1b1(mdo sde): //rma gar skad du/Ar+ya stu gar myat+to pa ra br-its+tshan+da ma ma hAm+b+han
1b2(mdo sde): sU tra/bod skad du/'phags pa blo gros rgya mtshos zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa
1b3(mdo sde): chen po'i mdo//bam po dang po//glengs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
1b4(mdo sde): thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//'di skad bdag gos thos pa dus gcig
2a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khag/de bzhin gu shegs pa'i spyod yul rin po che bko pa'i 'khor
2a2(mdo sde): khyams/de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas//bsod nams chen po'i rgyan gyi tshogs bsags pa/spyod pa chen po'i
2a3(mdo sde): mthun pa/sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi rnam par smin pas mngon par grub pa/byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i
2a4(mdo sde): gnas bstan pa mtha' yas pa/de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par sprul pas byin gyis brlabs pa/chags pa med
2a5(mdo sde): pa'i spyod yul gyi ye shes la 'jug pa/dga' ba rgya chen po bskyed pa/dran pa dang /blo gros dang /rtogs pas 'jug
2b1(mdo sde): pa/kun nas ma smad pa/ye shes kyis rnam par spyad pa de la ma chags par rtogs pas 'jug pa bskal par mu med par mngon par bstod pa/yon/
2b2(mdo sde): tan gyi tshogs thams cad dpag tu med pa na bzhugs te/bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni mnyam pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par sangs
2b3(mdo sde): rgyas/chos kyi 'khor lo nI shin tu bskor/slob ma shin tu dul ba mtha' yas pa'i tshogs ni mnga'/chos thams cad la mnga' dbang ni brnyes
2b4(mdo sde): sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa sgrub pa ni legs par mkhyen/dbang po'i dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni brnyes/bgra chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba yang
2b5(mdo sde): dag par 'joms pa la ni mkhas/sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa lhun gyis grub pa ni rgyun ma chad cing /dge slong 'bum phrag drug cu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang
2b6(mdo sde): thabs cig ste/thams cad kyang cang shes kyi sems dang ldan pa/nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi ga chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba yang dge par 'jom de la brtson pa/
3a1(mdo sde): /chos kyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras/chos zab mo la gnas pa/dmigs pa med pa'i chos kyis nges par byung ba/spyod
3a2(mdo sde): lam mdzes pa phun sum tshogs pa/sbyin gnas chen por gyur pa/de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' la shin tu zhugs pa sha stag go//byang chub sems
3a3(mdo sde): dpa'i dge 'dun chen po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dmigs pa med pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa rab tu thob pa/dbang bskur ba
3a4(mdo sde): dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa la zhugs pa/mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pas rnam par rtsen pa/byang
3a5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i gzungs mi zad pa'i za me tog rab tu thob pa/byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dpa' bar 'gro ba la dbang thob pa/byang chub semos
3a6(mdo sde): dpe'i so so yang dag par rig pa sems can thams cad tshim par byed pa rjes su thob pa/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa lhun gyis grub pas nges par
3b1(mdo sde): 'byung ba'i bkod pa'i rgyan gyi lhag pa'i bsam pa la shin tu gnas pa/tshad med grangs med/bsam gyis mi khyab/mtshungs pa med/gzhal du med/dpag tu
3b2(mdo sde): med pa la 'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mdzad mi zad pa zhes bya ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros tshad med pa zhes bya
3b3(mdo sde): ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spobs pa mtha' yas zhes bya ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dmigs pa med pa'i bsam gtan
3b4(mdo sde): pa zhes bya ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus gong na med ces bya ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus blo/
3b5(mdo sde): blos zhes bya ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rgyun mi 'chad pa zhes bya ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chags pa med pa'i
3b6(mdo sde): mi 'jigs pa brtsegs pa zhes bya ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don nges par brtags te lta ba zhes bya ba dang /de dag la sogs pa byang chub
3b7(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab mtshungs pa med gzhal du med dpag tu med pa dag dang yang thabs cig go//de nas bcom
4a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pas nges par 'byung ba sgrib pa med pa'i sgo//byang chub sems dpa'i lam pa 'od pa la dmigs pa stobs/
4a2(mdo sde): dang /mi 'jigs pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su 'grub pa'i ye shes kyi 'byung gnas/sa sa cad dbang bsgyur ba'i gsungs kyi phyur myi sbyor 'jug
4a3(mdo sde): pa/so so yang dag par rig pas rnam par gdon mi za ba la 'jug pa'i sgo//mngon par shes pa chen po'i ye shes la 'bab pas 'jug pa'i phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo phyo
4a4(mdo sde): mi ldog pa ston pa theg pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid du yang dag par 'du ba chos kyi dbyings 'dres pa med de tshul gcig pa rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa/sems can thams cad
4a5(mdo sde): kyi bsam pa dang /dbang po'i tshul la 'jug pa ston pa/snying po dang ldan pa/chos rnam par gdon mi za ba/bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'joms pa/
4a6(mdo sde): tshul bzhin du chos kyi tshul la 'bab cing 'jug pa/nyon mongs pa dang lte bar gyur pa thams cad 'dul ba/chags pa med pa'i ye shes la 'jug pa/kun tu bsngo
4a7(mdo sde): ba'i thabs mkhas pa shes pa ston pa/sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes la 'jug pa/chags pa med pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi sgo chos thams
4b1(mdo sde): cad ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par gdon mi za ba ston pa mi rtog cing rnam par mi rtog ste/mnyam pa nyid du 'jug pa rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zab mo rtogs par byed pa/bsod nams dang /
4b2(mdo sde): ye shes kyi tshogs chen po sogs pa/sangs rgyas kyi sku dang /snang dang thugs mnyam pa nyid kyi rkyen dang ldan pa/dran pa dang /blo gros dang /rtog pa dang /mos pa dang /shes
4b3(mdo sde): /rab mi zad pa mngon par sgrub pa/nyan thos kyi theg pas 'dul ba'i phyir 'phags pa'i tshul la 'jug pa/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas 'dul ba'i phyir lus dang sems rab tu dben par
4b4(mdo sde): shes pa/theg pa chen pos 'dul ba'i phyir thams cad mkhyen par dbang bskur ba rab tu thob pa/chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba'i tshul la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs de
4b5(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan brjod pa'i phyir gsung ngo //ston te/rab tu 'chad do//'dzin du 'jug go/klog tu 'jug go//shes par mdzad do//rnam par shes par mdzad
4b6(mdo sde): do//rab tu shes par mdzad do//rab tu 'god do//rnam par 'byed do//rnam par 'brel te//gsal bar mdzad do//yang dag par rab tu ston to//de nas bcom ldan
4b7(mdo sde): 'das kyis don shin tu rnam par nges pa 'dus pa chen po'i le'u'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i stong gsum gyi stong
5a1(mdo sde): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'og nusatI skyed nas bzung ba yan nad rin po che shod du'i da khyod gyi Sh+yams kyi bzh-i ldan pa'i brla nas yongs su gang
5a2(mdo sde): mcho gcig ltar kun tu snang ste/'di lta ste dper na/bsreg pa'i bskal pa 'angs nas chags pa 'byung ba'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong tshun pa 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad
5a3(mdo sde): chus yongs su gang bar 'gyur te/chu'i dkyil 'khor gyis yongs su 'khor ba de bzhin du/de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad chus yongs
5a4(mdo sde): gang ba'i rgya mcho gcig lta bur gnas par kun tu snang yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na grong dang /grong khyer dang /grong rdal dang /ljongs dang /sku
5a5(mdo sde): 'khor dang /rgyal po'i pho brang 'khyor rnams la 'ang sgrib bya med par kun tu snang ngo //dzAm+b+hi'i gling rnams dang /gling bzhi pa chen po rnams dang /rgya mtsho chen po rnams dang /
5a6(mdo sde): rab rnams dang /'dod pa na spyod pa'i lci'i bu rnams la'ang sngon ji ltar phyis kyang de bzhin du sgrib pa ci 'di med par de kho na bzhin du kun tu snang ngo //chu'i phung po de las kyang pad+ma chu
5a7(mdo sde): ba nai bai DUr+ya/sdong bu ni tsits+tshi mo/lo ma ni dzam+bu'i chu bo'i gser/bo 'i ni dpal gyi snying po/snying po ni rje'i snying po las grub po/mu tig gi dra bas ni khebs par byas pa
5b1(mdo sde): 'dab ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dang ni ldan pa/tshad ni rgyang grags kyi khyon tsam yod pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po byung ste/de dag rin po che'i bkod pa'i 'khor
5b2(mdo sde): kyis byams kyi gzhi las thal nas shing ta la srid du 'phags te/thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de'ang de'i tshe pad+ma la 'khod par kun tu snang ngo //pad+ma de dag las kyang 'od gang dag
5b3(mdo sde): gis phyogasra bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med grangs med po dag snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur pa'i 'od de lta bu dag byung ngo //de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de ngo mtshar du
5b4(mdo sde): gyur ni ma ji ltar sde ltas 'di dag kun tu sdang ba las na/kye ma'o 'di ni chos bstan pa chen por 'gyur ro zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod de/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
5b5(mdo sde): dpa' chen po byams pas cho 'phrul chen po de mthong nas pad+ma'i stan las langs te/bla gos phyag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga pad+ma'i snying po la btsugs te/bcom
5b6(mdo sde): ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di
5b7(mdo sde): cheb kyis yongs su gtams pa'i rgya mtsho gcig lta bur kun tu gda' ba dang /pad+ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di snyed gcig mngon par gyur pa 'di dag dang /bcom ldan 'das
6a1(mdo sde): sngon ma mthong ma thos pa'i cho 'phrul rgya chen po 'di dag kun tu gda' ba 'di dag su'i snga ltas lags/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis byung
6a2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pA la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//byams pa 'og gi phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
6a3(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khyams kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan rin po che dri ma dang bral ba dpag tu med pa bkod pas brgyan pa zhes
6a4(mdo sde): bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgya mtsho'i mchog menga'i blos rnam par rol pa mngon par 'phags pa'i mngon par mkhyen pa
6a5(mdo sde): zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa yod de/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rgya mtsho zhes bya ba/byang chub
6a6(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bgrang ba las 'das pa drug dang lhan cig tu nga la blta ba dang /phyag bya ba dang /bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /chos bstan pa 'dri lngas gtam gyi
6a7(mdo sde): rgyud 'ga' zhig dri ba'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'ong bar 'gyur te/'di ni de'i snga ltos so//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad
6b1(mdo sde): cechos gsol to//bcom ldan 'das ci lags/byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho thag ring po de srid cig na mchis shing chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan lags sam/bcom ldan//
6b2(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ri'i bu khyod ji ltar nga'i mdun na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho'ang 'jig rten gyi khams don 'dug ni
6b3(mdo sde): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan to//shA ri'i bu khyod kyis ji ltar nga dang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor 'di mthong ba de bzhin du/byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mchos kyang nga dang thams
6b4(mdo sde): cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor 'di mthong ngo //gsol pa/bcom ldan dadas kye ma'o ci tsam du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi
6b5(mdo sde): stobs 'di bsam gyis mi khyab ste/'di ltar thog ring po de srid ni mchis kyang mig gyis gzugs mthong ba la sgrib pa ma mchis shing rna bas sgra thos pa la sgrib pa ma mchis pa ni ngo
6b6(mdo sde): mtshar to//bcom ldan 'dis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yon tan gyi che ba nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'di thos nas su zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
6b7(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub tu sems me bskyed/gnas brtan shA ri'i bus bstan pa 'di bshad pa'i tshe lha'i bu nyi khri bzhi stong gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed
7a1(mdo sde): do//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rgya mtsho byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bgang ba las 'das pa drug gis kun nas
7a2(mdo sde): bskor te mdun du bdar nas lhan cig tu/bcom ldan 'das rgya mtsho'i mchog mnga' ba'i blos rnam par rol pa mngon par 'phags pa'i mngon par mkhyen pa'i de bzhin gshegs
7a3(mdo sde): pade la gsolan ste/bcom ldan 'das des gnang ste/sangs rgyas rnam par rol pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang /sems
7a4(mdo sde): gcig gis thob pa'i dran pas mige phye ba tsam gyis 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan rin po che'i dri ma dang bral ba dpag tu med pa bkod pas brgyan pa de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/
7a5(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dor phyin te/rin po che bkod pa'i 'khor gyi khyams kyi gzhi las thal nas shing ta la bdun tsam du mngon par 'phags te pad+ma'i snying po la 'dug
7a6(mdo sde): par kun tu snang ngo //de las gzhan po'i pad+ma'i snying po rnams la'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag 'khod par kun tu snang ngo //'og gi phyogs kyi sangs
7a7(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing tshad mad grangs med pa dag nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shin tu grangs med dpag tu mang padag chos nyin pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems
7b1(mdo sde): dpa' chen po glos rgya mtsho 'a phyi bzhin du 'brang bar gyur to//de nas phyogs bana'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+ma la 'khod pa/
7b2(mdo sde): dag gis rin po che bkod pa'i 'khor gyi khyams shin tu rgyus pas mdzes te/lham me/lhan ne/lhang nge'o//de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de ngo mtshar du gyur te/dga'
7b3(mdo sde): ba dang /dang ba dang /rab tu dga' bo thob nas thal mo sbyar te/byang chub sems dpa'ang dag la phyag+sa brtul to//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bro gros rgyu
7b4(mdo sde): mchis 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan rin po che dri ma dang bral bu dpag tu med pa bkod pas brgyan pa na yod pa'i me tog mya ngan med cing yid du 'ong ba mthong na dga' ba zhes bya ba 'da'am
7b5(mdo sde): bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang ldan pa/tshad rgyang grags kyi khyon tsam yod pa de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod par 'os pa/byang chub sems dpa'i bsamra pas rnam par dag pa sngon
7b6(mdo sde): gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas yongs su sbyangs pa/rnam par bkre ba/mig tu sdug pa/'khor thams cad tshim par byed pa kun nas 'od ldan pa kun nas shin tu yid du 'ong ba'i dri dang ldan
7b7(mdo sde): dra'i me tog de 'dra ba dgu mchod pa'i las kyi phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis sbyin sngar me tog gi char chen po mngon por phab ste/me tig gi tsher des rin po che bkode pa'i 'khor gyi khyems
8a1(mdo sde): /su mi bdun gyi yang rnam b+hi me tog dgram pa bkram par gyur to//rab tu de na pa'i brasam gtan gyi zlas zhes bya ba'i sil snyan yang bsgrags te/sim s+thAn/
8a2(mdo sde): byis des thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de bas mu gtan la snyoms par zhugs pa bzhin du bdag bde bas tshim par shes so//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
8a3(mdo sde): rmogs rgya mchis bcom ldan 'das la mchong ba 'di lta bu 'di byas nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi na bas la mgo bos phyug btsal te lani bdun bskor ba byas nas/bcom ldan
8a4(mdo sde): sbyi stong bral mo sbyar ti'i drug nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol te//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rgya me tshe'i mtshag mnga' ba'i blos rnam par ral
8a5(mdo sde): pa mingon par 'phags pa'i mngon par mkhyen pa bcom ldan 'das la gnod ba rdung dang/nyam du ba nyung ngam/bstung pa yang ngam/stobs dang ring bar reg da la gnasas ma
8a6(mdo sde): zhes spyan gsol to//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpe' chen po dag rnams cad kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la mgo bos phyag bcol te/lan bdun bskor
8a7(mdo sde): byas nas slang rang rang gi spyan pa 'khod do//de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i tshangs pa snying rje chen po sems pa zhes bya ba mya ngan med pa'i gling bzhi pa chen po na danas pa/tshangs
8b1(mdo sde): pa'i 'jig rten na 'dug pas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams chus yongs su gang ba'i rgya mtsho gcig lta bu'ang mthong /pad+ma rnam par bkra ba/blta na sdug pa/bye
8b2(mdo sde): khrag khrig brgya phrag stong mngon par byung ba'ang mthong /rin po che bkod pa 'khor gyi khyams byang chub sems dpas gang ba'ang mthong ste/mthong nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems te/
8b3(mdo sde): bsreg pa'i bskal pa ni ma byung na chus 'jog pa 'di byung ste/'di lta bu'i cho 'phrul 'di dag kun tu snang ba 'di la rgyu ci yod/bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ste/bcom ldan 'das
8b4(mdo sde): ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba chen po 'jig rten du byung ba'i rgyu gang lags/rkyen grang lags zhes zhu'o snyam mo//de nas tshangs pa snying rje chen po sems dpa'/tshangs pa 'bum phrag drug cu
8b5(mdo sde): rtsa brgyad kyis yongs su bskor te/mdun du bdar nas lhan cig tu tshangs pa'i 'jig rten nas mi snang bar gyur te/rin po che bkod pa'i 'khor gyi khyams su bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan
8b6(mdo sde): sngar stong gi bar snang la 'dug ste/lus btud thal mo sbyar nas/bcom ldan 'das nyid la phyog btsal to//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshangs pa snying rje chen po sems pas 'di skad
8b7(mdo sde): ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das 'di ci lags/gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di chab kyis yongs su gtams pa'i rgya mtsho gcig lta bung kun
9a1(mdo sde): tu gda' ba dang /pad+ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag 'di snyed cig byung ba 'di dang /de dag la'ang skyes bu dam pa dag mchis pa 'di lta bu kun tu gda' yang bcom
9a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni grong dang /grong khyer dang /grong rdal dang /ljongaso dang /yul 'khor dang /rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor
9a3(mdo sde): rngarnams la'ang sgrib pa ma mchis par kun tu gda' ba dang /dzam+bu'i gling rnams dang /gling bzhi pa chen po rnams dang /rgya mtsho rnams dang /ri rab rnams dang /'dod pa na
9a4(mdo sde): spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams la'ang sngon ji lta bar phyes kyang de bzhin du sgrib pa ci'ang ma mchis par de kho na bzhin du kun tu gda' bo de la/bcom ldan 'das 'di su'i byin gyi rlabs
9a5(mdo sde): kyis gyur snyam du bdag ngo mtshare cher gyur na 'di su'i snga ltas lags/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa snying rje chen po sems pa la 'di skad ces
9a6(mdo sde): bka' stsal to//tshangs pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho mchog mnga' ba'i blos rnam par rol pa mngon par 'phags pa'i mngon par mkhyen pa'i sangs
9a7(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan rin po che dri ma dang bral ba dpag tu med pa bkod pas brgyan ma nas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rgya mtsho byang chub
9b1(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bgrang ba las 'das pa dag drang lhan cig tu ngal blta ba dang /phyag bya ba dang /bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /'dus pa chen po'i lde'u chos kyi rnam
9b2(mdo sde): grangs 'di las gtam gyi rgyung 'ga' zhig yongs su dri ba'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'ong ba yin te/gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di
9b3(mdo sde): chus yongs su gang bar kun tu snang ba 'di ni de'i rnam par sprul pa'i byin gyis brlabs so//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das da dung du'ang 'dus pa chen po'i le'u yi chos kyi rnam grangs
9b4(mdo sde): 'chang ngam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/tshangs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i spobs pa ni/rgyun chad pa cung zad kyang med de/gang gi tshe khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs
9b5(mdo sde): pa cang mi gsung bar gyur pa mthong ba de'i tshe na'ang /du ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la chos rnam par nges pa'i gtam yang dag
9b6(mdo sde): par rab tu ston te/tshangs pa sangs rgyas kyi yul ni de ltar bsam gyis mi khyab bo//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gang 'di lta bu 'di rnam par sprul pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
9b7(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po blo bros rgya mtsho zhes bgyi ba de gang legs/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/tshangs pa khyod kyis pad+ma dpag tshad bcu'i khyod tsam yod pa de'i dkyil na
10a1(mdo sde): pad+ma'i snying po la rin po che bkod pa'i seng ge'i khri 'phang du shing ta la bdun tsam pa srog chags bye ba phrag mang pos phyag byas pa mthong ngam/gsol pa bcom ldan
10a2(mdo sde): 'das mthong lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/tshangs pa khyod kyis seng ge'i khri de la byang chub sems dpa' luso gser gyi kha dog tu 'dug pa/lus mtshan
10a3(mdo sde): dang dpe byad bzang pos legs par brgyan pa 'dug ste/gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ma gtogs par gzhan byang chub sems dpa'i lus zil gyis mnan nas 'dug pa/byang
10a4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' mang pos phyug byas pa mthong ngam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/tshangs pa 'di ni byang chub
10a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rgya mtsho zhes bya ba ste/'di ni de'i rnam par sprul pa'o//de nas tshangs pa snying rje chen po sems pas byang chub sems dpa' sems
10a6(mdo sde): dpa' chen po blo gros rgya mtsho la phyag btsal nas tshig 'di skad ces smras so//bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul 'od lta bu dag thob par gyur cig/
10a7(mdo sde): gang dag byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho'i ming thos pa'i sems can de dag ni rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang skyes bu dam pa 'dzir
10b1(mdo sde): ming thos nas gzugs kyis lus kyang mthong bas bdag gis kyang rnyed pa legs par rnyed do//bcom ldan 'das 'dus pa chen po'i le'u yi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yun ji srid gcig tu 'chad/
10b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/tshangs pa ji srid du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshe 'tshad gnas pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang byang chub sems
10b3(mdo sde): dka' 'di dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ba dang /klog pa dang /yang dag par rab tu ston pa dang /rgyas par byed kyi bar du'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshangs pa 'das pa dang /ma 'ongs pa
10b4(mdo sde): dang /da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub ni 'di'i nang du 'dus pa'i phyir ro//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rgya mtshos 'khor thams
10b5(mdo sde): cad rgya cher yang dag par rab tu dga' bar bya ba dang /tshangs po snying rje chen po sems pa 'dun par bya ba dang /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di brgyan par bya ba dang /bdag nyid kyi shes rab dang /
10b6(mdo sde): spobasdu pa'i stobs nye bar bstan pa'i phyir pad+ma dang lhan cig seng ge'i khri dang lhan cig tu steng gi bAr snang la shing ta la bdun srid tsam na 'dug ste/de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so//
10b7(mdo sde): khrag khrig sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul snyed kyi zhing rnams 'das pa'i 'og legs na//rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gnas zhing yon tan kun ldan rab mdzes pa//de na 'dren pa'i
11a1(mdo sde): bstan pa rgya mtshos blo thugs mtshungs pa ming bzhugs te//der ni bdag gis thub pa'i chos thos gyur te tos nas de bzhin bzung //bdag ni stobs bcu ldan la
11a2(mdo sde): blta bar bgyi dang de bzhin phyag bgyi dang //byang chub sems dpa' khyu mchog 'di rnams phan tshun dri slad 'dir mchis te//skyob la phyag bgyi bas ni chos rgyal mtshungs med
11a3(mdo sde): khyod la 'dir phyag 'tshal//sangs rgyas mchod pa gang lags rgya chen shin tu rgyas pas mchod pa 'tshal//gang gis gzugs la gzugs su mi rtog tshor po 'dus bgyis ma
11a4(mdo sde): logs shing //rnam par shes pa'ang tshor gsum bzhin du rtog par shin tu rnam dag ste//gang zhig 'dren la mtshan du ma lags skyes dang rigs su ma lags rtogs//mig
11a5(mdo sde): ldan des ni chos kyi rgyal po dri med yang dag don du mthong //bdag gam bdag med ces pa'i mtha' de gnyi ga me len mi 'dor te//nong du gyur pa zhi zhing thugs kyang zhi ste phyi rol rgyug
11a6(mdo sde): mi mnga'/mi rtog rnam mi rtog cing rtog bral thub pa'i thugs ni num mkha' 'dra//des ni phyogs bcu'i bde gshegs chos kyi rgyal mtshan gsal mdzad rnams la mchodado//ga
11a7(mdo sde): blo sbyin pa rnams la 'di ni sgyu ma len pa stong pa nyid//g.yo ba med pa'i yid kyis nor rnams de dag re ba med par gtong //byang chub don du nges kyi lta bar nges min spros pa gnas
11b1(mdo sde): ma yin//gung blo sems can nyes pa mthar 'byin de ni sbyin bdag ser sna med//de ni rab tu zhi bas zhi ste dag med yid med lus gdung med//gang drung med pas bcing ba rgya chen pal/
11b2(mdo sde): te nges pa dbang po zhi//badrug med shes par gnos nas byang chub dmigs pa med cing de mi 'dor//khrims gnas blo ldan khrims 'tshal mthar byed 'dod pa tshul khrims dri mo med//
11b3(mdo sde): chos rnams skad cig par ni rtogs par shes bya rnams lo smras pa med//nam mkha' mtshungs pa'i yid kyis 'gro ba 'di dag sgyu ma ji bzhin mthong //gang zhig lus ni dum bu dum bur//
11b4(mdo sde): bcad kyang yid ni khro mi 'gyur//gang zhig byang chub brtul zhugs gnas pa'i blo ldan mkhas de bzod pa smra//gang zhig chos rnams chu zla chu bur mnyam zhing sgyu ma smig rgyu 'dra//rtogs
11b5(mdo sde): nas mi min srog ma yin zhing shed bu ldan pa ma yin mthong //byang chub dang ni sems can tshogs mi ri migs kyang byang chub gzhan don brtson//yul 'dir gang zhig sgeg pa med pa de ni
11b6(mdo sde): brtson 'grus the mor phyin//gang gis sems ni yul la chags pa med cing the tshom yod min la//sems can gzhan gyi sems kyi spyod pa dus gsum gyur pa'ang shes pa dang /
11b7(mdo sde): gang sems spyod par gyur pa gang yin de yi bdud kyis mi shes pa//pha rol phyin thob bsam gtan dang ni mngon par shes la blo gros gan so//gang zhig sangs rgyas rnams kyi gsung kun
12a1(mdo sde): nyan cing de bzhin 'dzin byed pa//shAl pa dpagra na med par smra kyang spobs pa rgyan chad mi 'gyur te//sangs rgyas chos rtogs sems can mi nyud de ni gang dubyung
12a2(mdo sde): granas med pa//bcom ldan thub nyid mkhyen gter shes rab ldan zhing 'jig rten gsum na dpa'//gang zhig pha rol phyin pa'i pha rol gshegs min ma gshegs min//gang
12a3(mdo sde): zhig sems can spyod pa mthar phyin mi gnas gakho ba mi mnga' zhing //yon tan kun mthar gang phyin yon tan rnams la rlom sems mi mnga' ba//thub pa'i dbang po shAkyas sangs
12a4(mdo sde): rgyas khyu mchog de lo mgo bos 'jug/'od zer rnam dag nyi mas srin bu me khyer 'od rnams zil gyis mnan//me lce rtse mthon bskal mtha'i me yis la ji snyed yod pa sreg/ri
12a5(mdo sde): mchog ri rab kyis ni sa la yod pa'i ri kun zil gyis mnan//shAkya khyu mchog spu 'dris 'jig rten gsum gyi 'od gzhan zil du brlag/zhing brgya dag nas lhags pa'i byang chub
12a6(mdo sde): sems dpa' khyu mchog ji snyed pa//de dag gtso bo khyod kyi mdog dang gzi brjid kyis ni tshim par gyur//gang dag smon lam ji ltar btab pa de ltar kuni gyis mthun par mthong //
12a7(mdo sde): bdag cag gang nas ma 'ongs rang gi zhing nyid na ni 'dug par shes//ji ltar gang gis rang rig de ltar khyod kyi gsung ni shin tu 'jug/srid pa gsum na skad rnams ji snyed
12b1(mdo sde): mchis de dang mthun par 'jug/rdul gyi rdul dang mi rnams kyis ni sems kyi bsam pa bgrang nus srid//thub pa'i gsung dbyangs tshad med nam mkha' 'dra 'di dbrang bar nus ma
12b2(mdo sde): lags//nam mkha'i mtha' dang mi rnams kyi ni mtha' ma bgrang bar mi nus te//'khor ba'i sngon gyi mtha' ma nyid ni rnam pa kun tu babrang mi nus//nam mkha'i mtha' dang 'khor
12b3(mdo sde): ba'i mtha' ni mi yis bgrang bar nus kyang srid//sangs rgyas mkhyen dang ting 'dzin tshul khrims yul ni gang du'ang shos mi nus//gzhal yis bskal par gang gi bsngags pa brjod
12b4(mdo sde): par sla ba ma lags pa//khyu mchog dpag yas chos kyi dbang phyug 'dren pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//skye bo grang dag shes dang mos pasdu sangs rgyas che ba rjes rtogs pa//de dge
12b5(mdo sde): gis ni blo gros bsam yas rmed byung kun lhag 'dren pa mthong //de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rgya mtshos tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras nas bAr snang
12b6(mdo sde): de las babs te//bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du//
12b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o//de skad
13a1(mdo sde): sa gsol byad /rlom ldan da kyis byung chubs mas ba na smra chen pomags rgya mtshol 'dis ces ga //rigs dz+dza
13a2(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dge par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang /des bye de dang dengs lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems rangs par hU~M/
13a3(mdo sde): skad ces bka' skyel pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dang 'bro gros rgya mtshos 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
13a4(mdo sde): pa rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin shin tu dkar ba dri mi med pa'i phyag r+b+he zhes bgyi ba mchis te/ting nge 'dzin de la rab tu gnas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med
13a5(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhes bdag gis thos nas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shin tu dkar ba dri ma med pa'i
13a6(mdo sde): b+hag+hA m+b+ham+b+hiN+Di nge 'dzin rje lta 'thob pa dang /srid du shin tu dkur ba dri ma me ba zhes bsgri pa bcom ldan 'dus de bzhin gshegs pas de legs par bshad du gas/
13a7(mdo sde): 'dzin dal 'jug ci'i ra 'jug pa gi dzes nas/byang chub sems 'i sems da 'chen po rnam pa ting nge yidzin cho sa myur bye med pa yang dag pa rdzogs pa bya
13b1(mdo sde): gas /ma ldan du ga shigs sa / shA / sa / pa tshu
13b2(mdo sde): byams da na gyi nams marnas 'di ga sa pa/skyer to//skyes bla ma pa 'gas sa 'i gsasamadub di shing spyod tshul sbyin/de
13b3(mdo sde): mye pa 'a ge 'jig na smon par rdzogs /chud bar 'gyur sa pa phyi/ mi ldan sgyogs s+ho sa/
13b4(mdo sde): 'bum dzin ldan sa cha ma na dus m+b+ha ny+dzan du/ma ldan ngas sa dis sa ge stsal/'dil byed
13b5(mdo sde): mas pa mas de 'dzin ldan ba khrus pa ni pa yin te/ N+DI ma pa dang ldanig/sa pa'i snod ra rgyu sa pasags pa/du
13b6(mdo sde): na shes gtan gyis yongs su zin pa/sangs rgyam kyis byin ma bamangs pa/rgyu stobs can yon te de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mam
14a1(mdo sde): nod r+m+ma/ma na na/ ga sa sa gag sa na na zhes na na
14a2(mdo sde): snyan pa thos so//'khor phun du ma rdzogs pa 'ang mthong zhing chags pa med pa'i mkhyen pa la rjes la/rgyu phrul gyi cho 'phrul lA mAM/kun brjod pa'i cho 'phrul lam/rjes su bstan
14a3(mdo sde): cho 'phrul gyis sems can 'dul ba mdzad pa 'ang mdzod nas sems can rnams la snying rje chen po skyes te/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/brtson 'bras
14a4(mdo sde): brnams pa yin te/dge ba'i chos yongs su 'chol ba la brtson zhing thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes brjed pa med pas sems yongs su dag por rnal 'byor du byed do//de sem
14a5(mdo sde): yongs su dag pas ting nge 'dzin yongs su dag pa rab tu 'thob bo//blo gros rgya mtsho 'odi lta ste dper na rigs 'phags pa'i nor bu rin po che nor bu mkhan mkhas pa'i lag tu son pa/
14a6(mdo sde): tsam na yongs su dag pa dang /shin tu dkar ba dang /mthing bu dang bral ba dang /skyon med par gyur pa de srid du yongs su sbyangs na/skyes bu mkhas pa nor bu rin po che la mkhas
14a7(mdo sde): pa rnams 'du bar 'gyur ro//blo gros rgya mtsho de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i rigs 'phags pas thams cad mkhyen par sems bskyed pa rin po che bskyed nas/bla na med
14b1(mdo sde): payang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ji tsam na mthing bu dang bral zhing rlom sems kyi mthing bu dang sprul bar 'gyur ba de srid du/byang chub
14b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dang 'chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su sbyang ba bya ba dang /thos pa la mkhas pa yongs su snang ba bye bas thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa'i rin po che de yongs su
14b3(mdo sde): sbyangs ni phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'dul zhing shin tu dkar ba dri ma med pa'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin 'dri 'dra 'thob bo//bri gros rgya mche 'dro lta spyi dper na/rigs
14b4(mdo sde): 'ophyogs pa'i nor bu rin po che de ni rin po che'i rigs dgu las shin tu 'das par 'byung ste/dgu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/gsor gyi rigs dang /dngul gyi rigs dang /shel gyi
14b5(mdo sde): rigs dang /baiDUn+ya'i rigs dang /rdo'i snying po'i rigs dang /spug gI rigs dang /mu tI b+hi dmar po'i rigs dang /kaM sa ra'i rigs dang /dpal gyi snying po'i rigs dang /nor
14b6(mdo sde): ba 'i rigs dgra pa 'di dag laste shin tu 'dus nas/drim med cing rnam par dag pa'i 'di ces bya ba'i nor thun pa na pa'i rigs de las de nin pang med pa'i nor byin gyi
14b7(mdo sde): tsheni 'gyur te/de 'khor los sbyi pa'i rgyal po'i yongs su spyad par 'gyur gyi/de ma yin pa'i sems rnon gzhan rnams kyi ma yin te/nor bu rin po che de'i 'od gang yin pa des ni
15a1(mdo sde): de ma yin pa'i nor bu rin po che gzhan rnams kyi dod mog mog por byed do//blo gros rgya mtsho de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen par sems laskyed pa'i rin po che de'i
15a2(mdo sde): rin po che'i rigs dgu las shin tu 'das par byung ste/dgu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/so so'i skye bo dge ba'i rin po che'i rigs dang /dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'i rin po che'i
15a3(mdo sde): ribras dang /chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i rin po che'i rigs dang /mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa rin po che'i rigs dang /rgyun du zhugs pa rin po che'i rigs dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba
15a4(mdo sde): rin po che'i rigs dang /phyir mi 'ong ba rin po che'i rigs dang /dgra bcom pa rin po che'i rigs dang /rang sangs rgyas rin po che'i rigs dang /rin po che'i rigs dgu po 'di dag las
15a5(mdo sde): shin tu 'das nas bcu pa sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa snying rje chen po'i rin po che'i rigs las thams cad mkhyen par sems bskyed pa de rin po che 'byung ste/de
15a6(mdo sde): yongs su sbyangs na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad zil gyis non cing /sems can thams cad kyi rgyud rnams la'ang snang bar byed do//blo gros rgya mtsho 'di lta ste dper na//
15a7(mdo sde): nor bu rin po che chen po de gang gi tshe spyang bzod cing gnod pa bzod la/phug nas kyang nyes par ma gyur/no bu rin+d+ha po che chen po de ni 'di ltar sems can bsod nams byas pa/dge
15b1(mdo sde): ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa rnams la phan par byed par 'gyur ro//tho gros rgya na tshe de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen par sems bskyed pa rin po che de'ang gang gi tshe sbyang bzod cing gnod pa bzod la/drug
15b2(mdo sde): nas kyang nyes par ma gyur na thams cad mkhyen par sems bskyod po rin po che skyon thams cad dang bral ba de 'di ltar sems can thams cad la phan par byed par 'gyur ro//blo gros rgya mchod la
15b3(mdo sde): thams cad mkhyen par sems bskyed pa rin po che de sbyang ba gang zhe na/'di lta ste/sdom pa gsum gyis dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yongs su dag pa dang /byams pa'i rjes su 'jug pas
15b4(mdo sde): sems can thams cad la byamaso shing dang ba dang /snying rje'i rjes su 'jug pas sems can thams cad kyi bya ba ci yod snyam pa la brtson pa dang /dga' ba'i rjes su 'jug pas sems
15b5(mdo sde): can thams cad chos la sbyor ba dang /btang snyoms kyi rjes su 'jug pas sems can thams cad la mi 'tsho zhing rtag tu sems drang ba dang /g.yo dang sgyu med pas phan pa'i dngos po bsam
15b6(mdo sde): par gyur pa dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad brtsam pa la lhag pa'i bsam pa sbyor ba dang /rang shes kyi sems kyis dran pa dang shes bzhin dang ldan pa dang /sems shin tu dul bas
15b7(mdo sde): skems las su rung ba dang /dgang bslabs sbyangs pa'o yon tan yo byad basbyangs pa'i cho ga dang ldan pa dang /gAs pa slebs 'phags pa'i rigs chag shes pa dang /bla ma dang
16a1(mdo sde): sbyin gnas rnams la 'dud cing rab tu 'dud pa dang /nga rgyal med pas khengs pa dang rtsod pa rnam par spong ba dang /sems nges par sems pas nga rgyal las
16a2(mdo sde): kyang nga rgyal rnam par spong ba dang /rnyog pa med pas sems gsal ba dang /bdag la mi bstod pas bdag shes pa la 'jug pa dang /gzhan la mi smod pas sems can rjes su srung //
16a3(mdo sde): ba dang /sprin gyi sems kyis chos la gus pa dang /de'i don so sor myong bas chos don du gnyer ba dang /de la gzhol 'bab pas chos 'dod pa dang /nyon mongs pa med pa la
16a4(mdo sde): gnas pas chos la dga' ba dang /chos ma yin pa rnam par spong bas chos yongs su 'tshal ba dang /rtag tu ngo tsha shes pas dkon mchog gsum la dad pa rgyun mi 'chad pa dang /las
16a5(mdo sde): kyi rnam par smin pa la yid ches pas dge ba thams cad yid la byed pa'i bya ba la 'jug pa dang /drang bas spyod lam sbas pa dang /khengs pa med pas mnyen pa dang /zhi gnas
16a6(mdo sde): yongs su 'chil bas rgod pa dang bral ba dang /blo brtan pas snyom las med pa dang /rab tu mi g.yo ba so sems ri dang mtshungs pa dang /rjes su chags pa dang khong khro ba dang bral
16a7(mdo sde): bas sems sa dang mtshungs pa dang /bsam pa dag pas sems chu dang mtshungs pa dang /rlom sems med pas sems ma dang mtshungs pa dang /gnas med pas sems rlung
16b1(mdo sde): dang mtshungs pa dang /shin tu dri ma med pas sems nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims 'khrugs pa med pa'i phyir rab tu 'byung ba la gzhol ba dang /lus
16b2(mdo sde): dben pa'i phyir dgon pa la dga' ba dang /sems dben pa'i phyir chos la spyod pa dang /de byed cing yang dag par sgrub pa'i phyir tshig bden pa dang /kha 'og tu lus 'khrus par byed pa'i
16b3(mdo sde): phyir ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa dang /nyon mongs pas mi rdzo ba'i phyir sems dpa' ba dang /shin tu nyams pa med pa'i phyir ba slab pa yang dag par 'dzin pa dang /kha n+da mtho ba pa
16b4(mdo sde): rob la'ang 'jigs par lta ba'i phyir tshul khrims lhod pa med pa dang /skye bar smon pa med pa'i phyir tshul khrims sgron med pa dang /gcig tu dkar po spyod pa'i phyir tshul khrims thun
16b5(mdo sde): chags ma yin pa dang /byang chub kyi yan lag sbyang ba'i phyir dge ba'i bshos gnyen la bsten pa dang /mig yongs su dag pa'i phyir 'od zer thogs pa med pa dang /rna ba yongs su
16b6(mdo sde): dag pa'i phyir sbrul thegs pa med pa dang /sna yongs su dag pa'i phyir dri la thogs pa med pa dang /lce yongs su dag pa'i phyir ro lo thogs pa med pa dang /luste yongs su dag pa'i phyir/
16b7(mdo sde): rig bya la thogs pa med pa dang /yid yongs su dag pa'i phyir chos la thogs pa med pa'o//blo gros rgya mtsho gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ni mi sdug pa shin tu bsgoms pa'i phyir
17a1(mdo sde): 'dod chags kyi gdung ba dang bral ba yin/byams pa shin tu bsgoms pa'i phyir zhe sdang gi gdung pa dang bral ba yin/rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la
17a2(mdo sde): shin tu brtags pa'i phyir gti mug gi gdung ba dang bral ba yin/dbang po rnams la shin tu brtags pa'i phyir sgrib pa dang bral ba yin/stobs yongs su dag pa'i phyir
17a3(mdo sde): sgrib pa yang dag par bsal ba yin/'byung bar bya ba'i khams yongs su dag pa'i phyir kun nas ldang ba gsal po yin//yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i phyir 'dod pa dang /zhe sdang
17a4(mdo sde): dadeng /gti mug dang /'jigs pa dang /nga rgyal dang bral ba yin/chos kyi sbyin pa la ser ste med pa yin/zang zing gi sbyin pa la kun 'dzin pa'i sems med pa yin/theg
17a5(mdo sde): pa dman pa la 'dod pa med pa'i phyir byang chub kyi bsam pa yin/dbang po sbas pa'i phyir nang nye ba ri zhi ba yin/skyon shin tu mthong ba'i phyir phyi rol nye bar zhi ba yin/sdig pa
17a6(mdo sde): thams cad mi byed pa'i phyir 'khor pos skrag pa yin/dge ba'i rtsa ba sogs pas mi ngoms pa'i phyir yid yongs su mi skyo ba yin/chu bo bzhi las bsgral ba'i phyir chos kyi gru chen
17a7(mdo sde): po yang dag par sbyor ba yin/pha rol tu 'gro ba'i phyir stegs dang zam pa shin tu bcas pa yin/thang la shin tu gnas pa'i phyir 'dam dang 'obs las brgal ba yin te/blo gros
17b1(mdo sde): mad lta byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' nan po gang gi tshe chos 'di lta bu dag gis dag pa dang /yongs su dag pa dang /sbyin pa byugs pa dang /rgyal khrims yongs su dag
17b2(mdo sde): po dri ni thams cad mkhyen par sems bskyed pa rin po che de spyong ba'o//de nas de'i tsha bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gasbyongs so//lus dang ngag rnams dang ni yid bsdams
17b3(mdo sde): shing //rnam par dag pa'i las lam bcu la klob/bya mos pas sems can kun la yang dge lta//'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems spyod yin//snying rje ldan pas gzhan gyi bya bar brtson/
17b4(mdo sde): dga' dang ldan pas chos la pha rol sbyor//btang snyoms ldan pa sna chos mchog 'che ba med//'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems skyong yin//rtag tu dreng zhing g.yoni rnam par spangs//
17b5(mdo sde): gzhan le phan byed sdig pa rnam par spangs//lhag bsam dge ba ci yod rjes su 'jug/'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems sbyong yin//shes rab rab 'jug dran dang shes bzhin
17b6(mdo sde): can//sems rib dul bas sems ni las su rung //sbyangs pa'i yon tan rnams dang gso sla ba//'di ni thams cad mabyon pa'i sems skyong yin//'phags rigs chogs shes
17b7(mdo sde): pa dang tshig mnyen dang //bla ma rnams la rtag tu 'dung byed dong //rtsod brdzun nga rgyal spangs dang stobs ldan dang //brnyas dang log pan mo yang byed ma yin//sems ni nges
18a1(mdo sde): sems mngon pa'i nga rgyal dral//rnyog pa med cing rab tu dngas la gsal//bdag shes pa la rim gyis 'jug par byed//gzhan la mi brnyas sems can
18a2(mdo sde): rjes su srung //chos la gus par dga' zhing gus dang bcas//bsgrims te nyon mongs rnams ni spong bar byed//chos don gnyer zhing chos la rton par byed//rtag tu chos don
18a3(mdo sde): gzhol zhing 'bab par byed//chos la brtson zhing nyon mongs med pa bsgoms//chos min spangs shing chos rnams yongs su 'tshol//dkon mchog gsum la dad pa mi
18a4(mdo sde): byephyed ldan//'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems sbyong yin//rtag tu 'dzem dang ldan zhing nyes spyod ldog/de bzhin gshegs pa kun la ngo ches sdom//khrel yod ldan zhing 'dir
18a5(mdo sde): ni dbang po bsdams//'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems spyod yin//rab tu sbyor bso las kyi bya bar 'jug/bag yod pas na mtha' gnyis 'dzin mi byed//mkhas
18a6(mdo sde): pa sten pa'i chos rnams rjes rtogs pa//'di ni thams cad mkhyen po'i sems sbyong yin//spyod lam gyis ni drang ba'i dngos dang ldan//khengs pa med pas rtag tu mnyen pa
18a7(mdo sde): nyid//zhi gnas cho ga ldan pas rgod pa med//'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems spyong yin//blo ni rab tu brten pas nyams pa med//lhag mthong la ni re rgyal
18b1(mdo sde): rdo bzhin te//dam bcas brtan zhing bar skabs nyams pa med//'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems spyong yin//sdug bsngal bde bas mi g.yos sa dang mtshungs//bsam pa dag
18b2(mdo sde): pas chu ltar dri ma 'khru//rtag tu rlom sems med pas me dang mtshungs//gnas med rgyo bas rtag tu rlung dong 'dra//shin tu dri ma med pas mkha' mnyam sems//rab tu byung ba sa
18b3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bstan pa rnyed//lus ni dben zhing zhi bas dgon par dga'//sems dben pas ni chos kyi mchog la spyod//dge bar bden par smra dang yang dag sgra//ji skad smras pa
18b4(mdo sde): de ni de bzhin byed//nyon mongs mi rje dge la dpa' bo mchog/shin tu bslabs pas bslab pa yang dag 'dzin//de la lhod pa nam yang yod ma yin//kha ni mtho chung la'ing rtag
18b5(mdo sde): tu 'jigs//byang chub mchog rgyu'i tshul khrims nyams pa med//yon tan dkar spyod tshul khrims 'dres pa med//dge ba'i bshes gnyen ston cing sdig pa min//rdzogs pa'i
18b6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i bye phyir brta ni//de ltar de yi mig ni dri med kyis//'jig rten kun li 'od zer mnyam par lta//mkhas pa de ni sna tshogs sgra thos nas//dga' med rengs pa
18b7(mdo sde): mod cing zhum pa med//tho ldan de ni sgra yi don rtogs shes//de yi rna ba de ltar rnam dag nyid//sna yis dri dang lce yis ro rnams dang //lus kyis reg dang yid kyis chos rnams
19a1(mdo sde): la//reg gnas su khengs ma dung zhum pa med//de ltar de yi dbang po dag pa nyid//chags pas mi chags sdang ngas sdang ba med//dwa ti mug ma rmongs mi sdug/
19a2(mdo sde): gnas pa can//byams la dga' zhing rkyen gyis chos sems pa//'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems sbyong yin//sgrib pa lnga po dag gis bsgribs pa med//de ltar des ni
19a3(mdo sde): dbang po lnga yang bsgoms//de ni gang du'ang sgrib med bcings pa'ang med//stobs rnams lnga po dag la rab tu gnas//kun nas ldang ba shes shing byung ba nyid//tshul bzhin ma
19a4(mdo sde): yin spangs shing tshul bzhin gnas//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi la sten//yang dag spong dang rdzu 'phrul rkang par ldan//byang chub yan lag sten dang rtag tu ldan//brtan pa du ni
19a5(mdo sde): yan lag brgyad la mchog/de na 'dod dang sdang dang 'jigs mi 'gro/gti mug bral zhing dbang po shin tu bsdams//chos kyi sprin la de ni ser sna med//slob dpon nam yang chos
19a6(mdo sde): 'chab mi byed do//zang zing med par chos ni ston par byed//des na de ni byang chub sems dga' 'gyur//de ni zang zing rnams la kun 'dzin med//rnam smin re med 'dod dgu
19a7(mdo sde): gtong bar byed//sbyin dang snyan dang don byed don mthun pos//de ni sems can brgya dag rab tu sdud//de yi byang chub sems ni brjed mi 'gyur//theg pa dman la nam yang
19b1(mdo sde): re ba med//ji lta ji ltar sangs rgyas yon tan mthong //de lta de ltar dre bas ri rab 'dra//nad ni rab zhi sreng pa'i nyes pa mthong //de ni gzhan gyi 'khrul la lha mi byed//'dus byas
19b2(mdo sde): nyes pa dag kyang shin tu mthong //'khor bas 'jigs pas sdig pa rnams mi byed//legs spyod khur khyer bas ni skyo ba med//zhing rnams spyong par 'dod pa nyams pa ming //chos
19b3(mdo sde): rnams yongs su bzung bas zhum pa med//sems can thar byeng rgyu la 'jigs pa med//chu bo bzhi po dag las bsgral ba'i phyir//de ni chos gru yang dag sbyor bar byed//lus can mya
19b4(mdo sde): ngan 'das lam gzud pa'i phyir//de ni stegs dang zam pa 'cha' bar byed//'dam las 'das shing 'obs las brgal nas ni//thang la gnas shing de dag 'jigs med gnas//
19b5(mdo sde): 'jigs pas g.yen spyos rnams la 'jigs med ston//bdag nyid rgol nas de dag gzhan yang sgrol//gang dag chos tshul 'di dag rnam drug cing //rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems
19b6(mdo sde): brtan kha lo sgyur//de dag byang chub sems mchog rnam dag ste//nyon mongs dri mas gzhar yang gos mi 'gyur//de ste nam mkha' nyon mongs bya bar nus//de la rjes kyang bstan
19b7(mdo sde): par nus srid kyi//rang bzhin 'ad gsal rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems//de ni nam yang nyon mongs byar mi nus//thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems rin po che yongs su sbyang ba'i le
20a1(mdo sde): ste dang po'o///'phags pa thogs rgya mchos zhus pa//bam po gnyis pa//blo gos rgyu mtshathams cad mkhyen par sems bskyed pa na
20a2(mdo sde): po che de'i gnod pa bzod pa ni ji lta bu/thams cad mkhyen par sems bskyed pa rin po che de'i gnod pa ni gang zhe na/blo gros rgya mtsho 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
20a3(mdo sde): thams cad mkhyen par sems bskyed pa rin po che de ltar bskyed nas/'phags pa ma yin pa tshul khrims 'chal pa'i sems can rnams sam/bdud rnams sam/bdud kyi ris kyi lha
20a4(mdo sde): rnams sam/bdud kyi byin gyis brlabs pa rnams sam/bdud kyi pho nya rnams kyis gtses sam/rnam par gtses sam/bskyed dam/kun tu bskyed dme/dkrugs sam/kun
20a5(mdo sde): tu dkrugs sam/bsdigs sam/brdegs kyang byang chub tu bsam pa'i sems bskyed pa de las mi phyed pa dang /sems can thams cad rab tu thar bar bya ba'i snying rje chen pos brtson
20a6(mdo sde): 'grus brtsams pa las mi phyed pa dang /dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs mi 'chad par bya bar brtson pa las mi phyed pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par bsgrub pa'i dge
20a7(mdo sde): bi'i rtsa ba la sbyor ba las mi phyed pa dang /mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ba'i bsod nams kyi chags bsags pa las mi phyed pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs
20b1(mdo sde): su sung ba mngon par bsgrubs pa'i brtson pa las mi byed pa dang /wa.u dang srog 'dor shing dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin par mngon par brtson pa las mi pyod pa dang /sems can las
20b2(mdo sde): yongs su sbyin par bye la mngan par ban song bdag me pal michags palas mi byed pa kyi/de hU~Mg pa'i gams pathun sa ma tshugs pa myong bas sems ca thams
20b3(mdo sde): byos kyang bcing /'bying ma byis pa dang /spyad pa dang /ba shung babyas ng+gA mdzong /rnams sbyin thams cad kyis smos sum bsdigasas mngon du brjod dum/ngan du sgyu
20b4(mdo sde): pa'i tshig gi lam yang bzod/sems can thams cad kyi gnod pa'ang bzong /sems can thams cad kyi khur yang bzang /sgrol bas myed skyob med/sum med/kun tus
20b5(mdo sde): pamyed/sgyid lug pa med/yi chad pa med kyi stobs nye bar ston par byed/mthu skyed par byed cing brtson 'grus rlom la rtul bas rtul bar byed/sprob skyed cing rmongs pa'i sems mi
20b6(mdo sde): 'dzin to//de skyes kyang slar mig she/brdegs kyang slar mi rdog/khros kyang slar mo kho//'khrugs kyang slar mi 'khrugs te/de ltar sems baglang ba'i go cha gyon no//'di
20b7(mdo sde): lha ste/theg sa chen po 'do 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa'i thig //dkyi'i phyir zhe na/sems can de dag ni rgyun gyi rjes su 'gro ba dag go/bdag ni dz+nyAn las
21a1(mdo sde): ldog par rtsol bar 'dod pa'o//sems can de dag ni phan tshun mi mthun pa dag go//bdag ni sems can thams cad kyi mi mthun pa spang ba'i phyir go na bgos
21a2(mdo sde): pa'o//sems can de dag ni gnod sems la dpa' ba dag go//bdag ni bzod pa dang /nges pa yongs su 'chol ba'o//sems can de dag ni gcig la gcig yongs su 'drid par
21a3(mdo sde): gnas pa dag go//bdag ni shes rab kyis ngoms pa yongs su 'tshol ba'o//gal te sems can de dag phyogs bcu'i rab tu dbye bas rab tu dbye ba ji snyed pa de dag thams cad ral
21a4(mdo sde): gri dang /mdung thung dang mda' bo che lag na thogs te/bdag gi phyi bzhin 'brang yang /sa phyogs gang du 'greng ngam 'dug gama'o chag gam nya la yang rung ste/byang chub kyi sems
21a5(mdo sde): skye bar 'gyur pa dang /sbyin pa'i sems sam/tshul khrims kyi sems sam/bzod pa'i sems sam/brtson 'grus kyi sems sam/bsam gtan gyi sems sam/shes
21a6(mdo sde): rab kyi sems sam/thos pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sems skye bar 'byung ba'i sa phyogs der de dag lus rgya shug gi lo ma'i brgya che tsam du gtubs sam/rnam par gtor tam/rnam
21a7(mdo sde): par bcom mam/sems can de dag thams cad las gzhan mi byed par rgyun du gshe'am/sdigs sam/smod dam/be shung ngam/tshig ngan pa dang ngag rtsub po smra ba
21b1(mdo sde): de ltar gyur kyang bdag gis sems can 'ga' la'ang 'khrug pa'i sems bskyed par mi bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/sngon gyi mtha' nas 'khor badzad myed pAr byas te/gang du bdag
21b2(mdo sde): gis lus 'di sems can dmyal bar song ngam/dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ngam//gshin rje'i 'jig rten du song ngam/mir gyur kyang rung ste 'dod pa'i zos kyi dri mas dri me can du
21b3(mdo sde): gyur nas chos thos pa dang mi ldan zhing yang ba'i 'tsho ba'i spyod yul don med pas 'tsho ba can du gyur te yin ldag dang /nying lag brgyar gre shegs shing gtubs te phye zhing bral le bya ba rnam
21b4(mdo sde): pa mang po byas kyang bdag gis gzhi de las bdag gis don byas kyis gzhan gyi don ma byas kyis gal te sems can de dag thams cad kyis/phyi ma'i mthar bdag gis lus gshegs
21b5(mdo sde): gtubs rnam par gtor rnam par bcom pa de lta bur gyur kyang bdag gis thams cad mkhyen pa yongs su mi gtong ngo //sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ngo //dge ba'i
21b6(mdo sde): chos la 'dun pa yongs su mi gtong ngo //de ci'i phyir zhe na/lus gtubs pa'i lus kyi gnod pa 'di lta bu thams cad ni sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal gyi/brgya'i char
21b7(mdo sde): yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas rgyu'i bar du'ang mi bzod do//bdag la ni sems can dmyal bar gnas par spro'o//bdag gis sems can sangs rgyas kyi chos gtang bar ni mi bya'o//
22a1(mdo sde): sems can rnams ca rab du zlar bar bya ba la dmigs pa'i snying rje chen po mgu //de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni bcom ldan das kyis ngagasus te/na
22a2(mdo sde): ba la ni bar chung mang ngo //mi dge ba'i phyogs la ni grogs byed pa med do//dge ba'i phyogs linI grogs byed pa nyung ngo zhes gsungs pas bdag gis mi dge ba'i phyogs kyi grogs kyi
22a3(mdo sde): bya'i dge ba'i phyogs kyi grogs bya'o//sems can thams rjod la bzod par bya'i gnod sems su mi byed//sems can de dag la glang yod pa de byin na rang bdag lnga gang song ba
22a4(mdo sde): bdag gis sbyin par bya ste/sems can de dag lnga gnod sems dang khro ba dang /'khon du 'dzin pa yod pa de dag de rnams kyis byin yang bdag la bzod pa dang nges pa gang yod
22a5(mdo sde): pa de bdag gis sbyin par bya'o//bdag gis bzod pa'i stobs bstan par bya'i gnod sems ni ma yin no snyam mo//blo gros rgya mtsho lus dang srog 'dor ba'i byang chub sems dpa'
22a6(mdo sde): rnams la ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnyed dka' ba ma yin no//gang gi gzhi las gnod sems 'byung ba'i chos de bdag gis spang bar bya'o snyam mo//chos
22a7(mdo sde): de gang nen/'di lce ste lus la dga' ba dang /lus la gnas pa dang /lus la chags pa ste/lus btang na gnod sems kyang gtong ngo //blo gros rgya mtsho de ltar bgrang ba
22b1(mdo sde): la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can thams cad kyi gnod pa bzod de me skyo mi khrol//de gnod pa gsum bzod de/gsum gang zho na/lus kyi gnod
22b2(mdo sde): pa dang /dag gi gnod pa dang /sems kyi gnod pa'o//blo gros rgya mchod la byang chub sems da shi lus kyi gnod pa bzod pa gang zhe na/gang yan lag dang nyidang ldog rnams bcang
22b3(mdo sde): chos nyid la rton te gang de'i lus gnod pa'i sems can de nyid la lta ba'o//blo gros rgya mtsho de la thabs la mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus gcod pa na pha rol tu phyin pa drug bsgom pa
22b4(mdo sde): yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//blo gros rgya mtsho ji ltar na thabs la mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus gcod pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhe na/
22b5(mdo sde): gang lus 'dor ba dang lus yongs su gtong ba dang lustsa la mi lta ba 'dri ni de'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//gang lus gcod pa na sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byed/
22b6(mdo sde): pra dang /tshor ba rnams kyis mi 'phrogs pa 'di ni de'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//gang lus yongs su gcod pan gang dag de'i lus gcod pa de dag nyid rab tu thar bar bya ba'i/
22b7(mdo sde): phyed bsod cing sems kyi rma mi phyin to/bzod pa'i stobs nye bar ston pa 'di ni dor bzod pa'i pha ral tu phyin pa'o//brtson 'grus gang gis thams cad mi byon pa nyid la 'dun po mi
23a1(mdo sde): 'ad senas kyi skyengs / nga rgya dzin lu ra pa nyid du ma rnams kya spyong shi sh-i //ASh+Ta/rnam pa 'di sa rmyi don sa
23a2(mdo sde): sbyin pa po/nga lus rnam pang phyur ba nu mas ma pyod pa de sems bskyed po rin po cheng mi brjo phyi chub nyid la hU~M/zhi ba dang rlung tun pa sa rto
23a3(mdo sde): nI n+ti /ma gtan gyi ma ro la tu b+hin du rmi/gang lus pa/ ba na lus brdung ngo //sdig pa dang /shing /rjod/mig lci bur so sor rjog cing lus lnga m+b+ha mI chos
23a4(mdo sde): nyid du 'jug pa dang /yang dag par ni mi rtag pa nyid dang //yang dag phyir sdug bsngal ba nyid dang /lnga yang dag par ni bdag med pa snor dang /yang dag brlan zhi byi nyid /
23a5(mdo sde): lus la rtog pa 'di ni de'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i/blo gros rgya mtsho de ltar na thibs la mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpe'i lus gcod pa na/pha rol du phyin pa drug bsgom
23a6(mdo sde): baljongs sgra sa pa de gyur zhing dag du rten pa de las nya mes blo 'phrus te 'di ni byung na pa sems rdo gas kyi na bi / ngosas ma de'i rgyu rgyu sa
23a7(mdo sde): dbya'i dag gi spyong pa pa ga shem shing den du stod pa'i tshig mas dang du len pa dang /gtso bang du sdigs pa ded drung pa dang ba grong ba da sdigs ma byung /
23b1(mdo sde): ma ng+ge sa ga nga sa de byang mi skye na du nga gli na
23b2(mdo sde): na mas shing song me per blo bshos rten po na par gyi/sbyin pa sbyin pa rkyen skyem de dag smri shing ni ming /
24a1(mdo sde): ni de'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//gzhan yang 'di snyam du sems te/sems can 'di ni tshul khrims 'chalnga pa las ma mthong ba ste/de ni bdag lan
24a2(mdo sde): zhing bsdigs pa'o//bo dag ni tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs yang dag par blangs pa las mI nyams par bya'o//gnod sems med par bya'o//byang chub kyi sems
24a3(mdo sde): yongs su bsrung bar bya'o//las kyi rnam par smin pa la bstan par bya'o snyam pa 'di ni de'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//gzhan yang de 'od snyam du sems te/sems
24a4(mdo sde): can 'di ni zhe sdang gi shos che zhing gnod sems ming ba ste/de ni bdag la gshe zhing bsdigs pa'o//bdag ni bzod pa'i stobs mung du byas te/byams pa la gnas par
24a5(mdo sde): bya'o snyam pa 'di ni de'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//gzhan yang de 'di snyam du sems te/sems can 'di ni le lo can dge ba'i chos dang bral ba sti de ni bdag la gshe zhing /
24a6(mdo sde): bsdigs pa'o//bdag ni brtson 'grus brtsom par bya/dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su brtsal ba la mi ngoms par bya ste/sems can 'di byang chub kyi snying por sder rje 'dug pa
24a7(mdo sde): byas la phyis bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam du/de ltar go cha gyon pa de ni de'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
24b1(mdo sde): pa'o//gzhan yang de 'di snyam du sems te/sems can 'di ni brjed ngas pa shes bzhin med pa/nyon mongs pa nges par bsams pa ste/de ni bdag la gshe zhing bsdigs
24b2(mdo sde): pa'o//bdag ni nyon mongs pa nges par bsams par bya/dran pa dang shes bzhin tan du bya/rtse gcig tu byang chub kyi sems mi brjed par bya ste sems can ma dul ba/ma zhi ba/
24b3(mdo sde): sbas pa/nye bar ma nye bar 'di lta bu dag gi don du bdag gis go che chen po bgos te 'di ltar sems nges par sems su gzhugs go snyam pa 'di ni de'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//
24b4(mdo sde): gzhan yang de 'di snyam du bsams te/sems can 'di ni shes rab 'chal pa/bdag tu smra ba/sems can du lta ba ni dmigs pa'i spyod yul ba ste de ni bdag la gshe zhing bsdigs
24b5(mdo sde): pA'o//bdag ni chos nyid la bsten par bya'o snyam ste 'di la gshe ba dang khro ba su yin zhes yongs su 'tshol ba na gang gshe ba dang khro ba'i chos de mi dmigs so//de bdag dang gzhan
24b6(mdo sde): mi dmigs par dmigs par lta ba dang bral ba 'di ni de'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//blo gros rgya mtsho de ltar na thabs la mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ngan du brjod pa drang ngan
24b7(mdo sde): du smras pa'i tshig gi lam dang /gshe ba dang bsdigs pa dag pha rol las thos nos pha rol tu phyin pa drug bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par po gyur zhing theg pa chen po de las kyang mi nyams/
25a1(mdo sde): te 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i ngag gi gnod pa bzod du'o//blo gros rgya mtsho de la byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyi gnod pa bzod pa gang zhe na/gang 'dra thams/
25a2(mdo sde): cad kyis byang chub kyi sems de las phral yang mi g.yo ba dang /phas kyi rgol ba dmigs par lta ba lo mngon par zhen pa thams cad kyis yang dag pa'i bsam par zhugs pa
25a3(mdo sde): cad mkhyen pa'i sems de las mos pa bzlog kyang mi brjed pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi gzugs su 'dug kyang mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems de las nyams par byed mi nus te dung
25a4(mdo sde): rdzu 'phrul chen po dag gis khyod kyi theg pa chen po yang dge par bsgrub par mi nus kyis khyod kyis gcis par bya ba 'di thong zhig/khyod kyis brtson 'grus 'dir 'or cig/byang
25a5(mdo sde): chub ni rnyed par dka' ba/sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni rnyed par dka' ba ste 'dir 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal mang du myong bar 'gyur ro//gang dag mya ngan las 'das pa de dag ni bde ba
25a6(mdo sde): yin gyis skyes bu dam pa khyod myur du mya ngan las 'das par gyis shig ces de la sems skul zhing sems dran par byed la/blo gros rgya mtsho gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
25a7(mdo sde): dpa' chen po la de ltar bral bar byed de ltar mos pa zlog par byed kyang sngon gyi go cha mi 'dor zhing bsam pa rnam par 'khrugs par mi byed kyi de 'di snyam du sems te/bdag gis
25b1(mdo sde): nges par byang chub kyi snying po mnan par bya/bdag gis nges par bdud dpung dang bcas par 'pham par byas te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang //
25b2(mdo sde): rgya bar bya/bdag gis nges pas chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar bya/bdag gis nges par stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su chos kyi gtam chen po brjed par bya//
25b3(mdo sde): bdag gis sems can thams cad mgron du gnyer la chos kyi sbyin pas tshim par bya'o//sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /bdag dang gzhan gyi sems reg pa'i lha
25b4(mdo sde): rnams kyis byang chub tu bsam pa rig gis bdag gis thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems kyi gnod pa bzad par bya'o//sangs rgyas rnams dang lha rnams dang sems can thams cad dang bdag la
25b5(mdo sde): sla bar mi bya'o snyam pa 'di lta bu ni/blo gros rgya mtsho byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyi gnod pa bzod cing theg pa chen po de las mi phyed pa ste/blo gos rgya mtsho 'di ni thams cad mkhyen par
25b6(mdo sde): sems bskyod pa rin po che de'i gnod pa bzod pa'o//bzon pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gong na med pa gang yin pa dang /pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
25b7(mdo sde): gnyis yongs su rdzogs par byed pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyi gnod pa bzod pa'o//de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so//byang chub
26a1(mdo sde): lam las bsam pa mi byed cing //de ni snying rje las kyang phyed ma yin//bdag gis dkon mchog gsum po bsrung bar bya//sangs rgyas chos rnams yang dag bsgrub
26a2(mdo sde): par bya//sum cu rtsa gnyis khyud 'phags mtshan dang dpe byed bzang //gang dag gis ni stobs bcu rnams kyis lus mdzes pa//de dag yongs su btsal phyir mchod sbyin byes
26a3(mdo sde): byed//gnod pa shin tu rnam mong bzod cing yon tan phyug/brgya phrag mtha' yas nang rnams de dag bdag gis spyad//rin chen chos mchog 'di dag bdag gis bsrung bar bya//
26a4(mdo sde): brgya phrag mtha' yas sems can de dag bdag gis dgro'o//des ni gnod pa bzod cing bsam pa mi phyed //phyogs bcu'i sems can khams ni mtha' yas ji snyed pa//thams
26a5(mdo sde): cod 'dus par gyur nas lag na mtshon thogs te//de dag de la 'jigs sbyin gshe zhing bsdigs byud kyang //tshun tan phyir ni bsdigs dang 'phya ba bzod par byed//sngon mtha'i
26a6(mdo sde): bskul pa brgya phrag mtha' yas ji snyed par//de dag rgyun mi'i chad par tshig rtsu ba smras kyang ni//bdag nyid chen po de bzod mi khri ba she ba med//de ltar rtogs pa rnams ni
26a7(mdo sde): gnong pa dag por 'gyur//sems can de dag lags ni mtshan thogs lhan cig tu//bdag gi lus kyi yan lag dum bu dam bur gtubs//'on kyang bdag gi sems yid/
26b1(mdo sde): khro bar mi bya ste//byang chub yid la byas na gnod 'di dag par 'gyur//'greng ngam 'dug gam 'chag gam 'on te nyal yang rung //gang du byang chub sems mchog 'di dang sbyin pa
26b2(mdo sde): dang //bdul ba'i sems dang gzhon yang dkar sems mi 'dor ba//der ni de'i lus dum bu dum bur rnam par 'thor//sems dmyal dud 'gro'i skye gnas yi dgus 'jog rten
26b3(mdo sde): mrimiru//bskal pa brgya phrag mtha' yas don med lus kyang gtubs//sangs rgyas ye shes mngon par 'ding bas lus 'dor zhes//skyes bu des ni yid kyang yang dag tshim par byed//
26b4(mdo sde): mi yi sdug bsngal rgyu ni rnam pa du ma dag/marnams med sdug bsngal rgya cher nye bar mi 'gro ba'i//dmyal ba rnams su bskal pa brgyur ni gnas pAr s+ho//rgyal ba dang ci chos da
26b5(mdo sde): sems can mi gtang ngo //bdag lus mi rtag ring du mi thub sgyu ma 'dra//khams bzhi de dag gdug po'i sbrul dang 'dra bar gsungs//bdag gis lus por byas te dug med 'gyur
26b6(mdo sde): bar bya//nyon mongs du gzhi nas ni rang byung sangs rgyas 'gyur//srid gsum 'jig rten 'di na lus bde 'gyur ba'i gzhi//'dod pa'i zas rgyu cung zad ji snyed 'jigs pa ste/
26b7(mdo sde): bdag gis lus btang 'jigs pa med par 'gyur bar bya//bgrang ba 'di la zhugs pa de dag gnod pa bzod//nag po'i phyogs la grogs ni brgya stong phrag kyang med//dkar
27a1(mdo sde): po'i phyogs ni gang la'ang grogs po gcig pur 'gyur//bdag ni mi dge rnams dang rtsod par mi bya ste//sangs rgyas bzod pa gsung bas bzod pa bdag gis
27a2(mdo sde): grogs//phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas de dge 'dur ni bdag gi dbang //ji ltar sangs rgyas sku la sems ni mi byed do//sangs rgyas dang ni bdag nyid tshe lha bdag gi grogs//gnod
27a3(mdo sde): pa bzod par bya yi sdang bar mi bya'o//gnod pa bzod pa dag yid rnam pa gsum du gsungs//gang bzod dpa'o de ni mi phyed bzod pa yin//lus kyi sdug bsngal rnam pa mtha' yas
27a4(mdo sde): yod pa dag/gal te lus la bzod pa lus gnod dag par 'gyur/lus ni dum bu dum bur gtubs te rnam gtor tshe//zhabs ldan che ba'i bdag nyid pha rol phyin rdzogs 'gyur//
27a5(mdo sde): sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod dang brtson 'grus bsam gtan dang //shes rab khyad 'phags dam pa skad cig tsam gyis 'dzin//lus dang lus la sred pa'i nyon mongs rnams
27a6(mdo sde): kyokyang 'dor//sbyin dang rab tu ldan pa'i pha rol phyin par 'gyur//byams pas 'jig rten khyab byed tshul khrims nyams mi 'gyur//byang chub rjes su 'gro bas tshul khrims
27a7(mdo sde): dag pa 'dzin//bzod pa'i stobs bskyed yan log rnams dang nying log gcod//de yang de yo bzod pa'i pha rol phyin la sbyor//brtson 'grus gtses pa ma zhum par skabs
27b1(mdo sde): sgyung smad/sus narnam par 'dzir nyid mdzin 'grus pa san/mas kyi khasam pa m+b+ha da du dang //nyan mangs na m+bu rnams la ma m+b+hi
27b2(mdo sde): bor+d+ha ni/ lus bashrIg nas nI bsamA gtan stobs dang rnamathar blo zhig//'dir yang dzaHbral bsnam gyi na ma phyin la sbyor//dedag gis lus ni bdag myed rmi lo ma klog dang
27b3(mdo sde): 'd-i/'di la byed pa po med tshor ba po yang med//lus kyi gzings pas bcings pa'i s+'um+b+ha can ba pa gi dkrol/6/shos rab 'di ni khyed 'phags pha rol phyin pa mchog/ga
27b4(mdo sde): zhig 'di la sbyor zhing tshul bzhin chos sems la//lus kyi gnod pa bzod cing rab sdad mi byed tri//ma smad pa dang spyad dang bzung ba'i tshig zos byeng //de ni zhe sdong mi 'byur byams
27b5(mdo sde): ldan snyems kyong drug//tha ba rab tu zhe sdang por 'di sbyin pa ngam/byams pa'i yid du gyur pa 'di ni tshul khrims deg/bzod pa'i stobs bskyed 'di ni bzod pa dag pa yin//sangs
27b6(mdo sde): rgyas ye shes 'dod nas brtson 'grus phyir zhing bskyed//sems dang yi'u rwa bzhi pa 'di ni bsam gtan dag/sgra skad mi rnyed 'di ni shes rab dag pa yin//mi yi tshig thos nas ni
27b7(mdo sde): gong chos 'di sems pa//de 'dir gnod bzod dog gi skyon la chags pa med//bdud dang mu stegs can gyi lta gyur brgya stong gis//gnas 'di rnyed dkas sbyor ba 'od brjod
28a1(mdo sde): kyang //mi skrag zhum pa med cing phyi phyir mthu bskyed de//mkhas pa de ni gnod dang sems gnod mtha' yas bzod //gang zhig bzod dang brtson 'grus rab
28a2(mdo sde): gnas rnyi rab 'dra//sems can ku ni nang dpa' bo de 'dor gnod pa bzeng //stobs bcu rnams kyi skyeng ba dang ni gnod shes nas//byang chub rjes su 'gro bas skye nas stong ston
28a3(mdo sde): to//blo gros rgya mtsho de la thams cad mkhyen par sems bskyed pa rin po che de'i 'bigs pa gang zhe na/blo gros rgya mtsho 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad
28a4(mdo sde): mkhyen par sems bskyed pa rin po che des rlom sems su mi byed de/thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems de la brten par mi byed gnas par mi byed/dza len par mi byed/'dor bar ma
28a5(mdo sde): byed spros par mi byed/rtog par mi byed/rnam par rtog par mi byed kyi rnam par rtog pa nye bar zhi ba la gnas pa yin te/de chos thob mo rnams la blos rnam par dpyod do//chos
28a6(mdo sde): thob mo de dag gang zhe na/'di lta ste/rten cing 'brel bar 'byung pa'i lugs su 'byung ba dang /rgyu la dmigs pa khong du chud pa dang /rtag pa ma yin pa dang /chad pa ma yin
28a7(mdo sde): pa dang /mthar lta bu dang bral ba dang /rang bzhin gyis bdag med pa dang /bdag ngo bo nyid med pos chos thams cad ngo bo nyid med pa dang /gdod ma nas ma skyes pa dang /
28b1(mdo sde): ma byung ba dang /stong pa nyid la mos pa dang /mtshan ma med pa la yid ches pa dang /smon pa med pa lnga som ti med pa dang /mngon par 'du byed pa med pa la de kho na'i blo dang ldan pa
28b2(mdo sde): dang /shin tu mi rtag pa nyid dang /gzugs dbu ba dang mtshungs pa nyid dang /tshor ba chu bur dang 'dre ba nyid dang /'du shes smig rgyu dang mtshungs te gnyis su med pa nyid dang /'du
28b3(mdo sde): byed rnams la chu shing dang mtshungs par so sor rtog pa dang /rnam par shes pa sgyu ma lta bu'i chos nyid dang /khams rnams g.yo ba med pa nyid dang /skye mched rnams phan tshun du shos
28b4(mdo sde): po med pa nyid dang /sems gnas pa med pa dang //nga rgyal yid la mi byed pa dang /lhag par byed pa lhag par mi byed pa dang /mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa dang /tha did du bya ba
28b5(mdo sde): med pa dang /ro gcig pa dang /bgrod pa gcig pu'i lo ma la rab tu gnas pa dang /lam gyi tshogs shes pa yongs su 'tshol ba dang /nges po'i don gyi don la rton pa dang /don
28b6(mdo sde): gyi rjes su zhugs pa'i blo dang /skad thams cad la skad med par 'jug pa dang /sgra thams cad la sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad par shes pa dang /don dang tshig 'bru
28b7(mdo sde): rjes su med pa la 'jug pa shes pas don brjod du med par rtogs pa dang /sdug bsngal shes pa der 'dzin pa med pa dang /kun 'byung ba shes pa de shin tu zad pa dang /'gog
29a1(mdo sde): /pa shes bsgo btags pa med pa dang /lam shes pa 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas mnyam pa nyid du 'jug pa dang /lus lnga zhugs pa'i dran pa sngon gyi mtha'
29a2(mdo sde): dang /phyi ma'i mthar 'pho ba med pa dang /tshor ba la zhugs pa'i dran pa skye ba dang 'jig par gnas pa dang /sems la zhugs pa 'dran pa dmigs pa la shin tu brtags pa
29a3(mdo sde): dang /chos la zhugs pa'i dran pa chos kyi dbyings la ma yin pa dang /yang dag par spong ba mnyam pas mnyam pa dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa sems la dbang bsgyur bar gyur pa dang //
29a4(mdo sde): dad pa'i dbang po chags pa thams cad las shin tu 'das pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dben pas nges par byung ba dang /dran pa'i dbang po dran pa med pa dang /ting nge 'dzin
29a5(mdo sde): gyi dbang po yid la byed pa med pa dang /shes rab kyi dbang po spros pa las shin tu 'das pa dang /dad pa'i stobs gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi stobs
29a6(mdo sde): dmigs pa rtogs pa med pa dang /dran pa'i stobs nyams pa med pa dang ldan pa dang /ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs nges par sems par gyur pa dang /shes rab kyi stobs mi 'khrugs
29a7(mdo sde): pa'i rgyu mthun pa dang /dran pa yang dge byang chub kyi yan lat+ta da ba med cing brjed pa med pa dang /chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag chos thams cad mnya
29b1(mdo sde): nyid du 'jug pa dang /rtson 'grus yang dag byung chub kyi yan lag len pa med cing 'dor ba med pa dang /dga' ba yang dag byu chub kyi yan la gang pa 'dabs myed pa dang /rab tu
29b2(mdo sde): sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lig lus dang sems la zhugs pa dang /ting nge 'dzin yang dge byung chub kyi yan lag mnyam pa nyid khong du rgyud pa dang /nga snyoms yang dag byang chu
29b3(mdo sde): kyi yan lag gnyis dang bral ba dang /yang dag pa'i lta ba lta ba thams cad stong ba dang /yang dag pa'i rtag pa rtog pa dang rnam par rtog pa dang yongs su rtog pa thams cad dang bral po dang /yang
29b4(mdo sde): dag pa'i dgas ska thams cad mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa dang /yang dag pa'i las kyi maN+Dal lus dang /sems kyi lces dang bral ba dang /yang dag pa'i 'tsha ba 'tshal brnams cu rna
29b5(mdo sde): bcad pa dang /yang dag pa'i rdol ba 'dog pa med cing 'jog pa med pa dang /yang dag pa'i dran pa dge ba dang mi dge ba'i rnam par rig pa la mi 'jug pa dang /yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin
29b6(mdo sde): sems kyi dmigs pa mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa dang /zhi bzhi gnas kyi mthar song ba dang /lhag mthong lta ba rnam par dag pa dang /skye ba med pa'i don mi rtag pa'i don dang /gdod ma
29b7(mdo sde): nas skye ba med pa'i don sdug bsngal gyi don dang /rgyu med pa'i don bdag med pa'i don dang /nye bar zhi ba'i don zhi ba'i don dang /dul pos sbyin pa dang /bsil po'i dngos por gyur
30a1(mdo sde): pa'i tshul khrims dang /zang pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i bzod pa dang /shin tu rnam par phye bas rnam par 'byed pa'i brtson 'grus dang /nang nye bar zhi ba'i bsam
30a2(mdo sde): gtan dang /yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa'i mtshan nyid kyi shes rab dang /sems can gdod ma nas rnam par dag pa'i byams pa dang /nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i
30a3(mdo sde): snying rje dang /dga' ba med pa'i dga' ba dang /rtsom pa thams cad rgyan bcad pa'i btang snyoms dang /chos thams cad 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa dang /sngon gyi mtha' nas
30a4(mdo sde): stong pa dang /phyi ma'i mthar dben pa dang /da ltar byung ba na bdag med pa'o//blo gros rgya mtsho de ltar gang chos zab mo rgyun chad pa tshig 'bru dang bral ba nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa/
30a5(mdo sde): 'di lta bu 'di dag rtogs pa dang khong du chud pa dang 'jug pa shes pa la dpyod pa dang /sems pa dang 'jal ba dang bgrang ba dang /nye bar rtog pa dang nan tan byed pa 'di ni thams cad mkhyen
30a6(mdo sde): par sems bskyed pa rin po che de 'bigs pa'o//de ltar thams cad mkhyen par sems bskyed pa rin po che phigs na/chos thams cad la dbang bsgyur ba nyid lhun gyis grub pa nyid du 'thob
30a7(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro//blo gros rgya mtsho 'di lta ste dper na/zla ba dang nyi ma gzhal med khang lhun gyis grub par rnam par rga zhing dzam+bu'i gling thams cad du/snang bar byed kying lci'i bu nyim
30b1(mdo sde): da zla ba 'di snyam du bdag cag 'gro'am 'on te ldog snyam du sems par sems can rnams kyi bsod nams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pas de dag 'gro'o//blo gros rgya mtsho de bzhin du rab tu phigs
30b2(mdo sde): pa'i shes pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang lhun gyis grub par sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa dag na sems can gyi don byed kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
30b3(mdo sde): po de ni yang mngon par 'du byed pa med par bya ba de dag kun tu ston to//blo gros rgya mtsho de la byang chub sems dpa'i 'bigs pa shes pa gang yin pa de ni/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa
30b4(mdo sde): dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par yongs su btsal bar bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' mnyam par bzhag na lcug mthong gi chos rnams mthong gA mnyam par bzhag
30b5(mdo sde): pas ni ma yin no//de'i mthong ba grang yin pa de ni shes rab ste/shes rab des mngon sum du 'gyur ro//gang mngon sum du 'gyur zhe na/chos rnams kyi yang dag pa'i mtshan nyid la mngon
30b6(mdo sde): sum du 'gyur ro//chos rnams kyi yang dag pa'i mtshan nyid gang zhe na/mtshan nyid gzhi de la kun tu mi spyod pa'o//chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid kyi gzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste rnam par rig pa
30b7(mdo sde): nichos rnams kyi mtshan nyid kyi gzhi'o//rnam par rig 'dor yang dag pa ji lta ba'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa de nyid ni chos rnams kyi yang dag pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya'o//gang gi tshe tshar ba thams
31a1(mdo sde): cad rgyun la dbang gyur pa de'i tshe snang bar yang mi byed/mi snang bar yang mi byed do//de la spang ba ni gang /mi snang ba ni gang zhe na//snang ba zhes bya ba ni skye ba'o//
31a2(mdo sde): mi snang ba zhes bya ba ni 'grag pa'o//gang gi tshe snang bar yang mi byed mi snang ba ri yang mi byed pa de'i tshe/skye bar yang myi byed 'gag par yang mi byed do//gang gi tshe skye bar mi byed
31a3(mdo sde): 'gag par yang mi byed pa de'i tshe chos nyid la gnas pa yin te chos kyi dbyings 'khrugs par mi byed/de bzhon nyid las mo g.yo//yang dag pa'o mtha' 'jig par mi byed do//de la
31a4(mdo sde): chos kyi dbyings zhes bya ba ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rjes su rtogs pa'o//de bzhin nyid ni de kho na'i mtshan nyid khong du chud pa'o//yang dag pa'i mtha' ni gnyis su med pa'i yang dag
31a5(mdo sde): par mngon par rtogs pa'o//blo gros rgya mtsho de ltar mngon sum du shes pa rig pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shin tu phigs pa shes pa zhes bya'o//sbyang ba dang
31a6(mdo sde): gnod pa dang nges par 'bigs pa'i le'u 'di/bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa'i tshe/lha dang mi'i skye dgu'i srog tshugs khrag khrig bcu gnyis kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
31a7(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do//srog chags khri drug stong gis bzod pa rab tu thob par gyur to//de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs
31b1(mdo sde): so///chos kun nges par rtogs pa yi//byang chub sems ni sgrogs par byed//de tshe nges rtogs ye shes kyis//chos rnams kun la chags pa med//zab mo'i chos rnams khong
31b2(mdo sde): du chud/mkhos pa skrag par 'gyur ba med//smyig med kun tu 'jigs med pas//khyad par 'phags par 'gyur ba yin/rgyal dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ni//brten pa'i chos
31b3(mdo sde): rnams khong du chud//shes rab ldan de rjes mthun byeng //Sh+Ta lta ba nA me 'dzin te//rtag pa dang ni chad pa la//blo ni phyogs pa yod ma yin//yang dag mtha' nobs ma yas
31b4(mdo sde): bri'i//dbu mo'i mthA' ni rtogs par 'gyur//bdag gis mtha' mi rang bzhin gyis//chos rnams de ga med ngo ba nyid//chos kun de'i nga bzhin te//gdang nas ma skyes 'gag pa
31b5(mdo sde): med//skyes pa med cing 'byung ba med//stong pa gzung med dri ma med//mtshan ma med cing spros pa med//nam mkha' dang ni mtshungs shing 'dra//de dag sems kyis mi smon
31b6(mdo sde): par/'dod cing chags pa rnam par spangs//gzugs kyi rang de ni na mngon sum du//dbu ba lta bur rab tu shes//tshor ba chu bur 'dra ba ste//'du shes smig rgyu'i mtshan nyid do//
31b7(mdo sde): 'du byed chu shing snying po 'dra//rnam par shes pa sgyum 'dra//khams bzhi g.yo ba med pa ste//nam mkha' mtshungs pa'i khams yin no//gang dag skye mched thams
32a1(mdo sde): cad ni//bzlas po phun tshun spyod yul lo//sems ni nang na ma yin te//phyi rol du yang mi dmigs so//yid la nga yi yod ma yin//rnam pa shes pa
32a2(mdo sde): granunas pa med//chos rnams yid la mi byed do//lhag par byed pa rnam par spong //chos rnams thams cad mnyam nyid du//yang dag nyid du khong du chud//tha dad med
32a3(mdo sde): cing ro gcig ste//gcig pu bgrod lam mnyam pa nyid//lam gyi shes pa rab tu rtogs//nges pa'i don gyi don rnams mthong //blo ni don gyi rjes su zhugs//skad ni skad
32a4(mdo sde): med khong du chud//sgra rnams kun la sngon mtha' dang //phyi ma'i mtha' mar yongs su gcod//don dang tshig 'bru rnams la mkhas//chos rnams gnyis su med par rtogs//
32a5(mdo sde): brjod du med pa'i don la ni//'di nyid yang dgu khong du chud//skye ba med par sdug bsngal shes//kun 'byung ba la mnyam pa'i blo//'gog pa shes pa zad par bstan//lam
32a6(mdo sde): shes pa ni 'dus ma byas//lus dang tshor ba sems dang ni//chos la chos su rjes su rtogs//dran med yid la byed med pa'i//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa ston//chos kyi
32a7(mdo sde): dbyings ni dbyings min par//yang dag nyid ni mnyam pas mnyam//spong bas spang du med pa ni//yang dag spong bar rab tu bstan//sems la dbang ni thob pa yi//
32b1(mdo sde): 'phrul rkang pa rab tu bstan//tshogs pa kun las rab 'das pa//de ni dad pa'i dbang po yin//chos rnams thams cad rnam dben pa//de ni brtson 'grus dbang po yin//dran pa med
32b2(mdo sde): cing dran 'jug pa//de ni dran pa'i dbang po yin//chos rnams yid la mi byed pa//de ni ting 'dzin dbang po yin//spros las shin tu rab 'das pa//de ni shes rab dbang po yin//
32b3(mdo sde): yang dag nyid ni rtogs nas de//gzhan gyi dad pas 'gro ma yin//sems ni g.yo ba yod min pa//dad pa'i stobs ni de 'dra'o//yang dag shes las nyams pa med//dran pa'i
32b4(mdo sde): stobs ni 'dri 'dra'o//ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs mdzod ni//nges par sems la dga' ba yin//mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pa//shes rab stobs ni 'di 'dra'o//chos rnams rtogs
32b5(mdo sde): pa'i don du ni//byang chub yan lag rab tu bstan//mnyam ste mi mnyam med pa'i chos//yang dag lta ba yin zhes brjod//gnyis med chos la bsgom pa ni//skye ba med pa'i lam
32b6(mdo sde): bsgom yin//skye ba med pa mi rtag don//'byung ba med pa sdug bsngal te//rgyu ba med pa bdag med don//zhi don nye bar zhi ba'i gnas//dul ba'i sems ni sbyin pa yin//zhi ba'i
32b7(mdo sde): sems ni tshul khrims ldan//zad pa'i chos rtogs bzod pa yin//brtson 'grus rnam par phye bas rtogs//shin tu zhi ba'i bsam gtan te//shes rab yang dag rab shes//
33a1(mdo sde): sems nan gdong nas rnam dgadon//byams pa zhes ni brjod pa sbyin//snying rje nam mkha ba ste// sa 'amaspyod bdaga' ba man//nom ma
33a2(mdo sde): cad rgyun chad pa/btang snyoms shes ni rab tu bstan//'khor gsum yongs su chud par ni//chos rnams thams cad rab tu shes/chos rnams nges par 'biges 'dri ni//
33a3(mdo sde): lta ba'i mdun pa gcod pa yin//bsam gtan shes rab gang yin pa//der ni nges par 'bigs pa bstan//tshad med pa la 'jug pa ni/chos shes pa zhes brjod pa yin//
33a4(mdo sde): gnod pa bzod pa dang nges par 'bigs pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o////de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla
33a5(mdo sde): gos rgya mtsho la bka' stsal pa/blo gros rgya mtsho de ltar na gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dgu pa dang yongs su dag par 'gyur te/bsam pa bcos ma ma yin
33a6(mdo sde): zhing sems can thams cad kyis gnod par byas kyang zhe 'gras pa maud la/shin tu nges par phigs pa'i ye shes su gyur cing /shes rab rnam par gdon mi za ba thob pa de'i tshe/shin
33a7(mdo sde): tu dkar ba dri ma med pa'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rtsa ba'i gnas la rab tu gnas pa yin no//de la ting nge 'dzin 'di'i rtsa ba'i gnas gang zhe na/'di lta ste/sems can thams
33b1(mdo sde): cad la zhe sdang med pa'i snying rje chen po'o///de sems can thams cad kyis bsti stang du byas kyang khengs par me 'byug/sems can thams cad kyis bsdu skad du ma byas kyang rung par mi
