139a7(mdo sde): yang rab tu shes la yi ge dang nges pa'i tshig gis sems can rnams la chos kyang ston cing dam pa'i chos kyang yongs su 'dzin pa dang /sangs rgyas thams cad chos
139b1(mdo sde): kyi sku sa rab tu phye bar yang mos la mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po yongs su bsgrub pa'i phyir brtson 'grus kyang nyams par mi byed pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad la nam
139b2(mdo sde): mkha'i ngo bo nyid du'ang rtog la sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir rtsol ba'i rgyun kyang mi gcod pa ste/rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
139b3(mdo sde): chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na thabs dang shes rab yongs su dag po rnams yin no//rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpe' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi po 'di dag dang
139b4(mdo sde): ldan na rgyang ring du'ang lta ste/rtsa ba'ang ma chad pa rnams yin no//bzhi gang zhe na/byang chub kyi snying po la'ang lta la byang chub kyi sems kyang mi 'dor ba rnams yin//
139b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la'ang lta la rang gi shes pas kyang zhum pa med pa rnams yin/chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu skor ba lo'ang lta la ji ltar thos pa'i chos bsten pas kyang
139b6(mdo sde): yongs su mi skyo ba rnams yin/yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po la'ang lta la tshe dang /'chi 'pho dang /skye ba la'ang mi smod pa rnams yin te/rgyal po chen po byang
139b7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na rgyang ring du'ang lta zhing rtsa ba'ang ma chad pa rnams yin no//rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa'
140a1(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na yul yang 'byor la bag yod pa'ang mi 'dor ba rnams yin no//bzhi gang zhe na/mi yongs su smin par
140a2(mdo sde): bya ba'i phyir 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por yang gyur le 'du byed la mi rtag par so sor rtog pas yul 'byod kyang bag med par mi 'gyur ba rnams yin/lha yongs su
140a3(mdo sde): smyon par bya ba'i phyir lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin du'ang gyur lo 'du byed sdug bsngal bar so sor rtog pas yul 'byor kyang bag med par mi 'gyur ba rnams yin/bdud
140a4(mdo sde): kyi ros kyi lho yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir bdud nyid du'ang nye bar ston la chos la bdag med par so sor rtog pas yul 'byor kyang bag med par mi 'gyur ba rnams yin/
140a5(mdo sde): tshungs ris kyi lha yongs su smin por bya ba'i phyir tshangs pa dbang bsgyur du'ang gyur la mya ngan las 'das pa la zhi bar rtog pas yul 'byor kyang bag med par mi 'gyur ba rnams
140a6(mdo sde): yin te/rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che ni po chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na yul yang 'byor la bag yong ngo'ang mi 'dor ba rnams yin no//rgyal
140a7(mdo sde): po chen po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen blo chos bzhi dang ldan na don zab mo'i tshul lo mi sgeg pa rnams yin no//Sha ni gang zhe na/yang dag pa'i dge ba'i
140b1(mdo sde): bshes gnyen gang dag phyi rol du mi byed par rgyun tu sangs rgyas kyi byang chub zab mo 'di yang dag par rab tu ston pa la ston pa dang /mdo sde zab mo tshul 'di lta bu de dag mnyan
140b2(mdo sde): pa'i phyir dpag tshad brgyar yang 'gro ba dang /ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams kyi don la tshul bzhin du dpyod pa dang /don la rton pa yin gyi tshig 'bru la rton pa ma yin pa ste rgyal
140b3(mdo sde): po chen po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na don zab mo'i tshul lo mi skrag pa rnams yin no//rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa'i snyoms
140b4(mdo sde): dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' yang dag pa rnams zhes bya'o//bzhi gang zhe na/pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su 'tshol ba la brtson pa'i brtson
140b5(mdo sde): 'grus dang /sems can thams cad la yongs su smin par bya ba la brtson pa'i snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa la brtson pa'i
140b6(mdo sde): stobs kyis rnam par gnon pa dang /'khor ba dpag tu med pa yongs su 'dzin pa la yongs su mi skyo bar brtson pas bsod nams dang yid shes kyi tsho gos sogs pa ste/rgyal
140b7(mdo sde): po chen po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/byang chub sems dpa' yang dag pa rnams zhes bya'o//blo gros rgya mtsho de ltar bcom
141a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od na spyad pan/ sa des pani pa g+h+nAM ba gar+dz+dza pa da na/smyo gas b+h+ya/khyig drug sa/
141a2(mdo sde): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do//dge sbyong bye ba phrag brgyad len pa med pas zag pa rnams las sems rnam por grol lo//rgyal bu
141a3(mdo sde): gzhan nu de dag dang /rgyal po'i bu mo rnams dang /rgyal sgo'i btsun mo'i 'khor ni chung ngu rjes su mthur pa'i tshe sA la bzod pa skyes so//rgyal po chen po yul shin tu rnam
141a4(mdo sde): par dag pa ni rno ba'i rjes su mthun pa'i chos la bzod pa skyes so//de nas rgyal po yul shin tu rnam par dag pa tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs shing rab tu dga' ste dga' ba dang
141a5(mdo sde): yid bde ba skyes nas rgyal sring thams cad bcom ldan 'das de la yongs su spyad pa'i phyir phu la la//ni/'phags pa tho gas rgyu mchis zhes pa//
141a6(mdo sde): po dgu pa//blo gros rgya mtsho de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs po 'di zer snang ba mtha' yas des rgyal po yul shin tu rnam par dge bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal
141a7(mdo sde): to//rgyal po chen po khyod kyis yongs su spyang pa'i phyir rgyal srid thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa la phulo zin na/rgyal po chen po khyod dang bas legs par gsungs pa'i
141b1(mdo sde): chos 'alu shA la khyim nas khyin med par rab tu byung shig/de ci'i gyur zhe na/rgyal po chen po legs par mA sung sa pa'o zhes mnA la rab tu byung shA ni don che bya phan yon na
141b2(mdo sde): rgya che ba'o//rgyal po chen po rab tu byung bar gtogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'thob pa chen po ni nyi shu po 'di dag ste/mamyed mkhyen pa bla na med pa'i 'thob pa yongs rdzu
141b3(mdo sde): rdzogs par 'gyur ba dag go/nyi shu po gang zhe na/'di lta ste/rgyal srid dang longs spyod dang g.yog 'khor dang dbang phyug 'dor ba sau nga yi ba med cing yongs su 'dzin pa
141b4(mdo sde): med pa 'thob pa dang /khyim nas 'byung ba la gzhol bas nyon mongs pa las byung ba thob pa dang /nye ngur smrig 'dzin pas rnyog pa med pa'i sems 'thob pa dang /'phags pa'i
141b5(mdo sde): rigs chog shes pas dgong smra ba dang /gso sla ba 'thob pa dang /sbyangs pa'i yon tan yo byad bsnyungs pa yang dag par len pas 'dod pa rno ba dang sdig pa 'dod pa spong ba
141b6(mdo sde): 'thob pa dang /ti tshul khrims kyi phung po yongs su dag pas lha dang mir skye bo 'thob pa dang /byang chub kyi sems mi 'dor bas pha rol tu phyin pa drug 'thob pa dang //dgon pa
141b7(mdo sde): dben pa na gnas pas 'du 'dzi dang mi 'dre ba 'thob pa dang /gnod pa med pas chos sems pa'i bde ba 'thob pa dang /bsam gtan gyi yan lag yang dag par sgrub pas
142a1(mdo sde): sems las su rung ba 'thob pa dang /thos pa yongs su 'tshol bas shes rab chen po 'thob pa dang /nga rgyal med pas ye shes chen po 'thob pa dang /
142a2(mdo sde): don nyung zhing byed pa nyung bas chos rab tu rnam par 'byid pa 'thob pa dang /sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid pas byams pa chen mo 'thob pa dang /sems can
142a3(mdo sde): thams cad rab tu thar bar byed du'i sems kyis snying rje chen po 'thob pa dang /lus dang srog la mi lta bas ngam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa 'thob pa dang /sems rab tu
142a4(mdo sde): spangs pas mngon par shes pa chen po 'thob pa dang /sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa snga sangs rgyas mthong ba 'thob pa dang /tshul bzhin gyis chos la so sor rtog pas mi skye
142a5(mdo sde): po'i chos la bzod pa thob pa 'thob pa dang /yon tan thams cad yang dag par 'dzin pa'i spyod pas myur du thams cad mkhyen pa rab tu 'thob pa ste/rgyal po chen po rab tu
142a6(mdo sde): byung bar gtogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la 'thob pa chen po nyi shu po 'di dag rnyed dka' bar mi 'gyur ro//rgyal po chen po de lta bas na/khyod logs par gsungs
142a7(mdo sde): pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung shig/blo gros rgya mtsho de nas bcom ldan 'das des rgyal po yul shin tu rnam par dag pa rab tu 'byung ba yang dag par 'dzin du bcug pas
142b1(mdo sde): rgyal srid thams cad spangs/rgyal srid kyi du la yang spangs te khyim na gnas pas yid byung bas sgra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas/bcom ldan 'das de'i bstan
142b2(mdo sde): pa la dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo //de rab tu byung bar rig nas rgyal po'i btsun mo'i 'khor kyang rab tu byung ngo //de dag rab tu byung bar rig nas rgyal bu gzhon
142b3(mdo sde): nu rnams kyang rab tu byung //de dag/rab tu byung bar rig nas rgyal po'i bu mo gzhon nu ma rnams kyang rab tu byung ngo //dri dag rab tu byung bar rig nas rgyal po'i yul na gnas
142b4(mdo sde): pa'i srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dbu'ang rab tu byung ngo //de ltar de dag rab tu byung nas dge ba'i rtsa ba'i che sa 'tsho la bA la yongs su brtson pani brnon 'grus
142b5(mdo sde): brtsams te gnas so//blo gros rgya mtsho sems can bsod nams byas pa thams cad kyi gnas su gyur pas ji tsam du bcom ldan 'das de'i gsung rab mdzes par gyur pa lo ltos/
142b6(mdo sde): blo gos rgya mtsho de nas rgyal po chen po yul shin tu rnam par dag pa de ltar rab tu byung nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer snang ba mtha' yas deg lta bya der srong ste phyin
142b7(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag gang la sgrub pa snying por bgyid par gnas shing don mchis par yul 'khor gyi bsod snyoma'o/
143a1(mdo sde): yongs su 'tshal bar 'gyur ba'i gdams dbu dang rjes su bstan pa badrag la stsal du gsol/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das des
143a2(mdo sde): dge slong yul shin tu rnam par drag pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//dge slong khyod kyi ming ni yul shin tu rnam par dag pa zhes bya'o//khyod song la rang gi yul rnam par dag
143a3(mdo sde): par bya ba'i phyir brtson par gyis shig/rang gi yul la tshul bzhin gyis so sor rtogs shig/ci nas kyang yul drug po dag gri nang nas chos gang khyod la snang bar 'gyur ba
143a4(mdo sde): de nyid yang dog pa ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par rdzogs pa khong du chud pas byang chub mthong bar 'gyur ba de ltar so sor rtogs shig/byang chub la ring ba'i 'du shes ma byed
143a5(mdo sde): cig/nye ba'i 'du shes kyang ma byed cig/blo gros rgya mtsho de nas bcom ldan 'das des dge slong yul shin tu rnam par dag pa la gdams ngag 'dris gradams pa dang gcig
143a6(mdo sde): pu dben par rtul zhing shes bzhin dang ldan la bag yod par gnas te rang gi yul la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du so sor rtog go/de'i tshul bzhin gyis so sor rtog pa
143a7(mdo sde): gang zhe na/'di lta ste/mig gi yul ni stong pa nyid kyi yul lo//stong pa nyid kyi yul ni sems can thams cad kyi yul lo//sems can thams cad kyang sdong
143b1(mdo sde): pa nyid kyi yul te sangs rgyas kyi yul lo//rna ba'i yul ni stong pa nyid kyi yul lo//stong pa nyid kyi yul ni sems can thams cad kyi yul lo//sems can thams cad kyang stong
143b2(mdo sde): kyi yul te/sangs rgyas kyi yul lo//de bzhin du sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid kyi yul ni stong pa nyid kyi yul lo//stong pa nyid kyi yul ni sems can rnams
143b3(mdo sde): da kyi yul lo//sems can thams cad kyang stong pa nyid kyi yul te/sangs rgyas kyi yul lo//mig gri yul ni mtshan ma med pa'i yul lo//mtshan ma med pa'i yul ni
143b4(mdo sde): sems can thams cad kyi yul lo//sems can thams cad kyang mtshan ma med pa'i yul te sangs rgyas kyi yul lo//yid kyi bar gyi yul ni mtshan ma med pa'i yul lo//
143b5(mdo sde): mtshan ma med pa'i yul ni sems can thams cad kyi yul lo//sems can thams cad kyang mtshan me med pa'i yul te sangs rgyas kyi yul lo//de bzhin du mig gi yul ni smon pa
143b6(mdo sde): med pa'i yul lo//mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i yul lo//ma skyes pa dang ma byung ba'i yul lo//ma byung ba'i yul ni sems can thams cad kyi yul lo//sems can
143b7(mdo sde): thams cad kyang ma byung ba'i yul te sangs rgyas kyi yul lo//de bzhin du yid kyi bar gyi yul dang sbyar ro//blo gros rgya mtsho de ltar dge slong yul shin tu rnam par dag pa yul
144a1(mdo sde): rnal 'jug pa 'dis lus dang sems las su rung ste 'dun pa dang brtson 'grus dang sems dang dpyod pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bsgoms pas ring po ma thogs
144a2(mdo sde): par mngon par shes pa lnga bskyed par gyur to//bag yod pa'i spyod pa des kyang don dang nges par byung ba'i tshig thams cad sdud pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rab tu thob bo//blo
144a3(mdo sde): gros rgya mtsho de'i tshe de'i dus ni gang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid 'byor pa spangs te bcom ldan 'das de'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas yul shin tu rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i
144a4(mdo sde): dge slong du gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod ngogs shing yid gnyis su gyur ta me the tshom za nA khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/blo gros rgya mtsha
144a5(mdo sde): khyod nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong yul shin tu rnam par dag pa zhes bya bar gyur to//blo gos rgya mtsho de'i tshe de'i dus na gang dag dge slong rab tu byung ba de'i rjes su rab tu
144a6(mdo sde): byung ba'i srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang por gyur pa de dag gzhan dag cig yin pa snyam du khyod sems na/de de ltar mi blta ste/chos mnyan pa'i phyir gang dag
144a7(mdo sde): khyod kyi phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag go//bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon byung po'i le'u 'di bshad pa na srog tshogs khri brgyad stong gis bla na med pa
144b1(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do//byang chub sems dpa' brgyad stong gis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to//sngon byung ba'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu
144b2(mdo sde): pa'o////de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho la bka' stsal pa/blo gros rgya mtsho de lta bas na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
144b3(mdo sde): byang chub myur du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos skyes bu dam po khyod kyi rjes su bslab par bya ste/byang chub sems dpas

144b5(mdo sde): blo gros rgya mtsho sangs rgyas su 'gyur bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i tshig 'di ni brjod par sla'i/dge ba byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams bsgrub pa ni dka' snyam pa'o//blo gros rgya mtsho byang
144b6(mdo sde): chu ba sems dpa' gang la las chos kyi sbyin pas sems can thams cad mgron du gnyer te//de bas sems can khyed chos kyi sbyin pas tshim par bya'o zhes byas l-I mang du thos
144b7(mdo sde): pa dang /de las gzhan pa dge ba byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la'ang brtson par mi byed na de sems can de dag la slu ba yin te/de ji skad smras po de bzhin byed pa ma
145a1(mdo sde): yin no//blo gros rgya mtsho gang gi ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyi sbyin pas sems can thams cang mgron du gnyer te kho bos sems can khyod chos kyi sbyin pas
145a2(mdo sde): tshim par bya'o zhes byas la mang du thos pa dang /de las gzhan dge ba byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la'ang brtson par byed pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'o ji skad smos pa de
145a3(mdo sde): bzhin byed pa yin no//blo gros rgya mtsho 'di lta ste dper na/rgyal po 'am rgyal po'i blon pos gleng khyer gyi skye bo thams cod la sang za na sbyin no zhes mgron du bros la yul bar
145a4(mdo sde): bor te/bza' bya dang btung po mo sbyar na des skye bo'i tshogs de thams cad bslus pa yin te/de dag kyang bza' ba dang /btung ba'i zas ma thob pas 'phyi zhing slar 'ong ba
145a5(mdo sde): de bzhin du/blo gros rgya mtsho byang chub sems dpas ma rdul ba bsgral pa dang /ma grol ba dgol ba dang /dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs dbyung ba dang /yongs su mya ngan
145a6(mdo sde): las ma 'das pa yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir sems can thams cad dbugs phyung la mang du thos pa dang /de las gzhan pa'i dge ba byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos
145a7(mdo sde): rnams la'ang brtson par mi byed na/byang chub sems dpa' de ni ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa ma yin te/lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten la slu ba yin no//de
145b1(mdo sde): rlung ston srung sa rgyas bong pa'i /rnams kyisgyu ma na mya nang gzhogs dpas byed la rnam par spyod de/gang dag dod sbyin bu bar dam bzlas pany+dzam+b+ha s+yA g+h+r-i r+b+ha rgung par byed
145b2(mdo sde): pa'i mchod sbyin gyi bdag po byed par dag ni dkon no//de bos kyang gang dag mchod sbyin sbyin po de brtsams nas blan med pa'i thog pa chen po la yongs su skyo bar mi 'gyur ba dag ni
145b3(mdo sde): ces dkon no//blogs rgyo mtsho byang chub sems dpas gang gis lha dang mi dang lto ma yan du bcas pa'i 'jig rten la slu bar 'gyur ba'i tshig brjod par mi bya'o//blo gros rgyu
145b4(mdo sde): mchog na du yang la la zhig gos byang chub sems dpa'i gang la chos kyi don bya byar gsol ba bti ba la/de la byang chub sems dpa'i kho bos khyed kyi chos kyi don 'di yongs su thob

145b6(mdo sde): 'di ltar rig par bya'o//blo gas rgya mtsho sngon byung ba'i 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang ches grangs med pa dpog tu med par gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus ni/seng ge'i
145b7(mdo sde): rgyal po dar dkar lta bu'i ral pa can yan lag mi smad pa zhes bya ba sems can thams cad la byams pa'i rjes su zhugs pa rtsa ba dang lo ma dang me tog dang 'bras bu la mos pa
146a1(mdo sde): zhig ri'i drug bgrod dka' bzhigan kunas so//ri phyug rgod da//badzin skye so ma gnyis zhig kyang gnas so//de nas dus gzhan zhig na spre'u myo de lta
146a2(mdo sde): bu 'brangs nas de las phru gu gnyis byung //de nas spre'u de dang rtswa'u mongs phru gung de gnyis ri dgas kyi rgyal po seng go la btams te spyod yul dri dong ngo //de nas byi rgod
146a3(mdo sde): rgyal po spu grI ba zhes bya ba stong gi bar snang las byebs te spre'u phru gung gnyis blangs nas steng gi bar snang la gnas par gyur pa dang /ri dgas kyi rgyal po seng gis bya rgod kyi
146a4(mdo sde): rgyal po ste gle bas spre'u phru gu de gnyis khyer ba mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang tshigs su bcad de smras pa/bya rgod rgyal po khyod la bdag gsol ba//bdag gri spre'u phrug de gnyis
146a5(mdo sde): khyod kyis thong //bdug ni de dag 'jigs med bya phyir gnas//skyabs su dong ba ma bsad khyed kyis thong //de nas bya rgod kyi rgyal ngos ri dgas kyi rgyal po seng ge
146a6(mdo sde): dol tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ri dgas rgyal po gol te khyod ni bdag 'dor ni//de ltar na ni 'di gnyis mi bsang gtong bar bya//kho bos 'di gnyis zos nas khwa
146a7(mdo sde): mkha' la gnas/de khyod rje khros par gyu kyang bdag le ci byed yod//ri dgas kyi rgyal pos yang smras pa/bdag ni btong gis yongs su bzung bar gyis/
146b1(mdo sde): bdag gi spre'u phrug gnyis ni btang bar gsol//byang chub zhugs pa dam bcas srung bar byed//mkhas pa dag ni brdzun du smra ba med//bdag brdzun 'gyur du 'ong ste lhag byasam
146b2(mdo sde): pas//de nas drang srong chen po lus 'dor te//de nas lhag pa'i bsam pas dgar gyur nas//sems can rnams kyi ched du lus gtong ngo //de nas bye rgod kyi rgyal po nges
146b3(mdo sde): rmad du byung ba de mthong nas nam mkha' la gnas te ched du brjod de ched du brjod pa/gang dag gzhan phyir rang gi lus 'dor ba//de dag 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten 'dir bder 'tsho//khro
146b4(mdo sde): bopos spre'u phrug 'di gnyis btang bar bya//khyod kyang 'tsho zhing reng du chos spyod cig/blo gros rgya mtsho de'i tshe de'i dus na ri dgas kyi rgyal po seng ger gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam
146b5(mdo sde): du khyod sems na de ltar mi blta'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/blo gros rgya mtsho nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na ri dgas kyi rgyal po seng ger gyur to//'od srung chen po ni spre'ur gyur to//ser skya bzang
146b6(mdo sde): mo no spre'u mor gyur to//sgra gcan zin dang kun dga' bo ni spre'u phrog tu gyur to//dge slong phreng ba bzang po ni de'i tshe de'i dus ni bya rgod kyi rgyal po spu gri ba zhes bya bar gyur to//blo
146b7(mdo sde): gros rgya me de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis lus ni yongs su gtang bar byi skyabs spa dong ba rnams ni yongs su gtang bar mi bya ste ji skad smras pa de bzhin du bsku

147a3(mdo sde): tshe tshul khrims dang bslab pa dang sbyangs pa'i yon tan thams cad yang dag par 'dzin ci spyod par kun tu snang ba 'di ni de'i de bzhin byedadro pa'o//byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa
147a4(mdo sde): smra ba ni de skad smra ba ste/gang gi tshe gnod sems dang tha ba dang zhe sdang spang bar snang bu 'dri ni de'i de bzhin byed pa'o//byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus smra ba ni ji skad smra bas

147a6(mdo sde): gi tshe busam gtan dang rnam par thar pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la snang ba 'di ni de'i de bzhin bying pa'o//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' shes rab
147a7(mdo sde): smra ba ni pri skad slo ba ste/gang gi tshe rab tu dbye ba'i spobs pa rnam par nges pa'i ye shes la mkhas par snang ba 'di ni de'i de bzhin byed pa'o//de bzhin du mi dge ba'i chos
147b1(mdo sde): thams cad kyi bar dag spong bar smra ba dang /dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba smra ba ni byang chub sems dpa' ji skad smra ba ste/gang gi tshe mi dge ba'i chos thams
147b2(mdo sde): cad spong ba dang dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su 'tshol ba la brtson par snang ba 'di ni de'i 'di bzhin byed pa'o//gzhan yang bsam pa ni ji skad smra ba'o//g.yo med cing sgra med pa ni ngo
147b3(mdo sde): bzhin byed pa'o//sbyor ba ni ji skad smra ba'o//sbyor ba nyams 'og tu chud par byed pa ni de bzhin byed pa'o//rtsom pa ni ji skad smra ba'o//rtsom pa la zhum pa med pa ni de bzhin byid
147b4(mdo sde): papo'o//lhag pa'i busam pa ni ji skad smra ba'o//de lA ma tshags par khyad par du 'gro ba ni de bzhin pyod pa'o//dam bcas pa ni ji skad smra ba'o//dam bcas pa nyams 'og tu chung
147b5(mdo sde): par byed pa ni de bzhin byed pa'o//thos pa kun tu 'dzin pa ni ji skad smra ba'o//thos pa sgrub pa ni de bzhin byed pa'o//tshig gis yang dag par blangs pa ni ji skad smra ba'o//lus
147b6(mdo sde): dang sboms zhum pa mdo pa ni de bzhin byed pa'o//nga rgyal med pa ni ji skad smra ba'o//ye shes yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ni de bzhin byed pa'o//bslab pa yang dag par blangs//
147b7(mdo sde): pa ni ji skad smra ba'o//bslab pa ma nyams pa ni de bzhin byed pa'o//sems dang po bskyed pa ni ji skad smra ba'o//byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa ni de bzhin byed pa'o//mi skye
148a1(mdo sde): nga'i chos la bzod pa ni ji skad smra ba'o//phyir mi ldog pa'i sa ni de bzhin byed pa'o//skye ba gcig gis thogs pa ni ji skad smra ba'o//byang chub kyi snying por 'dud
148a2(mdo sde): pa ni de bzhin byed pa'o//yang dag par blangs pa brten pa ni ji skad smra ba'o//thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ni de bzhin byed pa'o//chos kyi 'khor

148a4(mdo sde): de lta bu ni ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa yin no//bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad smos pa de bzhin byed pa'i bstan pa 'di ba shad po na/byang chub sems dpa' lha stong gis

148a6(mdo sde): ldan 'das ji tsam du de bzhin gshegs pas ji skad smras pa de bzhin bi pyid pas sangs rgyas kyi chos 'di thams cad bstan pa ni ngo mtshar to//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/

148b7(mdo sde): pa/bcom ldan 'das gang la sems kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i rnam par shes pa 'jug pa de la sgrub pa ga la mchis/bcom ldan 'das byang chub semos dpa'i gang chos thams

149b5(mdo sde): ljon te khur myur du 'dor ba de byis pa so so'i skye bo phung po lnga la ltas pas glags par gyur pas khur gyis non pa rnams kyi khur spang ba'i phyir chos ston kyang chos thams cad ma skyes

152a2(mdo sde): 'das byang chub sems dpa'i gang gi sems dang yid la nyon mongs pa dang /nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cid mi 'jug pa de dag pa'o//dag pa gang lags pa de sgrub pa
152a3(mdo sde): yang dad pa la gnas pa zhes bgyi'o//byang chub sems dpa' blo gas rgya mtshos gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs
152a4(mdo sde): su zin pa 'dri ni tshegs chung ngus sgrub pa yang dag pa 'phags pa thob par 'gyur ro//de ci'i slad du ne ni/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang dag la gnas
152a5(mdo sde): bdud kyi lcags rgyu las mi 'da' ba de dag thams cad ni sdig pa'i grogs pos yongs su zin pa legs so//gang dge bdud kyi lcags kyu las shin tu 'da' ba de dag
152a6(mdo sde): thams cad ni dge ba'i be shes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa legs so//bcom ldan 'das de lta bas ni byang chub sems dpa'i bdud kyi lcags kyu las shin tu 'da' bar
152a7(mdo sde): 'chal bas dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la bsnyen par bgyi/bsten par bgyi/bsnyen bkur bgyi'o//dge ba'i beshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub
152b1(mdo sde): sems dpa' ni tshogs chung ngum sgrub pa yang dag par 'phags pa thob par 'gyur ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho la 'di ska ces bka'
152b2(mdo sde): stsal to//blo gros rgya mtsho khyod kyis bdud kyi lcags kyu rnams shes sam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bdud kyi lcags kyu rnams 'tshal to//bcom ldan 'das
152b3(mdo sde): kyis bka' stsal pa/blo gros rgya mtsho gang thos pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams shin tu mnga' bar 'gyur zhing bdud dang phyir rgol ba rloms te myur du bla na med pa yang dge bar
152b4(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur bar khyod bdud kyi lcags kyu bstan pa la rtsams te spobs par gyis shig/blo gros rgya mtshos gsol pa/
152b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das 'dri lta ste/sangs rgyas kyi mthus bdag gis bdud kyi lcags kyu bshad par bgyi'o//bdud kyi lcags kyu rnams gang zhe na/bcom ldan 'das bdud
152b6(mdo sde): kyi lcags kyu ni bcu gnyis po 'di dag ste/bcu gnyis gang zhe na/bcom ldan 'das 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni mi phangs pa'i dngos po
152b7(mdo sde): yongs su btang ba'i sems 'jug gi phangs pa'i dngos po yongs su btang ba'i sems mi 'jug pa dang /sems con gang dag de la dga' bar gyur pa de dag la ni sbyin par
153a1(mdo sde): bgyid sems can gang dag dga' bar ma gyur pa de dag la ni sbyin par mi bgyid cing des dngos po tha dad du bgyid sems can tha dad du bgyid na/bcom
153a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i srin pa dang rab tu ldan pa'i bdud kyi lcags kyu ste dang po'o//bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims dang
153a3(mdo sde): ldan zhing dge ba'i chos can du gyur te/so sor thar pa'i sdom pas bsdams/cho ga dang spyod yul phun sum tshogs/kha na ma tho ba phra rab la'ang 'jigs par lta/'tsho
153a4(mdo sde): ba yongs su dag/bslab pa'i gnas yang dag par blangs pa rnams la slob ste/de tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i dge slong dang bram ze la bsten cing sten la bsnyen bkur bgyid
153a5(mdo sde): de tshul khrims 'chalnga pa'i sems can rnams la khro ba dang sdang ba dang zhe 'gres par bgyid cing tshul khrims de nyid kyis bdag la bstod de gzhan la smod na/bcom ldan
153a6(mdo sde): 'das 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i bdud kyi lcags kyu ste gnyis pa'o//bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa sgrub ste/
153a7(mdo sde): lus kyis kyang bzed ngag gis kyang bzod na/de sems can stobs dang ldan pa rnams la ni bzod/sems can nyam chung ba rnams la ni mi bzod pa sems can
153b1(mdo sde): stobs dang ldan pa rnams lnga ni bzod pa'i stobs nye bar ston/sems can nyam chung bu rnams la ni gnod sems kyi sems kyi stobs nye bar ston te/de re shig ni bzod re shig
153b2(mdo sde): ni mi bzod/kha cig la ni bzod/kha cig la ni mi bzod la de gang gi tshe bzod pa de'i tshe bzod pas rgyags te rlom sems su bgyid/gang gi tshe mi bzod pa de'i tshe ni myur du
153b3(mdo sde): so sor mi 'chags na/bcom ldan 'das 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa dang rab tu ldan pa'i bdud kyi lcags kyu ste gsum pa'o//bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang
153b4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus brtsams par gyur la/de brtson 'grus brtsams par gnas par nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la sems can rnams yongs su smin
153b5(mdo sde): par bgyid kyi theg pa chen po lnga sems can yongs su smin par mi bgyid/nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi gtam rgyan du ston gyi theg pa chen po'i gtam 'chib par bgyid/'jig
153b6(mdo sde): rten pa'i bgyi ba la zhal ta bgyid par brtson gyi 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos yongs su mi 'tshol/de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pas dga' ba thob ste/'di lta ste/me
153b7(mdo sde): tog dang /spos dang /phreng ba dang /bdug pa dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /na bza' dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan rnams kyis de bzhin
154a1(mdo sde): gshegs pa rnams la mchod par bgyid de de la gzhol/de la 'bab/de la bab par gyur kyang thos pa yongs su btsal ba dang /thos pa bstan pa
154a2(mdo sde): dang /thos pa la so sor brtag pa dang /thos pa bsgrub par brtson 'grus mi rtsom na bcom ldan 'das 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus dang rab tu ldan pa'i bdud
154a3(mdo sde): kyi lcags kyu ste bzhi pa'o//bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan bzhi skyed/gzugs ma mchis pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi skyed cing
154a4(mdo sde): sgrub ste/de dag la rgyun du mang du gnas par gyur la/de zhi ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la gronas shing sems can yongs su smin par bgyid pa la smod/chos
154a5(mdo sde): bsten pa la smod/sems can dang 'dre ba la smod/bsod nams kyi 'du byed rnams la smod cing mi g.yo ba'i 'du byed kyi ro myang bar bgyid cing /gcig pur dga'
154a6(mdo sde): bas dga' ba thob ste/'bang pa chung ngus gnas par gyur nas/bsam gtan las ldog par yongs su mi 'tshal gyi/'dod pa'i khams dang /gzugs kyi
154a7(mdo sde): khams la bsad par 'du shes shing gzugs ma mchis pa'i khams kyi ro myang bar bgyid le/de lus dman pas gzugs ma mchis pa'i khams rnams su skye bar
154b1(mdo sde): bgyi du cing lha tshe ring po rnams dang /skal ba mnyam par skye ste/de der skye nas kyang gang sangs rgyas mang po sangs rgyas brgya phrag mang po sangs rgyas stong phrag mang po mnyes par mi
154b2(mdo sde): bgyid pa de'i gnas ma mchis so//sangs rgyas mthong ba dang /chos mnyan pa dang dge 'dun lo bsnyen bkur bgyid pa dang bral bar 'gyur/sems can yongs su smin par
154b3(mdo sde): bgyid pa dang /dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba dang /bsod nams kyi tshogs bsags pa dang bral bar 'gyur/de'i dbang po rnams blun zhing rtul ba'i rang bzhin can du
154b4(mdo sde): 'gyur/de nas shi 'phos nas gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der yang rtul ba'i rgyun can du 'gyur zhing rmugs pa dang gnyid che bar 'gyur ba 'di ni/bcom ldan 'das byang chub
154b5(mdo sde): sems dpa'i bsam gtan dang rab tu ldan pa'i bdud kyi lcags kyi sde lnga pa'o//bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' shes rab dang ldan par gyur te rkyen shin tu
154b6(mdo sde): mthong ba'i slad du rgyu yongs su shes pa deng ldan par gyur/rgyu mi mchis pa dang rgyu dang bral ba dang /mngon por 'du bgyi ba ma mchis par gyur te/bsod nams kyi 'du byed
154b7(mdo sde): rnams la smod thabs dang bral sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par mi bgyid/tshul khrims dang /bzod pa dang /brtson 'grus dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
155a1(mdo sde): ba rnams la brtson par mi bgyid la/de 'di snyam du sems te/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mchog shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni khyad par du 'phags
155a2(mdo sde): pa ste/de las gzhan pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnams ni dman pa'o snyam na de'i dbang po yongs su ma sbyin pa btod snyoms su ltung ba ste/bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sems can
155a3(mdo sde): rnams mi sdud cing spros pa ma mchis pa/mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma mchis pa de nyid kyi ro myang bar bgyid pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i shes rlab dang rab tu ldan
155a4(mdo sde): pa'i bdud kyi lcags kyi ste drug pa'o//bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' dgon par gyur te/bas mthe'i gnas mal la mngon par dga' zhing 'dod pa chung
155a5(mdo sde): la chog shes te/rab tu dben cing khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba rnams dang mi 'dre ste/de don nyung ba dang bgyi ba nyung bas bde bar gnas te g.yo ba ma mchis kyang mang du thos pa
155a6(mdo sde): yongs su btsal ba dang /sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba dang /chos mnyan pa la brtson par mi gnas/chos kyi 'bel ba'i bka' mchid dang don rnam par
155a7(mdo sde): nges pa'i bka' mchid bgyi ba la rgyun dgum par sems te/yongs su 'dri ba'i rang bzhin can ma lags/dge ba'i ci zhes 'tshol ba la mi brtson/de dgon pa la
155b1(mdo sde): gnas pa dang gcig pur dga' bas nyon mongs pa rnams kun tu mi smra ba ste/de kun nas ldang ba glanon btsam gyis dga' ba thob cing bag la nyal yang drug par gzhom pa'i slad du lam
155b2(mdo sde): sgom par mi brtsed/de de na bdag gi don dang gzhan gyi don bya snod du brtson par mi 'gyur ba 'di dag ni/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dApa'i dgon pa la gnas pa dang rlab
155b3(mdo sde): tu ldan pa'i bdud kyi lcags kyi ste bdun pa'o//bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' mang du thos par gyur te/chos kyi gtam+ba can ni tshig mnyan par 'os pa/tshig
155b4(mdo sde): bzung bar 'os pa/snyan pa sna tshogs kyi gtam can dang spobs pa phun sum tshogs par gyur kyang dri zang zing gi slad du chos ston te/zung zing ma mchis pa'i sems kyis ma lags
155b5(mdo sde): gang las de'i gos dang /zas dang /nul cha dang /na ba'i gsos sman dang /yo byad rnams mchi bar 'gyur ba dro dag la chos ston gyi sems can gang dag dad pa dang ldan zhing
155b6(mdo sde): dang ba mang ba/legs par bshad pa'i don 'tshal nus shing stobs dring ldan pa zung zong gis de rjes su 'dzin par mi bgyid pa de dag la chos myi ston pa dang /gang dag dri la
155b7(mdo sde): bged par bgyid pa/dman pa/dman par gyur pa/gti mug gi rang bzhin can/chos rgya chen po'i snod du ma gyur pa de dag la chos ston pa dang /de zang zing gis
156a1(mdo sde): spags pa'i rgyud des gang dag chos bstan par bgyi ba ma lags pa/snod du ma gyur pa de dag la chos ston cing gang dag bstan par bgyi ba de dag la mi ston
156a2(mdo sde): pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chos bstan pa dang rab tu ldan pa'i bdud kyi lcags kyu ste brgyad pa'o//bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
156a3(mdo sde): 'jig rten rgyang pan pa yongs su 'chol te/de gzhan dge la zab mo'i bka' mching rkyen bkum nas 'jig rten rgyang pan pa'i bka' mchid sna tshogs ston te/de 'jig rten rgyang
156a4(mdo sde): pan pa'i bka' mchid ston pas 'jig rten dga' zhing mngon par dga' ba'i tshig dang /lan gyi tshig la mkhas pas sems can rnams dga' bar 'gyur te/de la legs
156a5(mdo sde): so legs so zhes bgyi ba'ang stsol bar 'gyur lo/des kyang byang chub sems dpa' yi rangs par 'gyur ba dang /lha'i bu gang dag sngon sangs rgyas mthong ba/chos zab
156a6(mdo sde): mo la mos pa/chos mnyan pa'i phyir der 'dus par gyur pa de dag sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ste/yi ma rangs nas gang 'jig rten gyi dga' bas mngon par dga' ba'i sems
156a7(mdo sde): can de dag la zab mo'i gtam gyi rgyun bcad de 'jig rten rgyang pan pa'i gtam sna tshogs ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'di ni dam pa'i chos nub par byed pa yin gyi/dam pa'i chos yongs
156b1(mdo sde): su 'dzin pa ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/don zab mo'i phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'byung gi/'jig rten rgyang pa na pa'i gtam sna tshogs kyi phyir ma yin no//zhes
156b2(mdo sde): mtsho nang 'khor de nas mchi bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i tshig smra'o//bcom ldan 'das de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' gang 'jig rten rgyung pan pi'i bka' mchid sna tshogs bgyid
156b3(mdo sde): kyi zab mo'i bka' mching 'chab pa de ni sangs rgyas 'byung ba nub par bgyi ba'i slad du zhugs pa lags te/bcom ldan 'das 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i bka' mchid zab mo 'chub cing
156b4(mdo sde): 'jig rten rgyang pan pa dang rab tu ldan pa'i bdud kyi lcags kyu ste dgu pa'o//bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i bshes gnyen ltar bcos pa sdig pa'i grogs
156b5(mdo sde): po gang da gang la bsdu ba'i dngos po rnams las 'dun pa zlog pa dang /sems can yongs su smin par bgyid pa las 'dun pa zlog pa dang /dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung ba
156b6(mdo sde): las 'dun pa zlog pa dang /bsod nams kyi tshogs las 'dun pa zlog pa dang /rab tu dben pa la sbyor ba dang /don nyung zhing bgyid pa nyung ba dang sbyor ba dang /nyan thos dang /
156b7(mdo sde): rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid de la rgyun du mang du ston pa dang /theg pa chen po dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid de la mi ston pa dag la bston cing bstan te bsnyen bkur
157a1(mdo sde): bgyid pa dang /gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' dben par gnas pas theg pa chen po las ldong ba de'i tshe byang chub sems dpas gdon mi za bar zhal ta byed par
157a2(mdo sde): bya'o zhes byang chub sems dngapa li zhal te babyeng po'i dri ma la la/gang gi tshe byang rgyub sems dpa'azhal byed pa'i rloma'oji'i ma/dben pa la sbyor zhing mtshan
157a3(mdo sde): mdung bcos pa dang rgyu dang bcas pa'i bzad pa'i sa nyo bar ston gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lus yang drug pa yang dgang la gang legs pa de dag depa mi dz+nyAn te//bya chub sems
157a4(mdo sde): dpa'i las yang dag baM yang dag phul de dag gang lags zhe ni/bcom ldan 'das bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i las yang dag pa yang dag dul lags so//bcu
157a5(mdo sde): de dag gang zhe na/'di lta ste/rnyeng pa'i rtsu ba la rab tu gnas te/dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la badzin cing bstan te bsnyen bkur babyed pa dang /mgo dang gsal
157a6(mdo sde): zhugs 'bar ba bzhin du dge ba'i chos ci zhes yongs su 'tshal ba dang /dge ba'i chos la 'dun pa gnas te yang dag pa'i brtson pa mi 'dor ba dang /bag mchis par
157a7(mdo sde): les bgyid pa chung pa gzon pa dang /bdag bde ba la mi chags par rtag par rgyun du sems can yongs su smin par bgyid pa dang /lus dang srog la mi lta bar
157b1(mdo sde): dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa dang /mtshan dang dpo byad bzung po dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyang ba'i snang du bsod nams kyi tshogs yongs su 'tshul bas mi ngoms pa dang /
157b2(mdo sde): gzungs dang spobs pa rab tu thob par bgyi ba'i slad du ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su 'tshol ba dang /so so'i skye bo thams cad kyis su mi gas par bgyi ba'i slad du shes rab kyi phar
157b3(mdo sde): tu phyin pa sgom pa dang /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis las shin tu bzla ba'i slad du thabs la mkhas pa yongs su 'tshol ba ste/bcom ldan 'das bcu po de dag ni
157b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i las yang dag pa yang dag dul lags te/gang dag la byang chub sems dpes bslab par bgyi ba de dag de la ma ston pa dang /de la 'di skad du byang chub
157b5(mdo sde): no byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin gyi le lo can gyi ma yin no//gal te khyod bskal pa brgyad dam bcus bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon
157b6(mdo sde): par sangs ma rgyas na phyis khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus so zhes mchil/bcom ldan 'das de la byang chub
157b7(mdo sde): sems dpa' gong sgyid lug nas 'bras bu thob par bgyid pa'i gnas mchis na/bcom ldan 'das 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i bshes gnyen ltar bcos pa'i bdud
158a1(mdo sde): kyi lcags kyu ste bcu 'o//bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' nga rgyal gyis khengs shing nga rgyal gyis rengs par gyur te/de nga rgyal ras
158a2(mdo sde): bla ma rnams dang /sbyin gnas rnams dang /pha ma dang /slob dpon dang /mkhan po rnams dang /de lngas gzhan pa bla mo lta bu'i gang zag rnams la kun tu 'dud pa dang
158a3(mdo sde): 'dud pa dang /rab tu 'dud par mi bgyid cing de la ma gus pAr+Na gyur pa dang /gang dag byang chub sems drapa'i spyod pa rnams la mkhris pa/khyad par thob pa/gzungs
158a4(mdo sde): dang spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa/byang chub sems dpe'i bgyi ba thams cad tshar phyin po de dag gi kun du mi mchi//mi bsnyen/mi bsten/bsnyen bkur mi bgyid//
158a5(mdo sde): yongs su smi 'dra/yongs su 'drir mi stsol cing de ma thos pa'i chos nyan par mi bgyod/thos pa'i chos rnams kyang yongs su dkar bar mi bgyid/de lus gzhan pa'i
158a6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa po'i gang zagro bdud kyi ljags kyus zin pa/chos dran pa la spyod pa de dag la dga' ba rnyed pa dang /de dag kyang de bzhin du de'i rjes su 'jug
158a7(mdo sde): por gyur pa dang /de dman pa la ston cing /khyad par dang bral bas 'di lta ste/zhan pa'i 'gro ba/blun pa/'on pa/lkug pa'i 'gro ba/'gro ba dman pa
158b1(mdo sde): nyid dmachi bar 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta snang per na/skyes bul la zhig gis gram pa'i sa phyogs smra shing tsa mu ka bstan la chub stsol bar me kyid kyi/gang nas
158b2(mdo sde): mche bar mthong ba'i phyogs der yang brer na dang rtse mo dag pas bkum no/bcom ldan 'das de ltar na zhugs shing rna mu/tsha ba dang dril ba de la lcal ga dang lam dang yal ga
158b3(mdo sde): bre'u ma chags pa rnams kyang chags par mi 'gyur/yal ga dang lo ma dang yal ga phre'u tshegs pa rnams kying skams te dog sa la ltung bar 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das nga bzhin
158b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' gang byang chub kyi sems bskyed la nga rgyal kyis/khengs shing nga rgyal gyis rengs par gyur ni/de dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang chos mnyan pa dang bral te/mdze
158b5(mdo sde): sa rnams kyang mnyan/zos pa'i chos rnams kyang yongs su dkar bar mi bgyid do//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/gang gi tshe rgya mtsho chen po mchis par gyur pa
158b6(mdo sde): de'i tshi gdel ba'i phyogs rna mchis par 'gyur ro//de gzhol ba'i snyid du chu klung thams cad dang chang mige dang /'bri'i chu thams cad tshogs chung ngus /der bababo//bcom ldan
158b7(mdo sde): 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'ang rgyal ma mchis pa bla ma dang /skye ni gnas la gus pa'ang tshogs chung ngus chos zab mo'i sgo rnams rnga bo'i dbang po la grags par 'gyur
159a1(mdo sde): ro//de dran pa la'adra gnas par 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' nga rgyal gyis khengs nga rgyal gyis rengs par gyur te/bla ma/
159a2(mdo sde): dang sbyin gnas rnams la kun tu mi 'dud cing 'dud par mi bgyid la rab tu mi 'dud na/bcom ldan 'das kye ma'o byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni bdud kyi lcags kyus zin par
159a3(mdo sde): rig par bgyi ste/bcom ldan 'das 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i nga rgyal dang rab tu ldan pa'i bdud kyi lcags kyu ste bcu gcig pa'o//bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang
159a4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' gzugs bzang zhing mdzes la phyug cing nor che ba dang /longs spyod che ba nor mang la mdzod dang bde ba mang po phun sum tshogs par gyur te gzugs dang /
159a5(mdo sde): longs spyong dang /rus dang /rigs dang /g.yog 'khor dang /bsod nams kyi tshogs kyis brtan par gyur/ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su bcil ba la mngon par
159a6(mdo sde): brtson dang de gzugs dang longs spyod dang /g.yog 'khor dang /dbang phyug gi stobs kyis rgyags shing bag ma mchis par gyur te/byang chub sems dpa' gang dag rab
159a7(mdo sde): tu byung bar gtogs pa khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par byung ba/ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su 'chol ba la brtson pa/gdugs dang bser mes sha dang khrag skams pa/rke ba
159b1(mdo sde): nyam chung ba/lus rnas srog pa/mgo dang gos la zhugs 'bar ba bzhin du gdugs mtshan du brtson 'grus brnams pa/dge ba'i chos yongs su 'tshol ba la rtag tu brtson
159b2(mdo sde): pa dang ldan pa de dag la te zhing nyam chung la mdog ngani cing mi sdug par rig nas brnyes par bya'i snyam du sems shing /de dag lngas legs par bshad pa nyan par mi 'tshal gyi
159b3(mdo sde): de bsre shes cher dman zhing chos rmugs par 'gyur ba 'di ni/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i rgyugs pa dang bag ma mchis pa dang rab tu ldan pa'i bdud kyi lcags kyu ste
159b4(mdo sde): bcu gnyis pa'o//bcom ldan 'das bcu gnyis po de dag ni/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bdud kyi lcags kyu ste/byang chub sems dpa' de dag las shin tu mi 'das na tha
159b5(mdo sde): na rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa'ang mi 'thob na/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te de ni gnas ma mchis
159b6(mdo sde): so//bcom ldan 'das de lta bas na/byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal bras bdud kyi lcags
159b7(mdo sde): klu 'di dag las shin tu 'da' bar bgyi'o///'phags pa blo gros rgya mchis zhus pa//bam po bcu pa//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems
160a1(mdo sde): dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/blo gros rgya mtsho khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bdud kyi lcags kyu 'di dag legs par bshad
160a2(mdo sde): pa legs so legs so//blo gros rgya mtsho de'i phyir legaso ba ro rab tu nyon le yid la bzung zhig dong byang chub sems dpa'i dgra kang li gnas ni bdud kyi lcags kyu thams cad
160a3(mdo sde): las shin tu 'da' bar 'gyur ba bdud kyi lcags kyu rab tu gcod pa'i chos kyi sgo khyod la bshad do//blo gros rgya mtsho bdud kyi lcags kyu rab tu gcod pa'i chos kyi sgo de dag gang
160a4(mdo sde): zhe na/blo gros rgya mtsho bcu po 'di dag ni bdud kyi lcags kyu rab tu gcod pa'i chos kyi sgo yin no//bcu gang zhe no/'di lta ste/blo gros rgya mtsho chos thams cad ni stong pa nyid
160a5(mdo sde): kye rang bzhin pas stong pa nyid kyi rnam par zhugs kyang bdag nyid skyabs byed pas/sems can thams cad la cher byams pa 'di ni bdud kyi lcags kyu rab tu gcod pa'i chos kyi
160a6(mdo sde): sgo dang po'o//blo gros rgya mtsho chos thams cad ni mtshan ma med pa'i rong bzhin pas mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par zhugs kyang yongs su thar bar byed pas/sems can
160a7(mdo sde): thams cad la cher snying rdzo ba 'di ni bdud kyi lcags kyu rab tu gcod pa'i chos kyi sgo gnyis pa'o//blo gros rgya mtsho chos thams cad ni smon pa med pa'i rang bzhin pas smon pa
160b1(mdo sde): med pa'i rnam par zhugs kyang sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir bsam bzhin du skye ba 'di ni bdud kyi lcags kyu rab tu gcod pa'i chos kyi sgo gsum pa'o//blo
160b2(mdo sde): gros rgya mtsho chos thams cad ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i rang bzhin pas 'dod tshogs dang bral ba'i rna mo par zhugs kyang 'dod chags la spyod pa'i sems can yongs su smin par byang
160b3(mdo sde): pa ni bdud kyi lcags kyu rab tu gcod pa'i chos kyi sgo bzhi pa'o//blo gros rgya mtsho chos thams cad ni zhe sdang dang dral ba'i rang bzhin pas zhe slong dang bral ba'i rnam par zhugs kyang zhe sdang
160b4(mdo sde): la spyod pa'i sems can yongs su smin par byed pa 'di ni bdud kyi lcags kyu rab tu gcod pa'i chos kyi sgo sde pa'o//blo gros rgya mtsho chos thams cad ni gti mug dang bral ba'i rang bzhin
160b5(mdo sde): pas gti mug dang bral ba'i rnam par zhugs kyang gti mug la spyod pa'i sems can yongs su smin par byed pa 'di ni bdud kyi lcags kyu rab tu gcod pa'i chos kyi sgo drug pa'o//blo gros
160b6(mdo sde): rgya mtsho chos thams cad ni kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i rang bzhin pas kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i rnam par zhugs kyang kun nas nyon mongs can gyi sems can yongs su smin
160b7(mdo sde): por byed po 'di ni bdud kyi lcags kyu rab tu gcod pa'i chos kyi sgo bdun pa'o//blo gros rgya mtsho chos thams cad ni skye ba med cing 'byung ba med pa'i rang bzhin pas skye ba med cing 'byung
161a1(mdo sde): ba med pa'i rnam par zhugs kyang /skye ba dang /rga ba dang /na ba dang /'chi ba spong ba'i phyir sems can rnams la chos ston pa 'di ni bdud kyi lcags kyu rab tu
161a2(mdo sde): gcod pa'i chos kyi sgo brgyad pa'o//blo gros rgya mtsho chos thams cad ni dang mnyam zhing bye brag med pa'i rang bzhin pas dang mnyam zhing bye brag med pa'i rnam par zhugs kyang
161a3(mdo sde): theg pa chen po'i bsam pa yongs su mi 'dor bar sems can rnams la theg pa gsum rnam par dgod pa'i ston pa 'di ni bdud kyi lcags kyi rab tu gcod pa'i chos kyi sgo dgu pa'o//
161a4(mdo sde): blo gros rgya mtsho gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa'ang mi gnas la/byang chub kyi sems kyang mi brjod/rtsom pa thams cad dang yang
161a5(mdo sde): brele la sems can thams cad rab tu thar bar bya ba'i rtsom pa'ang mi 'dir/spyod pa thams cad las kyang shin tu 'das la byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa las kyang mi ldog pa
161a6(mdo sde): 'di ni/blo gros rgya mtsho byang chub sems dpa'i bdud kyi lcags kyu rab tu gcod pa'i chos kyi sgo bcu pa'o//blo gros rgya mtsho bcu po 'di dag ni bdud kyi lcags kyu rab tu
161a7(mdo sde): gcod pa'i chos kyi sgo ste byang chub sems dpa' de dag la/rab tu sbyor na bdud kyi lcags kyu thams cad las shin tu 'das par 'gyur ro//bdud kyi lcags kyu rab tu
161b1(mdo sde): gcod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/bdud kyi gnas thams cad mog mog por gyur te rnam pa drug tu g.yos so//'di lta ste/dper na/byang chub kyi snying du
161b2(mdo sde): la 'dug pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdzo de spu nas 'od rab tu phyung bas bdud kyi gnas thams cad mogro mog par gyur pa de bzhin du de'i tshe bdud kyi gnas thams cad mog mog
161b3(mdo sde): por gyur to//de nis bdud sdig can gyis lces chen po 'di mthong nas ring zhing myur ba la gor du dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa bsdus te/bkod pa ci 'dra bas byang chub
161b4(mdo sde): kyi snying po la 'dug pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gan du 'gro ba'i bkod pa de 'dra ba'i dpag tshad sum cu rtsa drug tshun chad bdud kyi sdes bkang nas bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor gyi bkyil
161b5(mdo sde): 'khor gyi khyams ga la ba der dong ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi mthus der de bsgribs par gyur te/'ongs kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dang /gang dag phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub
161b6(mdo sde): sems dpa'i rnams dang /'khor de las sems can gang dag 'dul bar gyur pa rnams dang /gang dag sred par kun tu sbyor ba sbyangs pa'i dgra bcom pa lta ba phun sum tshogs
161b7(mdo sde): ba'i gang zag rnams ma gtogs par gang gis kyang de ma mthong ngo //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho la bka' stsal pa/blo gros rgya
162a1(mdo sde): mtsho khyod kyis bdud sdigacan bkod pa rdo lta ba dang ldan pas 'ong ba mthong ngam/gsol pa sgom ldan 'das maspyod lags so//bcom ldan 'das/
162a2(mdo sde): kyis bka' stsal pa/blo gros rgya mtsho bdud sdig can 'di ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la bar chad bya ba'i phyir 'ongs na 'di ci zhig bya//gsol pa bcom ldan 'das dede 'di bde
162a3(mdo sde): ba thams cad kyis rgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su 'phang bar bgyi'o//de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho la 'di skad ces smras
162a4(mdo sde): so//rigs kyi bu bde ba thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de ni gral yod/ngan chas ston pa'i da zhin gshegs pa'i mtshan ni ci zhig bya/blo gros rgya mchis
162a5(mdo sde): smras pa/btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas gang+gA'i klung bcu gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na bde ba thams cad kyis
162a6(mdo sde): brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bdud rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba chos
162a7(mdo sde): ston te//ci'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba thams cad kyis brgyan pa zhes bya zhe na/btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu bde ba thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams
162b1(mdo sde): den bde ba'i rgyu dang /yon tan gyi rgyu dang /bkod pa'i rgyu bskal par brjod kyang zad par mi nus te/de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams de bde ba thams cad kyisu brgyan pa zhes
162b2(mdo sde): bya//gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bdud rab tu 'joms pa des byang chub thob pa de'i tshe ngos byang chub
162b3(mdo sde): kyi snying po la 'dug ste/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thob par lus las bdud kun tu sbrel ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer byung nas 'od zer des bskol bas 'jig rten gyi khrims de
162b4(mdo sde): na bdud thams cad bye ba phrag brgyar 'khong pa'i bdud re re zhing yang g.yog 'khor bye ba brgya phrag bcu yod pa/de dag thams cad byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba der song ste phyin nus
162b5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' la bar tshod bya bar brtsams pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' la bor chad byengad mi nus te/de dag ngo mnar du gyur nas bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs gnyis
162b6(mdo sde): la gtugs so//des kyang ji lta ji ltar de dag bsam pa thug pa nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar bdud de dag la chos

163a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rab tu 'jom pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i gtam 'ba' zhig yang dag par rab tu ston te/de ni theg pa gzhan gyi mi yang med do//
163a3(mdo sde): btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu bde ba thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i 'jog rten gyi khams de ni de 'dra ste/der 'phangs na phyis bdud kyi las byed par mi 'gyur gyi/bdud las btu
163a4(mdo sde): ba'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang lhan cig tu byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//de nas bdud sdig
163a5(mdo sde): can dang ngas skrag 'jigs te/spu zing zhes byed nas/'khor de nas 'gro bar 'dod na 'gro ma nus te mi snang bar ma gyur na/de de bas kyang cher dang ngas shing skrag ste/

163a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das bdag la bskyab tu gsol/bde bar gshegs pa bdag lo bskyab tu gsol/tu bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/sdig can myi 'jigs shig/
163b1(mdo sde): skyes bu dam pa 'di lta bu 'di dag ni sems can la rnam par 'tsho ba'i phyir+yA ga nas pa ma yin no//sdig nar khyod byang chub sems dpa' TI gros rgya mtsho 'di la bzlang bya ga n+d+han
163b2(mdo sde): dong//'di nyid khyod la skyob par 'gyur ro//de nas bdud sdig can gyis thal masbyar te/byang chub sems dpa' blo gros tu mtshol phye spro bco nas 'di skad nis smos so//sa/

163b6(mdo sde): rten gyi khams der song la/'jig rten gyi khams kyi bkod pa de dang /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rab tu 'jom pa de la ltos shig dang khyod la 'tshe bar/
163b7(mdo sde): mi 'gyur ro//de nas byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mchis lag pa g.yas pa gser gyi kha dog can brkyang nas/bdud sdig can gyi spyi bor bzhag nas bdon pa dang bde
164a1(mdo sde): pa'i tshig gang gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams la chos kyi ser sna dang /skyob dpa na chos kyi dpo mkhrang med pa'i bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des bdag
164a2(mdo sde): gis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ci 'dra ba na bdud sdig can gyi'ang de dang 'dra bar gyur cig ces de lta bu'i bden pa'i byin gyi brlabs skyes so//byang chub sems dpa'ablo gros rgya mchis
164a3(mdo sde): tshig de skad ces smras ma thag tu/de nas bdud sdig can rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs mchog dang ldan par gyur te/des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'od rnam
164a4(mdo sde): pa drug tu g.yos par byas na ste sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas ma snang bar gyur te/'di ltar byang chub sems dpe' blo gros rgya mtsho'i byin gyi brlabs kyis skad cig thang cig yud
164a5(mdo sde): tsami de la bde ba thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams der gnas par gyur to//de nas bdud sdig can+da bcom ldan 'ongs de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
164a6(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bdud rab tu 'jom pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs le mgro bos phyag btsal te lan bdun bskor ba
164a7(mdo sde): byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rab tu 'jam pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na bdud las btul ba'i byang chub sems
164b1(mdo sde): dpa' gang dag 'khod pa de dag gis bdud sdig can de mthong nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rab tu 'jom pa de la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das sems
164b2(mdo sde): can dbang chung zhing mdog ngan la mi sdug pa 'di lta bu 'di gang nas mchis/bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu nub phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas
164b3(mdo sde): gAng+ka'i klung bcu gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams me mjed ces bya ba yod do//de na de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
164b4(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so//'tsho'o gzhes so//de 'dus pa chen po'i le'u ni chos kyi rnam grangs rgya cher ston to//yang dag par rab tu 'chad do//der phyogs
164b5(mdo sde): bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' tshad med grangs med cing bgrang ba las shin tu 'das pa dag/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan pa'i phyir 'dus so//byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor der

164b7(mdo sde): 'dus par gyur to//chos kyi rnam grangs de'i tha ma bshad pa'i tshe bdud sdig can mig gis mi rtsol bar bya ba'i phyir 'ongs pa dang /skyes bu dam pa des 'dul ba'i dbang nye bar bzung
165a1(mdo sde): d+ya dud sngag can 'jig rten gyi khams 'dra 'phangs po/de nas bdud las btum pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag blos bdud sdig can la 'ang /
165a2(mdo sde): skad ces smras so// kho bo cig kyang khyod kyi grogs yin gyis/sdig can khyod bla ru med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/
165a3(mdo sde): kho bo cag kyang bdud du gyur te/sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa bo byer chad bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa las/kho bo cag de bzhin ga shegs pas bla na med pa yang dag par
165a4(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do//de lta bas na sdig can khyod bla na meng pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cig/de nas bdud sdig can/
165a5(mdo sde): gyis lhag pa'i'o bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas tshig 'di skad ces bdag gis/bla no med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
165a6(mdo sde): byang chub tu sems bskyed de phyin chad bdud kyi las mi bya'o zhes smras so//de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis bdud sdig can rin po che bkod pa'i seng ge'i khri la
165a7(mdo sde): bi zhig ste/de na 'dus pa chen po'i le'u'i chos kyi rna mo grangs kyi gtam rgyud ci 'dra bo li rigs kyi bu khyod spobs par gyis shig ces gsol ba btab bo//de nas

168a7(mdo sde): pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar lung bstan to//sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun tu bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o///
168b1(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' bro gros rgya mtshos 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub 'di ni bar chad
168b2(mdo sde): mang ba phyir rgol ba mang ba lags ni/gang 'di lta bu'i mdo sde 'di drug de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyis nub par mi 'gyur zhing rgyas par 'gyur ba dang /gang dag
168b3(mdo sde): 'dzin po dang klog pa dang /ston pa de dag la'ang bdud dam bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ba dang /dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas pa dang mdo sde
168b4(mdo sde): 'di lta bu 'di dag kyang kun tu bsrung ba dang sba ba dang /yongs su gzung ba'i slad du/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas legs par byin gyis brlab tu gsol/
168b5(mdo sde): skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpe' blo gas rgya mtshol 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//blo gros rgya mtsho sems can gang dag mdo sde 'di la
168b6(mdo sde): bu 'di dag 'dzin pa dang /ston par 'gyur zhing 'dod pa brtson 'grus brtsams pa/dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa de dag 'dul ba'i dbang nye bar gzung ste chos kyi rnam grangs 'a
168b7(mdo sde): byoran byis pa rlabs zin to//blo gros rgya mtsho de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la bzung shig dang /tshig gang dag shes rgyal po chen po bzhi dag bkug nas chos kyi rnam
169a1(mdo sde): grangs 'di kun tu bsrung ba dang /chos smra ba de dag kyang yongs su gzung ba'i phyir nan tan byed par 'gyur ba'i rgyal po chen po bzhi dgug pa'i tshig
169a2(mdo sde): rnams brjod par bya'o//blo gros rgya mtsho dgug pa'i tshig de dag gang zhe na/'di lta ste/sa mo sA ma san d+ho/sa ra Na sa ra bA ti d+hi nA d+hA na ba ti d+hu d+hu mai d+h+yaM d+hu mA ba te a
169a3(mdo sde): brti a ma le bi ma lau/bi dz+ra re ka ka re ka ru Ni/hu hu hu hu ba te hu hu san+ni/nir+g+ha ta ni a bat+te/kri bat+te ma dru ma te ma ra dza te/bi shud+d+he bau shu d+ha ba ti/mi su li ma no hA
169a4(mdo sde): re/blo gros rgya mtsho 'di dag ni dgug pa'i tshig rnams yin te/chog de rig gis rgyal po chen po bzhi bkug nas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di kun tu bsrung ba dang /chos smra
169a5(mdo sde): de'ang yongs su gzung ba'i nin tani byed par 'gyur ro//sngags kyi tshig 'di rnams chos smra ba des legs par kha ton du byas te/phyo ga sA bzhir byams pas khyab par
169a6(mdo sde): byas la rgyal po chen po bzhi bsam na/sngags kyi tshig 'di dag gis rgyal po chen po bzhi bkug nas 'ong bar 'gyur ro//de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi 'khor de nyid du 'dus par
169a7(mdo sde): gyur te 'dog pa de dag stan las langs te/bcom ldan 'das gol ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom
169b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das rgyal po chen po bzhi po bdag cag lhan cig tu mthun par gang na yang dag pa dang lhan cig pa'i nad kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'dre 'chad par 'gyur ba der/chos kyi rnam
169b2(mdo sde): glengs 'di 'ang kun tu srung ba dang chos smra ba de'ang yongs su gzung ba dang /ci nas gang gis kyang bsgribs pa'am gnod par bgyid par mi 'gyur bar bgyi ba'i slad du mchi bar
169b3(mdo sde): bgyi'o//blo gros rgya mtsho gzhan yang lha'i dbang po brgya byin dgug pa'i tshig brjod par bya ste/tshig de dag gis lha'i dbang po brgya byin dgug par 'gyur ro//lha'i dbang po
169b4(mdo sde): batra byin dgug pa ru 'gyur ba'i tshig de dag gang zhe na/'di lA~M s+yA dza ye dza ya me ti eT+Te mAT+Ta maM ku re sid+d+hi ma ti shu b+haM shAn+ti kA r+ye na da ne dAn+te dAn+ti myA ti/tang+ka rek+Sha ya kA yaM mu khai ya
169b5(mdo sde): bat+ti nau bi bat+ti nai pa rits+tshe dr-i smr-i ti smi ti san+tiHA gan+d+he kau shri kA/nr-idz+r-i tA/a su ra/dzi yaMn+ti de ba sa ma yaste a bo d+harma nir+t+r-i to//ra mi h+ya nAs+t+ri ya nA mA b+ha dra nAM I rak+Sha d+harma tsA ri NAM/
169b6(mdo sde): blo gros rgya mtsho 'di dag ni lha'i dbang po bairma kIR+Ya dbrog pa'i tshig ste de dag gi lha'i dbang po brgya byin dgug par 'gyur ro//deng chos smra ba des sngags kyi tshig 'di dag legs par
169b7(mdo sde): kho ton du byas la gtsang po dang /gtsang sbra'i tshogs khrus legs par byas te/gos bzang po bgos la/shar phyogs su me tog gtor te sangs rgyas thams cad bsam
170a1(mdo sde): bya'i dran pa dang /sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po dang rab tu ldan pas seng ge'i khri la 'dug ste lha'i dbang po brgya byin bsams la/kau shi ka/
170a2(mdo sde): 'khor legs par yongs su bzhag pa'i phyir tshur shog/sngags grub pa mngon sum du gyis shig ces brjod na/de'i bsam pa shin tu rnam par dag cing yongs su dag la
170a3(mdo sde): tshul khrims yongs su dag pas bsams ma thag tu lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'ongs nas 'khor yongs su 'jog par 'gyur/sngags kyi grub pa'ang nye bar bsgrub par 'gyur ro//
170a4(mdo sde): de nas lce'i dbang po brgya byin 'khor de nyid du 'das par gyur te/'dug pa des bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam gangs 'di
170a5(mdo sde): yongs su gzung ba dang /yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du bdag chos smra ba de'i drung du mchi bar bgyi/de'i 'khor kyang yongs su bzhag par bgyi/sngags kyis
170a6(mdo sde): grub pa'ang nye bar bsgrub par bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bshad par bgyi'o///
170a7(mdo sde): de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das 'das pa dang /ma byin pa dang /de ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'di las
170b1(mdo sde): bstan pa'i slad du'o//bcom ldan 'das bdag gis 'das pa dang /ma byin pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos la gus par bgyis te/
170b2(mdo sde): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bgyi'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin lnga legs so zhes bya ba byin+da te/kau shi ka khyod
170b3(mdo sde): kyis dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir seng ge'i sgra bsgrags pa legs so legs so//de lta bu ni khyod kyi bya ba'o//lha'i dbang po khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'od
170b4(mdo sde): bsams na lha rnams ni rgyal zhing lha mi yon rnams ni pham par 'gyur bar shes par bya'o//blo gros rgya mtsho gzhan yang bdud dang bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams tshar bcad pa'i
170b5(mdo sde): sngags kyi tshig 'di rnams brjod par bya ste/sngags kyi tshig de dag gis bdud dang bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams tshar chod par 'gyur ro//sngags kyi tshig de dag gang zhe na/'di
170b6(mdo sde): l+ye ste/n+ya sha maM/sha ma ba tai/sha mi ta shat+si/aM gu re/maM gu re/mA ra dzi te/kr-i rA Te/ke yu re/te dzo pa ti/o ho ka ma ti/bi shraSh+Ta/nirma le/ma lA ba na
170b7(mdo sde): ye/oM kha re/o kha rA/gra se/kha yA gA se/gra sa te/he mu khI/pa rA mu khi/a mu khA/sha mi tA ni/sarba gra ha ban+d+ha nA ni/ni gr-i hi tA/sarba pa ra pra pA
171a1(mdo sde): don/ saHk+Sha sh+yAk+Sha/ s+yAng+ga//sam+b+har+m+maN+Dit+ta/s+yasan/un tA pa bya brad+d+hat+ti kar+m+mAnI swA m+b+ha kAr+m+maN+De/glos rgyumatshong/
171a2(mdo sde): dag ni bdud char bcad pa'i tshig/nyon mongs pa bsal ba'i cho ga ste/de dag chos smra ba/des legs par kha ton du byas la chos kyi khril 'dug ste/byang chub kyi rnam
171a3(mdo sde): pas mngon par bsgrubs pa'i byams pas 'khor thams cad la khyab par byas la/bdag la sman par 'du shes dang /chos la sman gyi 'du shes dang /chos nyan pA la
171a4(mdo sde): nad pa'i 'du shes dang /de bzhin gshegs pa la skyes bu dmo pa'i 'du shes dang /chos kyi tshul la yun ring du gnas pa'i 'du shes bskyed la/sngags kyi tshig 'di
171a5(mdo sde): ngadag mngon du byas te/chos kyi gtam byed na/de'i khor yug dpag tshad brgya tshun chad du bdud dang bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams mig gis mo rtsol bar bya ba'i las kyi phyir
