171a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das gang bdag byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtshos 'jig rten gyi khams/bde ba thams cad kyis brgyan par 'phangs pa skyes bu dam pa de dag gis byin
171b1(mdo sde): sa dang /NA dul dang /tsho phrul 'di bdag la mngon sum d+ha k+Shan+nahU~M/bcom ldan 'das bdag dadeng sman dang bad kyi sug las rnams cad da //ga' da /
171b2(mdo sde): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ston pa dang /yang dag par rab tu ston par 'gyur ba'i snong ngam/grod khyer ram/gang rdal lam/gtsug lag khang deng chos mnyan pa'i skud
171b3(mdo sde): byung gung rmyil me mdzes pa dang /gus pa dang banas shing ni ste dang bcasi pas mchis par 'gyi'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/sdig can legs so lags sa
171b4(mdo sde): khyod chos la gus pa'i rnam par sbyin po 'dis rim gyis bdud kyi las thams cad las shin tu 'dus te/gang skyis bu dam pa de dag gis thos pa'i chos de dag rjes su 'phob
171b5(mdo sde): mor 'gyur ro//blogs rgya mtsho gzhan yang mi mjed kyi bdag blo tshangs pa dgug pa'i sngags kyi tshig rnams brjod par bya ste/dgug pa'i sngags kyi tshig de dag gis tshangs
171b6(mdo sde): po bkug nas chos smra ba'i gon du 'ong bar 'gyur ro//sngags kyi tshig de dag gang zhe na/'di lta ste/mri tre ka re/ka ru No karI/mr-i di ta kA raM/u pek+Sha ka re/bud+d+ha ka re/
171b7(mdo sde): /sar+b+ba ka~M/su~M kr-i ti bi tsam/mdag na/nisu~M //mdzab te/mdzag me/d+har+m+mAH/nid ni/sairbe shwet+paSh+ThAn+te/u ti /
172a1(mdo sde): sA tsit+ta u pa sha me/bya ba lo ka ya brah+mA Na/byA tiSh+Tha na maste/a bek+Sha sA d+ha ma tsa raNAM/ku ru sa d+harma pA ri brA ha Na/kri ta ma nu pA la ya/bud+d+ha ni/tI ma?
172a2(mdo sde): ma bya ba tshwa ba si s+pha ra taM/d+harma tsakA pra bar+t+ta nA~M/ku ru sAtrA bo sha d+ha nA~M/pra ti grA ha na/d+harma nAM ga ra mA mA nAM/bud+d+ha a d+hiSh+ThA nI/ma bI ka u pa yaM/blo gros rgya mtsha mi
172a3(mdo sde): mdzod kyi bdag po tshangs pa dgug pa'i sngags pa'i tshig 'di dag chos smra ba des legs par kha ton du byas la tshangs pa'i lam la shin tu gnas te/zhe 'gras pa med
172a4(mdo sde): pa'i sems kyi rgyud dang /dbang po shin tu smras pa dang /shin tu bsrungs pa'i dran pa dang /shin tu dkar ba'i phyag rgya dang /shin tu yongs su dag pa'i lus kyi
172a5(mdo sde): las dang /shin tu dben pas zin pa'i ngag gi las dang /shin tu brtan pa'i blo dang /legs par byas pa'i bzod pa'i las dang /shin tu yongs su sbyangs pa'i
172a6(mdo sde): tshul khrims kyi phung po dang /legs par brtsams pa'i brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang /shin tu bsten po'i mang du thos pa dang /shin tu yongs su bsgoms pa'i sems/
172a7(mdo sde): las su rung ba dang /shin tu rna ba'i shes rab kyi dbang po dang /shin tu brtson pa'i yang dag pa'i sbyor ba dang /byang chub kyi sems kyis legs par zin pa dang //
172b1(mdo sde): shin tu yongs su bsgoms pa'i byams pa dang /shin tu brtan pa'i snying rje chen pos sems can thams cad kyi bde ba yang dag par skyed pa dang /sems can thams cad sdug
172b2(mdo sde): bsngal las shin tu yongs su dgrol ba'i phyir seng ge'i khre la 'dug ste/mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa bsams la chos kyi gtam yod drag par rab tu brjod na/des bsams
172b3(mdo sde): ma theg tu tshangs pa tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu rloms dang lhan cig tu 'ong bar 'gyur ro//blo gros rgya mtsho de la tshangs pa 'ong bar 'gyur ba'i ltas ni 'di lta bu 'di dag 'byung
172b4(mdo sde): bar 'gyur te/'di lta ste/'khor thams cad byams spyi'i sems su 'gyur ba dang /dbang po nyams pa med pa dang /gcig la gcig mi gnod par gnas pa dang /
172b5(mdo sde): chos dang chos smra ba la ston pa dang /bla ma ltar phangs par sems pa dang /thal mi sbyar ba dang sems rtse gcig pa dang /myi g.yeng bar yid la byed pa dang /rus shing
172b6(mdo sde): ltar byed pa dang /yid la byed pa dang /sems can thams cad kyis sems pa dang /rna bzugs te nyan pa dang /chos smra ba de'ang sngon lung ma mo nas pa dang /sngon
172b7(mdo sde): mi thos pa'i chos rnams kyang mngon du 'gyur ba ste/'khor dang mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'ongs par rig par bya'o//de nas mi mdzad kyi bdag po tshangs pa
173a1(mdo sde): 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdug tshangs pa'i 'jig rten
173a2(mdo sde): du gnas te/bsam gtan dang tshad med pa'i bde ba la gnas pa bor la gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di stod pa'i 'khor der mchi bar bgyi'o//chos smra bya de la'ang
173a3(mdo sde): ches brkyang bsgrubs par bgyi'o//brgyad gang zhe na/ji ltar thos pa'i chos mi bskyud par bgyi ba'i slad du de la dran pa bsgrub par bgyi/chos zab mi rtogs par
173a4(mdo sde): bgyi ba'i slad du de la blo gros bsgrub par bgyi/don gyi rnam pa rtogs par bgyi ba'i slad du de la rtogs pa bsgrub par bgyi/the tshom thams cad bcad pa'i slad du de la
173a5(mdo sde): spobs pa bsgrub par bgyi/skyed dang nges pa'i tshig thams cad kyis yongs su tshim par bgyi ba'i slad du de la lung bstan pa phun sum tshogs pa bsgrub par bai gyi/
173a6(mdo sde): 'khor thams cad zil gyis mi non par bgyi ba'i slad du de la 'dul ba bsrung ba bsgrub par bgyi/mi dman par lung bstan pa'i srad du de la chos kyi snang ba bsgrub
173a7(mdo sde): par bgyi/de bgyid cing chos bsgrub pa'i slad du de la nges par 'byung ba'i sgo bsgrub par bgyi ste/bcom ldan 'das chos smra ba de la tshes brgyang po 'di dag bsgrub
173b1(mdo sde): par bgyi'o//chos smra ba de la bsrung zhing sba ba dang /dam pa'i chos kyang yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du 'di lta ste/de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyi byin gyi brlabs
173b2(mdo sde): kyis ji ltar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rgyas par 'gyur ba de ltar bdud thams cung dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad shin tu tshar bcad par bgyi'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das la
173b3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtshos 'di skad ces gsol to//de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan lus 'das te/tha ma'i dus kyi tshe ci nas dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa'i
173b4(mdo sde): sems can rnams kyi sug par mchi ba dang /mdzod du chud pa dang /glegs bam du 'gyur zhing nub par mi 'gyur bar bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
173b5(mdo sde): byin gyi brlab tu gsol/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtshos gsol ba btab pa mkhyen nas/mdzod spu nas 'di lta bu'i 'ang phyung ste/'od
173b6(mdo sde): ngas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang ba chen po khyab par gyur nas/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dri na rtswa dang /shing gral
173b7(mdo sde): pa dang /sman dang /nags tshal dang /rdo dang gyo mo dang gzugs su snang ba de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs su snang ngo //rin po che bkod pa'i
174a1(mdo sde): khyams na mchod pa'i las byin gyis brlabs pa'i gzugs kyi rnam pa gang dag yod pa de dag kyang dri bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs nyid du gnas par
174a2(mdo sde): kun tu snang ngo //de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs de dag gis gsung gcig tu/kye ma'o chos kyi rnam grangs 'dri ni bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas byin gyis brlabs
174a3(mdo sde): so//gang bcom ldan 'das kyis byin gyis brlabs pa de phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'o//gang sangs rgyas bcom
174a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa de la bdud thams cad kyis bar chad bya bar mi nus so//bcom ldan 'das gal te gr-ing+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bdud
174a5(mdo sde): dpung dang bcas/g.yog 'khor dang bcas/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la bar chad bya bar btud kyang de dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la bar tshad bya bar mi nus
174a6(mdo sde): so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/sa 'gas kyang srid/rgya mtsho thams cad ni skam yang srid/ri thams cad ni rnam par mthor yang srid/rlung ni zhags pas bcang
174a7(mdo sde): du rung yang sring /nyi ma dang zla ba ni sa'i steng du ltung yang srid/nam mkha' ni gzugs kyi rnam par bsten du rung yang srid/me ni chur 'gyur yang srid/chu/
174b1(mdo sde): ni mer 'gyur yang srid/'byung ba chen po bzhi ni gzhan du 'gyur yang srid/sems can thams cad la sems ni gcig tu byar rung yang srid/nam mkha' dang
174b2(mdo sde): sa ni 'byar yang srid kyi/de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs ni sus kyang bskyod pa'am g.yo ba 'am 'khrugs par byed mi nus so zhes gsungs so//de nas/
174b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rkun dga' bo'i spyi bor phyag bzhag ste/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//kun dga' bo khyod kyis dam
174b4(mdo sde): pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par bye ba nye bar bzung ste/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung shig/tshangs shika/lhogs shig/kun chub par gyis shig/gzhan
174b5(mdo sde): dradrug la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston cig/de nas bcom ldani 'das la byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtshos 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das
174b6(mdo sde): kyis don gyi dbang gang gzigs nas dri la rgya mtsho dang mtsho chen po ltar/gting dpag dka' ba'i dran pa dang blo rab tu thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag mchis bzhin
174b7(mdo sde): du/dge slong kun dga' bo nya che ba'i 'tshal pa dang ldan pa la chos kyi le'u 'di lta bu 'di yongs su gtang /bcom ldan 'odas kyis bka' stsal pa/blo gros rgya mtshang/
175a1(mdo sde): slong kun dga' bo rang gi dran pa las bskyed pas mdo sde 'di lta bu 'dzin pa ma yin gyi/de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis 'dzin to//
175a2(mdo sde): blo gros rgya mtsho sems can gang dag dge slong kun dga' bo las rjesakyi rnam grangs 'dra bas na dga' ba dang /dad pa dang /mchog tu dga' ba thob par 'gyur ba yong
175a3(mdo sde): de/de dag 'di snyam du 'di lta ste/de bzhin gshegs pa'i byid gyis brlabs kyis 'di ltar nyan thos kyang 'di lta bu'i mdo sde 'di 'dzin cing ston pa ni/de bzhin
175a4(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i byin gyi brlabs ci tsam du bsam gyis mi khyab pa dpo cher to snyam du sems par 'gyur ro//de nas 'khor de las lha dang mi kha cig 'di snyam du sems
175a5(mdo sde): ci bya chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho 'di dan pa rab tu ldan pa yin gyi/gang bcom ldan 'das kyis mang du thos pa'i mchog tu bstan pa tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo
175a6(mdo sde): nado lta mo yin no snyam mo//de nos tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos 'khor de'i sems kyi rnam par rtog pa sems kyis shes nas 'khor gyi sems can rnams la
175a7(mdo sde): rnam par bltas te/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho 'ang rab tu dran pa dang ldan pa lags
175b1(mdo sde): kyi grang bcom ldan 'das kyis mang du thos pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ni ma lags sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'od srung //
175b2(mdo sde): gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag na sems ca tsam du bsdu bar gas pa'i sems can gyi khams ni rab tu mang gi se'i khams ni de lta ma yin no//zhes
175b3(mdo sde): gsung skad du bya ba de la ji snyam du sems/'od srung sems can gyi khams de myong ngam/'od srung gis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mang lags so//bde bar
175b4(mdo sde): gshegs pa tshad ma mchis so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'od srung yongs su rtag pa nye bar bzung ste/sems can de dag thams cad snga phyi med pa mi'i
175b5(mdo sde): lus thob par gyur la/de bzhin du ji ltar dge slong kun dga' bo ltar dran pa dang gzungs kyi stobs dang yang ldan par gyur kyang kun dga' bo lta bu'i sems can de dag gis
175b6(mdo sde): dran pa dang gzungs kyi stobs de ni/byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho'i dran pa dang /gzungs kyi stobs beskyed par brgya'i tshe re yang nye bar mi 'gro ba ras dpel bar
175b7(mdo sde): dri nga mi zod do//'od srung byang chub sems dpa' blo gros kyi mtshani phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bam ldan 'das thams cad kyis gsungs pa 'dzin to//de bzhin
176a1(mdo sde): gshegs pa gcig gi chos bstan pas de bzhin gshegs pa gnyis kyi chos bstan pa la sgrib pa'am/klan nas ldang ba'i bya ba ma byed de/'od srung 'ang
176a2(mdo sde): lha ste/dper na rgya mtsho chen por shing rta'i sreg shing tsam gyi cher pa'i rgyun 'bab pa'i chu rgyun gcig gis chu'i rgyun gnyis pa la snying pa'am kun nas ltung ba'i bye ba
176a3(mdo sde): mi byed de/chu'i rgyun thams cad kyang rgya mtsho chen pos blangs nas de la 'grob pa'am grang ba'i de med do//'od srong de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsha
176a4(mdo sde): skyang rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi chos bstan pa kun tu 'dzin kyang /de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gis chos bstan pas de bzhin gshegs pa gnyis kyi
176a5(mdo sde): chos bstan pa la sgrib pa'am/kun nas ldang ba'i bya ba mi byed de/de'i dran pa'i stobs bskyed pa la bri ba'am gang ba'ang med do//bstan pa 'di bshad pa na srog chags
176a6(mdo sde): brgya stong gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyod de/tshig 'odi skad ces bdag cag kyang byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho'i dran pa'i
176a7(mdo sde): stobs bskyed pa ci 'dra bar gyur cig ces smras so//thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyis lha'i dang /me'i me tog gis bcom ldan 'das deng byang chub sems dpa'
176b1(mdo sde): blo gros rgya mtsho la gtor mngon par gtor to//de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma bkod pas 'di skyed ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi
176b2(mdo sde): bu'ami rigs kyi bu mo gang chos kyi sgo'i le'u 'di thos nas mos pa dang /mos nos kyang 'dzin pa dang /'chang ba dang /klog pa dang /'dren pa dang /rtog pa dang /
176b3(mdo sde): bzhin du nan tan bgyid pa de bsod nams ji tsamra zhig skyed par 'gyur/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma bkod pa la tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal
176b4(mdo sde): stong chen po yi 'jig rten khams 'di ni//gser gyis bkang ste bde gshegs phul ba bas//gang gis chos kyi mdzod 'di thos nas ni//mos pa'i bsod nams
176b5(mdo sde): 'di ni khyad par 'phags//gang gis 'jig rten khams khri rin chen bkang //de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la phul ba bas//gang gis che ngo sde 'di la 'jug byas pa///
176b6(mdo sde): bsod noms de la snrums bskyed du meng //gang gis 'jig rten ldams ni stong phrag bcu//rin chen bkang ste sbyin pa byin pa bas//gang gis mdo 'di bton nas ston pa
176b7(mdo sde): yi//bsod nams de yi tsheni snga ma min//zhing ni bye ba khrag khrig stong gi rnams//rin chen byakang ste 'jig rten slob dpon skyob/sangs rgyas rnams la dbul bar
177a1(mdo sde): phul ba bas//gang gis tshul 'dir rab tu sbyor ba dang //phyogs bcu rnams su gang+gA'i bye snyed zhing //rin chen bkang ste rgyal la phul ba bas//ji
177a2(mdo sde): ltar bstan pa bzhin du gang gnas pa'i//bsod nams de la mnyam pa yod ma yin//rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dang chos 'dzin dang //chos sgrub pa dang srog
177a3(mdo sde): chags snying rje ba//tshes bzhi 'di dag bsod nams mtha' yas te//de dag mtha' ni bde gshegs ma gsung ngo //nem mkha'i khams dang de bzhin sems can
177a4(mdo sde): khams//sangs rgyas ye shes dang ni byang chub sems//chos bzhi 'di dag dpag tu med pa ste//mkhas pa rnams kyis de thos dogs mi bya//dkon mchog
177a5(mdo sde): chos 'di rab tu bshad pa na//phyogs bcu'i zhing ni bya ba g.yos par gyur//snang ba byung zhing me tog char yang bab//sil snyan brgya dag ma dkrol sgra yang byung //
177a6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa de dag kun//mgu nas ched du brjod pa ched du brjod//chos bstan 'di 'dra 'di thos bdag cag rnams//'tsho ba don yod na
177a7(mdo sde): pa legs par rnyed//gang dag 'di 'dra 'di ni thos 'gyur ba//sems can de dag rnyed pa rab rnyed pa//gang dag byang chub sems ni mi brjed do//de dag de bzhin
177b1(mdo sde): gshegs pas shin tu bzung //phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas stong phrag bye ba rnams//phyag ni g.yas pa rab tu rkyang mdzad de//yon tan rgya mtsho'i spyi bor bzhag nas ni//shAkya
177b2(mdo sde): seng ge'i bskul ba legs zhes gsung //lha dang klu dang lha min ma'ame tsi//dri za gnod sbyin mkha' lding lto 'phye tsho//brgya byin tshangs po 'jig rten skyong ba rnams//nas mkha'
177b3(mdo sde): gnas te ched du brjod pa brjod//shAkya seng ge 'odi dang dge 'dun dang //mdo sde 'dri 'bru ba ni 'dzin byed po//byang chub sems dpa' dpa' bo ring gnas gyur//legs gsungs
177b4(mdo sde): chos ni gzhan yang nub mi 'gyur//gang dag chos kyi tshul ni 'di 'dzin pa//de dag la ni bdag cag bsnyen bkur bgyi//bdag cag thams cad gus dang bcas par ni//kun//
177b5(mdo sde): tu srung zhing sba bar spro bar bgyi//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho la bka' stsal pa/blo gros rgya mtsho chos kyi tshul chos kyi phyag/ches btus
177b6(mdo sde): pa ches rab tu dbye ba 'di ni 'das pa dang /ma 'ongs pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bshad pa/'chad pa 'chad par 'gyur ba ste/blo
177b7(mdo sde): gros rgya mtsho khyod kyis de la gus pa dang bcas pa dang /zhe sa dang bcas pa dang /sgrub pa snying por bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/byang
178a1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros r+b+ba madz+dza dang /thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems da 'i tshogs de dang /dge slong gi dge 'dun
178a2(mdo sde): dang /lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang /dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//byin gyis brlabs kyi
178a3(mdo sde): le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//'dus pa chen po'i le'u'i chos kyi rnam grangs las/'phags pa blo gros rgya mtshos zhus pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste lnga pa rdzogs so///
178a4(mdo sde): rgya gar gyi mkhan po 'dzin mi tra dang /dA na shI la dang /bud d+hi pra b+he dang /zhus chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+d+ha ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gas chad kyis kyang bcos nas
178a5(mdo sde): gaugatan la phab pa//rgya gar skad du/Ar+ya sA ga ra nA ga nA dza pa ri prits+tshi nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/bid skad du/'phags pa klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos zhus pra zhes bya bya
178a6(mdo sde): theg pa chen po'i mdo//bam po dang bri//sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/bcom
178a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la/dge slong brgyad stong gi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /byang chub sems dpa' mngon par shes pa mngon
178b1(mdo sde): par shes pas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa/rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa/gzungs dang mdo sde rtogs par khong du chud pa/sems can thams
178b2(mdo sde): da kyi spobs paso mgu bde byed pa/mngon par shes pa'i ye shes ston pa la mkhas pa/pha rol te phyin pa thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa/byang chub sems
178b3(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms pa ro 'jug pa dang ldang ba shes pa la mkhas pa/sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstod cing bsngags la snyan par brjod pa/sangs rgyas kyi zhing
178b4(mdo sde): thams cad du rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba shes pa la mkhas pa/bdud thams cad skrag par bya ba shes pa la mkhas pa/chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du shes pa la mkhas
178b5(mdo sde): pa/sems ca na thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa la mkhas pa/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad yang dag par sgrub pa shes pa la mkhas
178b6(mdo sde): pa/sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mchod pa'i las yang dag par sgrub pa'i shes pa la mkhas pa/'jig rten gyi chos thams cad kyis ma gos pa/lus dang ngag dang sems
178b7(mdo sde): kyi rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po la spro ba'i go cha bgos pa/bskal pa grangs med par brtson 'grus chen pos yid yongs
179a1(mdo sde): sgyu mi ts+tshab/sa ga'i sgra chen pa bsgrags pa/byas kyi rlos pa rnams cad kyis dril gyis mi smon pa/d+hI mi lkog pa'i chos kyi phyug rgyas pa /
179a2(mdo sde): bya/sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba thob pa khwanyas stong la 'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lhun po dang /rorab dang /
179a3(mdo sde): bo chen po dang /lhun po'i rtse 'dzin dang /lhun po mar ma'i rgyal po dang /sbyin pa brtsegs pa dang /lhun po'i rgyal mtshan dang /lhanI pa'i rgyal po dang /sbyin pa'i
179a4(mdo sde): mo rdib pa'i rgyal bu dang /'brug sde dang /rnam+b+ha dang /rin chen 'byung rjes dang /rin rjen tu g+hi dang /rin chen rtse m+bu dang /rin chen drangul dang /na
179a5(mdo sde): chen 'byung dang /rin chen 'od dang /rin chen khor ba can dang /rin chen rtsi mo dang /lag na rin chen phyag rgya dang /rin chen dra ba dang /rin chen bkod pa
179a6(mdo sde): dang /rin chen 'od dang /rin chen gleng dang /rin chen sgron mA dang /lag na rin chen dang /dga' byed dang /chas la dga' bri bkod pa dang /bkod pa'i
179a7(mdo sde): rgyal po dang /mtshan gyis yang dag par brgyan pa dang /tshig bkod pa'i 'ad dang /tshig rnam par das pa'i 'od dang /gtsug na rin po che dang /lha rtsigs
179b1(mdo sde): dang /rin chen brtsegs dang /'od zer stong ldan dang /me l+lI dang /skar ma la dga' ba dang /zla 'od dang /sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /
179b2(mdo sde): gser bzangs rnam dag 'od dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu rgyun mi chad par mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa dang /byams pa la sogs pa bskal pa
179b3(mdo sde): bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad dang /'jam dpal la sogs pa sems dpa' dpe med pa drug cu dang /bzang skyong la sogs pa skyes bu
179b4(mdo sde): dam pa bcu drug dang /rgyal po chen po bzhi la sogs pa rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang /lha'i dbang po brgya byin la sogs pa sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang
179b5(mdo sde): lha'i rgyal po rab 'thab bral ba'i lha rnams dang /lha'i rgyal po yongs su dga' ldan la sogs pa dga' ldan gyi ris kyo lha rnams dang /lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul dga'i lha
179b6(mdo sde): rnamaso dang /lha'i rgyal po dbang byed la sogs pa gzhon 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang /lha'i bu dred dpon la sogs pa bdud kyi ris kyi lho'i bu dkar po'i phyogs
179b7(mdo sde): thams cad dang /ra bo tshangs pa la sogs pa'i tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don po'i lha rnams dang /mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa la sogs pa tshangs chen gyi ris kyi lha rnams
180a1(mdo sde): dang /lha'i rgyal po 'od gsal la sogs pa 'od gsal gyi lha rnams dang /lha'i rgyal po dge rgyas la sogs pa dge rgyas kyi lha rnams dang /lha'i
180a2(mdo sde): rgyal po 'bras bu che la sogs pa 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams dang /lha'i rgyal po dbang phyug chen po la sogs po gnas gtsong ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang /lha'i rgyal
180a3(mdo sde): po dri med 'od la sogs pa 'og min gyi lho'i bu rnams dang /lha mA yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan la sogs pa lha ma yin gyi dbang po drug khri dang /mI 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon
180a4(mdo sde): pa la sogs pa mi 'am ci'i rgyal po bzhi khri nyis stong dang /dri za'i rgyal po phreng thogs la sogs pa dri za'i rgyal po sum khri nyis stong dang /klu'i rgyal po mA dros pa la
180a5(mdo sde): sogs pa klu'i rgyal po bdun khyi nyis stong dang /bya'i rgyal po nam mkha' lding bzhi stong dang /dri ma yin pa'i lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri ze dang /lha
180a6(mdo sde): ma yin dang /nam mkha'i lding dang /mi 'am tsI dang /lto 'phye chen po gzi brjid chu ba gzi brjid che ba stong dag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so//de nas bcom
180a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das 'khor stong phrag du mes yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te chos ston cing /lha bems cad kyi bkod pas legs par rgyan pa'i seng ge'i khril ril
180b1(mdo sde): rgyal po ri rab rgya mtsho'i nang nas gyen du 'phags pa bzhin du bzhugs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis lha drang bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnun nas dge slong gi tshogs kyis yongs
180b2(mdo sde): sru bskor te la mo me lhun ni lhang nge zhing bzhugs so//de nas de ltar 'dus pa'i 'khor de'i nang na de bzhin gshegs pa de ltar bzhugs pa'i steng gri bAr snang la rin po che'i gdugs
180b3(mdo sde): rin po che thams cad kyi 'od dang ldan zhing rin po che thams cad kyis legs par brgyan pa zhig byung ste/rin po che'i gdugs des thams cad dang ldan pa'i gling bzhi pa chen po'i 'jig
180b4(mdo sde): rjen 'di kun tu khebs par gyur to//rin po che'i gdugs de las kyang mu tog kha dog du mi'i rgyan phreng 'bum phrag du ma 'di lta ste/mu tig dkar po dang /mu tig dmar
180b5(mdo sde): po dang /mu tig dri ma med pa dang /gser lta bu'i mu tig dang /zla ba lta bu'i mu tig dang /pad+ma lta bu'i mu tig dang /nam mkha' lta bu'i mdog can gyi mu tog rnams
180b6(mdo sde): 'phyang ngo //mu tig gi rgyan+da phreng de dag las kyang 'od zer dag byung ngo //'od zer de dag las kyang me tog kha dog sna tshogs pa/kha dog 'bum phrag du ma/dri zhim pa/blta
180b7(mdo sde): na sdug pa yid du 'ong ba dog gi cher mngon par bab bo//me tog de dag gis kyang 'khor gyi khyams thams cad pus mo nub pa tsam du gang bar gyur to//bar snang la
181a1(mdo sde): 'brug sgra chen po skrag par gyur to//a garu dang /tsan+dan gyi bye ma dag dang /n+dan dus kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i bye ma ngag gi char yang bad bya//de nas
181a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa radril gyi bu chen po stan las langs nas rmugs phrog pa gcig tu gzir te pus mo g.yos pa'i lha ngos la btsugs nas/bcom ldan
181a3(mdo sde): 'das gol ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/bcom ldan 'das la byad skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das sngon ma mthong ma thos pa'i cho 'phrul 'di
181a4(mdo sde): bu grada' ba di dag su'i sde ltas lagos/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maut+pal gyi blo chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
181a5(mdo sde): med+gal gyi bu 'di ni klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshod de bzhin gshegs pa la bltar 'ong ba de'i snga ltas yin no//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig de skad ces bka' stsal nas ring
181a6(mdo sde): po ma lon par/klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho klu bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dang /klu'i bu mi bye ba phrag bdun cu rtse gnyis kyis bskor cing mdun du bdar te/me tog dang /bdun/
181a7(mdo sde): pa dang /spos dang /me tog phreng dang /byug pa dang /phyi ma dang /gos dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /baidan thams cad dang /si
181b1(mdo sde): snyan dang /phyag rdob pa dang /glu dbyangs brgya stong dag len cing bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag bcol
181b2(mdo sde): te/ji ltar thogs pa'i me tog dang /bdug pa dang /spos dang /me tog phreng dang /byug pa la sogs pa dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba don la sogs
181b3(mdo sde): pa dang /sil snyan dang /pheg rdob pa dang /glu dbyangs rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la mtshud pa byas nas/btsun mo'i 'khor drang bcas pa dang /gnyen 'dab kyi
181b4(mdo sde): 'khor dang bcas pas de'i tshe/bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang mthun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstong ngo //'jig rten dag na 'jig rten phan par bzhed
181b5(mdo sde): pa 'jig rten gyis mchod 'jig rten mig sbyin pa//'jig rten du skyes 'jig rten dri ma rnams kyis ma gos pad+ma chus mi chags pa bzhin//'jig rten snang ba rnam par
181b6(mdo sde): gzigs pa spyan gsum mnga' ba 'jig rten bde ba sbyin mdzad pa//'jig rten nyi ma rkyen la mkhas pa 'jig rten gtso bo khyod la de ring bdag phyag 'tshal//dul zhing dul
181b7(mdo sde): byas yongs bskor stobs bcu mnga' ba sbyin pa rnams dang dul ba rnams kyis 'phags//'dren pa nyon mongs rdul dang mun pa dang ni dri mo tha ba bsregs shing myu gu
182a1(mdo sde): bsregs//snying rjes nor gyi gtso bo bdun po sbyin par mdzad cing sems can rnams la byams pas 'phags//bsod snyoms zhing ste 'jig rten+da
182a2(mdo sde): rtsa lag brtan po khyod la bdag ni mgo bos phyug 'tshal lo//khyod kyi zhal gyi smin mtshams mdzod spu 'bor ba me tog kun+da zla ba dung mdog 'dra//'di ni tshangs pa'i
182a3(mdo sde): gnas na 'khod pa'o lha rnams kyis kyang khyod kyi spyi gtsug mthong mi 'gyur//zla ba lta bu'i zhal nus byung ba'i rlud byung 'od kyis 'gro ba ma lus snang bar mdzad//de yis
182a4(mdo sde): reg par gyur pa'i dbang gis mtshams medo sems can rnams kyang bde ba nyid du gyur//khyod kyi gsung ni shin tu yid 'ong tshig ste zla ba bzhin dri yid kyang tshim par bgyid/
182a5(mdo sde): lha dang mri yi sgra skad zil gyis gnon cing gcig tu nges par ngag lnga gtsang ba ste//'dod chags zhe sdang mun pa rdul rnams rab tu zhi bar bgyid cing shes rab gsal
182a6(mdo sde): bairarla bgyid//dga' dang mgu bgyid bang ba shin tu skyed par bgyid cing thar pa yang dag ston pa lpags//khyed kyi ye shes dus gsum gtogs pa rtogs pa ma
182a7(mdo sde): mchis gar yang chags pa ma mchos te//khyod kyis sems can rnams kyi spyod pa chung dang 'bring dang dam pa mi lus thugs su chud//gang dag gis ni dab
182b1(mdo sde): pababasam pa ngag dang 'gro dang thar pa tha dad ji 'dra ba//thams cad khyod kyis skad cig tsam gyis thugs su chud par de slong khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//rdzogs pa'i byang chub
182b2(mdo sde): shing rgyal drung du blugs lce'i phyir brtson bdud rnams bye ba brgya phrag snyed//khyod kyi thang du lhags par gyur kyang gnas les ma g.yos thugs brtser ldan pa'i blo mnga' ba//
182b3(mdo sde): mnga' bdag khyod kyis badren dang brtul zhugs dpalnga dang yon tan rnams dang byams pas pham par mdzod//de slad mi rnams su zhig drang 'dir khyed la mchod pa'i slad
182b4(mdo sde): du khyod la ngo mos par 'dzin//mnga' bdag khyod kyis chos rnams byed pa mAM do dang ya ma brla dang zla ba 'dra ba dang //dbu ba glog sprin tshwa yi chu bur 'dri zhing sgyu ma smig rgyu lta
182b5(mdo sde): bur thugs su chud//gang la rgyu med rtog pa mo 'byung khyod kyis chos de dag ni rtag tu bdag med de//de ltar 'gro ba'i 'dod pa lnga bskyed mdzad pas mnga' bdag khyod ni thar
182b6(mdo sde): pa lags pa ro 'os//gang gis don tu bskal pa bye bo khrag khrig mang por dka' ba rnams ni bsten pa drang //gang gi don du rtag tu 'gro la phan mdzad 'dren pa rnams la/
182b7(mdo sde): mchod pa mdzad pa dang //glang gi don du sbyin dang yang dge sdom dang dul dang bzod pa rtag tu bsten pa yi//rnam 'dren khyod kyi smon lam chen po shin tu rmed ri byung ba
183a1(mdo sde): de ni rdzogs par gyur//de nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang mthun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par/
183a2(mdo sde): bstod nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du/bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na/
183a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu bar 'tshal lo//de skad ces gsol pa
183a4(mdo sde): dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//klu'o bdag po khyod nI dang ci 'dod pa de bzhin gshegs pa la dris shig dang /
183a5(mdo sde): ngas dri ba dris pa de dang de lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dri ba lung bstan pa'i skabs phye nas/bcom ldan 'das
183a6(mdo sde): la klu'i rgyal po rgya mchos 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams ngan 'gro dang ngan song thams cad yang dag par chad pa
183a7(mdo sde): dang /mi khom pa brgyad las 'das pa dang /lha dang /mi'i skye bar 'gro ba lags//bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams rtag tu rgyun
183b1(mdo sde): mi 'chad par sangs rgyas mthong ba thob pa dang /dge ba'i bshos gnyen dang phrad pa dang /'tsham pa'i yul du gnas pa 'thob pa lags/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar
183b2(mdo sde): na byang chub sems dpa'i rnams dad pa dang /dga' ba'i shas che ba dang /las kyi rnam par smin pa la rton pa dang /mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spangs nas dge ba'i
183b3(mdo sde): chos thams cad kyis 'bigs pa lags/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i rnams rgyas don tu gnyer ba dang /chos 'tshal ba dang /chos kyi kun
183b4(mdo sde): dga' la dga' bas dga' ba dang /thos pa tshol bas tshig ma 'tshal ba dang /thos pa sgrubs pas mngon par 'phags pa lags/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar no byeng
183b5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rnams rab tu 'byung ba la mos pa dang /nags dang /nags 'dab na rgyu ba dang /'phags pa'i rigs dang /sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang /yo byad
183b6(mdo sde): bsnyungs pa la mngon par dga' ba dang /rab tu byung ba'i yon tan rnams yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa lags/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
183b7(mdo sde): chas zab mo'i tshul la gnas pa dang /chad pa dang rtag par lta ba yongs su spangs pa dang /rgyu dang rkyen gyi chos rnams la zhugs pa dang /lta ba'i rnam pa thams
184a1(mdo sde): du dang bral ba lags/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par rtse ba dang /smra
184a2(mdo sde): pa ma mchis pa'i ye shes mthong ba lags/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems can gyi spyod pa dang /bsam pa dang /cho ga 'tshal
184a3(mdo sde): pa lags/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams yongs su smin par bgyi ba dang /gzung ba dang /bklag pa dang /brda sprod pa la mkhas
184a4(mdo sde): pa lags/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams bdud kyis phyir rgol ba bcom pa dang /skrag pa dang /'jigs pa thams cad dang bral nas
184a5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa lags/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams phyir mi ldog pa'i chos la yang dag par gzhol ba dang //
184a6(mdo sde): bzod pa thob pa dang /lung bston pa thob pa lags/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to///
184a7(mdo sde): klu'i bdag po legs so legs so//khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di 'dri bar sems pa ni klu'i bdag po legs so//klu'i bdag po de'i phyir legs
184b1(mdo sde): par rab tu ston la yid la gzung shig dadrungs khyod la bshad//bcom ldan ng+yas lcogs so zhes gsol to//'i rgyal po rgyu mtsho bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa

184b3(mdo sde): yang dag par chad par 'gyur te/bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/sems can thams cad la khong khri ba'i sems meng pa dang /dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par
184b4(mdo sde): blangs nas thams rnyed srung ba dang /gzhan gyi nyes pa mi gleng zhing brnyas par mi byed pa dang /bdag gis 'khrul pa rtog par byed kyi gzhan gyi 'khrul pa la mi rtog pa
184b5(mdo sde): ste/klu'i bdag po chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/byang chub sems dpa' rnams ngan 'gro dang /ngan song thams cad yang dag par chud par 'gyur ro//

185a1(mdo sde): mi byed pa dang /gzhan dag gi 'gyod pa mi skyed pa dang /sems can 'gyod cing 'dug pa rnams kyi 'gyod pa sel ba ste/klu'i bdag po chos bzhi po

185a4(mdo sde): blangs pa mi gtong zhing nyams par mi byed pa dang /smon lam lo bsem po rnam par dag pa dang /sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir de dag la snying rje
185a5(mdo sde): chen po skyed pa ste/klu'i bdag po chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rnams lha dang mI'i skye bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro//klu'i badrag po chos brgyad dang ldan

185b1(mdo sde): byed du 'jug pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa lta ba la sems can rnams yang dag par 'dzud pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang na de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa thos pa

190b7(mdo sde): yon tan yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/brgyad gang zhe na/'phags pa'i rigs kyis tshig par 'dzin pa dang /sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang /yo byad bsrungs pa 'i gnas
191a1(mdo sde): pa dang /mang du thos pa dang /sems nges par sems pa la dga' bya dang /byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa lnga kun tu rmongs par byed pa dang /dran pa//
191a2(mdo sde): nye bar bzhag pas gnas pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /shes rab sdom pa'i sbyor bya la brtson pa dang /brtsams pa thams cad sgrub pa snying por byed pa ste/blo'i bdan
191a3(mdo sde): chos brgyad po de dag dang ldan ne byang chub sems dpa' rab tu 'byung ba'i yon ton yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//klu'i bdug po ches bcu dang ldan ni byang chub sems
191a4(mdo sde): dpa' rnams chos zab mo'i tshul la gnas pa yin te/bcu gang zhe na/bdag gi ngo bo nyid kyis chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyi rjes su 'gro ba dang /bdag dag pas chos
191a5(mdo sde): thams cad dge ba'i rjes su 'jug pa dang /bdag med pas chos thams cad bdag myed pa la mos pa dang /bdag stong pas chos thams cad stong par som nyi med pa
191a6(mdo sde): dang /bdag dben pas chos thams cad dben pa la 'jug pa dang /bdag zhi bas chos thams cad zhi bar so sor rtog pa dang /bdag ji lta ba bzhin pas chos thams
191a7(mdo sde): cad ji lta ba bzhin du khong du chud pa dang /bdag zab pas chos thams cad zab par nges par sems pa dang /bdag bems po yin pas chos thams cing bems
191b1(mdo sde): bo yin par nges par rtog pa dang /bdag gzung du med pas chos thams cad gzung du med par rab tu shes pa ste/bcu po de dag go//klu'i bdag po gzhan yang chos bcu dang /
191b2(mdo sde): ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos zab mo'i tshul la gnas pa yin te/bcu gang zhe na/rnam par bsgrubs pas gnas pa'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir chos thams cad sgyu ma lta
191b3(mdo sde): bur shes pa dang /phyin ci log las byung bar mthong bas chos thams cad rmi lam lta bur rab tu shes pa dang /phyin ci log tu 'du shes pas chos thams cad smig rgyu lta bur ras/
191b4(mdo sde): tu shes pa dang /rgyu'i bye ba dang /rkyen la dmigs te skye ba'i chos thams cad mig yor lta bur rab tu shes pa dang/'pho ba med pa'i mtshan nyid las phyir mi ldog pas chos thams
191b5(mdo sde): cang chu zla lta bur rab tu shes pa dang /yul la mi gnas shing phyogs na mi gnas te ngo bo nyid med pas chos thams cad brag cha lta bur rab tu shes pa dang /skad cig kyang mi
191b6(mdo sde): sdod pa ste chos thams cad sprin dang glog snang ba lta bur rab tu shes pa dang /'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang /gti mug gis chags par mi 'gyur bas chos thams cad
191b7(mdo sde): 'ji' tshon lta bur rab tu shes pa dang /blo bur gyi nye ba'i nyon mongs pas nyon mongs pa can du mi 'gyur bas chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rab tu dag par shes pa
192a1(mdo sde): dang /skye ba dang /'jig pa dang /gnas pa dang bral bas chos thams cad nam mkha' lta bur rab tu shes te/klu'i bdag po chos bcu po de dag dang /
192a2(mdo sde): ldan na byang chub sems dpa'o rnams chos zab mo'i tshul la gnas pa yin no//klu'i bdag po chos gnyis dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rnams chad par lta bar ltung bar
192a3(mdo sde): mi 'gyur te/gnyis gang zhe ni/las kyi bya ba la 'jug pa shes pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cang rnam par sgrub pa shes pa ste/klu'i bdag po ches de gnyis
192a4(mdo sde): dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rnams chad par lta bar ltung bar mi 'gyur ro//klu'i bdag po chos gnyis dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rnams rtag par lte bar
192a5(mdo sde): lhung bar mi 'gyur te/gnyis gang zhe na/mi rtag pa'i chos la 'jug pa shes pa dang /skyes nas zhig cing zhu ste/mi gnas par rab tu rnam par dbye ba shes pa ste/
192a6(mdo sde): klu'i bdag po chos gnyis dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rnams rtag par lta bar ltung bar mi 'gyur ro//klu'i bdag po chos bzhi dang ldan ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams
192a7(mdo sde): brten te 'byung ba la mkhas pa yin te/ma rig pa kun 'byung ba nas rga shi kun 'byung ba'i bar la 'jug pa dang /ma rig pa 'gag pa nas rga shi 'gag pa'i bar
192b1(mdo sde): la 'jug pa dang /chad par lta bar yang mi ltung ba dang /rtag par lta bar yang mi gnas pa ste/klu'i bdag po chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rnams rten
192b2(mdo sde): cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la 'jug pa la mkhas pa yin no//klu'i bdag po chos bzhi dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rnams lta bar gyur pa thams cad du lta bar mi 'gyur te/bzhi
192b3(mdo sde): gang zhe na stong pa nyid shes pas bdag dang sems can du lta ba rI ma 'gyur ba dang /mtshan me med po shes pas srog dang gang zug tu lta bar mi 'gyur ba dang /smon pa med pa shes
192b4(mdo sde): pas 'byung ba dang 'jig par lta bar mi 'gyur ba dang /rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba shes pas ched pa dang rtag par lte bar mi 'gyur ba ste/rgyas bzhi po 'di dang ldan na byang chub
192b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams lta bar gyur pa thams cad du lte bar mi 'gyur ro//klu'i bdag po chos drug dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rnams mngon par shes pa'i shes pos rnam
192b6(mdo sde): par rtse bar 'gyur te/drug gang zhe na/sems can thams cad la khong khro ba med pa'i lta bas de'i lce'i migu rnam par dag par 'gyur ba dang /ngan du smras pa'i tshig dang
192b7(mdo sde): du len pas lha'i rna ba rnam par dag par 'gyur ba dang /sems can kun nas nyon mongs pa med pas gzhan gyi sems shes pa rnam par dag par 'gyur ba dang /sngon byas
193a1(mdo sde): pa'i dge ba'i rnab sems can thams cad la gtong bas sngon gyi gnang rjes su dran pa shes pa rnam par dag par 'gyur ba dang /mthun par byed pa dang
193a2(mdo sde): bka' tho ba'i ba dang /ji skad smras pa bzhin byed pas rdzu 'phrul bya ba shes pa rnam par dag por 'gyur ba dang /chosna rnams la slob dan kyi dpe ma lhung mdo pas zag
193a3(mdo sde): zad pa shes pa rnam par dag par 'gyur ba ste/drug blang dag go/klu'i bdage bo gzhan yang mar mi byin pas ni lha'i mig rnam par dag/pa 'gyur ro//sil san
193a4(mdo sde): dang /thig rdib pa dang /klu'i dbyings rnams cad byin pas ni rtswa'i rnaM ba rnam par dag par 'gyur ro//kun nas nyon mongs pa med par byin pas ni gzhan gyi ma
193a5(mdo sde): shes pa rnam par dag par 'gyur ro//dgra pa'i chos dran par byed cing bek+kul bas ni sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa shes pa rnam par dag par 'gyur ro//sgrib pa dang /
193a6(mdo sde): 'gyod pa bsal bas+t+ra ni rdzu 'phrul gyi bya ba shes pa rnam pAR+Sha dag par 'gyur ro//ches byin pas ni zag phye zad pa shes pa rnam par dag par 'gyur ro//klu'i bdag
193a7(mdo sde): bo gzhan yang de bzhin ga shegs pa la lta bas ni lha'i mig rnam par dag par 'gyur ro//dam pa'i chos mnyan pas ni lha'i rna ba rnam par dag par 'gyur ro//
193b1(mdo sde): sems kyis nges par brtags pas ni gzhan gyi sems shes pa rnam par dag par 'gyur ro//dge 'dun rjes su dran pas ni sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa shes pa rnam par
193b2(mdo sde): dag par 'gyur ro//'dun pa drag pos ni rdzu 'phrul gyi bya ba shes pa rnam par dag par 'gyur ro//chos skyengs pas nI zag pa zad pa shes pa rnam par dag par 'gyur ro//de
193b3(mdo sde): la mngon par shes byas rnam pAr N+ye bA gang zhi nA/klu'i bdag po 'di la nyan thos dang /rlung sangs rgyas rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa dang /phyi rol gyi drang srong mngon par
193b4(mdo sde): shes pa lce dang ljon pa rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa dang /lha dang klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lA mA yin dang /nam mkho'i lding dang /mi 'am ci
193b5(mdo sde): dang /lto 'phye chen po dang /mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de bas ni byang chub sems dpa'i lha'i mig de ches 'das pa dang /ches gsal ba dang /
193b6(mdo sde): ches khyad par du 'phags pa dang /chos mchog tu gyur pa dang /ches rnam par dag pa ste/de'i lha'i mig des ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprin gyi yul ma gtogs par
193b7(mdo sde): semaso can du snang ba 'am/gzugs su snang ba'am/chos su snang ba gang yang mi rtogs pa dang /mi mthong ba dang /mi shes pa ci'ang med do//klu'i bdag
194a1(mdo sde): bo nga la nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi lci rna ba gang yin pa nas mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar rnams kyi lha'i rnga ba gang yin pa de bas ni byang chubase /
194a2(mdo sde): dpa'i lha'i rna ba de ni su 'dus pa dang /ches gsal ba dang /ches byed par du 'phags pa dang /ches mchog tu gyur pa dang /ches rnam par dag pa ste/de ltar
194a3(mdo sde): rje rje'i dpung ba des ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i snyan gyi sprul ma gtogs byer sbyar phrag pa glang yang thos par mi 'gyur ba ci'ang med de/des ni sgra thams cad kyi sngon gyi rje
194a4(mdo sde): dang /phyi mo'i meny+dza yongs su gcod pa rab tu shes so//klu ring dra//po de 'i byang chub sems dpapyas ni sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyu ba dang /sems kyi dmigs
194a5(mdo sde): bridang /sems kyi mtshan ma dang /sems kyi dpyod pa dang /sems kyi /sems kyi bsam pa dang /sems kyi 'bras bu dang /sems kyi nges par
194a6(mdo sde): sems kyi brtag pa dang /sems kyi rnam pa sna tshogs dang /sems kyi rjes su chags pa dang /sems kyi khong khro ba dang /sems rnam par g.yengs pad
194a7(mdo sde): sems bsdu ba dang /sems bral bar g.yo ba dang /sems lhag par g.yo ba dang /sems bskul ba dang /sems gnas pa dang /sems kyi sngon
194b1(mdo sde): mtha' dang /sems kyi phyi ma'i mtha' dang /sems kyi da ltar byung ba dang /sems kyi gnas dang /sems kyi gnas pa thams cad yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu
194b2(mdo sde): shes te/shes nas kyang de bzhin du des sems can de dag la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam 'jug par byed do//des sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pas bdag dang gzhan rnams
194b3(mdo sde): kyi sngon gyi mthu'i mur thug pa'i bar gyi 'chi 'pho yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes shing dran te/rnam pa dang bcas/yul phyogs dang bcas par yang drug pa ji lta ba
194b4(mdo sde): bzhin du de kho na nyid dang gzhan ma yin par brjod par byed do//rdzu 'phrul gyi bya ba rnams la'ang mngon par 'du byed pa med pa thob ste bya ba thams cad ston to//klu'i bdag po 'di/
194b5(mdo sde): dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa ste/de la rang gi sems la dbang byed pas don thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa 'di ni de'i rnam par rtsi ba ste/sangs
194b6(mdo sde): rgyus yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba 'ang kun ston la gtan du yongs su mya ngan las 'dra' bas yongs su mya ngan las 'de' bar yang mi byed pa lta bu'o//de la byang chub
194b7(mdo sde): sems de ba'i zug pa zad pa shes pa mngon sum du byed pa'i mngon par shes pa gang zhe na/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi rnam par grol ba la ma tshogs te/
195a1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi rnam byar grol ba la lhag par dmigs shing rang bzhin gyis zag pa zad ba shes kyi shes pa de mngon sum du byed pa ni ma yin
195a2(mdo sde): la sems can thams cad kyi zag pa zad par bya ba kho na'i phyir yang 'khor ba'i rgyun la gnas pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa drug pa'o//klu'i bdag
195a3(mdo sde): po rgyos bzhi dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sgrub pa med pa'i ye shes mthong bya la 'jug pa yin te/bzhi gang zhe na/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su
195a4(mdo sde): bsgos pa'i mngon byer shos po lnga dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen pos yongs su bsgos pa'i so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /thabs dang shes rab
195a5(mdo sde): kyis yongs su bsgos pa'i gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pas yongs su bsgos pa'i
195a6(mdo sde): byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun te/klu'i bdag po ches bzhi po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes mthong ba la 'jug pa yin
195a7(mdo sde): no//klu'i bdag po de la sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes mthong ba gang zhe na/nyon mongs pa thams cad kyang mthong la bag tshigs kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i rnam pa'i nyon mongs pa
195b1(mdo sde): thams cad kyang yang dag par bcom pa gang yin pa dang /'khor ba'ang mthong la mya ngan las 'das pa la'ang yang dag par gzhol ba dang /nyan thos dang /rang sangs
195b2(mdo sde): rgyas kyi sra'ang mthong la byang chub kyi snying po la'ang yang dag par gzhol ba dang /sems can gyi spyod pa'i rjes su'ang 'jug pa'i sems can gyi spyod pa dben par yang shes pa ste///
195b3(mdo sde): 'di ni sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes mthong ba zhes bya'o//gzhan yang sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes mthong ba ni 'dus byas kyi bya ba thams cad kyi rjes su'ang 'jug la/'dus ma byas
195b4(mdo sde): pa'ang thob pa gang yin pa dang /'dus byas thams cad kyi nye bar zhi ba'ang mthob la 'dus byas kyang thob pa'o//klu'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' ni 'dus byas la spyod pa
195b5(mdo sde): na'ang 'dus ma byas shes pas sgrib pa med pa la 'dus ma byas pa thob pa la'ang 'dus ma byas kyi chos kyis sgrib pa ming de//der sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes gang yin pa don byang
195b6(mdo sde): chub sems dpo'i sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes mthong ba zhes bya'o//klu'i bdag po ches bzhi dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems can gyi spyod pa dang /bsam pa dang tshe
195b7(mdo sde): gi shes pa yin te/bzhi gang zhe na/'jig rten gyi rjes su 'jug pa'i shes pa dang /snyoms par 'jug pa la mkhas pa'i shes pa dang /shes pa dang /bsam
196a1(mdo sde): ba las su rung ba'i bsam pa dang /sems la dbang byed pa'i thabs te/klu'i bdag po chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems
196a2(mdo sde): can gyi spyod pa dang /bsam pa dang cho ga shes pa yin no//klu'i bdag po chos lnga dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa yin te/lnga
196a3(mdo sde): grang zhe na/bdag gi bde ba la mi lta bas yid yongs su mi skyo ba dang /brtson pa brtan pas sems can la bde ba sbyin pa dang /snying rje chen po dang /sems can rnams
196a4(mdo sde): kyi spyod pa ji lta ba de lta bu'i spyod pa la rjes su 'jug pa dang /gong du'ang yon tan khyad par can la'ang 'god par byed pa ste/klu'i bdag po chos lnga po de dag dang ldan na byad
196a5(mdo sde): chu bo sems dpa' sems can yongs su smin par byed pa yin no//klu'i bdag po chos drug dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' 'dzin pa dang /klog pa dang /k+She dza skad
196a6(mdo sde): pA la mkhas pa yin te/drug gang zhe na/gzungs thob pa dang /dran pa dang shes bzhin gyis sgrub pa dang /yang dag pa la tshul bzhin du 'jug pa dang /sems
196a7(mdo sde): kyi rjes su 'jug pa shes pa dang /thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa thob pa dang /dgongs pa'i tshig ldan pa'i shes pa la mkhas pa ste/klu'i bdag po chos drug po de dag
196b1(mdo sde): dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' 'dzin pa dang /klog pa dang /brda sprod pa la mkhas pa yin no//klu'i bdag po chos brgyad dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' bdud phyir
196b2(mdo sde): rgyal ba bcom pa yin te/brgyang gang zhe na/sgyu ma'i chos nyid phung po lce yongs su shes pa dang yang ljin la 'jig rtogs la lte bo'i nyin mongs pa dang bral te/stong du
196b3(mdo sde): nyid la spyod yul ba'ang yin pa dang /'du byed thams cad kyi skye ba med par yang rab tu shes la sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir bsams bzhin du skye bar yang byed
196b4(mdo sde): pa dang /brtson 'grus brtan pas byang chub kyi bsam pa'ang yongs su mi gtod la khams gsum pas kyang yid rtag tu skrag po dang /mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'ang
196b5(mdo sde): mi ltung la thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyang yongs su 'chol ba dang /sems can rnams la'ang lta la/bsod nams kyi tshogs kyang sogs pa dang /mi rtag pa'i
196b6(mdo sde): mtshan nyid la'ang yid che so la ye shes kyi tshogs kyang sogs pa dang /nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi shes pa la'ang ma chags pa ste/klu'i bdag po chos brgyad
196b7(mdo sde): bopo de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' bdud phyir rgol ba bcom pa yin no//klu'i bdag po chos bcu dang ldan da byang chub sems dpa' skrag pa dang 'jigs pa bams
197a1(mdo sde): / da nas smra sa/smra na pa/ ng+tha shA na na gyi gas

197a5(mdo sde): skrag pa dang 'jigs pa tham mo cad dang bral te byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa yin no//klu'i bdag po chos brgyad dang ldan na byed chub sems pa'

198a2(mdo sde): pas kyang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la spyod par byed la zag pa thams cad kyang zad par mi byed pa ste/klu'i bdag po che so lnga po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa'

198a5(mdo sde): phyir chags pa med pa ste ga sum po de dag go/gzhon yang gsum ste/sngon gyi mtha' rnam par drag par bya ba'i phyir mi zad pa'i cho sa nyid dang /phyi ma'i mtha'i rnam
198a6(mdo sde): por dag par bya ba'i phyir mi skye ba'i chos nyid dang /de ltar byung ba'i chos rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir logs par gnas pa'i chos nyid de/gsum po de dag gi/

198b1(mdo sde): kyis nye bar brtan pa dang /ngag yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir ye shes mtha' yas pa dang /snasems yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir ting nge 'dzin la dmigs pa ste/klu'i
198b2(mdo sde): bdag po chos gsum po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa thob pa yin no//klu'i bdag po chos bzhi dang ldan no byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
198b3(mdo sde): rnams kyis lung ston par mdzad de/bzhi gang zhe na/chos rnams la lhag pa'i bsam pas sgrub pa dang /dkar po rnam par mthong bas spyod pa la spyod pa yongs su rdzogs pa
198b4(mdo sde): dang /sems can gyi bsam pa rnams la ye shes kyi stobs bskyed pa thob pa dang /shin tu med pa'i rang bzhin gyis ma skyes ma byung ba'i chos rnams rab tu shes pa ste/
198b5(mdo sde): gru'i bdag po chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' songs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis lung ston par mdzod do//bstan pa 'di bshad pa na lha dang klu
198b6(mdo sde): dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang lha ma yin dang /nam mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po dang /mi dang mi ma yin pa khrag khrig phrag bcu gnyis ni bla
198b7(mdo sde): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so//byang chub sems dpa' bdun khri nyis stong gis mi skye ba'i chos rnams la bzod pa thob bo//dge slong khri bzhi/
199a1(mdo sde): stong ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go//dge slong ma brgyad stong ni len pa med par zug pa rnams las
199a2(mdo sde): sems rnam par grol lo//lha'i bu lnga stong gis ni 'did chags dang bral ba thob bo//stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'ang de'i tshe rnam pa drug tu g.yos
199a3(mdo sde): so//'jig rten yang snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to//me tog gi cha re chen po'ang bab bo//lha'i bu rnams kyis kyang bar snang las sil snyan brgya stong dag dkrol te
199a4(mdo sde): ched du brjod pa 'di skad kying ched du brjod do/A la la de bzhin gsheg sa pas ni chos kyi 'khor lo gnyis pa bskor ba 'di chos kyi rnam grangs 'dri las bskor to//yul
199a5(mdo sde): bA ra NI si drang srong smra ba ri dgas kyi nags su chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba gang yin pa dang /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las bskor ba gang yin pa 'di ni mtshungs so//de
199a6(mdo sde): ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lngas sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa'i don mdzad pa'i phyir ro//gzhan yang sems can gang chos kyi rnam
199a7(mdo sde): grangaso 'di thos pa de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba den don ma yin pa dang ldan pa yin ni sems can gang dag/thos nas kyang 'chang bar byed pa lta ci smos te/de dag gis ni mir skye
199b1(mdo sde): brnyed pa legs par rnyed do//de dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa legs par mthong ngo //de dag gis ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di legs par thos so//chos kyi tshul bya
199b2(mdo sde): rnam pa 'di thos nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa gang yin pa de dag gi ngan song thams cad ni bkag par gyur to//de dag lhang de mir
199b3(mdo sde): skye ba'i sgo rnams ni phye bar gyur to//de dag ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das zin par rig par bya'o zhes brjod do//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu de dag la legs
199b4(mdo sde): so zhes bya ba byin to/grogs po dag legs so legs so//khyed kyis tshig 'di legs par smras so//mdo sde'i tshig bstan pa 'di lta bu dag le dga' ba thob pa'i sems
199b5(mdo sde): can gang yin pa de dag ni sngangs rgyas kyis byin gyisra brlabs pa dang /theg pa chen pos 'dul ba yin no//sems can de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyis thugs su chud
199b6(mdo sde): pa dang /phyir mi ldog pa'i phyag rgyas btob pa yin no//chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la dga' ba thob pa gang yin pa'i sems can de dag mo bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes
199b7(mdo sde): 'ba'i zhig lo//yang dag por gzhol ba ma btogs pa de dag 'gro bar mi 'gyur na gang dag bsngags pa thos nas 'dzin par byed pa dang /de bzhin nyid du sgrub pa rnams
200a1(mdo sde): \u0f7fsmyos/kru r+m+ma pA po d+hAmadzes nas pa las kyang bzhi'i lce skye dang pol//kham phyoganyis pa/donas /
200a2(mdo sde): rgyas shang ba 'di thos nas/tshom nid myugu la yi rang s+yAtA rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid ba ba skyes nas/rgyu mtsho'i gnas rnam par dag par byung ba
200a3(mdo sde): rin po che'i bkod pa kun tu 'od zer 'byung ba'i 'od can zhes bya ba'i nor bu rin po che chen po stong gsum gyi sbyong tshon po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ri ba gang yin pa de bcom ldan
200a4(mdo sde): 'dus la chos kyi dgab par phul lo//nor bu rin po che de'i 'od kyis kyang nyi ma dang zla ba gnyis kyi 'di mog mog bor byas so//'khor thams cad kyang ngo mtshar tu gyur nas/
200a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal zhing tshig 'di skad du A la la sangs rgyas byung ba ni ngo mtshar che ste/de dung bsngon 'di ltar ya mtshan du rung zhing rmad du byud pa'i rgyam
200a6(mdo sde): ngadag kyang steng ngo zhes smos so//de nas klu'i rgyal pa rgya mtshos bcom ldan 'das la mngon par dag pa pa byas nas 'di skad ce smra gsol to//bcom ldan 'dres dge ba'i
200a7(mdo sde): ba 'dis ni bdag sangs rgyas kyi sku'i 'od dri mo ma mchis pa thob par gyur cig/'od des kyang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rmyi zhing thams kyad sbyang bar gyur cig/sems
200b1(mdo sde): n+dan gang la 'od des phog pa de dag kyang nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis gnod par ma gyur cig/de bzhin gshegs pa'i smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu ci 'dra ba de lta bu yang bdag
200b2(mdo sde): gis thob par gyur cig/byang chub kyi lam shes pa sgrib pa ma mchis pa'ang thob par gyur cig/lam shes pa des kyang sems can lam ldog pa la zhugs pa rnams yang
200b3(mdo sde): dag pa'i lam la 'god par gyur cig/bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mun pa mun nag dang bral te/lam shes pa thob par 'gyur lags//
200b4(mdo sde): de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//klu'i rgyal po 'di la byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi dbang gis
200b5(mdo sde): byung ba/shes rab kyi sgron ma lag na thogs pa/shes rab kyi shes pa can/shes rab kyi sngon du 'gro ba/shes rab kyi mtshon cha can/shes rab kyi bya ba byed pa de ni
200b6(mdo sde): shes rab kyi gnas la gnas nas sbyin pa byin par byed/tshul khrims srung bar byed/bzod pa sgom par byed/brtson 'grus rtsom par byed/bsam gautan la snyoms
200b7(mdo sde): par 'jug par byed/chos rnams lhag par mthong bar byed/sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do//klu'i bdag po de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
201a1(mdo sde): shes rab kyi gnas la gnas nas sbyin pa byin par byed ce na/kwaklu'i bladag po 'di la sbyin pa mnyam pa nyid kyis bdag mnyam pa nyid ngo //bdag mnya
201a2(mdo sde): pa nyid kyi sems can mnyam pa nyid dang //sems can mAHma pa nyid kyi chos mnyamA pa nyid do//chos mAnyam pa nyid kyis byang chub mnyam pa nyid de/mnyam pa nyid
201a3(mdo sde): 'di dag kyang mi spong la sbyin pa'ang byin par byed de/sbyin pa de'ang nyon mongs pa'i dbang gis byin par mi byed do//des du dza lta ji ltar yongs su 'jal ba de khon
201a4(mdo sde): bzhin du nyon mongs pa thoms cad yongs su gting bar byed de/nyon mongs pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba dang /lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad nye bar zhi ba dang /
201a5(mdo sde): pa thams cad 'dor ba gang yin pa de ni gtong ba'i mchog yin te/klu'i bdag po 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi gnas la gnas pa'i sbyin pa yongs su gtong
201a6(mdo sde): bya'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi gnas la gnas pa'i tshul khrims gang zhe na/lus dang dgra dang sems dben par mthong ba gang yin pa de ni tshul
201a7(mdo sde): khrims yongs mi srung ba ste/lus dang ngag dang sems la'ang mi rten/'jig rten 'di la'ang mi rten/'jig rten pha rol la'ang mi rten/nang la'ang mi rten/
201b1(mdo sde): rol la'ang mI t+ten/phung po la'ang mi rten/khams la'ang mi rten/skye mched la'ang mi rten/byang chub la'ang mi rten/mya dran las 'das pa la'ang mi rten/chos thams
201b2(mdo sde): ca la'ang mi rten par tshul khrims srung bar byed la/tshul khrims des kyang rlom sems su ma byed cing shin tu rlom sems su mi byed pa 'di ni/byang chub sems dpa' shes
201b3(mdo sde): rab kyi gnas la gnas pa'i tshul khrims zhes bya'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi gnos lnga gnas pa'i bzod pa gang zhe na/bzod pa gang sgom pa na bdag dang sems//
201b4(mdo sde): can dang /srog dang gang zag tu mi dmigs shing /ngar 'dzin pa dang /nga yir 'dzin pa la'ang mi gnas pa de ni nang dag pa dang /sems can dag pa dang /chos thams
201b5(mdo sde): cad dag pas bzod pa sgom pa yin te/de ni bzod pa'ang sgom la/chos gang yang sgom par mi byed/mi sgom par yang mi byed la/chos gang yang bskyed pa'i phyir ram//
201b6(mdo sde): dgag par bya ba'i phyir yang sgom par mi byed/chos gang yang zad par bya ba'i phyir ram/nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir yang sgom par mi byang /sems can bdog med pa dang //
201b7(mdo sde): sems can dben pos kyang mi skrag mi dngong dngang bar mi 'gyur la bzod po de'ang lus la dmigs pa dang /dog la dmigs pa dang /sems la dmigs pas bzod
202a1(mdo sde): par mi byed pa dang /de lus bshig pa'am/yan lag dang /nying lag rnams gcod pa na rtswa dang /shing dang rtsig pa dang 'dra bar so sor
202a2(mdo sde): rtog cing bzod pa dang /de gzhan gyis dran du smras pa thos na ngag ya ma brla dang ngag gsoT dang ngag gsog dang /ngag gzung du med pa dang /dge zhi ba dang /ngag
202a3(mdo sde): myi gnasna pa shes nas bzod pa dang /dri sems rnyog pa med pa dang /sems gsar ma yin pa dang /sems rnying ma yin pa dang /gcig la gcig mtshams
202a4(mdo sde): sbyor ba med pa dang /skad cig gis 'jig pas med par 'gyur bar so sor rtog cing brjod la/mtshams sbyor ba med par mthong ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'
202a5(mdo sde): shes rab kyi gnas la gnas pa'i bzod pa zhes bya'o//dri la byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi gnas la gnas pa'i brtson 'grus gang zhe no//byang chub sems
202a6(mdo sde): dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad rnam par 'phel por bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus kyang rtsom la/brtson 'grus rnam par 'phel ba des kyang chos kyi dbyings rnam par
202a7(mdo sde): 'phel ba dang yongs su 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba gang yin pa dang /des chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings su yang dag par 'du bar rig nas chos
202b1(mdo sde): gang yang bden par ljongs su grub par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong la/mi bden pa phyin ci log la 'jig rten gnas pa'ang mthong ba dang /des de ltar shes rab
202b2(mdo sde): rnam par dag pa'i sgo nas chos thams cad la rnam par lte bra na tshes rnam 'phel bar yang mi byung/'grib pa'ang mi byed pa dang /chos thams cad spungs pa'i rang bzhin ma
202b3(mdo sde): yin pa dang /yul na mi gnas pa dang /phyogs na mi gnas pa dang /grang nas kyang mi 'ong ba dang /gang du'ong mi 'gro bar rab tu shes te/de de lta bu'i chos dang
202b4(mdo sde): ldan pas phyin ci logra pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir/sems can rnams la chos ston pa'i brtson 'grus rtsom la/sems can de dag kyang
202b5(mdo sde): yeng dag por mi dmigs te/sems can mi dmigs pa gang yin pa de nyid de'i chos thams cad mi dmigs bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe ni/sems can lam gtogs parje
202b6(mdo sde): chos gang yang med la/chos la ma gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyang med mod kyi/'on kyang chos kyi ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de ni bdag gi ngo bo nyid do//bdag gi
202b7(mdo sde): ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de ni chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid do//chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid gang yin pa doni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi ngo bo nyid do//ngo ba nyid mnyam/
203a1(mdo sde): pa nyid 'dis sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad 'tshol ba gang yin pa dang /btsal nas kyang chos kyang mi dmigs/chos ma yin pa'ang mi dmigs
203a2(mdo sde): pa dang /'chol ba na'ang gang gis bcol ba dang /gang btsal ba dang /sus bcil ba de dag thams cad me dmigs pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi
203a3(mdo sde): gnas la gnas pa'i brtson 'grus zhes bya'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi gnas la gnas pa'i bsam gtan gang zhe na/bsam gtan rnams la'ang
203a4(mdo sde): snyoms par 'jug la/mnyam bya nyid las kyang nyams par yang mi 'gyur/phun sum tshogs par yang mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa dang /de bsam gtan rnams
203a5(mdo sde): kyang bsam gtan du byed la/chos gang yang skyed par yang mi byed/'bri bar yang mi byed pa dang /yul thams cad la'ang mi rten par bsam gtan byed la/
203a6(mdo sde): chos thams cad dang mthun pa dang mi mthun pa med par yang bsam gtan byed pa dang /lus dang sems kyis kyang bsam gtan gyi yan lag dang /bsgom gtan
203a7(mdo sde): gyi bsam pa dang /bsam gtan gyi sbyor ba de dag mngon par sgrub par mi byed pa dang /de snyoms par 'jug pa na ci nas de bzhin nyid dang /yang dag pa'i mtha'
203b1(mdo sde): dang /chos kyi dbyings kyis snyoms par 'jug pa de lta bus snyoms par 'jug pa dang /de sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid dang /chos thams cad la sgra mi 'dogs pas
203b2(mdo sde): snyoms par 'jug ste/de de ltar ting nge 'dzin sgom pa'i sbyor ba nA nang dang phyi rol gyi lus dang sems lnga'adra mi gnas la/phyi rol gyi yul yang sems mi gnas pa de ni mi gnas
203b3(mdo sde): pa'i rnam par shes bya ste/dmigs pa can gyi rang bzhin gyi snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad kyang zil gyis smyan na la/phyi rol gyi drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldanapa
203b4(mdo sde): rnams dang /nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang /bsam gtan dang /bsamya btan la snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad kyang zil gyis gnon to//de
203b5(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams dang /bsam gtan de dag kyang shes rab kyi shas che ba dang /lta ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bral ba yin la/byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa'adi yin pa
203b6(mdo sde): dang /sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'ang sgrub pa yin te/de lta bas na de bzhin gshegs pa ni snyoms par 'jug pa gcig gis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i
203b7(mdo sde): mthi' bar du thug par mdzad do/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi gnas la gnas pa'i bsam gtan no//de la byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi gnas
204a1(mdo sde): lA gnas pa chos lhag par mthong ba gang zhen/dus chosag du lhag par mthong ba de dag shes rab kyi mig kho nas lcug pAr mabyung gi/shA'i myig
204a2(mdo sde): dang /lha'i mig gis chos de dag lhag par mthong ba ma yin no//de dag ni pa kho nar lhag par mthong ga ma zhi bar lhag par mthong ba ma yin no//de bzhin du chos
204a3(mdo sde): rnams rgyu ba med pa dang /gnas pa med pa dang /dben pa dang /yongs su grub pa med par lhag par mthong ngo //de ltar mthong ba gang yin pa de ni chos thams na de lhag
204a4(mdo sde): par mthong ba'o//des chos thams cad lhag par mthong ba na gal te chos 'ga' zhig mthong na ni lhag mthong ma yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/chos mthong bas ni lhag
204a5(mdo sde): mthong skyes pa ma yin la/shes pa ni mi shes pa yin pa'i phyir ro//ma mthong ba ni chos lhag par mthong ba yin la/bdag mo mthong ba dang /sems can ma mthong
204a6(mdo sde): ba dang /srog dang /gso ba dang /skyes bu dang /gang zag ma mthong ba ni chos lhag par mthong ba yin te/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ni chos de dag kyang ji lta
204a7(mdo sde): ba bzhin du mthong la/sems can rnams kyang phyin ci log tu gyur par mthong nas/de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' dkye mtshes 'di dag ni 'di ltar dag ni sems can
204b1(mdo sde): 'di dag ni/kun nas nyon mongs so snyam nas sems can rnams la snying rje chen po skye'o//de bas na de sems can rnams rab tu grol bar bya ba'i phyir/snying rje ba chen pa
204b2(mdo sde): skyed do//sems can de dag kyang rtag tu sems rgyun med pa kha ne ste/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi gnas la gnas pa'i chos lhag par mthong ba'o//de la byung
204b3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi gnas la gnas pa'i sems can yongs su smin por bya ba gang zhe na/klu'i bdag po 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can med pa'i phyir//
204b4(mdo sde): sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do//sems can bdag med pa dang /sems can la sems can myed pa dang /sems can dben pa dang /sems can rang bzhin
204b5(mdo sde): gyis sems can du brjod pa tsam du zad pa dang /sems can du gdags pa tsam du zad pa dang /sems can stong pa dang /sems can mtshan ma med pa dang /sems
204b6(mdo sde): can smon pa med pa dang /sems can mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dang /sems nan ji lta ba bzhin ma yin pa dang /sems can ma skyes pa dang /sems can ma byung
204b7(mdo sde): ba dang /sems can rnam par dag pa'i phyir sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed de/de'ang bdag gzhig pa'i phyir ma yin/sems can gzhig pa'i phyir ma yin//
205a1(mdo sde): srog dang /gsob dang /skyes bu dang /gang zag gzhig pa'i phyir ma yin/dngos po gzhig pa'i phyir ma yin/rdzas gzhig pa'i phyir ma yin
205a2(mdo sde): g+higyi klu'i bdag po sems can de dag gi ngo bo nyid ji lta bo de kho na bzhin du yongs su smin par byed do//sems can rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ji lta bu zhe na/'di lta ste/rang bzhin
205a3(mdo sde): gyis bdag med pa'i ngo bo nyid ni ngo bo nyid med pa'o//ngo bo nyid med pa ni sems can rnams kyi ngo bo nyid do//sems can rnams kyi ngo bo nyid gang yin pa'i ngo bo nyid de nyid
205a4(mdo sde): ni/chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid do//chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de nyid ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid de/de bas na chos thams cad ni
205a5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi chos zhes bya'o//klu'i bdag po chos thams cad ces bya ba ni ming tsam du zad de/ming de'ang ming du mi dmigs so//klu'i bdag po chos thams cad ces
205a6(mdo sde): bya ba bstan pa ni chos ma yin pa bstan pa yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/ci tsam du chos tha snyad du byed pa de tsam du chos ma yin pa'i phyir ro//de la chos gang brjod pa
205a7(mdo sde): de dag thams cad ni chos ma yin pa kho na'o//klu'i bdag po chos nyid dang chos kyi dbyings ni rang bzhin gyis brjod pa'am smra bar mi nus te/'di ltar chos kyi dbyings
205b1(mdo sde): kyi rang bzhin brjod du med pa dang /chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can yin te/de lta bas na chos thams cad brjod par mi nus so//klu'i bdag po sangs rgyas
205b2(mdo sde): kyi chos 'di dag ni rnam grangs 'di dang tshul 'dis bsten mod kyi/'on kyang sangs rgyas kyi sa de dag ni sgra'i rnam par rig par byed kyis rngam par rig parla bya ba ma yin no//rlu'i
205b3(mdo sde): bdag po sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni 'dus byas dang /'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyis rnam par rig par bya ba ma yin/gdagaskye par bya ba ma yin no//de ci'i phyir
205b4(mdo sde): zhe na/klu'i bdag po 'dus byas dang /'dus ma byas la mAM gtogs par gang gzhan du babrang du rung ba'i chos ci'ang med do//gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'o na sangs
205b5(mdo sde): rgyas kyi chos rnams 'dus ma bgyis pa lags sam/de bzhin gshegs pa'ang de lta bu legs som/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/klu'i bdag po de de bzhin no
205b6(mdo sde): de de bzhin te/sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang 'dus ma byas pa'o//de bzhin gshegs pa'ang 'dus ma byas pa'o//klu'i bdag po de la ji snyam du sems/'dus
205b7(mdo sde): ma byas pa la gdags pa tsa'ang yod dam/gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//bcom ldan thongs kyis bka' stsal pa/klu'i bdag po rnam grangs 'dis
206a1(mdo sde): kyang khyod kyis ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos rnam par rig par bya ba ma yin pa dang /gdags par bya ba ma yin pa de ltar rig par bya'o//sangs rgyas
206a2(mdo sde): kyi chos rnams ji lta ba bzhin du chos thams cad kyang de dang 'dra'o//klu'i bdog po sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po ji tsam du bstan pa la
206a3(mdo sde): ltos/'di ltar rnam par rig par bya ba ma yin pa dang /gdegs par bya ba ma yin pa'i chos rnams ming dang brdas 'dogs par mdzad de/chos 'di dag ni zag pa
206a4(mdo sde): dang bcas pa'o//chos 'di dag ni zag pa med pa'o de bzhin du 'jig rten pa rnams dang /'jig rten las 'das pa rnams dang /kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa rnams
206a5(mdo sde): dang /kha na ma tho ba med pa rnams dang /'dus byas rnams dang /'dus me byas rnams dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa'i phyogs dang mthun pa rnams dang /rnam
206a6(mdo sde): par byang ba'i phyogs dang mthun pa rnams dang /bsten par bya ba rnams dang /yongs su spang bar bya ba rnams dang /gdagos par bya ba rnams dang /bzhag par
206a7(mdo sde): bya ba rnams dang /so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams dang /slob pa'i chos rnams dang /mi slob pa'i chos rnams dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang /byang chub
206b1(mdo sde): sems dpa'i chos rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams 'dogs par mdzad de/klu'i bdag po de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa ni de ltar chos rnam par bzhag pa bstan
206b2(mdo sde): pa'ang ston par mdzad la/chos gang la'ang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su mi gzigs so//klu'i bdag po dper na mi la la zhig skyes la/des nam mkha'i khams
206b3(mdo sde): gzugs med cing bstan du med pa 'di la tshon rtsi thams cad kyis ri mor bris te/lha'i gzugs rnams kyang der bstan/mi'i gzugs rnams dang /rta dang /glang
206b4(mdo sde): po che dang /shing rta dang /dpung bu chung dang /bzhon pa rnams kyang der bstan na/klu'i bdag po 'di ji snyam du sems/ci mi de dka' ba byed pa yin nam/gsol
206b5(mdo sde): pa bcom ldan 'das dka' ba bgyid pa lags so//bde bar gshegs pa dka' ba bgyid pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/klu'i bdag po de
206b6(mdo sde): bas na gang gzugs med cing bstan du med pa/gzung du med pa/yi ge med pa/brjod du med pa'i chos 'di sems can gzhan rnams dang /gang zag gzhan
206b7(mdo sde): rnams dang /gang zag gzhan rnams la brda sprad cing yi ge rnams kyis mtshan te/thabs sna tshogs kyis go bar byas pa de/de bzhin gshegs pas ches dka'
207a1(mdo sde): ba mdzad pA yin no//klu'i bdag po de bas kyang gang+gA dag 'di ltar bstan pa'i chos 'di dag la mos par 'gyur bya'am/'jug par 'gyur ba de dag
207a2(mdo sde): nirgyas ngo mtshar che ba byed pa smin no//klu'i bdag pa gzhan yang zlab mo'i tshul 'dri la 'jug pa'i sems can gang yin pa de dag ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
207a3(mdo sde): la yongs su sbyang ba byos pa yin te/de dag la ni bdud sdig can gyis kyang klags mi rnyed do//klu'i bdag pangs mngon par shes pa 'das pa'i dus na/sangs rgyas
207a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das tshad med pa ngas mnyes par byas te/mchod pa'ang byas/de dag gi bstan pa la'angang rab tu byung ste/tshangs par spyod du'ang spyad na/'on
207a5(mdo sde): kyang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis ngal 'di ltar zlab cing 'di ltar rgyu ba chad pa'i chos ma bstan te/gzhan du na sbyor ba'i gtam nyi tshe dang /sbyin pa dang /dul
207a6(mdo sde): dang /legs par sdom pa dang /nges pa'i gtam nyi tshe dang /tshul khrims dang /zos pa dang /gtang ba dang /bzod pa dang /brtson 'grus dang /bag yod/
207a7(mdo sde): pa'i gtam nyi tshe dang /tshangs par spyad pa dang /sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang yo byed basbyangs pa'i gtam nyi tshe bsten to//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar yongs su/
207b1(mdo sde): /sbyang ba ma byas pa'i phyir ro//klu'i bdag po gang gi tshe nga yongs su sbyang ba byas par gyur pa de'i tshe ni ngas de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad chen po las zab mo'i chos kyi tshul
207b2(mdo sde): 'di thos so//thos nas kyang nga mi mthun pa'i chos rnams la bzod pa smos so//klu'i bdag po de lta bus na rnam grangs 'dis kyang khyod kyis 'di ltar zab cing ngu'o snyam po'i
207b3(mdo sde): dang rgyal las rnam par grol ba yongs su rtog pas byas pa/rgyu dang rkyen los byung ba/sems can dang srog dang /gso ba dang /gang zag tu rtog pa med pa'i chos rnams
207b4(mdo sde): la mos pa dang /dad pa dang 'dzin pa dang /gzhan dag la'ang brda sprod par byed pa'i sems can de dag ji ltar sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la yongs su sbyang ba byas
207b5(mdo sde): pa gang yin pa dang /de dag la ni bsod nams kyang mang du 'phel bar 'gyur ba de ltar rig par bya'o//klu'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' sems can rnams la phan pa
207b6(mdo sde): dang bde ba'i don la zhugs pa/gang gis stong gsum gyi steng chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can lha rnams dang /mi rnams kyi bde ba'i yo byad ji snyed yod pa'i bang
207b7(mdo sde): ba'i yo byad de snyed sems can re re la byin na/klu'i bdag po 'di ji snyam du sems/ci byang chub sems dpa' des sems can de dag la bde ba'i yo byad mang po byin pa yin/
208a1(mdo sde): nam/gsol ba bcom ldan 'das myang lags so//bde bar gshegs pa mang lcags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/klu'i bdag
208a2(mdo sde): po byang chub sems dpas sems can de dag le bde ba'i yo byad de snyed byin pa gang yin pa dang /de dag la mi rtag pa dang ldan pa tshig gcig tsam bsten tam/sdug bsngal
208a3(mdo sde): ba dang ldan pa'am/bdag med pa dang ldan pa'am/zhi ba dang ldan pa 'am/stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'am/mtshan ma med pa dang ldan pa 'am/smin pa med pa dang
208a4(mdo sde): ldan pa'am/sems can med pa dang /srog med pa dang /gso ba med pa dang /gang zag med pa dang ldan pa 'am/me skyes ma byung ba dang ldan pa tshig gcig
208a5(mdo sde): tsam bstan na/de nyid des bde ba'i yo byad de bas ches mang du byin pa yin te/bsod nams kyang ches mang du 'phel bar 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/klu'i
208a6(mdo sde): blangag po 'dus byas kyi bde ba'i yo byad thams cang ni sems can rnams kyis sngon myong zin gyi 'dus ma byas kyi bde pa'i yo byad ni sems can rnams kyis sngon ma myong ba'i
208a7(mdo sde): phyir ro//klu'i bdog po de la 'di ltar zab pa'i chos 'di dag thos pa gang yin pa 'di ni 'dus ma byas kyi bde ba'i yo byad 'dren pa yin te/de bas na klu'i bdag po
208b1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' bdag gi don dang /gzhan gyi don yongs su rdzogs par byed 'dod pa rnams kyis ni chos zab mo rnams la brtson par bya'o//klu'i bdag po byang chub sems
208b2(mdo sde): dpa' 'khor gyi nang du 'ongs la/'khor gyi nang du 'dug nas zab mo'i gtAm gyo bar chad byed de/gtam sna tshogs gleng dra ba gang yin pa de ni dam pa'i chos nub par bya ba'i phyir
208b3(mdo sde): brtson pa yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/dzam+bu'i gling 'dir ji srid du zab mo'i chos grag pa de srid du dam pa'i chas nub par mi 'gyur bA'i phyir ro//klu'i bdag po gzhon yang mi
208b4(mdo sde): chos 'dod de/chos nyan po ni nyung la mi ma yin pa'i chos nyan pa ni mang ste/der dam pa'i chos smra ba po gang gis zab mo'i gtam ni 'chab par byed la gtam sna tshogs ni
208b5(mdo sde): gleng bar byed na der zab mo la mos pas lha rnams yi ma rangs par gyur te/'di skad du rigs kyi bu 'di ni gang kho na la 'jig rten pa nyon mongs pa spyod pa de nyid kyi 'jig rten
208b6(mdo sde): pa'i gtam gleng zhing 'dug ste/kye re ngan 'di na sangs rgyas kyi gsung mi grag go zhes tshig ngan 'thon nas de dag 'khor de dag la mi dga' ste/'dong bar byed do//smon
208b7(mdo sde): lam gyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o////de nas bcom ldan 'das la/klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das ci 'jig rten pa'i sbyin/
209a1(mdo sde): pA /rdul bya dang /legs par rnam pa dang /dus pa tu ma dang /rabAtu 'byung bdang /nges par k+Sha b+hU'i gat+ta mA dang /rlus
209a2(mdo sde): par spyod pa dang /rgyul khrims dang /sta pa dang ngag/med pa dang /sbyangs phyi'i yon tan dang /yi byang brgyangs pa'i gtam sangs rgyas kyi gsung ma lcags sum/
209a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/klu'i bdag po chos gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam sngo 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /'gog par 'gyur ba'i phyir
209a4(mdo sde): byam yin pa khams gsum na spyod pa nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba ma yin pa dang ga khrims cad ni 'jig rten pa'i yin gyi/de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi gsung ma yin
209a5(mdo sde): no//de dag kyang gang zhe na/sam gtan bzhi dang /tshud med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /mngon par shes pa la dang //
209a6(mdo sde): dge pa bcu'i las kyi ma rnams dang /'jig rten pa'i sbyin pa dang /tshul khrims dang /bzod pa dang /brtson 'grus dang /bsam gtan dang /shi
209a7(mdo sde): rab shes pa dang /yi ge dang /grangs dang /bgrang ba ngo /gcis shes pa dang /'byung khengs shes pa dang /sngags dang /spun dang /gso ba
209b1(mdo sde): sa pa dang / ga su gas padang /rgyan ma dang sa sma dang/du ba dang smras dang / NI du sa nga /
209b2(mdo sde): ma lda sa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i nas ldan mags pa las rnas pa gang dag yin pa 'di mi dge 'i dun du/ la na nga/
209b3(mdo sde): dran nga /ba 'dzin da /drug gi sbrul yongs su shes pa'i dun dang /sman+ya byung ba skang ba na dang /'gag pa mengan snyam du bya ba 'di ni dang/man
