280b7(mdo sde): gcod pa mang du byas shing sdig pu'o las ma du byas la/mang po dag kyang 'jigs por byas so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe bya'i rgyal po nam mkha' lding
281a1(mdo sde): ban po de dag gis ci nas tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa gser thub de dang der dge sbyong du gyur nas las mngon par 'du byed pa
281a2(mdo sde): mngon par 'dus byas pa de dag thams cad rjes su dran par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du byed pa mdzad do//de dag gis kyang mngon sum du bcom ldan 'das
281a3(mdo sde): la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das sems ni dmu rgod gdul dka' zhing bsrung dka' bo logs te der bdag cag gas sems brkam tshigs can du gyur pas
281a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gser thub de ma mnyes par bgyis lags so//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis slan chad rang gis srog kyang yong mi smre btang
281a5(mdo sde): bar 'tshal gyis sdig pa'i las ni mi bgyid do//bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag chos kyi gtum gyis dge' ba skyes nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//grogs po dag de bzhin
281a6(mdo sde): gshegs pa byams pa'i 'dus pa dang po'i grangs su gtogs par 'gyur ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgya mtsho chen por sems can gyis dron ji snyed bya dgas pa
281a7(mdo sde): dag thams cad mdzad nas kwa'i rgyal po rgya mchi la bka' stsal pa/klu'i pidag po tshur shog/da rang gi mal cha dang stan rnams sdus shig/nga ni rang gi gnas so 'gre'o//de
281b1(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das zhabs 'bring ba dung bcas par gdan las bzhengs nas rgya mtsho chen po'i nang nas phyir yang rin po che'i them skas rnams las bkod pa chen po dang /
281b2(mdo sde): mchod pa chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi che ba nyid chen pos gshegs nas/mgur bsal te/rgya mtsho'i 'gram du gzhes so//de nas rgya mtsho'i lha mo 'di ldan mas/bcom
281b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod pa/sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan mnga' lha dang mis mchod pa//lha min dbang pos bsnyen bkur mi mchog dang
281b4(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal//pad+ma lta bu'i spyan mnga' zhal ras zla ba 'dra/dge ba'i chos kyis 'phags pa bde sbyin deng phyag 'tshal//gzugs mchog ston pa bsod nams brgya yi mtshan dang
281b5(mdo sde): ldan+da/yon tan ye shes 'phags pa rnam 'dren deng phyag 'tshal//sbyin dang dul bas 'phags pa tshul khrims bzang po brtsegs//bzod pa'i stobs kyis 'phags
281b6(mdo sde): pa me mchog deng phyag 'tshal//brtson 'grus stobs kyis byung ba bsam gtan blo gros sbyangs//shes rab mkha' mtshungs khyod lnga de ring mgos phyag 'tshal//byams
281b7(mdo sde): pas snyoms pa'i thugs ldan thugs rje 'grol gzigs//'dren pa thugs dgyes rtag tu btang snyoms pha rol gshegs//ka la ping ka lta bur gsung snyen tshangs srid stong//
282a1(mdo sde): gsung snyan ston pa khyod la de ring mgos phyag 'tshal//bdud dpung 'joms pa bdud stobs nges par 'joms mdzad pa//byang chub brtul zhugs sgrub
282a2(mdo sde): pa srid gsum srid pas mchod//de gsum di ma spong ba rnam thar gsum ston pa//'jig rten gsum grags khyod la de ring mgos phyag 'tshal//bden pa'i brtul
282a3(mdo sde): zhugs bzang rtog rtag tu chos kyis 'phags//rtag tu dgon pa spyod yul rtag tu ye shes spyod//nyon mongs dgra 'joms gzi brjid lhag par gzi bskyed pa//pad+ma lta
282a4(mdo sde): bu'i spyan mnga' deng khyod mgos phyag 'tshal//lhun po'i rtsa 'dra dgongs pa rdo rje lta bur brtano//dgongs pa sa 'dra yon tan rgya mtsho phyag 'tshal lo//'gro la stong pa
282a5(mdo sde): ston po zhi gnas pha rol phyin//rab tu zhi ba'i thugs ldan khyod la skyabs su mchi//bdud rtsi dam pa ston pa 'gro mini 'gro ba gcod//lha dang mis mchod khyod la de ring
282a6(mdo sde): mgos phyag 'tshal//sa steng lha yul grags pa snyan dang grags pa 'phags//yon tan rgya chen mi zad yon tan 'byung gnas 'dud//ji skad gsungs bzhin mdzad
282a7(mdo sde): cing ji skad mdzad bzhin gsung //ji skad spyod bzhin skul ba dang khyod mgos phyag 'tshal//rga shi grol mdzad sman pa 'gro bas bsnyen bkur ba//thar pa'i lam ston
282b1(mdo sde): khyod la de ring mgos phyag 'tshal//rgyu yi byed pa rab ston lta ba'i mun pa sel//lam mchog ston pa rgyal ba khyod la skyabs su mchi//rin chen sbyin pa gcig pu chos kyi
282b2(mdo sde): dga' ba gsung //so 'dra'i thugs ldan khyod la bdag ni skyabs su mchi//'dren pa yon tan rgya mtsho yon tan las bstod pa'i//bdag gis bsod nams gang lags
282b3(mdo sde): des ni khyod 'drar shog/de nas rgya mtsho chen po'i lha mo 'od ldan mas bcom ldan 'das la de skad bstod nas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das
282b4(mdo sde): slar byung ste gshegs pas rgya mtsho chen po mi mdzes pa lags na/ci nas bdag rgya mtsho mdzes par bgyid pa de lta bur bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su bstan na legs so//de
282b5(mdo sde): skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis rgya mtsho chen po'i lha mo 'od ldan ma la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//'od ldan ma chos bcu po 'di dag ni rgyan du 'gyur ba
282b6(mdo sde): yin te/bcu grang zhe na 'di lta ste/dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir byams pa'i rjes su 'jug pa'i sems bskyed pa dang /sems can thams
282b7(mdo sde): cad la rnam par mi 'tshe bar bya ba'i phyir snying rje chen po la gnas pa dang /bsam pa'i sbyor ba bla ni med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba'i sems bskyed
283a1(mdo sde): pa dga' bar gnas pa dang /sbyin pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba dang /rnam pa sna tshogs kyi rgyan gyi smon lam la brtson 'grus brtan pa dang //
283a2(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir dran pa dang /shes bzhin du gnas pa dang /sngon gyi dge bo ched mi za ba'i phyir dang shes rab yongs
283a3(mdo sde): su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir chos dang ldan zhing chos 'dod pa dang /phan pa'i dngos pos sems can thams cad la yon tan thams cad skyed pa dang /gnyis su med pas
283a4(mdo sde): grong du khyad par rtogs pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi thugs su chud pa la yang dag par gzhol bas sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa thob pa ste/'od ldan ma chos bcu po de dag
283a5(mdo sde): ni rgyan du 'gyur pa yin no//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /rgya mtsho chen po'i lha mo 'od ldan ma lha mo khri dang lhan cig tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
283a6(mdo sde): tu sems bskyed nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das rgya mtsho chen po'i rgyan lags so///de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das
283a7(mdo sde): byang chub kyi sems ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rgyan laklas na/rgya mtsho chen po'i lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/byang chub kyi
283b1(mdo sde): sems de ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad brgyan pa'i slad du bdag cag gis skyes lags so//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs kyang rung /yongs su
283b2(mdo sde): mya ngan las 'das kyang rung ste/bdag ni rgya mtsho chen po'i ring na gnas bzhin du dam pa'i chos yongs su bsrung ba'i slad du rtag tu brtson pa kho nar 'tshal lo//bcom
283b3(mdo sde): ljon 'das grong khyer du gshegs pa na'ang bkod pa thams cad nye bar bstan par 'tshal lo//chos kyi dben pa'i gtam mdzad pa na'ang 'khor gyi khyams kyi bkod pa sgrub
283b4(mdo sde): phyir 'tshal lo//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'od ldan ma 'di ltar khyod kyis ni sangs rgyas khri la mchod pa byas so//'khor gyi khyams kyi bkod pa 'di bstan
283b5(mdo sde): to//dam pa'i chos kyang yongs su bsrungs so//'od ldan ma khyod ni bskal pa bzod po'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la'ang mchod pa byed par 'gyur ro//dam pa'i
283b6(mdo sde): chos kyang yongs su bsrung bar 'gyur ro//khyod ni bskal pa bzod pa 'di 'das pa'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi
283b7(mdo sde): khams mngon par dga' bar skye bar 'gyur te/bud med kyi dngos po brjes nas skyes pa'i dngos po thob par 'gyur ro//khyod ni de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs
284a1(mdo sde): pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ro//de nas rgya mtsho chen po'i lha mo 'od ldan pas bcom ldan 'das
284a2(mdo sde): las bdag nyid kyi lung bstan pa thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te/rab tu dga'i zhing dga' ba dang yod bde ba skyes te rgya mtsho chen po'i rin po che dang /rin thang
284a3(mdo sde): mnyam pa'i rin po che'i phreng ba bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la gsol nas sor mo btsu'i thal mo sbyar te/de'i tshe bcom ldani 'dra so la tshigs su bcud pa 'di dbu smras
284a4(mdo sde): so//bdag ni thub pa ye shes yon tanA kun gyi 'byung gnas de yis lung bstan te//bdog ni 'dren par 'gyur ba dag la yid gnyis the tshom ci yang yod ma mchis//
284a5(mdo sde): stong gsum sa gzhi thams cad 'gas shing zla ba sa li lhung yang gda'//lce las lhag pa'i lhas mchod sangs rgyas phyin ci log gi tshig gsung yong mi gda'//
284a6(mdo sde): bsam pa byams pa brtson 'grus yul la thugs ni 'khrug par 'gyur ba mi mnga' ltos//bdag ni stong pa'i ye shes yul gyi chos rnams dag la gus par bgyid
284a7(mdo sde): la ltos//bde bar gshegs pa'i yang dag spyod pa rnams dang ye shes thogs pa mi mnga' ste//de yis 'dir ni bdag gi sems kyi yul bden mkhyen
284b1(mdo sde): nas de bzhin lung yang bstan//smon pa rab mchog bde sbyin sdug bsngal kun las grol bar mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo//gnas dang skyabs dang dpung gnyen skyob pa 'jigs
284b2(mdo sde): pa rnams la 'jigs med sbyin mdzad pa//rgyal ba lam mchog dam pa sten mdzad lam ngan yongs su spyod la phyag 'tshal lo//'jog rten rnam par gzigs la mkhas
284b3(mdo sde): pa 'jig rten 'das pa'i 'dron la phyag 'tshal lo//'drir ni lha dang mi rnams gang dag sangs rgyas chos dang tshogs rnams zos pa dang //byang chub spyod cing byang chub bsam
284b4(mdo sde): pa sems pa de dag rnyed pa legs par rnyed//de dag la ni ngan song ngan 'gro'i 'jigs pa med de mi khom brgyad las yongs su grol//de dang de dag lho dang mi'i bde la nges shing //
284b5(mdo sde): zhi ba'i go 'phang thog/de nas bcom ldan 'das la klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i bu mthong dgas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das lha dang klu dang /gnod sbyin dang dri za
284b6(mdo sde): dang /lha ma yin dang nam mkhrang lding dang /mi 'am tso dang lto 'phye chen po dang /me dang mi ma lags pa mang po dag gis ni de bozhin gshegs pa la mchod pa po gyis legs
284b7(mdo sde): na/gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la gnang ba mdzad na/bdag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las cung zad tsam 'tshal te/bdag gis bcom ldan
285a1(mdo sde): 'das zhabs 'bring ba dang bcas par rnam par rgyal byed dang 'dra ba'i bkod pa chen po'i khang bzang gi nang du bzhugs par gsol la/bya rgod kyi phung
285a2(mdo sde): po'i ri la bskyal bar 'tshal lo//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bud de'i dus la bab par shes na stsol cig/de nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i bu mthang
285a3(mdo sde): dgas sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis rnam par rgyal byed dang 'dra ba'i khang bzang byin gyis brlabs nas/der bcom ldan 'das zhogs 'bring dang
285a4(mdo sde): bcas par bzhug par gsol nas steng gi bar snang las gshegs te/klu'o bu mo brgyad de khri bzhi stong yong sol snyan byed pag rdob/glung dbyangs len cing me tog gi char
285a5(mdo sde): chen po 'bebs la/lha'i spos dang phye ma sna tshogs kyi char 'bebs bzhin du mthar gyis bcom ldan 'das bya rgod phung po'i ri la bskyal to//de nus klu'i rgyal po rgya ma
285a6(mdo sde): bu dang bcas/chung ma dang g.yog 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la betugs nas bcom ldan 'das la bzod pa gsol te//bcom ldan
285a7(mdo sde): 'das bdag cag gis ma 'byor par gyur pa gang lags pa rnams bdag cag la bzod pa mdzad du gsol/de ci'i slad de zhe na/bcom ldan 'das rin po che ji lta ba
285b1(mdo sde): bzhin du de dang 'tsham pa'i mchod pa'i 'os lags la/bcom ldan 'das ni sems can thams cad kyi bla na ma mchis pa'i bsod nams kyi zhing rin po che lags te/mchod
285b2(mdo sde): pa'i 'gre lags na/de ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyis kyang 'byor pa 'am/yongs su rdzogs
285b3(mdo sde): par bgyid pa'i rngo ma thog ste/de bzhin gshegs pa de tsamatshad ma mchis pa'i mchod pa'i 'os lags pa'i slad du'o//bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems
285b4(mdo sde): dpa' ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bgyid pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/klu'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' nan tan byeng pas de bzhin
285b5(mdo sde): gshegs pa ji ltar mchad pa nyon cig/bsam pa rngam par dag pa ni de bzhin gu shegs pa la mchod pa yin te/bac+doMs mA mA yin pa dang g.yo med pa'i phyir ro//lhag
285b6(mdo sde): pa'i bsum pa yongs su dag pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa yin te/dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la lhag par dmigs pa'i phyir ro//zhe 'gras pa med pa'i sems ni
285b7(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa yin te/sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa'i phyir ro//tshul 'chos pa dang /kha bsag thams cad rnam par spangs
286a1(mdo sde): pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa yin te/spyod lam yongs su dag pa'i phyir ro//ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la
286a2(mdo sde): mchod pa yin te/'jig rten thams cad la mi slu ba'i phyir ro//'phags pa'i rigs kyis chog par 'dzin cing sbyangs pa'i yon tan thams cad yang dag par blangs pa
286a3(mdo sde): mi 'dor ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa yin te/dam bcas pa la brtan pa'i phyir ro//dben pa la dgo' zhing bre mo'i gtam yongs su spong ba ni de bzhin
286a4(mdo sde): gshegs pa la mchod pa yin te/sems yongs su 'dul ba'i phyir ro//ji skad thos pa'i chos la tshul bzhin du so sor rtog pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa
286a5(mdo sde): yin te/yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin yongs su shes pa'i phyir ro//bdag med pa dang /sems can med pa dang gso ba med pa dang gang zag med par nye bar rtog pa ni de
286a6(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa yin te/gzod ma nas ma byung ba'i phyir ro//stong pa'i chos la 'jug pa dang /mtshan ma med pa la nges par rtog pa dang smon pa drang
286a7(mdo sde): bral ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa yin te/rnam par thar pa'i sgo mngon sum du byed pa'i phyir ro//rkyen 'di pa nyid la 'jug cing mthar lta ba sel ba ni
286b1(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa yin te/rtag pa dang chad par lta ba yongs su spong ba'i phyir ro//ma byung ba dang /ma skyes par bzod pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod
286b2(mdo sde): pa yin te/rang bzhin gyis ma byung ba'i phyir ro//klu'i bdag po de ltar na lus dang ngag dang sems kyi rtsom pa gang yin pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa
286b3(mdo sde): yongs su dag pa ma yin gyi/gang lus dang ngag dang sems kyi rtsom pa med pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa yongs su dag pa yin no//mngon par 'du byed pa
286b4(mdo sde): med pa dang /blang ba med pa dang /dor ba med pa dang /'khor gsum yongs su dag pa dang /dus gsum mnyam pa nyid dang dri ma gsum gyi dri ma sel ba dang /khams
286b5(mdo sde): gsum la mi rten pa dang rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum la 'jug pa dang /rig bya gsum gyi rig pa shes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa yin no//de skad ces bka'
286b6(mdo sde): stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das me tog dang bdug pa dang spos dang mye tog phreng dang /byug pa dang phyi
286b7(mdo sde): mi dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dang /na bza' dang /bshes dang /gzims cha dang gdan dang /snyun gsos sman dang /yo byad dang so
287a1(mdo sde): snyan dang /pheg rdob pa dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bgyid pa gang lags pa de dag kyang ci de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bgyid pa
287a2(mdo sde): lags sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/klu'i bdag po de ni bla na med pa'i mchod pa de nyid yongs su sbyong ba yin gyi/mchod pa de ni shin tu mthar
287a3(mdo sde): zug pa dang /shin tu dri ma med pa dang shin tu tshangs par spyod pa'i mthar thug pa ma yin no//klu'i bdag po dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i slob pa de dag ni 'phags pa'i rnam par
287a4(mdo sde): grol ba la/sems gnas kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa rnams ni de lta ma yin no//klu'i bdag po gzhan yang chos bzhi dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni de
287a5(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byed pa dag yin to/bzhi gang zhe na/byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs gsog po dang /snying rje chen po la
287a6(mdo sde): gnas pa'i sems kyis ye shes kyi tshogs gsog pa dang /brtson 'grus chen po shin tu brtsams pa'i sems kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa dang /chos
287a7(mdo sde): zab mo rgya chen po la sems bskyed pas bzod pa skyes pa thob pa ste/klu'i bdag po chos 'di bzhi dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod
287b1(mdo sde): pa byed pa yin no//de nas rgyal po'i khang na gnas pa'i bram ze dang /rgyal rigs dang khyim bdag rnams dang /grong rdal pa dang /yul gyi mi rnams dang /rgyal po ma skyes dag
287b2(mdo sde): dang blon po dang /nang 'khor dang /sgo dpon dang /'khor dang /tshong dpon rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i gnas su bshos gsol nas bya rgod
287b3(mdo sde): kyi phung po'i ri la gshegs so zhes thos nas der srog chags bdun khri nyis stong dang /rgyal po ma skyes dgra g.yog 'khor sum khri nyis stong dang lhan cig tu rgyal po'i khab kyi grong
287b4(mdo sde): khyer nas byung nas/bya rgod phung po'i rig la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabaso la mgo bos phyag btsal te lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs cig tu 'khod
287b5(mdo sde): do//de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po ma skyes dgras 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho chen por gshegs na chab kyi tshogs nga ni
287b6(mdo sde): michis pa de gang du mchi lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rgyal po chen po gang gi tshe dge slong me'i khams kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa de'i tshe stong
287b7(mdo sde): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khamase mas yongs su gang bar mthong na/de'i chu'i phung po de dag gang du song /gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ting nge 'dzin sa
288a1(mdo sde): dbang thob pa'i sems de lta bur las su rung bar gyur pa lags so//bka' sprul pa/rgyal po chen po khyod kyis de nyan thos ting nge 'dzin dang /snyoms
288a2(mdo sde): par 'jug pa la dbang thob pa'i sems las su rung ba las gyur par 'dod na de bzhin gshegs pa rtag tu mnyam par bzhog pa/ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par
288a3(mdo sde): 'jug pa thams cad la mkhas pa/sems la dbang yod pa/chos thams cad kyi dbang phyug/chos la dbang yod pa'i ni de ltar myi 'dod dam/rgyal po chen po gang
288a4(mdo sde): gi tshing rgya mtsho chen por zhugs pa de'i tshe chu de'i nang na gnas pa'i sems can rnams ni bdag nyid chu'i nang na gnas so snyam du 'dzin to//skams la gnas pa'i sems
288a5(mdo sde): can rnams kyis ni rgya mtsho chen po skams par mthong ngo //ji ltar gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas kyi bkod pa rnams rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa de
288a6(mdo sde): bzhin du klu dang dri za dang lha ma yin gyi gnas thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od kyis khyab par gyur to//rgya mtsho chen po'i nang gi sems can thams cad kyang gcig
288a7(mdo sde): la gcig byams pa'i sems dang /phan pa'i sems dang gnod sems med pa dang /rnam par 'tsho ba med par gnas par gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal
288b1(mdo sde): po ma skyes dbus 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi che ba nyid dang /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs
288b2(mdo sde): la mkhos pa de tsam du bsam gyis mi khyab pa ni ngo mtshar legs te/'di ltar klu'i rgyal ba rgya mchis de bzhin gshegs pa spyan drangs te/de ltar sems can gyi don tshad ma
288b3(mdo sde): mchis pa bgyis na/bcom ldan 'das klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos yun ji srid cig nis ni bla na mod pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed lags/de bzhin gshegs
288b4(mdo sde): pa ji snyed cig la ni mchod pa bgyi/yun ji srid cig na ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur lags/de mngon par rdzogs
288b5(mdo sde): bar sangs rgyas pa'i mtshan ni ci zhes bgyi bar 'gyur/de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni ci 'dra bar 'gyur legs/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba
288b6(mdo sde): 'das pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med pas ches grangs med pa/bsam gyis mi khyab pa/yun ring ba/tshad med pa'i sde ral de'i tshe de'i dus ni bskal pa yid du 'ong zhing zhi bzhis
288b7(mdo sde): bya ba la shar gyi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dag pa zhes bya bar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
289a1(mdo sde): rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa/'jig rten mkhyen pa/skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/lha dang mi rnams kyi ston
289a2(mdo sde): pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di rnam par dag pa'i 'od zer rgyal po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/rgyal po chen po 'jig rten gyi khams lta ba yongs su dag pa
289a3(mdo sde): de'i bkod pa byung ba de dag ni de'i tshe'i tshad bskal par gnas su zin kyang rgyas par bstan par sla ba ma yin no//rgyal po chen po de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal
289a4(mdo sde): po lhas btsa' zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od rnam par dag pa'i 'od zer rgyal po de la lo bzhi khri nyis stong gi bar du mchod pa byas te/
289a5(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa bas nye bar brtan pa de gnyid log pa'i rmi lam du tshigs su bcad pa 'di gnyis thos so//skyes bu khyu mchog la ni mchod chen mang //dpag med rgyo chen
289a6(mdo sde): bsam yas byas zin gyis//'gro ba dag la snying brtse bskyed nas kyang //rab mchog byang chub sems no bsred par gyis//byang chub sems ni yang dag sgrub byed gang //
289a7(mdo sde): de ni mchod mchog dam pa khyad par 'phags//de ni de bzhin gshegs rnams bkur sti yin//de ni phyi ma'i bsod nams gzi byin yin///
289b1(mdo sde): bam po bdun pa ste tha ma//rgyal po chen po de nus 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po lhas btsa' des tshigs su bcad pa 'di gnyis thos te/de'i mtshan mo 'das nas g.yog 'khor
289b2(mdo sde): dang bcas te/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od rnam par dag pa'i 'od zer rgyal po ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag btsal te/
289b3(mdo sde): lan gsum bskor ba byas nas srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das de'i spyan sngar 'khod ngo //thal mo sbyar nas lhag pa'i bsam pos bla na med pa
289b4(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs po'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so//gzugs la brkam dang sgro la brten pa dang //dri dang ro dang reg la
289b5(mdo sde): gnas pa dang //'dod la brkam dang bde ba dgo' ba yis//byang chub mchog 'di rtogs par mi nus so//le lo can dang mda' la brtson pa dang //ser sna can dang tshul
289b6(mdo sde): khrims ma bsdams dang //sdang ba'i sems dang blo ni 'khrul pa yis//byang chub mchog 'di rtogs par mi nus so//rang gi bde ba thams cad spangs pa dang //'gro ba'i
289b7(mdo sde): sdug bsngal thams cad bzod pa dang //brtson 'grus brtsams shing rtag tu ches 'dod gang //de ni 'jig rten de 'dra'i sangs rgyas 'gyur//sangs rgyas byang chub
290a1(mdo sde): la ni bdag zhugs pa//sangs rgyas rnams dang lha rnams dbang btsugs te//ci nas bdag tshig log par mi 'gyur ba//de ltar sman smad spyod pa spyad par
290a2(mdo sde): bgyi//byang chub sems ni bdag gis rmi lam tho so//thos nas bdag ni byang chub mchog la zhugs//de yi slad du sangs rgyas mi yi mchog/ye shes ljon pa de 'dra
290a3(mdo sde): bdag gis bgyi//rgyal po chen po de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po lhas btsa' zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod som nyi 'am/ying gnyis
290a4(mdo sde): sum/the tshom za na rgyal po chen po khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho 'di nyid de'i tshe 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po lhas btsa' zhes bya bar gyur
290a5(mdo sde): to//de'ang de'i dang po byang chub tu se mos bskyed pa yin no//rgyal po chen po khyod 'di skad du/klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho 'di yun ji srid cig na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
290a6(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bor 'gyur zhes zer ba de nyon cig/rgyal po chen po klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho 'di ni bskal pa grangs med pa nyes brgya na bskal pa dpal
290a7(mdo sde): gyi me tog ces bya ba la/'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi sgra grags pa zhes bya bar/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
290b1(mdo sde): ga pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/bad bar gshegs pa/'jig rten mkhyen pa/skyes bu 'dul ba kha lo sgyur ba blan med pa/lnga dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/sangs rgyas
290b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das shin tu dri ma med cing yongs su dag la yon tan gyi tshogs mtha' yos pa las byung ba'i rgyal po zhes bya bar 'gyur ro//rgyal po chen po 'jig rten gyi khams
290b3(mdo sde): chos kyi sge gag pa de ni rin po rjes yas smras par 'gyur te/dzam+b+ha chu bo'i gser las grub pa rin+da pa che sna tshogs du mas bris shing mig mangs ris su rnam par bye la/lag mthil
290b4(mdo sde): bzhin du mnyam ste/ka tsa lin+da ka'i gos bzhin du 'jam zhing reg ni bde la yangs shing the glu che ste/gling bye ba phrag 'bum dang ldan la/'byor pa dang /rgyus pa dang /bde
290b5(mdo sde): ba dang yid du 'ong ba ste/lha dang mi mang po dag gis gang la/gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa'i lha rnams kyi ny-i bu spyad pa dang longs spyod ji lta ba bzhin du mi de dag gi'ang de dang 'ang
290b6(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ro//'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi sgra grags pa zhes bya ba de na rin po che thams cad las grub pa'i shing tA li'i phreng ba dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/shing ta la de dag gi
290b7(mdo sde): lo ma dang me tog dang 'bras bu thams cad las chos kyi sgra khrag khrig phrag 'bum mang po dag 'byung ngo //'jig rten gyi khams de na sgra ji snyed 'byung ba 'di lta ste/lha'i sgra 'am/
291a1(mdo sde): spyod /seMn mi med pa nga sbyi pa med de/mngon pa na byed ba med byed du //dag byu bar gyu / 'ju
291a2(mdo sde): ga T+Te Sh+Te rI/'jog rten sa de spyod mi N+DI b+h+ri dag da
291a3(mdo sde): da ldan par 'gyur zhing mngon pad+mo shes pa'o shes pa lci mkhas pa dang /blan med pa yad dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub the rlom med pa sha stag//bcom
291a4(mdo sde): dri mi /shegs pa shing tu ma ma yongs su ga /yid tu tshogs mapa yis pa las byung ba'i rgyal ba'i na kyi chos na
291b1(mdo sde): bzhed pa de'i tshe/de nyid kyi sku las 'od 'gyed par mdzad de/'od des sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad snang bar 'gyur ro//de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od de las kyang sangs rgyas bye ba
291b2(mdo sde): phrag stong gsung ba'i chos ston pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro//de na lha dang mi rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od de'ang mthong la chos bstan pa de'ang thos nas dga' ba dang /mchog
291b3(mdo sde): tu dpa' ba chen po rgya cher skyes te/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu dri ma med cing yongs su dag la yon tan gyi tshogs mtha' yas pa las byung ba'i rgyal po ga la
291b4(mdo sde): ba der dong ste lhags nas de bzhin gshegs pa de la mchod pa tshad med pa byas te/rdzu 'phrul dang mngon par shes pa'i stobs kyis nam mkha'i dkyil na rin po che'o bkod pa chen
291b5(mdo sde): po dang ldan pa'i pad+ma dag la skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod par 'gyur ro//de bzhin gshegs pa de'ang nam mkha'i dkyil nyid na seng ge'i khri la bzhugs te lha dang mi de dag la chos
291b6(mdo sde): ston to//de chos ston pa ni phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' tshad med grangs med pa brgya stong dag chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'ong bar 'gyur ro//'jig rten gyi khams de nu
291b7(mdo sde): sems can su'ang tshom la zho 'gras pa med do//de na bdud sdig can dag dang gzhan mu stegs can dag gi sgrar gang gso pa'ang med do//de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sku tshe'i tshang
292a1(mdo sde): nI bang+ka lA ba bcur 'gyur ro//de'i byang chub sems dpa'adi bgrang ba las 'das par 'gyur ro//rgyal ba chen+da na dA ltar na sbyangs rgyas kyi zhing hU~M ga
292a2(mdo sde): bsam gyis mi khyu gyi//chos bstan pa'ang bsam gyis mi khyab bo//zhabs 'bring 'khor byang chub semaspa pa' yang bsam rmyis khyabya'o//klu'i rgyal po rgyam
292a3(mdo sde): lhung ba snun pa'i yo ste brgyud pa///de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po ma skye ste nas 'di da ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'dis rgyas rnam sbya
292a4(mdo sde): ni rgyu'i rjes su 'brang ba dang /rnam par bsgrubs na 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid lags te/dro koni ji lta ji lta ba de pe d+mo/de ltar rnam par 'brub pa legs so//bcom
292a5(mdo sde): rgyu sa sas kyil gas s+ho// kyang rdzob ma skyed de rna pa rnams ldan saHsa sa smras
292a6(mdo sde): mi bzung bdi srid du byung chub sems dnga'i spyod pa smrang byung 'akyi'o//bcom ldan 'das kyi chu'i sems dnga' thams cad kyis ni dri'i rgyal po rnam che ji lta ba bzhin
292a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyang bar /bcom ldan 'das kyis pa/'i rgya po ni na ge sbyon gyi da na /chos thams cad ni ying la
292b1(mdo sde): mdzo byung /chos rnams cang byed pa med pa'i phyir de dag ni ji sngar 'dod pa bzhin du rnam par 'grur//de nas rgya pom skyes dgras rgyu'i rgyal po la da da/
292b2(mdo sde): swAs so//klu'i bdag po gang khyod de bzhin gshegs pas da ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yin tan m+b+hi ts+tshin dkod pa bris ma gyis mi khyab par rnan med pa yang ga par rjog kyi
292b3(mdo sde): bying chub tu sring bsnyed pa marjed du lags pa / do//degad ces skyem pa dang / rmyil rgyam myos rgyal po maskyes dgu la 'di sa rjes smras s+ho//
292b4(mdo sde): chos gang yang lung bsnyen du med do//de ci'i byi na na/chos thams cad ni gnongam nas rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro//rgyal pos smras pa/klu'i bdage sbyin /
292b5(mdo sde): skyed pa rnams kyi nga rje sbyin du med dam/rgyam de rgya mchos smras pachen pa sems can dug dgos pa na drang po dang /khams dag/sgyu mched rnams su dadal
292b6(mdo sde): padang /khams dang /skye mched rnams ni lung ba stan du med do//rgyal po chen po ming dang gzugs lnga sems can du gdags par zud bya/ming dang gzugs la lung bstan
292b7(mdo sde): da de/rgyu dang /lta ba dang /'du shes dang /yid la byed pa las sems can du gdags par zad na/rgyu dang /lta ba dang /zhes da/yid la byed pa de
293a1(mdo sde): lung brdzun du myed do//dge ba b+ha ga dang//gis byang chub sems dpa' byam ra mkhyen pa nyid du yang dag par 'grub pa smye pa'i ba da /
293a2(mdo sde): bstan du med do//rgyal po chen po chos thams cad ni stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid yin la/stong pa nyid ni lung bstan du myed do//rgyal po chen po ches thams cad ma
293a3(mdo sde): ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i mtshan nyid yin lA mtshan ma myed pa dang /smyon pa snyed pa dang /mngon par 'du byed pa med pa
293a4(mdo sde): mtshan nyid ni lung bstan du med pa'o//rgyal po chen po gzhan yang sangs rgyas rnams kyi snying rje chen po 'dri ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ming med pa dang /mtshan ma
293a5(mdo sde): med pa'i chos thams cad ming dang mtshan mas ston par mdzad la/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni ming dang /mtshan mo'i rjes su 'brang ba'i rnam par shes pa can
293a6(mdo sde): yang ma yin no//rgyal po chen po lung bstan pa 'di ni 'jig rten brda sprad par zad de/'di la gang lung bstan par bya ba'i chos gang yang nang ngam phyi rol na mi dmigs
293a7(mdo sde): so//rgyal pos smras pa/klu'i bdag po bzod pa thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lung bstan pa med ngam/smras pa/rgyal po chen po bzod pa
293b1(mdo sde): de'ang skad cig pa/zad pa'i mtshan nyid/mi zad pa'i mtha' can/yang dag pa'i mthar nges pa/mnyam pa'i ma mar n+dan/gnyis su med pa'i mthar nges pa ste/gnyis
293b2(mdo sde): sgyu med pa'i mtha' ni yang dag pa'i mtha'o//yang dag pa'i mtha' ni gtan du mi 'byung ba'i mtha'o//mtha' tshan gang yin pa de ni 'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang /gauti mug rnams
293b3(mdo sde): so//de'i mtha' can ni rnam par grol ba'amathu'o//gang mtha' de'i skur zhugs pa ni gang du'ang mngon par zhen pa med do//gang mngon par zhen pa de ni tha snyed kyis brda tshigs
293b4(mdo sde): pa med do//ma chags na grol bar 'gyur ro//grol na phyin cad mi rgyu rab tu mi rgyu'o//mai d+hA rab tu mirgyun gang du'ang nyams par mi 'gyur ro//blo ma nyams ni thams cad las
293b5(mdo sde): nges par 'byung bar mthong ste/ji ltar rnam par mthong ba de nid ltar yad mthong ngo //gang gi ni rnam par mi mthong ba de'i tshe gnyis su mi 'byed do//gnyis su med pa la gnas na
293b6(mdo sde): mnyam pa nyid la 'jug go/mnyam pa nyid la zhugs dpa tho bo nga yang mi 'gyur dma' bar yang mi 'gyur ro//mtho ba'ang med/dma'i ba'ang med na mnyam pa nyid kyi chos kyis
293b7(mdo sde): rab tu phye ba'i bzod pa thob par 'gyur te/de la bzod pa gang yid pa dang /l+r-ing bstan pa gang yin pa dang /gang lung bstan par bya ba dang /sus lung bstan pa dang /'i
294a1(mdo sde): phyir lung bstan pa'i chos de dag thams cad chos mnyam pa dang /chos med pa'i chos kyi dbyings su nges pa dang /brda med pa dang /'byung ba med pa dang /
294a2(mdo sde): dngos po dang dngos po med pa dang bral ba dang /gnyis su med pa'i mthu' can de dag gi don yongs su gzhal nos/chos gang yang bgrang bar mi byed do//dper na nam mkha'
294a3(mdo sde): ni bgrang du med cing baglang ba las yang dag par 'das pa ste/de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang de dang 'dra bar blta bar bya'o//klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i bstan pa 'di bshad pa na
294a4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' nyes brgya ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to//dge slong nyis brgya ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par gol lo//de nas bcom
294a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das la rgyal po ma skyes dgas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i spobs pa ni ngo mtshar lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
294a6(mdo sde): rgyal po chen po 'di'i spobs pa ni ngo mtshar yang mi che la dka' ba'ang ma yin gyi/las dang po pa gang dag gis bstan pa 'di thos ni ma skrag mi dngang /dngang bar mi 'gyur ba
294a7(mdo sde): 'di ni de dag gi chos ngo mtshar che ba dang /cher dka' ba yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub ni de ltar mos par dka' ba ste/de
294b1(mdo sde): lA ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'jug par mi 'gyur/'gro bar mi 'gyur/mos par mi 'gyur/yid ches par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir te/rgyal po chen po rnam grangs
294b2(mdo sde): 'dis kyang gang dag chos zab mo bstan pa 'di la mi skrag/mi dengang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag ni sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa yin par da ltar
294b3(mdo sde): rlig par bya'o//rgyal po chen po gzhan yang 'di ji snyam du sems/skyes bu gang gis nam mkha' gzugs can ma yin pa bstan du med pa 'di gzugs can du ston par byed na//
294b4(mdo sde): ci de dka' ba byed pa yon nam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mchog tu dka' ba lags so//bde bar gshegs pa mchog tu dka' ba lags so//bka' stsal pa/chos
294b5(mdo sde): 'di lta bur zab pa/zab par snang ba/tshor ba thams cad rgyun chad pa/bdag med pa/sems can med pa/srog med pa/gso ba med pa/gang zag med pa/rgyu ba med
294b6(mdo sde): pa 'di la mos la mos nas kyang de kho na bzhin du sgrub pa gang yin pa de dag ni de bas kyang ches dka' ba byed pa yin te/de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mthun pa'i dge
294b7(mdo sde): ba dang /grogs dang /mdza' bshes yin no//de dag gis ni sems can rnams kyi phyin ci log spangs pa'i phyir chos ston nus so//de dag gis ni byang chub kyi snying po mchog
295a1(mdo sde): dam pa la 'dug nas bdud kyi dpung bye ba phrag brgya byams pa dang /shes rab dang /ye shes dang /brtson 'grus kyis gzhom par nus so//de dag
295a2(mdo sde): gis ni chos thams cad la dbang byed pa dang /sems dpa' ba dang /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mngon sum du byed pa dang /sems kyi skad cig gcig dang ldan pas/
295a3(mdo sde): thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar nus so//de dag gis ni sems can thams cad brda ston pa dang /sems can thams cad kyi sems ji lta
295a4(mdo sde): ba bzhin du shes pa dang /sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa dang /ji lta ba bzhin du shes pas chos kyi 'khor lo bla na med pa bskor bar nus
295a5(mdo sde): so//de dag gis ni phas kyi rgol ba rnams tshar bcad pa dang /mu stegs can thams cad zil gyis mnan pa dang /ngag thams cad tshar bcad pa'i phyir chos kyi dung 'bud nus
295a6(mdo sde): so//de nas klu'i rgyal ba rgya mtsho bsem pa grub cing brnag pa dang /yid la bsam pa yongs su rdzogs te rang gis lung bstan pa thos nas bar snang li mngon par 'phags
295a7(mdo sde): te/bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to//bdud rnams sde bcas dpung bcas nges bcom zhing //lha bya dran pa'i tsho gas kun bshig nas ni//
295b1(mdo sde): thub pa chen pos chos kyi char phab ste//'jig rten thams cad bdud rtsis tshim par mdzad//khyod ni chos rgyal mi 'jigs skul ba lags//'dam lngas rgal te 'jigs
295b2(mdo sde): ma du 'gram na bzhugs//'jig rten mig ste lam mchog ston pa po//skye bo skyabs ma mchis pa'i mgon po lags//sman pa'i rgyal khyod zug rngu 'byin pa yi//sman pa
295b3(mdo sde): rga shi med pa'i sman stsol ba//ci nas phyin cad nad rnams mi 'byung bar//nad dang rga bas gzer rnams gso mdzad pa//khyod ni stor skyabasngo ba mo gcig pu logs//gtan du bde
295b4(mdo sde): ba sbyin la khyod nyag cig/khyod ni ru skya 'dzin pa don dam mkhyen pa lags//'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las ni zlog mdzad pa//lho yi lha ste 'gro ba rnams kyi gtso//'jig
295b5(mdo sde): rten kun gyi sgron mar gyur pa logs//khyod dang mjal na 'jog rten chu chen rgal//mi rnams kyi ni mi mchog khyod nyag cig/ye shes gzugs dang pha rol gnon pa yis///
295b6(mdo sde): thub dbang khyod 'dra su yang ma mchis te//khyod ni lhar bcas 'jig rten thams cad kyi//ston pa po ste zar po'i lam mtshan lags//khyod ni thams cad zil mnan kun
295b7(mdo sde): mkhyen mtshig/'jig rten chos rnams kyi so ni khyod ma gos//kun mkhyen sred bral rnam grol dpa' ba dang //ye shes mchog brnyes khyod la bdag phyag 'tshal//ji
296a1(mdo sde): ltar bar snang nam mkha' rnam par dag/gzugs med gzung du ma skye bas 'dus ma bgyis//de bzhin chos rnams dri med rnam par dag/'jig
296a2(mdo sde): rten rnam par 'dren pas rab tu bstan//yod dang med par lta ba spangs nas kyang //rnam dag chos rnams bde bar gshegs pas gsungs//rkyen dang bcas shing
296a3(mdo sde): rgyu dang bcas pa ste//sems can ma mchis gang zag srog ma mchis//gzod nas rnam dag nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid//sgyu ma smig rgyu chu zla 'dra ba ste//shin tu dag
296a4(mdo sde): pa nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid//gnas pa ma mchis glog dang 'dra ba'i tshul//sngon gyi mtha' stong phyi ma'i mtha' yang stong //skye dang 'jig dang gnas pa'i ngo bo stong //
296a5(mdo sde): 'dir ni 'di dag dngos med dngos med min//'dri dag thams cad rang bzhin ma mchis stong //chos dbyings rang bzhin ngo bo gong lags te//sems can khams
296a6(mdo sde): kyi rang bzhin ngo bo lags//sems can khams kyi rang bzhin ngo bo gang //sangs rgyas chos kyi rang bzhin ngo bo dri//sangs rgyas chos kyi rang bzhin ngo bo gang //de
296a7(mdo sde): ni chos kun rang bzhin ngo bo nyid//chos kun rang bzhin ngo bo gang lags pa//sangs rgyas zhing gi ngo bo rang bzhin te//sangs rgyas zhing gi rang bzhin ngo bgang //
296b1(mdo sde): sngangs rgyas byang chub rang bzhin ngo bo do//sangs rgyas byang chub rang bzhin ngo bo gang //de ni chos dbyings rang bzhin ngo bo nyid//chos rnams kun la rnams dag pa
296b2(mdo sde): 'di/gang tshe byang chub sems dpas de ltar mdzong //ngo nas rgyal rnams ye shes dam pa yis//byang chub mchog tu de ni lung ston mdzad//tshes rnams brda dang
296b3(mdo sde): ming drang tha snyad tsom//mnyam pa legs te mi bden ming du btags//de dag sngon chad sus kyang ma thob ste//de dag gis nu ming rnams kun tu brjod//mid+ha ma mchis
296b4(mdo sde): par ming ni rnam par brtags//chos rnams stong ste rang bzhin rnam par dag/'jig rten 'du shes mkhas par rig nas ni//the snyad tsam la kun tu spyad pa raM bgyi//
296b5(mdo sde): chos kun sgyu ma bzhin du reg nas kyang //mi bden snying po ma mchis rmi lam 'dra//rnam smin rgyu dang nying mtshams sbyor ba tsam//de la bden pa'i 'du shes yang mi bgyi//
296b6(mdo sde): chos kun slu bar mi bgyid 'jigs pa lags//skye ma smig rgyu 'dra ste mi bden pa//mugal mo'i 'khor lo gzugs brnyan 'dra ba lags//rtag tu byis pa'i skye bo rmongs
296b7(mdo sde): par bgyid//byis pas bdag dang bdag gir 'dir brtags nas//blun po sred pas gzir ba 'dir rmongs te//'khor ba'i 'khor los yongs su 'khor ba mo//sdug
297a1(mdo sde): bsngal gyis non zhi ba thob mi 'gyur//'gro ba'i 'jug pa 'di ni yang dag min//glang gi 'jug pa de ni ma mchis te//'tsho ba'i 'jig rten lta ba gta
297a2(mdo sde): mug ljongs//rgyun du yang dang yang du sdug bsngal rnyed//lha rnams sdug bsngal 'chi 'pho'i chos gcig pa//mi rnams kyi ni sdug bsngal tshol khro lags//dmyal ba
297a3(mdo sde): ngag gi sdug bsngal gnod pa rnams//gcig la gcig 'tshal dud 'gro rnams kyi lags//yi dgas sdug bsngal 'di na bkres dang skom//'jig rten thams cad sdug
297a4(mdo sde): bsngal rnams su nub//skyabs med gyur dang rten med gyur pa yi//'jig rten sdug bsngal thams cad gzigs nas ni/drang srong chen po thugs brtse thugs rje can//
297a5(mdo sde): sdug bsngal rnam par dgrol phyir 'byung bar mdzad//byang chub sems dpa' bskal mang bye bar yang //brtul zhugs brtan zhing pha rol phyin la brtson//sred na mchis
297a6(mdo sde): pa de 'ang mkhyen nas ni//'dam las rgal te sems can rnams kyang 'du ba//gang tshe chos rnams gsog dang gsob tu gzigs//nam mkha' chang stong 'dra zhing
297a7(mdo sde): snying po med//de dag bdag gi ngo bo ma mchis pas//bdag med dngos med dngos po med pa legs//mtha' rnams kun tu lta ba kun spangs na//byang chub rdul med
297b1(mdo sde): rnam dag thob par 'gyur//skye dang rga dang gnod par bgyi ba gang //'chi dang gnas pa gang lags su yang med//gang 'dir skye dang rga dang nA dang 'chi//shed las skyes dang shed
297b2(mdo sde): 'dri ma mchis//'di na bdag dang bdag gi ma mchis te//gang zag shes skyes shed bu yong ma mchis//'dri brdzun bdag po ma mchis dbang ma mchis//'tsho ba'i
297b3(mdo sde): 'jig rten snga ma lta bur 'jug/byed pa ma mchis tshor ba po ma mchis//'on kyang las mchis 'bras bu don ma mchis//'gro ba'i las kyi sbyin gyis rang bzhin 'byung //phan
297b4(mdo sde): tshun du ni rgyu las brten par 'dus//drag dang mi dge'i las gang bgyid pa dang //gang zhig bsgoms dang gang zhig mang du bgyis//yul ni mo mchis phyogs na mi mchis
297b5(mdo sde): te/ngo bo nyid stong 'on kyang rnam par smin//rlung dang slad rol bar ni mi gnas te/chos rnams gang du'ang 'phungs pa yod ma mchis//de dag gang la'ang rten pa ma
297b6(mdo sde): mchis la//rnam par smin pa slu bar yong mi bgyid//skyes pa mi mnga' 'gags pa mnga' ma lags//mkhas pa rnams ni glo bar bgyi slad du//nyan pa la ni smra bas
297b7(mdo sde): tshig kyang bstan//lta ba rnam par sbyang ba'i slad du bstan//gang gi 'du shes 'du shes can ma mchis//mya ngan 'das mchis su yang zhi ma mchis//skye ba ma mchis
298a1(mdo sde): mtha' gang mtha' de lags//bdag gi bdag med mtha' ni nam mkha'i mtha'//kun gyi mtha' ni mtha' mnyam thob pa des//sangs rgyas bsam gyis
298a2(mdo sde): mi khyab dam pa thob//sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' dang ni//skye ba'i mtha' dang skye ba ma mchis mtha'o//mtha' kun de ltar mnyam par mthong ba drang //chags
298a3(mdo sde): med mtha' yi sgo shes ldan pa dang //dus gsum mtha' rnams la ni ma chags des//rgyal ba rnams kyi rigs mchog thob par 'gyur//'gro ba bcings las rnam
298a4(mdo sde): par grol mdzad nas//zhi mchog mya ngan 'dras pa brnyes par 'gyur//'gro kun rmi lam lta bur des gzigs nas//'dir ni ming dang gzugs la sems ma
298a5(mdo sde): chags//chos kun las ni rnam por dag pa'i mig/zhi ba dang no mi g.yo mi 'gul thob//chos rnams thams cad sgra med skad med pa//gzung du med cing dngos
298a6(mdo sde): med rnam par dag/de bzhin rgyal bye dam pa rnams kyi gdung //zhi ba'i ngo bo nyid de smon pa spangs//skyon med rims nad med cing mya ngan bral//spros kun nye bar zhi zhing
298a7(mdo sde): bsam mi khyab//rgyal po mchog rnams kyi ni chos 'di dag/gzung bral rang bzhin sgra dang skad ma mchis//'gro la sman slad skyes bu dam pa yis//de yang
298b1(mdo sde): yi ge rnams kyis gleng zhing bstan//gang gis 'jig rten bla mar rang 'byung mthong //mthong nas kyang ni yid la dad bgyid dang //khyad par 'gro ba'i chos kyang nyan pa yi//lha
298b2(mdo sde): dang mi rnams rnyed pa legs par rnyed//phyogs drang phyogs mtshams rnams su chos 'di ni//'jig rten rnam par 'dren pas rab tu bstan//gang dag ma 'ongs sangs rgyas
298b3(mdo sde): 'gyur ba rnams//thams cad kyang ni mnyam pa'i chos su 'gyur//sgra rnams thams cad brag ca tsam du bas//de ni brjod na rna bar grag par 'gyur//de ni tshul bzhin
298b4(mdo sde): lam gyi rgyud 'gyur te//chos so 'tshal gyi slad du btags pa tsam//chosra kun sgyu ma 'dra zhing gsog lags te//de dag sems can slad du rnam par phye//de dag rang
298b5(mdo sde): bzhin ngo bo gang yon pa//de ni nams kyang rnam par dbyer mi rung //'jig rten ni ni sangs rgyas chos rgyal mchog/chos kyi dbang phyug kun rig kun mkhyen pa//ston pa
298b6(mdo sde): de la slob na de bzhin du//'phags pa kun gyis de nyid don kyang rtogs//byung ba gang lags pa dang da ltar dang //ma 'ongs pa na 'byung ba gang lags pa//thams cad la
298b7(mdo sde): yang thub pa skyes mchog gi/ye shes 'jug ste thogs pa yong mi mnga'//skyes bu dam pa de yis de ring bdag/dogs ma mchis par byang chub mchog lung bstan//
299a1(mdo sde): bdag ni 'gro la phan phyir sangs rgyas 'gyur//bdag la som nyi ma mchis ngogs ma mchis//chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa'i la'u
299a2(mdo sde): ste dgu pa'o////de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad la bka' stsal pa/skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs
299a3(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub ci nas yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir mdo sde 'di gzung zhig/khyod kyi nang nas su dag mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di dag gzung bar spro//de nas der byang chub sems
299a4(mdo sde): dpa' nyi khri dang lha'i bu khri stan las langs te/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan
299a5(mdo sde): 'das bdag cag gis mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di dag gzung bar 'tshal lo//rgyas par yang bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu khyed kyis chos bsgru
299a6(mdo sde): paji lta bus de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub 'di 'dzin par byed//de nas der byang chub sems dpa' ye shes rgyal mtshan tog ces bya ba des/bcom ldan 'das la
299a7(mdo sde): 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag gis dam pa'i chos gzung bar 'tshal na/ci bdag de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub 'dzin pa lags sam/bcom
299b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu khyod de ltar sgrub na de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub 'dzin pa yang dag pa yin no//byang chub sems dpa'i mnyam parA ltas
299b2(mdo sde): gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mtshams ma mi chis pa mnyam pa nyid kyis byang chub mnyam pa nyid du mthong na/ci bdag de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub 'dzin pa
299b3(mdo sde): lags sam/bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu khyod de ltar sgrub na nga'i byang chub 'dzin pa yang dag pa yin no//byang chub sems dpa' lta ba med kyis gsol pa/bcom
299b4(mdo sde): ldan 'das bdag gis so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams kyang ma mthong /slob pa'i chos dang /mi slob pa'i chos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dang /byang chub sems dpa'i chos
299b5(mdo sde): dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang mu mthong na/ci bdag de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub 'dzin pa lags sam/bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu de ni de bzhin no//byang
299b6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' chos thams cad la khas 'che ba med par shin tu gnas bsdu gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos kyi rang bzhin ci'ang ma 'tshal cing mi 'dzin na/
299b7(mdo sde): bdag dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa lags sam/bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu de ni de bzhin no//byang chub sems dpa' mig mi 'dzums kyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das
300a1(mdo sde): bdag mig gis mi lta/sems kyis mi gtod/dran pa mi skyed na/ci bdag dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa lags sam/bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi
300a2(mdo sde): bu de ni de bzhin no//byang chub sems dpa' brjod du med pas gsol pa/ba com ldan 'das bdag chos kyang mi ston/chos ma lags pa'ang mi ston/bdag
300a3(mdo sde): lngas chos kyi sgra'ang mi 'byung /chos kyi 'du shes pa'ang rtog par mi bgyid na/ci bdag dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa legs sam/bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu de ni de
300a4(mdo sde): bzhin no//byang chub sems dpa' ming med pas gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag gang gi ming dang mtshan ma'ang mnyan lags na/ci bdag dam pa'i chos 'dzin
300a5(mdo sde): pa lags sam/bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu de ni de bzhin no//byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i mdzod kyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos
300a6(mdo sde): thams cad nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid du rig nas gang la 'dzin pa'i chos rnams dang /chos ma lags pa rnams mi mthong na/ci bdag dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa lags sam//
300a7(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu de ni de bzhin no//byang chub sems dpa' mi g.yo ba'i stabs kyis 'gro bas gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag chos thams cad la
300b1(mdo sde): mi dmigs mi g.yo mngon par zhen pa ma mchis na/ci bdag dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa lags sam/bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu de ni de bzhin no//byang chub sems
300b2(mdo sde): dpa' bdud 'joms kyis gsol ba/bcom ldan 'das bdag sangs rgyas kyi yul la bdud kyi yul gyi rjes su mchis la/bdud kyi yul la'ang sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi rjes
300b3(mdo sde): su mche na/ci bdag dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa lags sam/bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu de ni de bzhin no//byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i stabs kyis 'gro bas gsol
300b4(mdo sde): pa/bcom ldan 'das gang chos kyi dbyings kyang 'byed par mi bgyid/sems can gyi khams la ma gtogs par yang chos kyi dbyings la 'jug par mi bgyid na/ci de
300b5(mdo sde): dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa lags sam/bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu de ni de bzhin no//byang chub sems dpa' mi dmigs pas gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gang chos
300b6(mdo sde): ci'ang mi dmigs la/ba spu'i khung bu thams cad nas kyang chos kyi sgra 'byung na/ci de dam po'i chos 'dzin pa lags sam/bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu de ni de bzhin no//
300b7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' kun nas bsrings pas gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gang bdud kyi zhags pas kyang ma bcings la/byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod na/ci dang
301a1(mdo sde): pa'i chos 'dzin pa lags sam/bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu de ni de bzhin no//byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtshos gsol pa/bcom ldan/
301a2(mdo sde): 'das gang chos thams cad rgya mtsho'i phyag rgyas yang dag par 'du ba dang /rnam par grol ba'i ngo bo nyid ro gcig par 'tshal na/tsid dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa lags sa ma/
301a3(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu de ni de bzhin no//lha'i bu mchen bzang gis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gang skye'ang skye la/phung pa dang /khams dang /skye mched
301a4(mdo sde): rnams 'byung ba'ang mi 'dzin/'byung yang 'byung la/de sems dang yid du 'dogs par yang mi bgyid na/ci de dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa lags sa mau/bka'
301a5(mdo sde): stsal pa/lha'i bu de ni de bzhin no//lha'i bu dri ma med pas gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gang chos thams cad dri ma ma mchis pa dang /snyigs ma ma mchis pa
301a6(mdo sde): dang /'dod chags kyi rdul dang bral bar rag nas/rgyu las rnam par grol bar mi bgyid na/ci de dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa lags sam/bka' stsal pa/lha'i bu
301a7(mdo sde): de ni de bzhin no//lha'i bu sems can sgrol gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gang sems can rnams kyang sgrol bar bgyid la/bdag ma mchis pa'ang 'tshal///
301b1(mdo sde): bsgral nas kyang 'dzud par bgyid la/chu rol dang pha rol gyi 'gram na'ang mi gnas na/ci de dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa lags sam/bka' stsal pa/lha'i bu de ni de bzhin
301b2(mdo sde): /lha'i bu dbang byed kyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gang chos thams cad la dbang yang thob la/chos gang yang skye bar yang mi bgyid/'gag par yang mi babyed
301b3(mdo sde): na/ci de dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa lags sam/bka' stsal pa/lha'i bu de ni de bzhin no//lha'i bu rgyal po bzang pos gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gang sems can
301b4(mdo sde): thams cad sems can mnyam pa dang /chos thams cad chos mnyam pa dang zhing thams cad zhing mnyam pa dang /sangs rgyas thams cad sangs rgyas mnyam par rjes
301b5(mdo sde): su song na/ci de dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa lags sam/bka' stsal pa/lha'i bu de ni de bzhin no//lha'i bu legs par sems kyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das
301b6(mdo sde): bdag chos ci'ang mi sems shing spros par mi bgyid de/mtshan mar mi bgyid na/ci bdag dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa lags sam/dza bka' stsal pa/lha'i bu de ni de bzhin
301b7(mdo sde): no//sring mo ut+pa las gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag chos thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams lags par 'tshal la/'on kyang bdag mngon par rdzogs par
302a1(mdo sde): n+tam+b+ha/bdag da sa 'dzin pa lpagasasas/shAklun smral pa/skyed blun da thA nam//ma rgyug gis ga
302a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bu srid kyi rjes rnams kyang me migs/sa sa rnams kyad ma dmi gas/sa sa rnams
302a3(mdo sde): gang lags pa ni/bud med dang/skyes pa'i chos rnams kyi marnyan rnyed lags la/chos de dag kyang rgyas kyang ma lags/chos ma lags pa'i mya lags//de'i srid rje
302a4(mdo sde): dri ltar bdag ni skyed par yi ma bgyid/khas yin par yang mi bgyi na/ci bdag dam pa'i nas 'dzin pa lagasusam/bka' stsal pa/bu mngon de bzhin no//
302a5(mdo sde): na da gyis maso lang /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis byang chub dang /byung chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'ang ma mthong la/sems rkyen blam steHda kyi ga chu'ang ba dag ga
302a6(mdo sde): dem/de dag sang gtan du bdag gis ma mdzad na/tso bdag dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa legs sam/bka' sprul pa/bu mo de ni de bzhin no//bu mo drim med
302a7(mdo sde): da kyis gisal pa/ngocom ldan 'das bdag ces thams cad la'ang chos kyi 'du shes mi skyed pa/sems can thams cad la'ang sems can gyi 'du shes
302b1(mdo sde): ma chos thams cad n+d+has sa pa/ma ma rtan s+ho/sa nas su/rmongs su \u0f7fsa thams cad 'dus phyir yang dag
302b2(mdo sde): /de dag gi ljongs su du mnyen par yong dag par mdzu na/btsam ldan 'das ste gude ltar ba ma pa chos 'dzin pa lags sim+ba/bInIm+bi ldan ngos
302b3(mdo sde): s+yA bka' stsa pa/bu mo khyod de ltar sgrub na dbu pa'i chos 'dzin pa yang dag pa yin no//de nas bcom sbyin 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'dis
302b4(mdo sde): gsol te//bcom ldan 'das 'de ltar bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos rnam par nges pa'i spobs pa dang ldan pa'i bu mi rnams kyis 'dir rnam po dang skad dang brjen tshogs
302b5(mdo sde): gyi mchos nyid de khon gyings te/chos deng dadu yang 'gal bur mi gyi la/chos rnams nad kyang byang chub dang mnyem pa nyid du sbyin pa ni ngo mtshar legs so//bcom ldan das
302b6(mdo sde): ka' stsal pa/kau shaM gzhan yang chos de ni de bzhin d+he/bu mo 'di dag ni bsku ma chis mo khyab pa'i chos rnam par nges basbyin pa la mkhas pa/sangs rgyas ma
302b7(mdo sde): bi la bsnyen bkur byas pa//da pama' 'an rtenas 'di dag ni kyi rje 'ardung ba dang /gan la'ang nus par bstan pa dang /
303a1(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa mya dran las 'dres pa'i 'og tu'ang mi 'ongs pa'i sems can chen po dam pa'i chos kyi grong khyer bsrung ba de dag la bstan pa'i phyir
303a2(mdo sde): khyod la gtad do//de ltar byas na khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i cho ga byas par 'gyur ro//brgya byin gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi
303a3(mdo sde): rnam grangs 'di bdag gis bzung lags so//'di ni bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kho nas rgyas par bgyi'o//ma 'ongs pa'i sems can chen po de dag
303a4(mdo sde): la'ang bstabs par 'tshal lo//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa la bka' drin bsabs pa'i rngo mi thog ste/'di ltar
303a5(mdo sde): bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi phan gdags pa'i slad du'o//bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang ci nas bdud dang /phyir rgol ba nges par bcom nas nyud dzam+bu'i
303a6(mdo sde): gling du spyod par 'gyur ba de lta bur chos kyi rnam grangs 'di de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlab tu gsol//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka
303a7(mdo sde): de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la bzung zhig dang /bar du gcod pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i rig sngags dang /gsang sngags kyi gzhi'i byin
303b1(mdo sde): brlab ngas bstan par bya ste/dag sngagasu dang /gsang sngags kyi gzhi dang ga gis bdud thams cad dang /phas kyis rdol ba thams cad kyang shin tu car garjod pa
303b2(mdo sde): 'gyur la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnaMs sgron ma 'di'ang yu rIng du gnas parade 'byung ro//tad+yathA/e b+hi ye/b+hu ya breg te/d+ha ma tho shod+d+ha re/oM Sh+Ta yAng de/

303b7(mdo sde): ni 'di dag yin te/'das pa dang /ma 'ongs pa dang /de ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir gsungs so//rig sngags dang /

304a5(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i chos bzung na/bsod nams ji tsam zhig skyed par 'gyur lags/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu de la tshigs su bcad de bkra' stsal pa/

304a7(mdo sde): mgon po'i chos//stong nas yongs su 'dzin byed na//de bas mi de'i bsod nams ni//shin tu mang du 'phel por 'gyur//bskal pa'i bar du bzhugs

304b3(mdo sde): skyes so//steng gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'oda'ang rnam pa drug dang mo chen mtshon po bco brgyad du rab tu g.yos phyir gyur to//'di lta ste/

308b1(mdo sde): no//des nang nyung bar 'gyur bar sgrub pa yongs su bzung ba yin no//des tshe rang bar 'gyur tu sa b+h+yon btab pa yin no//de la mi ma yin pa rnams kyang srung

309a2(mdo sde): yin no//phyogs dang phyogs mchims rnams su de'i bsngags pa brjod cing de la pha rol gyi ga nod pa'i 'jigs pa thams nang med pa yin no//de'i dge ba bad+d+ho

309a7(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsdu na/de dge ba'i rtsa ba des de bzhin gshegs po nye ba'i nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i ye shes can du rang gi ma
309b1(mdo sde): par shes pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro//klu'i bdag po 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa spangs pa'i

309b7(mdo sde): gyi ched mar 'gyur ba dang /lce dang mi dga' bas dbang gcig par 'gyur ba dang /dbugs 'byin pas 'byung po rnams dogs pa med par 'gyur pa dang /lhag

310a3(mdo sde): par 'gyur pa yin te/klu'i bdag po brdzun du smra ba spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni lha dang mis bsngags pa'i chos brgyad po de dag thob po//brdzun du smra ba//
310a4(mdo sde): spangs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de gal te bla nA med pa yang dag par rdzogs po'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo na/de dge ba'i rtsa ba des bden pa'i rjes su 'jug pa'i tshig tu
