382a1(mdo sde): kyi dbang po rtogs pa la'ang mkhas pa dang /'phags pa'i yon tan yang brjod la 'phags pa'i ma yin pa'i chos la gnas par yang brtson
382a2(mdo sde): pa dang /spros pa'ang med la smos pa la'ang 'jug pa dang /nye bar yang zhi la nye bar ma zhi ba 'di yongs su 'dzin pa dang /mi g.yo zhing rnam par mi g.yo ba'ang
382a3(mdo sde): rgyan mi gcod la sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan rnam par bsgrub par nye bar gnas pa ni klu'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa 'jig rten las 'das pa ste/'jig
382a4(mdo sde): rten las ldog pa'ang ma yin pa'o//klu'i bdag po de ltar gang shes rab dang /thabs dang ldan pa 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med
382a5(mdo sde): pa la 'jug pa'o//klu'i bdag po 'di lta ste/dper na nyan thos kyi skon med pa la 'jug pa ni log par mi ltung ba'i chos te rgyan du zhugs pa zhes bya'o//klu'i bdag
382a6(mdo sde): po de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug pa ni log por mi ltung ba'i chos te phyir mi ldog pa zhes bya'o//klu'i bdag po nyan thos kyi skyon med pa la
382a7(mdo sde): 'jug pa ni mi 'da' ste/gdon mi za bor 'bras bu thob par byed pa'o//byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jog pa ni 'da' ba ste/nyan thos kyi 'bras bu thob
382b1(mdo sde): par mi byed kyi byang chub kyi snying po'i 'bras bu dang nye bar byed pa'o//de'i phyir nyan thos kyi skyon med pa ni chad du bya'o//byang chub sems dpa'i ni tshad du bya ba ma yin pa'o///
382b2(mdo sde): bdag po 'dre lta ste/dpe rin+da skyes bu gnyis shig g.yongs chen por ltung ba las de la skyes bu gcig ni 'od 'dra ba'i stobs dang /brtson 'grus dang /brtul ba dang /byis/
382b3(mdo sde): dang /sngon gyi sbyor ba dang /rigs pa dang ldan par gyur pa zhig pas lhung yang brtson 'grus chen po'i stobs kyis g.yeng sa chen po de nas drangs nas slar g.yang sa chen po
382b4(mdo sde): de'i khar phyin te gnas so//gcig shos ni stobs bskyed pa chung la thabs la mi mkhas pas ltung ba de bzhin du/klu'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' nga shes rab kyi stobs
382b5(mdo sde): bskyed pa sngo chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /mtshan mi med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par 'du byed pa med par rnam par lta zhing nye bar rtog la sems can thams
382b6(mdo sde): cad la dmigs pa'i snying rje chen pos yang dag par btang ba'i thabs la mkhas pas kyang thams cad mkhyen po'i sems la gnas so//nyan thos kyi theg pa can ni chos la so//
382b7(mdo sde): sor brtags nas 'bras bu mngon du byed do//klu'i bdag po g.yang sa chen po zhes bya ba de ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos kyi tshig bla drags so//brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang ldan
383a1(mdo sde): pa'i smos bu zhes bya ba de ni/byang chub sems dpa'i rgyug bla dgas so//g.ya du spyad nas skur bzlog ma nus pa zhes bya ba de ni can thos kyi theg pa
383a2(mdo sde): can gyi tshig bla dgas so//klu'i bdag po gang dge skyon med pa 'di thos pa de ni nges par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'byung zhing byang chub
383a3(mdo sde): sems dpa'i skyon med pa dang yang nye bar 'gyur ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das la klu'i rgyal po'i bu rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya bas 'di skad cesa? gsol to//bcom
383a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das bdog zang zing ma mchis pa'i sems kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ring du gnas par bgyi ba dang /dmi pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i slad du byang chub tu
383a5(mdo sde): sems bskyed cing /sangs rgyas dang /chos dang /dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o//bdag sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyis sems kyi rang bzhin gyis byang chub kyi
383a6(mdo sde): rang bzhin dang /byang chub kyi rang bzhin gyis chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mngon par yang dag par khong du chud par bgyis te rab tu bshad par bgyi'o//bcom
383a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das gang dag rnam par dag pa'i lam gyi chos kyi sgo'i le'u 'di mi nyan pa de dag ni bdud kyis byin gyis brlabs pa lags so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/
383b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la nges par 'byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni 'byung ba'i lham thams cad du nges par 'byung lpags pa'i skad du'o//de nas
383b2(mdo sde): dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis klu'i rgyal po'i bu rnam par 'phrul pa lo 'di skad ces smras so//rigs kyi bu khyod kyis grang sems kyi rang bzhin gyis byang chub mngon par
383b3(mdo sde): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhes bya ba de la sems kyi rang bzhin de gang yin/smras pa/btsun pa rab 'byor gyi rang bzhin glang yin pa'i rang bzhin de sems kyi rang bzhin
383b4(mdo sde): no//smras pa/rab 'byor gyi rang bzhin ji lta bu/smras pa/gang 'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang /gti mug gi rang bzhin no//smras pa/'dod chags dang /
383b5(mdo sde): zhe sdang dang /gti mug gi rang bzhin ji lta bu/smras pa/rtog pa dang /rnam par rtog pa'i rang bzhin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor 'di la ji snyam du
383b6(mdo sde): skyems/rtog pa med par 'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang /gti mug skye bar 'gyur ram/smras pa/di nI ma yin no//smras pa/gang mi rtog cing rnam par myi
383b7(mdo sde): rtog pa de mi skye ba'o//gang mi skye ba de rang bzhin te/'di ni 'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang /gti mug rnams kyi rang bzhin no//btsun pa rab 'byor gyis sems kyi
384a1(mdo sde): //rang bzhin zhes bya ba de gang yin zhes smras pA la 'od gsol ba de ni sems kyi rang bzhin no//gang sems kyi 'od gsal ba de la 'dod chags dang /
384a2(mdo sde): drung /gci mug med /sa pa/rigs kyi blo nyon mongs pa gang dag skye bde dag skye ba gang zhes skye/smras pa/sbyin par shA byor sbyin ci lhag
384a3(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa rnams skye mod kyi/sems kyi rang bzhin ni nam yang kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin no//btsun po rab 'byor gal te sems kyi rong bzhin kun nas nyon
384a4(mdo sde): myormongs pa can yin du zin na ni gang yang shin tu rnam par dag par mi 'gyur ba zhig na/gang gi phyir sems kyi rang bzhin kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i
384a5(mdo sde): phyir nyon mongs pa yongs su shes pas rnam par dag pa zhes bya'o//rab 'byor gyis smras pa/rigs kyi bu ji ltar na nyon mongs pa rnams yongs su shes pa yin//
384a6(mdo sde): smos pa/btsun pa rab 'byor rkyen yod par gyur na skye ba'i rkyen med na mi skye bor tshul bzhin yid la byed pa ni nyon mongs pa rnams yongs su shes pa'o//smras pa//
384a7(mdo sde): rogs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhon la rab tu brtson po yin/smras pa/btsun pa rab 'byor gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sbyor ba thams cad
384b1(mdo sde): dang mi ldan par gnas pa de'i tshe tshul bzhin la brtson pa yin no//btsun pa rab 'byor gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang rang
384b2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas la rnam par grol ba'i chos ston kyang rnam par grol ba der mi ltung ba 'oda'ang byang chub sems dpa'i tshul bzhin la sbyor ba'o//btsun pa rab 'byor gzhan yang
384b3(mdo sde): dru gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rang gi nyon mongs pa dben pas sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa dben par khong du chud pa de 'ong de'i tshul bzhin
384b4(mdo sde): la sbyor ba'o//gzhan yang grong gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sbyor ba la sbyor ba ma yin pa dang /sbyor ba ma yin pa la sbyor bar mthong ba de'ang byeng chub sems dpe'i tshul
384b5(mdo sde): bzhin la sbyor ba'o//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis klu'i rgyal po'i bu rnam par 'phrul pa la 'di skad ces smras so//rigs kyi bu byang chub snyoms dpa'i sbyor ba la
384b6(mdo sde): sbyor ba ma yin pa dang /sbyor ba ma yin pa la sbyor ba mthong ba ji ste bu/sgrasgru pa/btsun pa rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis gang mig dang /
384b7(mdo sde): gzugs nas yid dang chos kyi bar de dag ni sbyor bar mi blta'o//sbyor ba ma yin pa zhes bya ba ni khamos gsum du nying mtshams mi sbyor ba ste/de la byang chub sems
385a1(mdo sde): /m+b+ha sa man+ta sa rlom sgyur ba zhes byam+b+ha/thun pa yang ra du da ba brtson pa'i byung rgyab sgyums da ku dul
385a2(mdo sde): rab tu brtson pa zhes bya'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i rgyal po'i bu de la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste/skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis ji ltar sangs rgyas
385a3(mdo sde): mthus byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin la sbyor ba 'di de ltar bston pa ni legs so lcags so//byang chub sems dpa' phreng dag theg pa chen po 'di la tshul bzhin
385a4(mdo sde): de lta sbrul rab tu brtson pa de dag ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges pa yin par blta'o//de nas bcom ldan 'angs l+ye klu'i rgyal po'i bu rnam par 'phrul pas 'di
385a5(mdo sde): skad kyisaM gsol to//bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zang zing ma mchis pa'i sems kyis sangs rgyas dang / chos dang /
385a6(mdo sde): dge 'dun la skyabs su mchis pa legs/bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu gang gi phyir byang chub sems dpas chos thams cad bdag med po dang /sems can
385a7(mdo sde): med pa dang /srog med pa dang /gang zag med pa dang /gang zag med par shes nas gzugs su ma yin/mtshan du ma yin/chos su ma yin par de bzhin
385b1(mdo sde): g+h+r-i shogs pa yod dag b+hur su mya 'ong ba de lta bu ni zang zing med pa'i sems kyis sangs rgyas la skyabs su song ba yin no//de bzhin pa sh+legs bya chos nyid gyu
385b2(mdo sde): na g+h+r-i sa//sa kyi dbyed ng+gA yin pa de ni thams rgyu N+Dirnas su sa~M bzlas b+hAs+t+wa~M/de ltar thos rnams rgyas kyi rjes su
385b3(mdo sde): ra mthong ba de lta bu ni zang zing med pa'i sems kyis chos la skyabs su song ba yin ni//gang chos kyi dbyings 'dus ma byas par rab tu bsgom pa dang /nyan thos
385b4(mdo sde): zlotheg pa la 'dus mi byas pa ston pa dang /'dus byas dang /'dus ma byas gnyis su med pa 'di lta bu ni zang zing med po'i sems kyis dge 'dun la skyabs su myong ba
385b5(mdo sde): yin no//bstan pa 'di bshad pa'i tshe klu'i rgyal po'i bu rnam par 'phrul pas rjes su mthun pa'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob par gyur to//de nas klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa
385b6(mdo sde): rgyu mi'i 'khor dang bcas/gnyen dang 'khor du bcas te/dngos po thams cad kyis sangs rgyas dang /chos dang /dge 'dun la skyabs su song nas rang gi gnas
385b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dren dang bcas pa la phul te 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdage smon lam 'debs pa ni 'di lags te/gang bdag
386a1(mdo sde): gi gnas 'dri nas klung chen po bzhi rgya mtsho chen po bzhir 'bab pa'i rgya mtsho chen po de dag dang /bcom ldan 'das klung chen po 'di dag la 'chol ba'i sems can
386a2(mdo sde): rkang gnyis pa dang /rkang bzhi pa dang /rkang mangs dang /ri dgas dang /bya gang lags pa de dag rgyu des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu gyur cig/gang
386a3(mdo sde): dag byang chub tu smon pa de dag kyang rgyu des rnam par grol bar gyur cig/de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad do//'di ni sangs rgyas
386a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas kha dog du ma'i 'od zer byung nas mtha' yas mu med
386a5(mdo sde): pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'od kyis khyab par byas te/slar log nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo//de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom
386a6(mdo sde): ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa//mtshungs pa ma mchis gzugs mnga' mthong na dga'//skyes mchog bcom ldan skyes bu khyu mchog pa//'jig rten
386a7(mdo sde): 'das la 'jig rten sgron ma yi//'od gzi bzhad pa'i don 'di bdag la gsungs//bsod nams brgya mnga' bsod nams lhag pa po/ye shes kyis 'phags ye
386b1(mdo sde): shes snang mdzad pa//chos dbang mi mtshungs chos kyi bka' mchid can//bcom ldan ci yi don du bzhud pa ston//bden pa gzigs shing rtag tu bden la dgyes//dbang
386b2(mdo sde): po zhi ba zhi gnas pha rol phyin//zhi lnga rab zhi zhi gnas dgyes pa po//gzhan don yon tan mthar phyin bdag la gsungs//'jam pa'i gsung can tshangs pa'i dbyangs
386b3(mdo sde): 'byin pa//bya mchog mang po sgra dang sil snyan sgra//sgra dbyangs yan lag thams cad rdzogs pa'i dbyangs//thub pa bzhed par sbyor ba bdag la gsungs//thub po shes
386b4(mdo sde): rab 'byung gnas shes rab grol//rtag tu mnyam gzhag 'khrul pa'i thugs mi mnga'//thams cad mkhyen pa sems can spyod la mkhas//mtshungs med bzhed pa'i
386b5(mdo sde): don ni legs par gsungs//ye shes mi phyed dbang gi mthar phyin pa//rdzu 'phrul mtha' yas pa yi stobs ston cing //stobs bcu mnga' ba dbang gi pha rol gshegs///
386b6(mdo sde): bde bar gshegs khyod ci slad 'dir 'dzum ston//sku 'od dpal gyis snang ba mdzad pa po//khyod kyi 'od kyis gzhan 'od gsal mi 'gyur//ji ltar rgyal ba'i 'od ni
386b7(mdo sde): mnga' ba ltar//nyi zla zhugs dang nor bu'i ma lags so//bsod nams chen po the tshom mi mnga' ba//rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' phyogs gsal mdzad//bcom
387a1(mdo sde): ldan ci slad bzhed pa ston pa de//mi mtshungs ye shes mnga' bas bdag lung skyon//de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa
387a2(mdo sde): kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//kun dga' bo klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa de bzhin gshegs pa la 'di 'dra ba'i bkod pa 'di dag gis mchod pa byed
387a3(mdo sde): pa mthong ngam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa 'dis byang chub bsgrub pa
387a4(mdo sde): phyir sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i gan du tshangs par spyod pa spyad do//gang gi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad kyis nga la khyod ma 'ongs pa'i
387a5(mdo sde): dus ni de bzhin gaushegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa de'i tshe de'i dus na klu'i rgyal
387a6(mdo sde): pI 'di tshong dpon gyi bu rnam par dag pa'i blo gros zhes bya bar gyur te/des nga lung bsnyen pa thos nas smon lam btab pa/bdag kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na ji ltar
387a7(mdo sde): khye'u blo gros bzang po 'di lung bsten pa bzhin du lung ston par gyur cig ces smras so//kun dga' bo klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa 'di ji ltar da ltar nga la 'bul
387b1(mdo sde): de bzhin du bskal pa bzang po'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cadadra la'ang rang gi gnas brgyan nas 'bul bar 'gyur te/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams
387b2(mdo sde): cad kyis kyang de'i lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nas rnam par dag pa'i lam gyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chad par 'gyur ro//sa phyogs 'di nyid du de bzhin gshegs/
387b3(mdo sde): pa log par dad sel dang /gser thub dang /'od srung yang bzhugs nas rnam par dag pa'i lam gyi chos kyi sgo'i le'u 'di gsungs so//klu'i bdag po ma dros
387b4(mdo sde): pa 'di bskal pa bzang po'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa byed par 'gyur chos gang nyan par 'gyur ro//de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa grangs
387b5(mdo sde): med pa mnyes par byed par 'gyur/tshangs par spyad pa'ang spyod par 'gyur/dam pa'i chos kyang yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur te/bskal pa grangs med pa bdun
387b6(mdo sde): stong lnga brgyan de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yong dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma dros pa zhes bya ba nyid du 'gyur ro//kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs
387b7(mdo sde): pa ma dros pa byang chub thob pa'i tshe sems can gang yang 'dod chags kyi gdung ba 'am/zhe sdang gi gdung po 'am/gti mug gi gdung ba'am//pha rol gyi gdubya bas
388a1(mdo sde): gdong bar mi 'gyur te/sems can de dag thams cad kyang nges par chu'i ched du 'gyur ro//kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa ma dros pa'i tshe'i
388a2(mdo sde): tshad ni lo bye ba phrag brgyad cur 'gyur ro//kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa ma dros pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni bai DUr+ya las grub par 'gyur te/sa chen po de
388a3(mdo sde): ni dzam+bu'i gling gi gser gyi pad+mas khebs par 'gyur/lha dang mi de dag gi longs spyod dang /yongs su spyad pa dang /bza' ba dang /btung ba'ang bsams pa tsam
388a4(mdo sde): gyis 'byor par 'gyur/mi de dag thams cad mngon par shes pa lngas nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur/dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi longs spyod dang /yongs su
388a5(mdo sde): spyod pa ci 'dra bar mi de dag gi'ang de 'dra bar 'gyur ro//sems can de dag gnyis kyis gnyis sbyor ba ma yin gyi/de dag thams cad chos kyi dga' ba la dga' zhing
388a6(mdo sde): mos par 'gyur/nyon mongs pa rnams kyang rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro//de bzhin gshegs pa de 'od yongs su mi skyo bar chos ston par 'gyur ro//ji ltar da ltar nga
388a7(mdo sde): rdzu 'phrul gyi tshe 'phrul thams cad kyis chos ston pa ltar de sha zang bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//sems can de dag kyang chos brjod pa tsam gyis 'dul bar 'gyur//
388b1(mdo sde): ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/sa 'di ltar sangs rgyas zhing de ni lha dang mi rnams la chos kyi ta ma gcig ston par 'gyur ba phyir ro//sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na nyan mtshan
388b2(mdo sde): zhes so sor baglang du med par 'gyur/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa mi dris pa de'i rang gi lus las 'od bkyo bas thams cad dang ldan
388b3(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de gsalta bas khyab par 'gyur ro//de nas sems can de dag 'di snyam du de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi bka' mchid mdzad par 'gyur ro/
388b4(mdo sde): snyam du semos par 'gyur zhing de dag 'od des bskul ba dang chos nyan pa'i phyir nam mkha' las 'drong bar 'gyur ro//de ltar de dag 'dus nas de bzhin gshegs
388b5(mdo sde): pa de shing ta la bdun srad du steng gi bar snang la 'phags te/nam mkha'i la gnas pa'i seng ge'i khri la 'dug nas sems can de dag la chos ston par 'gyur ro//
388b6(mdo sde): de der 'dag pa dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de thams cad du snang bar 'gyur te/dper na zla ba nya ba'i dkyil 'khor bzhin no//de na dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa'i sems
388b7(mdo sde): dri dag bcom ldan 'a sa dri'i mdzina'i khyo gnas med pa de badzin du rgyas pa'is cang byang gas ma drini mam pa' ba da sum dzesams
389a1(mdo sde): 'gyur te/de dag nyid kyis mngon par rtogs par 'gyur/bzod pa'ang rab tu thob par 'gyur ro//de bzhin gshegs pa de ni rdo rje'i sgo la 'jug
389a2(mdo sde): pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs ston to//'di lta ste/dper na rdo rje ni gang dang gang du bab pa de dang de dag 'jim mo//de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa de'i chos
389a3(mdo sde): bstan pa'ang bag la nyal dang kun nas ldang ba thams cad 'jom mo//kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa ma dros pa de gang gi tshe yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba de'i tshe//
389a4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' smon lam khyad par 'phags zhes bya ba 'di nga'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu snang ba zhes bya bar 'gyur te/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang 'di 'dra
389a5(mdo sde): ba nyid du 'gyur ro zhes byang chub sems dpa' smon lam khyad par 'phags pa lung bstan nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o//de nas klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa'i bu rtag tu/
389a6(mdo sde): dad pa thob ces bya ba de so nor bu rin po che'i gdugs rin po ches spras pa de bzhin gshegs pa la phul lo//phul nas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das
389a7(mdo sde): de'i tshe de'i dus ni byang chub sems dpa' smon lam khyad par 'phags zhes bgyi bar 'gyur ba de gang lags/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i rgyal po'i bu rtag tu dang
389b1(mdo sde): ba thob kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' smon lam khyad par 'phags zhes/
389b2(mdo sde): bya bar 'gyur ba de gzhan yin po snyam du khyod sems na de ltar mi blta'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kun dga' bo klu'i rgyal po'i bu rtag tu dad pa thob pa 'di nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na
389b3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' smon lam khyad par 'phags zhes bya bar 'gyur te/bcom ldan 'das ma dros pa de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
389b4(mdo sde): po'i sangs rgyas kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten du 'byung ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis zhus pa lung bstan cing rnam par dag pa'i lam gyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mthar phyin
389b5(mdo sde): pa'i dus shes nas phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang /brgya byin dang /tshangs pa dang /'jig rten skyong ba dang /lha dang /klu
389b6(mdo sde): dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /nam mkha' lding dang /mi'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs shing rab tu dga' ste/dga' ba
389b7(mdo sde): dang yid bde bo skyes nas mngon par dga' ste stan las langs nas/bcom ldan 'das la tshul bzhin du mchod de/rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang rang rang gi gnas su dong ngo ///
390a1(mdo sde): de nas klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa bu dang chung ma dang bcas/gnyen dang 'khor du bcas te klu'i rgyal po lha srung du mngon par sprul nas bcom ldan 'das
390a2(mdo sde): kyi gzhal med khang rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'ang mngon par sprul te/bcom ldan 'das der bzhugs su gsol nas/byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun
390a3(mdo sde): dang bcas/nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas par bkod de rang gi gnas nas byung nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs 'bring du song ste/des bcom ldan 'das byang chub
390a4(mdo sde): sems dpa' dang bcas/nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa bya rgod phung po'i ri la bskyal nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ste rang gi gnas su song ngo //de nas bcom
390a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dgu' bo la bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung zhig/gsol pa/bdag gis gzung lpags so//bcom/
390a6(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ku ni dga' bo de'i phyir rnam par dag pa'i lam gyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'khor bzhi po dag la rgyun mi chad par ston cing /de ltar
390a7(mdo sde): ni khyod dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba byas par 'gyur ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa'i gnas nas bya rgod phung po'i raM la gshegs so/
390b1(mdo sde): zhes rgyal po'i khab kyi bram ze dang /khyim bdag rnams kyis thos nas de dag thams cad dad pa thob ste/lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ngo //de dag de//
390b2(mdo sde): ltar phyin pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam par dag pa'i lam gyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyid las brtsams te/de lta de ltar chos bstan nas 'khor
390b3(mdo sde): de las srog chags khris byang chub tu sems bskyed do//srog chags lnga stong ni chos la chos kyi mig skyes so//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa
390b4(mdo sde): dang /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /nyan thos chen po de dag dang /lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin dang /dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten bcom ldan 'das
390b5(mdo sde): kyis gsungs pa la yi rangs te/mngon par bstod do//'phags pa klu'i rgyal po ma dros pas zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so///
390b6(mdo sde): rgyu gar gyi mkhan po dzi na miHdang /dA na shI la dang /ye shes sde dang /yi ge pa dgon gling rma lA logs pos zhus chen bgyis te gtan la phab pa/
390b7(mdo sde): gar skad du/Ar+ya d+yA ma ka na nar rung par bri skrinA ma ma hA yA na sU tre/bod skad du/'phags pa mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdang pos zhus pa zhes bya bru theg pa chen po'o//
391a1(mdo sde): mdo//byam+bu po dang po//sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//'di skad bdag gis zos pa dus gcig na/
391a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na ri bya rgod kyi phung po lo dge slong drug khri nyis stong gi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
391a3(mdo sde): po phal cher phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten g+ho khams nas 'dus pa bdun khri nyis stong thams cad kyang mngon par shes pas mngon par shes pa/gzungs rab tu thob pa/
391a4(mdo sde): spobs pa chagos pa med pa/ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob pa/dran pa dang /blo gros dang /rtogs pa dang /mos pa dang /ngo tsha shes pa dang /khrol yod pa phun sum
391a5(mdo sde): tshogs pa/bsam pa rdo rje ltar brtan zhing mi phyed pa/sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa/lhag pa'i bsam pa khyad par du 'phags
391a6(mdo sde): pa la zhugs pa/bdag nyid byang chub kyi sems mi 'dor ba/sems can gzhan byang chub kyi sems yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa/sbyin pa dang /dul ba dang /sdom
391a7(mdo sde): bya dang /nges pa dang /bzod pa dang /sdug pa'i dngos po thams cad yongs su gtong ba dang /yongs su bsngo ba'i cho ga shes pa/lus dang /drugu dang /sems
391b1(mdo sde): dang /tshul khrims kyi rgyan gyis logs par brgyan pAHsems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa dang /bzod pa dang nges pa'i stobs kyi go cha shin tu bgos pa/bskal
391b2(mdo sde): pa bye ba khrig khrig brgya stong phrag grangs med par rtson 'grus shin tu brtsams pa/bsam gtan dang /rnam par thar pa dang /tI nge 'dzin dang /snyoms par 'jug pa
391b3(mdo sde): dang /mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par rol pa/tshig thams cad rab tu dbya ba la spobs pa chags pa med pa'i shes rab dang /ye shes la mkhas pa/
391b4(mdo sde): ri rab kyi ri ltar sems g.yo ba med pa/sa dang /chu dang /me dang /rlung dang /ri ltar rjes su chags pa dang /khong khro ba dang bral ba byams pa chen po la gnas te 'od//
391b5(mdo sde): zer thogs pa med pa/snying rje chen po la gnas te sems can thams cad kyi bya ba gcig la brtson pa/dga' ba chen po la gnas te chos la dga' zhing mgu ba dang ldan
391b6(mdo sde): pa/btang snyoms chen po la gnas par brtson pa/gnyis su med pa'i ye shes rab tu thob pa/'jig rten gyi chos brgyad po rnyed pa dang /me rnyed pa dang /grags
391b7(mdo sde): pa dang /ma grags pa dang /bstod pa dang /smad pa dang /bde ba dang /sdug bsngal las rab tu 'dus pa/phacol rgol ba ngan pa'i tshogs can gyi tshogs thams cad
392a1(mdo sde): kun tu rab tu 'jams pa/bdud dang phyir rgol ba bcom pa/u dum+bA ra'i me tog mthong ba ltar shin tu 'byung bar dka' bru/gsol ba ma btab
392a2(mdo sde): par sems can thams cad la dge ba'i bshes gnyen byed pa/rab tu yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bshes gnyen byed pa/seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa
392a3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo dang mi 'jigs pa sgrogs pa/de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgyas btab pa/mi 'khrugs par phyed par lung ston pa/ji ltar smras pa
392a4(mdo sde): de bzhin byed pa/de kho na'i chos kyi tshul la brtson pa 'od kyis nyi ma dang zla ba mog mgo bor byed pa/phyogs bcur sgra bsgrags pa/sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad
392a5(mdo sde): la sems pa/chos dkon mchog gi mdzod yang dag par 'dzin pa/dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs mi gtsad par yid la byed pa/sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas
392a6(mdo sde): pa 'da' ba la mkhas pa/shin tu rnam par phye ba rnam par 'byed pa gnas pa'i blo dang ldan pa mthong ba dang /thos pa don yod pas rnam par gnon pa/rtag par
392a7(mdo sde): rgyun du sems can yongs su smin par byed pa la brtson pa/shes rab dang thabs la mkhas pa'i mchog thob pa/sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang /
392b1(mdo sde): mchog ma yin pa shes pas ci rigs par chos ston pa/sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa la lta ba'i cho ga la mkhas pa/sems can thams cad kyi 'jug pa dang brtag
392b2(mdo sde): pa la bde blag tu mkhas pa/mi 'jigs pa chen pos 'jigs pa med pa/rga ba dang /na ba dang /'chi ba dang /nyon mongs pa rab tu zhi bar byed pa/sangs rgyas bye
392b3(mdo sde): ba khrag khrig brgya stong dpag tu med pa la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa/mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po yongs su rdzogs pa'i bsod nams dang /ye shes kyi tshogs bsogs
392b4(mdo sde): pa/stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'i chos thams cad la mos pa la/smon pa med pa sems can dang /chos thams cad sgyu ma dang smig rgyu
392b5(mdo sde): dang /rmi lam dang /chu zla dang /mig yor dang /brag ca dang /nam mkha' dang mtshungs par mos pa/sgra skad thams cad nges pa'i tshig gis ston pa'i ye shes la
392b6(mdo sde): mkhas pa/chos dang /don dang nges pa'i tshig dang /spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab kyi dbang po mngon sum du
392b7(mdo sde): gyur pa/shugs chen po 'dzin pa'i stobs bcu la nye bar gyur pa/sha'i mig dang /lha'i mig dang shes rab kyi mig dang /chos kyi mig dang /sangs rgyas kyi
393a1(mdo sde): spyan snang ba thob pa/lam gyi yan lag gi tshogs shin tu bsngags pa'i lam thams cad la 'jug pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa/byang chub sems
393a2(mdo sde): dpa'i sde snod snang ba li 'jug pa'i cho ga shes pa/phyir mi ldog pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba/mtshan nyid kyi phyag brgya'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob pa/
393a3(mdo sde): dkyil 'khor gyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa/chos thams cad la dbang byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin mngon du gyur pa/chos dkon mchog gi skyon
393a4(mdo sde): ma 'dzin pa/sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyud la rnam par lta ba/sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi bsam pa la rnam par lta bar mkhas pa sems
393a5(mdo sde): can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi bya bas so sor nye bar gnas pa rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i yon tan rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan
393a6(mdo sde): pa/bskal pa thams cad du bsngags pa yongs su brjod kyang mthar mi phyin pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' byed
393a7(mdo sde): dang /dga' 'byung dang /lag na rin po che dang /rin chen me tog dang /rin po che'i tog dang /mthong dga' dang /mig gis mthong dga' dang /mdzes pa'i
393b1(mdo sde): blogros dang /dga' zhing mchog tu dga'abyod dang /sa 'dzin dang /spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /mthu chen thob dang /dpal chen dang /bdud thul dang /
393b2(mdo sde): trog man+dA ra ba'i dri dang /rlung lha dang /bdon dga' dang /mnyam lhang ngo /ri rab rtse 'dzin dang /ri rab brtsegs dang /ri rab mchog dang /dra ba can gyi 'od dang /rgyal
393b3(mdo sde): ba'i zla gros dang /skye bar tshim byed dang /'gro ba 'dzin dang lha'i rgyal pos mchod dang /mchog gi blo gros dang thags myed snyems dang /skye rang dro kris dang ma skyo
393b4(mdo sde): pa dang /dpag med rin chen mdzod dang /'od kyi tog po'i 'di dpal dang sman ma'i rgyal po dang /byang chub blo gros dang /'od kyi yang dag brgyan dang /sna tshogs mo ga
393b5(mdo sde): dang /lha'i rgyal po dang /lha'i tshul gyis lta ba dang /dpung bzang dang /legs par bsam pa sems dpa' dang /'khor lo rab gnas rkang pa dang /mi g.yon
393b6(mdo sde): pas rnam par gnon dang /rdo rje'i rkang pas rnam par gnani dang /rkad pas 'jig rten gsum rnam par gnon dang /dga' spobs dang /spobs myur dang /spongs pa
393b7(mdo sde): mi 'chad pa dang /spobs pa byin gyis brlabs dang /'jam sgra dang /sems can thams cad tshi ma byed dang /tshangs dbyangs dang /bzang skyong dang rani chen 'byung gnas
394a1(mdo sde): dang /ded dpon bzang po dang /mes byin dang chu lha dang /byams pa dang 'jam dbyangs dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam
394a2(mdo sde): gzhon nur gyur pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bdun khri nyis stong dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so//gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
394a3(mdo sde): 'di'i brgya byin dang /tshangs pa dang /'jig rten skyong ba dang /de las gzhan pa lha dang klu dang gnod sprin dang /dri za dang lha ma yin dang /nam mkha' lding dang /
394a4(mdo sde): mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang /mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams bcom ldan 'das la lta ba dang /phyag bya ba dang bsnyen bkur ba dang /chos mnyan pa'i phyir//
394a5(mdo sde): 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug go/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i cod pon zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus pa des/byang chub
394a6(mdo sde): sems dpa'i 'khor chen po de 'dus par rig nas stano las langs te/bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag
394a7(mdo sde): btsal te/bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar
394b1(mdo sde): ba btud nas/bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do//'jig rten 'das pa 'jig rten sgron ma mdzad//khyod ni 'jig rten don
394b2(mdo sde): mdzad blo gros ldan//snang ba brnyes shing nyon mongs dri bsal ba//'jig rten snang mdzad khyed la phyag 'tshal lo//sbyin la dgyes shing stobs bcu mchog mnga' ba/
394b3(mdo sde): dul ba 'dul ba gdul ba'i pha rol phyin//bcom ldan lha dang mi dang klus mchod pa//gdul ba'i mthar phyin khyod lo phyag 'tshal lo//mtshan mchog 'gro ba mang
394b4(mdo sde): po'i don mdzad pa//mdom gang 'od ni gser gyi kha dog lta//dge bo'i mtshan gyi dam pa'i gzugs mngo' bo//srid gsum mtshungs med khyod la phyag 'tshal lo///
394b5(mdo sde): pha rol phyin pas gzhan gyi tshogs 'joms shing //pha rol rgol ba'i rgol 'joms mi g.yo ba//sems can gzhan gyi sems dang spyod la mkhas//thugs rje
394b6(mdo sde): mchog monga' khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//dgra bcom rgyal po nyon mongs rdul bsal ba//'tsho bdag cing brtul zhugs tshul khrims gnas//lha yi lha mchog tri
394b7(mdo sde): med dri ma bral//pha rol tshogs 'joms khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//bde gshegs rin chen mchog tu dga' mdzad pa//dgon par rtag gnas rtag tu dgon par dgyes//
395a1(mdo sde): rdul skyon gti mug rnyog pa mi mnga' ba//nam mkha' mnyam thugs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//chu bo bani rgal bden bzhi bka' mchid gsung //
395a2(mdo sde): mig sbyin bdud rtsi chos kyi dka' mchod can//'gro ba'i don mdzad 'jig rten gsum rgyug/'khor lo zhabs mnga' khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//lha dang mis mchod
395a3(mdo sde): pa yi mthu bo che//mgon po lha yi dbang po bdud 'joms pa//mi dang lha klu tshogs kyis mchod pa yi//mi mchog dmo pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//rtag tu bde
395a4(mdo sde): sdug dam pa'i chos la dgyes//mnyam thugs 'gro ba kun la byams pa'i thugs//chos la mnyam gnas mi rnams kha lo sgyur//yon tan mthar phyin khyod
395a5(mdo sde): laM phyag 'tshal lo//snyan pa'i sgra dbyangs rnam par dag dang ldan//tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs lta bur 'jam pa'i gsung //thams cad dbyangs kyi yan log gsung
395a6(mdo sde): tshul rdzogs//bden pa snyan gsung khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//stong pa mtshan ma med cing smon dang bral//zab mo blta dka' shin tu rtogs par dka'//thar
395a7(mdo sde): lo 'jug par mkhas pa blo gros ldan//thar pa'i lam dgyes khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//rgyu la brten pa mkhas pa'i bcom ldan 'das//mtha' gnyis lta ba
395b1(mdo sde): rtag tu mi mnga' ba//las kyi rnam smin 'bras bu kho na gsung //lha yi mun bral khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//gang nas ma byon gang du'ang gra shogs ma lags//rtag
395b2(mdo sde): tu dben pa'i chos rnams rab gsung ba/smig rgyu rgyu bzhin nga yi mi mnga' ba//dge ba'i chos tshul khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//skye ba mi skye gang du'ang skye ma lags/
395b3(mdo sde): skye dang 'jig dang gang du'ang mi bas pa//chos kyi gnas nyid ji lta'i gnas la gnas//gnas la mi gnas rgyul la phyag 'tshal lo//de bzhin kho na de bzhin
395b4(mdo sde): yong dag gsung //rtag tu mi g.yo de bzhin nyid la bzhugs//ri rab rgyal mtshan rdo rje 'dra ba'i sku//mi g.yo ri rab mtshungs la phyag 'tshal lo//sku ni dben
395b5(mdo sde): zhing mnyam thugs blo ldan pa//grags pa mtha' yas 'jig rten gsum grags pa//skyes bu mchog lu zhu ba zhus pa rnams//'jig rten zla bas myur du skabs
395b6(mdo sde): dbyar gsol//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i cod pan gyis tshu lo dang mthun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la
395b7(mdo sde): mngon par bstod nas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gis zhus pa lung bstan pa'i slad du/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
396a1(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis skabs dbye ba rAg na na bcom ldan 'das la bdag phyogasu 'ga' zhug zhu'o// ces gsol pa dang /
396a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i cod pan la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dag
396a3(mdo sde): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang /ngas dri ba dris pa de dang de'i lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o//
396a4(mdo sde): de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i cod pan gyis bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes gsol te/bcom ldan
396a5(mdo sde): 'das kyi ltar nyan cing bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' spongs pa sna tshogs kyi rgyan dang ldan pa
396a6(mdo sde): rnams lags/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos zab mo rnam par gdon mi ze ba la 'jug pa shes pa la mkhas pa rnams lags/ji ltar na byang chub
396a7(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang mchog ma lags pa shes pa la mkhas pa rnams lags/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' so so
396b1(mdo sde): ci rigs par chos ston pa la mkhas pa rnams lags/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad la sems kyi bsam pa mnyam zhing spyod pa shes pa
396b2(mdo sde): la 'jug par mkhas pa rnams lags/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i rgyu dang dbye ba dang /las kyi rnam par smin pa la 'jug pa shes pa la brjod pa ma mchis
396b3(mdo sde): par spyod pa rnams lags/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams lags/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims kyi rgyan gyis
396b4(mdo sde): brgyan pa rnams lags/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams lags/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus kyi rgyan gyis
396b5(mdo sde): brgyan pa rnams lags/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bsam gton gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams lags/ji ltar no byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi rgyan
396b6(mdo sde): gyis brgyan pa rnams lags/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshangs pa'i lam la mkhas pa rnams lags/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mngon par shes
396b7(mdo sde): pa las mi nyams pa rnams legs/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba rnams lags/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rgal nas pha rol
397a1(mdo sde): /ShAT+Tam gnas pa rnams myags//rbo b+hA na byad ts+tshanga? m+b+has dpa' nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgya sku thams cadra bAg+sa tA sems ca nub mas h+ya ta
397a2(mdo sde): spyod lam yId smyon pa marmongs pa spyod par yang rnam par miN+Dots+tsha byaM rnams lags/rIni byang chub sems dpa' 'kho ba la 'dr-i m+b+ha kha~M dun sa
397a3(mdo sde): 'das pa la 'ang mi gnas pa rnams legs/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' khams sna tshogaso la'ang rnam par lta la chos kyi dbyings las kyang mi ga yo
397a4(mdo sde): ba rnams lags/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' don yong mi 'dor la gnod par yang kun tu gda' ba rnams lags/ji lce ro na byang chub som sad pa'
397a5(mdo sde): bsod nams kyi nor dang ldan lo thabs kyi sku nor ma mchis pa rnams lags/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' A zhes bgyi ba'i sgos rnam pa ma mchis
397a6(mdo sde): pa'i sgor 'jug pa rnams legs/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon sum du 'gyur ba rnams legs/ji ltar na byang
397a7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' chos rnam par gdon mi za ba rnams la rnam par phye ba/shin tu rnam par 'byed pa rnams lags/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'jig
397b1(mdo sde): nargyu bya ba dang mthun bu na zhugs kyang rte mongs pa thams cad kyis mAM gos rnams lags/
397b2(mdo sde): shAn tu rdul zhi du mi 'khrugs pa'i chos can rnams logs/ji ltar na byang chumase mas dpa' chos rnami skyo blangs pa myA mchi sa par sgo dpyo nA rnams legs/
397b3(mdo sde): mA ra ni byib tu m+b+has dpa' sems can thams cad kyi ston par gyur pa rnams legs//ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgya mas cad kyi chos kyi 'kho
397b4(mdo sde): rjes su bskor pa rnams legs/ji ltar ni byang chub sems da ma'i sangs rgyas kyi chos thams tsa lo dbang bskur ba tho pa rnams lcags/de skad tsa s+yai gso ba dang /
397b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po lha'i cod pan la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste/rigs kyi bre lcags so legs so//rigs kyi bu
397b6(mdo sde): khyod skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang /skye bo phal po che'i don dang /lho dang mi rnams la phan pa dang /'de//
398a1(mdo sde): ba'i phyir zhugs pa dang /rigs kyi bu khyod da lhur gyi dang /ma 'ongs pa'i sems can rnams rjes su gzung ba dang /theg pa chen po 'di lun
398a2(mdo sde): ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir/rigs kyi bu khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la gang don 'di yongs su 'dri bar sems pa ni legs so//rigs kyi bu de'i phyir shin tu legs
398a3(mdo sde): par nyon la yid la gzung zhig dang ngas khyod la bshad do//bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol nas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i
398a4(mdo sde): cod pan bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan
398a5(mdo sde): na spobs pa sna tshogs kyi rgyan dang ldan pa rnams yin no//bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste/sems can thams cad la 'od zer thogs pa med pa rnams rin po che dang
398a6(mdo sde): sdug pa'i dngos po thams cad yongs su btang zhing yid 'gyod pa med pa rnams yin/chos smra ba gzhan dag gis bshad pa mi zlog cing rjes su yi rang ste dga' ba
398a7(mdo sde): dang /mgu ba dang /dang ba dang mchog tu dga' ba thob nas legs so zhes bya ba sbyin pa dang /chos mnyan pa 'am/chos bgro ba 'am/de bzhin gshegs pa'i
398b1(mdo sde): mchod rten gyi phyir rA ma/mtshan mo 'dug par bskul na mchog tu dga' ba dang ldan pa dang /byang chub kyi sems kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa dang /zang zing med pa'i sems
398b2(mdo sde): kyi chos kyi sbyin pa byin ste/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di bzhi dang ldan na spobs pa sna tshogs rgyan dang ldan pa rnams yin no//rigs kyi bu byang chub
398b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na chos zab mo rnam par gdon mi za ba la 'jug pa shes pa la mkhas pa rnams yin no//bzhi gang zhe na/rten cing 'brel por 'byung ba
398b4(mdo sde): dang rjes su mthun pa dang /bdag gi rang bzhin ltar sems can thams cad kyi rang bzhin rtogs pa dang /'du byed thams cad gar yang mi 'gro//gang nas kyang ma 'ongs
398b5(mdo sde): par rab tu shes pa dang /chos thams cad nam mkha'i phyag rgyas btab par mos pa ste/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di bzhi dang ldan na chos zab mo rnam
398b6(mdo sde): pur gdon mi za ba la 'jug pa shes pa la mkhas pa rnams yin no//rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i chos bzhi dang ldan na sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog
398b7(mdo sde): dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa la mkhas pa rnams yin no//bzhi gang zhe na/chos kyi dbyings kyi sgo shin tu sbyangs pa dang /sgrib pa myed pa'i sgo mngon sum du gyur pa dang //
399a1(mdo sde): mngon par shes pas rnam par rdzob shes pa dang /sems las su rung zhing ting nge 'dzin phun sum tshogs pa ste/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'/
399a2(mdo sde): chos 'di bzhi drung ldan na sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang /mchog ma yin pa shes pa la mkhas pa rnams yin no//rigs kyi bu byang chub sems
399a3(mdo sde): dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na so so ci rigs par chos ston pa la mkhas pa rnams yin no//bzhi gang zhe na/so so yang dag par rig pa shes pa dang /sems
399a4(mdo sde): can gzung ba shes pa dang /chos rab tu rnam par 'byeng ba'i shes pa dang /bdag gis sems sbyangs pas sems can thams cad kyi sems sbyangs par rab tu
399a5(mdo sde): shes pa ste/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di bzhi dang ldan na so so ci rigs par chos ston pa la mkhas pa rnams yin no//rigs kyi bu byang chub
399a6(mdo sde): sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na sems can thams cad la sems kyi bsam pa mnyam zhing spyod pa shes pa la 'jug par mkhas pa rnams yin no//bzhi gang
399a7(mdo sde): zhe na/shes rab kyis 'dzud pa dang /ye shes chags pa med pa dang /thabs kyis zhugs pas sgrib pa thams cad rgyun bcad pa dang /blo shin tu sbyangs pa ste/
399b1(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di bzhi dang ldan na sems can thams cad la sems kyi bsam pa mnyam zhing /spyod pa shes pa la 'jug par mkhas pa rnams
399b2(mdo sde): yin no//rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na rgyu dang /bya ba dang las kyi rnam par smin pa la 'jug par shes pa la brjed pa med par spyod pa rnams
399b3(mdo sde): yin no//bzhi gang zhe na/chad par smra ba ma yin pa dang /rtag par smra ba ma yin pa dang /rgyu dang bya ba dang las kyi 'bras bu la yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du 'jug pa
399b4(mdo sde): dang /chos la chos nyid du byed cing chos la chos su sma'i 'di la bdag dang bdag gir mi smra ba ste/de ltar bya ba la 'jug pas rgyu dang bya ba dang las kyi 'bras bu ma rung
399b5(mdo sde): bar mi byed pa ste/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di bzhi dang ldan na/rgyu dang bya ba dang las kyi rnam par smin pa la 'jug pa shes pa la brjed pa med par spyod
399b6(mdo sde): pa rnams yin no//rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na sbyin pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams yin no//bzhi gang zhe na/mtshan gyis legs par
399b7(mdo sde): brgyan pa rnams yin/dpe byad bzang pos rnam par smras pa rnams yin/gzugs lta bas mi ngoms pa rnams yin/lag na rin po che thob pas longs spyod mi
400a1(mdo sde): zad pa ste/rigs kyi byang chub sems dpa' chos 'dra bzhi dang ldan na sbyin pa'i rgyun gyis brgyan pa rnams yin no//rigs kyi hU~M byang chub sems dpa'
400a2(mdo sde): chos bzhi dang ldan ni/tshul khrims kyi rgyun gyi brgyan pa rnams yin no//bzhi gang zhe ni/'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur zhing byang chub kyi sems kyis brgyan
400a3(mdo sde): pa dang /lha'i dbang po brgya byin du 'gyur zhing byang chub kyi sems kyis brgyan pa dang /mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs par 'gyur zhing byang chub kyi sems kyis brgyan
400a4(mdo sde): pa dang /ngan 'gro thams cad yang dag par bcad nas lha dang mir skye ba yongs su bzung bar gyur cing byang chub kyi sems kyis brgyan pa yin te/rigs kyi bu byang
400a5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' chos 'di bzhi dang ldan na tshul khrims kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams su rig par bya'o//rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na bzod
400a6(mdo sde): pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams yin no//bzhi gang zhe na/tshangs pa'i skad dang sgra dbyangs lta bu dang ldan pa rnams yon/ka la ping ka'i sgra dang /rnga sgra lta bu
400a7(mdo sde): dang ldan pa rnams yin/skye bo mang pos mthong na sdug cing yid du 'ong ba rnams yin/dge ba'i chos rnams la yi dam la brtan pa rnams yin te/rigs
400b1(mdo sde): kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos 'dri bzhi dang ldan na bzod pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams su rig par bya'o//rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan no
400b2(mdo sde): brtson 'grus kyi rgyan gyis brgyan par rig par bya'o//bzhi gang zhe na/dam bcos pa nyams 'og tu chud por bya ba'i cho ga shes pos dge ba'i chos rnams la yi dam la
400b3(mdo sde): brtan pa rnams yin/pha rol gyis mnan pa med pas rdo rje'i lus rab tu thob pa rnams yin/bya ba ci yo ces bya ba la mos pas gsol ba ma btab par sems can
400b4(mdo sde): thams cad la dge ba'i bshes gnyen byed pa rnams yin/thos pa'i tshogs bsags pas mi ngomos pa'i phyir yid yongs su mi skyo ba rnams yin te/rigs kyi bu byang
400b5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' chos 'di bzhi dang ldan na/brtson 'grus kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams su rig par bya'o//rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na
400b6(mdo sde): sam gtan gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams yin no//bzhi gang zhe na/mi rgod pa rnams yin/ma khengs pa rnams yin/mu cor smra ba med pa rnams yin/cang
400b7(mdo sde): shes kyi sems mi 'dor ba rnams yin te/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di bzhi dang ldan na bsam gtan gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams yin no//rigs
401a1(mdo sde): kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na shes rab kyi rgyun gyis brgyan pa rnams yin no//bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste/bdag dang sems
401a2(mdo sde): can dang /srog dang gso ba dang /skyes bu dang gang zag tu sme ba med pa rnams yin/spongs pa chags pa med pa rnams yin/tshig thams cad rab tu dbye ba bstun
401a3(mdo sde): pa shes pa la mkhas pa rnams yin/chos thams cad la som nyi med cing the tshom dang bral ba rnams yin te/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di bzhi
401a4(mdo sde): dang ldan na shes rab kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams yin no//rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na tshangs po'i lam la mkhas pa rnams yin no//
401a5(mdo sde): bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste/sems can thams cad kyi dpung gnyen byi ba'i phyir mngon par bsgrubs pa'i byams pa dang /sems can thams cad yongs su smin par
401a6(mdo sde): bya ba'i phyir mngon par bsgrubs pa'i snying rje chen po dang /chos thams cad lo dga' bas mngon par bsgrubs pa'i dga' ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shis kyi
401a7(mdo sde): phyir mngon par bsgrubs pa'i btang snyoms te/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di bzhi dang ldan na tshangs pa'i lam la mkhas pa rnams yin no//rigs
401b1(mdo sde): kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na mngon par shes pa las mi nyams pa rnams yin no//bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste/bsam gtan bzhi sdud pa'i
401b2(mdo sde): shes pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi bsgrubs pa'i thabs shes pa dang /rang gi sems la dbang sgyur ba'i chos shes pa dang /srangs
401b3(mdo sde): rgyas la blta ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas par 'gro ba ste/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di bzhi dang ldan na mngon par shes pa las mi nyams
401b4(mdo sde): pa rnams yin no//rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba rnams yin no//bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste/nang
401b5(mdo sde): par zhu ba dang /phyi rol du mi rgyu ba dang /chos thams cad la sgyu ma lta bu rab tu rtog pa'i shes pa dang /ye shes kyi stobs can yin gyi nyon mongs pa'i stobs can
401b6(mdo sde): ma yin pa ste/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di bzhi dang ldan na g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba rnams yin no//rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos
401b7(mdo sde): bzhi dang ldan na rgal nas pha rol thang la gnas pa rnams yin no//bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste/'dod pa'i chu bo'ang rab tu shes la 'dod chags dang bral ba'ang mngon
402a1(mdo sde): sum du mi byed pa dang /srid pa'i chu bo'ang rab tu shes la bsams bzhin du'ang skye ba dang /lta ba'i chu bo'ang rab tu shes la lta ba'i bcings pas
402a2(mdo sde): bcings pa'ang mi 'dor ba dong /mi rig pa'i chu ba rab tu shes la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i rjes su mthun par yang byed pa ste/rigs kyi bu byang chub
402a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' chos 'di bzhi dang ldan na rgal nas pha rol thang la gnas pa rnams yin no//rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na nyan thos dang
402a4(mdo sde): rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang /sems can thams cad kyi spyod lam yang ston la mtshungs par spyod pa'ong rnam par mi rtog pa rnams yin no//bzhi gang zhe na 'di
402a5(mdo sde): lta ste/sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu yongs su bsgrubs pa dang /chos thams cad rnam par bsgrubs pas so sor nye bar gnas pa'i mtshan nyid du shin tu
402a6(mdo sde): brtags pa dang mngon par shes pa lngas rnam par rtse ba shes pa dang ldan pa dang /yid kyi lus mngon par bsgrubs pa la mkhas pa ste/rigs kyi bu byang chub
402a7(mdo sde): sems dpa' chos 'di bzhi dang ldan na nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang /sems can thams cad kyi spyod lam yang ston la mtshungs par spyod par
402b1(mdo sde): yang rnam par mi rtog pa rnams yin no//rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na 'khor ba la'ang lta la mya ngan las 'das pa la'ang mi granas pa rnams yin
402b2(mdo sde): no//bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs dang /snying rje chen po'i sems dang /thabs la mkhas pa dang /sngon gyi yi dam mi 'dor ba ste/rigs/
402b3(mdo sde): kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na 'khor pa la'ang lha la mya ngan las 'das pa'ang mi gnas pa rnams yin no//rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'
402b4(mdo sde): chos bzhi dang ldan na khams sna tshogs la'ang rnam par lta la chos kyi dbyings las kyang mi g.yo'o//bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste/sems can rang bzhin med pas chos
402b5(mdo sde): rang bzhin med par rtog pa dang /chos rang bzhin med pas sems can+do rang bzhin med par rtog pa dang /sems can rang bzhin med pas sangs rgyas kyi chos rang bzhin
402b6(mdo sde): med par mos pa dang /sems can rang bzhin med pa la som nyi med cing the tshom dang bral ba yin te/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpal chos 'di bzhi dang ldan na khams
402b7(mdo sde): sna tshogs la'ang rnam par lta la chos kyi dbyings las kyang mi g.yo'o//rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na don yang mi 'dor la gnod par yang
403a1(mdo sde): kun tu snang ngo //bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/bsam pa mya ngan las 'das par song ba rnams yin/sbyor ba 'khor bar song ba rnams yin/sangs rgyas
403a2(mdo sde): kyi chos thams cad yongs su bskang ba la bsam pa song ba rnams yin/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi yul lo'ang kun tu snang ba rnams yin te/rigs kyi bu
403a3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di bzhi dang ldan na don yang mi 'dor la gnod par yang kun tu snang ngo //rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na bstod
403a4(mdo sde): noms kyis nor dang ldan la thabs kyi nor med pa rnams yin no//bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste/rgya chen po la mos pa'i sems can 'dul ba'i phyir bsod nams kyis
403a5(mdo sde): 'khor los sgyur ba dang /brgya byin dang tshangs pa'i bsod nams kyang nye bar ston pa dang /'gro ba phul pa 'dul ba'i phyir dbul zhing dman par yang nye bar snyam pa dang /
403a6(mdo sde): slong ba mthong na bdog pa thams cad gtong zhing /nor med par yang 'gyur ba dang /nor chen po dang ldan pa mthong na bsod nams kyis longs spyod zad mi shes par yang
403a7(mdo sde): nye bar ston pa ste/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di bzhi dang ldan na bsod nams kyis nor dang ldan pa yin la/thabs kyis nor med po rnams yin no//rigs
403b1(mdo sde): byang chub skyems dpa' chos pa'i dang ldan na sa zhes byu ba'i smos rnam pa myed pa'i sgrol 'jug pa rnams yin na//bzhi gang zhan 'di lta ste/'du byed thams da mi d+h+yan
403b2(mdo sde): par shes pa skyong ba dang /'du byed thams cad garjod mo nas sdug bsngal lo zhes byang chub rab tu rnyed pa dang /chos thams cad bdag med de zhes lta bar gyur pa yongs su sbyong
403b3(mdo sde): dang /mya ngan las 'das pa ni gzod ma nas zhi ba zhes ye shes la 'jug pa ste/rags kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di ba'i dang ldan na/a zhes bya ba'i sgos rnam pa
403b4(mdo sde): med pa'i'o sgo la 'jug pa rnams yin no//rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon sum du 'gyur ba yin no//bzhi gang
403b5(mdo sde): zhe na 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi mig shin tu rnam par dag pa rnams yin/chos kyi mig gis snang ba thob po rnams yin/sangs rgyas kyi spyan mngon sum du gyur pa rnam
403b6(mdo sde): yin/sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la dbang bsrung bathob pa rnams yin te/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos 'dri bzhi dang ldan na sangs rgyas kyi rjes thams cad
403b7(mdo sde): mngon sum du 'gyur ba rnams yin no//rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' tshas pani dang ldan no/chos rnam par gdon mi za ba rnams la rnam par phye ba shin tu rnam papa byed
404a1(mdo sde): pa rnams yin no//bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste so so yang dag par rig pa shes pa sgrib pa med pa dang /badren pa rnam par dgod pa shes pa dang /rton pa la
404a2(mdo sde): gnas su shes pa dang /gzungs la g.yeng ba med par shes pa ste/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di bzhi dang ldan na chos rnam par gdon mi za ba rnams la
404a3(mdo sde): rnam par phye ba shin tu rnam par 'byed pa rnams yin no//rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na 'jig rten gyi bya ba dang mthun par zhugs kyang nyon mongs pa
404a4(mdo sde): thams cad kyis mi gos pa rnams yin no//bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste 'jig rten gyi chos mngon sum du gyur pa dang /'jig rten las sems can yang dag par sgrol ba
404a5(mdo sde): dang /rjes su chags pa dang /khong khro ba spong ba dang /gzod ma nas rnam par dag cing 'od gsal bas kyang rang bzhin gyis nyon mongs pa med pa yin te/rigs kyi bu
404a6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di bzhi dang ldan na 'jig rten gyi bya ba dang mthun par zhugs kyang nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis mi gos pa rnams yin no//rigs kyi bu byang chub
404a7(mdo sde): sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na gzhan dag gis bltar mi mthong ba'i chos kyi dbang phyug rnams yin no//bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/sems kyi dbang phyug dang /shes
404b1(mdo sde): rab kyi dbang phyug dang /ye shes kyi dbang phyug dang /thabs kyi dbang phyug ste/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di bzhi dang ldan na gzhan dag gis bltar mi mthong ba'i chos
404b2(mdo sde): kyi dbang phyug rnams yin no//rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang mi 'brel ba rnams yin no//bzhi gang zhe na 'di
404b3(mdo sde): lha ste/sems can rnams sangs rgyas mthong ba yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang /sems can rnams chos nyan pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang /sems can rnams byang chub
404b4(mdo sde): kyi sems yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang /sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang mi 'bral ba yin te/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di bzhi dang ldan na de
404b5(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba rnams yin no//rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na shin tu dul zhing mi 'khrugs pa'i chos can rnams yin no//
404b6(mdo sde): bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/'phags pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab kyis rnam par grol ba ye shes mthong ba mngon sum du gyur pa dang /bden pa la nye bar brtags pas
404b7(mdo sde): chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin pa dang /bag chags kyi mtshan ma sbyor ba thams cad yang dge bar gcod pa la mkhas par gyur pa dang /nyon mongs pas mi 'khrugs pa'i
405a1(mdo sde): chos can te/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na shin tu rdul zhing ma 'khrugs pa'i chos can rnams yin no//rigs kyi bu byang chub
405a2(mdo sde): sems dpa' chos bani dang ldan na chos rnams blangs pa med par slob dpon rnams yin no//bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste/sems can thams cad la phan pa'i dngos po phun
405a3(mdo sde): sum tshogs pa rnams yin/sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la brtan zhing bsam pad+ma med pa rnams yin/badr-i g+h+ra gis bde ba la mi chags pa rnams yin/gang yi
405a4(mdo sde): shes yongs su tshol ba de'ang sems can thams cad kyi ched du yin gyi bdag 'ba' zhig go phyir ma yin pa ste/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di bzhi dang ldan na
405a5(mdo sde): chos rnams blangs pa med par slob dpon rnams yin no//rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na sems can thams cad kyi rton par gyur pa rnams yin no//
405a6(mdo sde): babazhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste/bdag gi don btang zhing gzhan gyi don byed po rnams yin/bdag gi bde ba thams cad gtong zhing sems can rnams la chos kyi bde ba sbyin pa rnams
405a7(mdo sde): yin/ji ltar thos pa'i chos ston pa la ngal ba med pa rnams yin/chos kyi 'tsho bas 'tsho yi zang zing gis 'tsho ba ma yin pa ste/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos
405b1(mdo sde): 'di bzhi dang ldan na sems can thams cad kyi rton par gyur pa rnams yin no//rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi de ldan no/sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor
405b2(mdo sde): lo rjes su bskor ba rnams yin no//bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste/gzungs rab tu thob pa dang /spobs pa rgyun mi chad pa dang /sems can gyi bsam pa shes pa la 'jug pa dang /
405b3(mdo sde): mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam du khrid cing mi phyed pa'i chos ston pa yin te/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di bzhi dang ldan na sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo rjes
405b4(mdo sde): su bskor ba rnams yin no//rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la dbang bskur ba thob pa rnams yin no//bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste/
405b5(mdo sde): spyod pa thams cad las rab tu 'das pa rnams yin/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa las mi ldog cing mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob pa rnams yin/bsams bzhin du tshe dang /'chi/
405b6(mdo sde): 'pho dang /skye ba'ang ston la phyir mi ldog pa'i phyag rgyas kyang btab pa rnams yin/de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya la yang dag par gzhol zhing sa bcur nges par byung na/sa nas
405b7(mdo sde): sar 'phar ba la mkhas pa yin te/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di bzhi dang ldan na sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la dbang bskur ba thob pa rnams yin no//bcom
406a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bzhi pa bsgrub pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos nas snang ba
406a2(mdo sde): chen pos kyang 'jig rten gyi khams khyab par gyur to//steng gi bar snang las lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis lha'i glu dbyangs rlangs te/lha'i me tog mAn+d+ha ra ba'i char rab tu pa'i nas
406a3(mdo sde): 'di skad ces kye ma'o bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ban pa bsgrub pa'i/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
406a4(mdo sde): las bstan pa 'di ni bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa nas bsgrubs pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das gang bzhi pasgrub pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan pa dang /mnyan nas
406a5(mdo sde): mos pa dang /mos nas 'dzin pa dang /'chang ba dang klog pa dang /kun chub par bgyid pa dang /gzhan dag la'ang ston pa dang /byang chub kyi sems dang mi 'bral pa'i sems
406a6(mdo sde): can de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba/ngan ngon dang ldan pa ma lags te/de dag ni ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas da ltar seng ge'i
406a7(mdo sde): sgra sgrog pa bzhin du lha dang mi dang /lha ma yin gyi 'jig rten gyi mdun du seng ge'i sgra sgrog par 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang bzhi pa sgrub pa'i chos kyi rnam
406b1(mdo sde): grangs 'di thos pas rnyed pa legs par rnyed do//zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do//bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhi pa bsgrub pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/lha dang
406b2(mdo sde): myi'i srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong ni/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so//byang chub sems dpa' khri nyis stong ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu
406b3(mdo sde): thob par gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpo' chen po lha'i cod pan gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'odas gang dag de bzhin
406b4(mdo sde): gshegs po/yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di 'dzin pa dang /gzhan dag la rgya cher rab tu ston pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dgra chos du dang ldan
406b5(mdo sde): par 'gyur/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di 'dzin pa dang /gzhan
406b6(mdo sde): dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par ston pa'i/byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni chos brgyad dang ldan par 'gyur ro//brgyad gang zhe na/'di lta ste/de dag yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
406b7(mdo sde): byang chub la bsam pa nges te/bsam pa phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba dang /sems can thams cad la zhe sdang ba'i sems med de/shin tu byams pa bsgom pa bsgoms par
407a1(mdo sde): 'gyur ba dang /sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba la gnas te/snying rje chen po la gnas par 'gyur ba dang /chos 'dod de chos don dugacung /
407a2(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ba dang /thos pa tshol bas mi ngoms te mtsho chen rgya mtsho lta bur 'gyur ba dang /lus dang srog 'dor zhing dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang /bsod
407a3(mdo sde): nams kyi tshogs bsags te/dge ba'i rtsa ba brtan par 'gyur ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi phyin gyi brlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs te smon lam gyis yang dag par byung bar 'gyur ba
407a4(mdo sde): dang /'khor gyi nang du 'jigs pa med pas bdud dang phyir/rgol ba bcom par 'gyur ba ste/rigs kyi bu gang de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i
407a5(mdo sde): mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di 'dzin pa dang /gzhan dag la rgya cher ston pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni chos brgyad po 'di dag dang ldan par 'gyur ro//de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas
407a6(mdo sde): rgya mthus stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur to//stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'drin gang dag sa
407a7(mdo sde): phyogs mamo dma' can dang /ri nag po dang /chu mig dang /mtsho dang lteng ka dang /rgya mtsho chen po de dag thams cad mi snang bar gyur to//sa chen po 'di thams cad kyang
407b1(mdo sde): lagA mthil ltar mnyam par gnas par gyur to//chun gnas pa'i sems can rnams la'ang gnod pa med par gyur to//stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di
407b2(mdo sde): na shing snyam gang dag lo brgya lon pa de dag thams cad las kyang me tog dang /'bris bu sna tshogs skyes par gyur nas/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su btud mngon par
407b3(mdo sde): brgyad nas phyag 'tshal bar gyur to//de ma yin pa shing gzhan thams cad las kyang me tig dang /'bras bu sna tshogs skyes nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su btud
407b4(mdo sde): mngon par btud nas phyag 'tshal bar gyur to//sa chen po las pad+ma tshad shing rta'i 'khor lo tsam sna tshogs blta ni sdug pa kho dog dang ldan pa dri dang ldan pa yid du 'ong ba skyes so//snang ba chen
407b5(mdo sde): pos kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di gsal bar gyur to//mi snang zhing ma dkrol bar steng gi bar snang las lha'i sal snyan dang /glu dbyangs kyi sgra byung skye
407b6(mdo sde): grags par gyur to//ri'i rgyal po grangs can dang /ri'i rgyal po spos kyi ngad ldang las kyang lha'i me tog sna tshogs sngon dri mi mnam po rnams kyang mchog gi dri langs par gyur to/
407b7(mdo sde): drides stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir dri zhim po bsnam par gyur to//ri'i rgyal po gangs can dang /ri'i rgyal po spos kyi rad ldang de las me tog gi cher chen
408a1(mdo sde): po bab ste/de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gang na ba der mngon par babs nas sa chen po 'dir me tog gi tshar de dag gis pus mo man cad
408a2(mdo sde): nub par gyur to//me tog gi shing de dag las me tog sna tshogs kyi char rab tu 'bab cing /sil snyan dang /glu dbyangs sna tshogs kyi sgra dag kyang byung ngo //steng gi bar snang
408a3(mdo sde): lo rin po che sna tshogs kyi gdugs dpag tshad brgya stong phrag bcu'i tshad tsam kun tu gnas par gyur to//rin po che'i gledugs de las mu tig gi do shal dang /ri ni
408a4(mdo sde): po che'i dril bu ga yer ka'i dril bu sna tshogs kyi dra bo 'phyang bar gyur to//dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba'i sgo yid du 'ong ba/yid dga' bar byed pa/chags par byed pa des
408a5(mdo sde): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dri go bar byas par gyur to//de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
408a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das dga' bar bgyid pa/mgu bar bgyid pa'i mtshan ma rgya chen po 'di lta bu 'di dang /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rgyan thams
408a7(mdo sde): cad kyis brgyan par gyur pa dga' ba 'di su'i snga ltas lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ri'i bu 'di ni mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po ni spos kyi ngad ldang
408b1(mdo sde): nas 'khor mo 'am ci stong phrag du mA dang 'khor dri za stong phrag du ma dang /'khor lha stong phrag du ma dang bcas te 'ong ba der snga ltas so//de skad gsungs ma thug tu de nas skad cig
408b2(mdo sde): de la mi 'am ci'i rgyal ze sdong po sil snyan dang /glu dbyangs len pa brgyad khri ngan snying dang /'khor ba rgya snong du mas bskor nas steng ga bar snang la me tog gi rkun po'i char
408b3(mdo sde): 'bebs shing /bcom ldan 'das gul ba dang 'ongs te phyin nas 'khor dang bcas pas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhangs la phyag btsal te/bcom ldan 'das le lan gsum
408b4(mdo sde): bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po bdag nyid kyis pi lcang gi khog pa bai DUr+ya las dris
408b5(mdo sde): pa/dzam+bu'i gling gi gser gyi sa ba le'u can/sa la sbram dang /nor bu dang /rin po che du mas smras pa/sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pas yongs su sbyangs po byungs te/seMl
408b6(mdo sde): sman brgyad khri ba ni stong po de dag dang lhan cig tu grag par byed do//mi 'om ci'i rgyus po sdong pos pi wang de zangs ma thag tu de nas pi ling gi sgra des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
408b7(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs kyis go bar gyur to//pi wang gi sgra des 'dod pa na spyod pa'i rgyud kyi sgra dang /glu'i sgra dang /lha'i glu dbyangs kyi sgra rnams zil gyis mnan te mi
409a1(mdo sde): gsal bar gyur to//de nas pi wang gi sgra bskul bas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis/lha'i rol mo bor te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so//
409a2(mdo sde): mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos pi wang de blangs ma thag tu de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i shing dang /ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang /grangs can dang /
409a3(mdo sde): spos kyi ngad ljang dang bting bzung dang /btang bzung chen po dang /de ma yin pa gzhan ri nag po rnams dang /rtswa dang shing gel pa dang sman dang /nags tshal ji snyed pa de dag
409a4(mdo sde): thams cad ldeg/rab tu ldeg/kun tu rab tu ldeg go/g.yo rab tu g.yo/kun tu rab tu g.yo'o//'gul rab tu 'gul/kun tu rab tu 'gul lo//'di lta ste dper
409a5(mdo sde): na chang gis ra ro ba'i mi 'khyer/rab tu 'khyor/kun tu rab tu 'khyor ba de bzhin du shing de dag thams cad dang /ri thams cad kyang 'dud/rab tu 'dud/kun tu rab tu
409a6(mdo sde): 'dud do///bam po gnyis pa//mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos pi lcang khog pa bai DUr+ya las byas pa blangs ma thag tu/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor
409a7(mdo sde): kyi dkyil 'khor der 'dus pa'i nang nas phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ma gtogs par 'dod chags dang bral ba'i dge slong dang /dge slong me dang /dge bsnyen
409b1(mdo sde): dang dge bsnyen ma dang /lha drang klu dang gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang lha ma yin dang /nam mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang /brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang /'jig/
409b2(mdo sde): rten skyong ba dang mi dang mi ma yin pa dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa'i dgra bcom pa dang /thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyis po wang gi sgra de thos pa dang /pi/
409b3(mdo sde): wang gi sgra de ma bzod nas rang rang gi stan las langs te 'dar/rab tu 'drar kun tu rab tu 'dar ro//'dud rab tu 'dud/kun tu rab tu 'dud do//gar byed rab tu gar byed/kun
409b4(mdo sde): tu rab tu gar byed do//nyan thos chen po de dag thams cad kyang rang rang gi stan la mi dga' ste/'gul/rab tu 'gul zhing spyod lam yang 'khrugs nas byis pa chung ngu bzhin du
409b5(mdo sde): gar byed pa lta bur ston to//de nas byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan gyis nyan thos chen po de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces smos so//tshe dang ldan pa nyan thos chen po dag nyon
409b6(mdo sde): mongs pa dang bral ba/rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa bden pa bzhi mthong bar gyur pa yin na/ci'i phyir rang gi lus 'jog par mi nus shing /tshe dang ldan pa dag byis
409b7(mdo sde): pa'i chung ngu bzhin du gar byed pa lta bu ston/nyan thos chen po de dag gis smras pa/rigs kyi bu mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos pi wang 'di blangs pa dang /sil snyan dang /klu
410a1(mdo sde): da su sngags nga rjo pa dug sug lan/rlu /na ma m-i gyu/ ga na
410a2(mdo sde): smye /rnam par gnag par yang marnas sa//des chub gnas chen pa rjes sasas
410a3(mdo sde): 'dus can ba zlas gcugs zhugs pa/dag zhes smra/rnam par yin tan 'dzid du rlung /sadang mi dang /l+h+wa ma yin du gas
410a4(mdo sde): rten du gyur pa yinan/ phyir rang gi sus 'dzin par ma dus shig/gnas kun du gyur bdu skyes pargyang du basbyin du gur byed pa shA sa/kunas
410a5(mdo sde): 'od srung chen pos smras pa/rigs kyi bu dper na dmu rung phyed pa'i rlung langs pa na shing dang nags dang /ri sems cad gang gis bri dag rnam par bgag pa'i stobs mid
410a6(mdo sde): mthu med de/de dgi thams cad mi 'dod bzhin du gA yi rab dru ga yo//'gul rab tu 'gul lo//rigs kyi bu de bzhin+d+ra du glang 'di mi 'am ci'i rgyal po snod pos pi wang bus
410a7(mdo sde): pa de'i sgri bas pas bdag cag dmu rlung phyed pas ro chen po bangs pa bzhin du bdag 'dzin ma nus par gyur to//de ci'i phyir zhe na/skyes bu dam pa 'di'i smon lam dang /
