410b2(mdo sde): yod pa na nyis smras pa/sbyin pa 'ad skyeng rje de m+b+hi ba lkug ng+gA byung chubasems dang mas du la nga / sa dzig gyur ba spring sbyang+yas su
410b3(mdo sde): ba'am/bskyed par myi nus pas btsun pa 'od srung chen po suM zhig blon med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems ni spyad /de ci'i phyir sbyin/gni tshi ma sa
410b4(mdo sde): dang ldan pa rnams kyi stobs dang gzi brji de ni pi klung gi sgra 'dis zil gyis non to//gang theg pa chen po la zhugs pa rnams kyi stobs dang /gzi ba rjid de la ni zil gyis
410b5(mdo sde): glanan par mi nus pA laM ltos/dri nas maM 'i ma nIn+ti N+Dal po snang bas pa ltung gi/de skrag pa nasangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /mi 'am ci'i rgyal po snang po'i sprin gyi smon lam
410b6(mdo sde): byin gyi brlabs kyos pi wang de dang sil spyan brgyad khri bon stong pa de dag las tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag byung ngo //tha ma 'ab+h+ring dang de bzhin mchog rnams kyi//chos rnams rnams
410b7(mdo sde): cod mnyam zhing chos rnams dben//zhi ba stong pa mi 'gyur 'khrugs pa med//gzed nas dag ste dri med nam mkha' bzhin//gang dag da ltar gyi dang 'das pa yi//sems
411a1(mdo sde): can kun+da mnyam sems can sems can med//sems can skad du sgra rnams 'byung ba yang //chos kyi sgra dang mtshungs te de yang med//zhing rnams
411a2(mdo sde): thams cad zhing mnyam zhing min te//bar snang dang ni mtshungs shing mnyam par snang //'phel ba me yin mi zad ma skyes te//gsob gsog nam mkha' lta bur rnam par
411a3(mdo sde): drag/sangs rgyas kun mnyam sangs rgyas sangs rgyas yin//chos dbyings nges par 'dres pa med pa ste//tshul khrims shes rab ye shes rnam grol mnyam//mtshan
411a4(mdo sde): nyid gcig ste mtshan mnyam mtshan nyid med//nyon mongs thams cad nyon mongs ma yin grol//rtog dang rtag pa kun rtog rnam par rtog/nang na rgyu ba ma yin phyi rol min//
411a5(mdo sde): 'du shes mdud pa phyin ci log las gyur//rnam par rtog pas chos dbyings ming btags pa//ming de nyid kyang gzhan min de bzhin min//ming dang gzugs kyi rang bzhin
411a6(mdo sde): rjes rtogs pa//de dag rtag tu mi chags 'jig rten spyod//gang rnams 'das pa'i bde gshegs grangs med pa//de dag gis ni gang gsungs chos mang po//gzod nas
411a7(mdo sde): zad cing dengs dang 'jigs las dben//de dag yul dang phyogs su 'gro ma yin//chos 'di dag ni yi ge las byung ste//yi ge gang dag zad can zad pa'i chos//yi ge
411b1(mdo sde): zad pa'i chos nyid shes pas na//chos rnams kun la rnam par rtog mi byed//sems kyi rgyud ni rgyud mnyam rgyud ma yin//rang bzhin gzhan dang gzhan te chags pa med//sems dang sems
411b2(mdo sde): byung chos mtha' med shes pas//'phags pa rnams ni mnyam pa'i chos la 'jug/mtha' dang mtha' med kun chad rnam par chad//thog ma tha ma bar ma mnyam gyur pa//dus
411b3(mdo sde): gsum dag ni dben pas shes pa mnyam//shes pa de yang mtha' yod ma yin no//skye bo rtag tu ming dang gzugs la chags//mtha' dang mtha' med lta bas gos pa rnams//
411b4(mdo sde): rgyu dang rkyen las byung bar shes pas na//bdag dang sems can rnam par rtog ma yin//bdag las ldang ba rtag tu ldang ma yin//chos de kun nas bslang ba med pa ste//gang
411b5(mdo sde): dag ldang dang ldang ba med rtogs pa//de dag bzod pa mnyam nyid rjes mthun pa//chos kun rtag tu bdag med rang bzhin te//sprin dang glog dang nam mkha' lta bu gsog/bdag
411b6(mdo sde): dang sems can rtag tu rang bzhin stong //'di ni gzungs kyi phyag rgyar 'jug pa'o//chos rnams mtshan nyid gcig te mtshan nyid med//gang gis thar pa'i sgo gsum rnam rtogs/
411b7(mdo sde): nas//zug pa med pa'i chos rnams ston byed kyang //chos la yongs su rtog pa mi byed do//tha ma 'bring dang de bzhin mchog rnams kyi//chos 'di dag ni yi ge las byung ste//
412a1(mdo sde): yi ge rnams la rnam par rtog mi byed//de lta bur ni don rnams bshad pa yin//don dang tshig 'bru gnyis la mi 'jug ste//gnyis med rtag tu don
412a2(mdo sde): ni sgra dang bral//gang gis mtha' 'di dben par shes pa ni//de yi sngon gyi mtha' ni nye bar chad//gang dag sngon mtha' nye bar chud pa rnams//'gro ba'i don du 'dus
412a3(mdo sde): byas rnams la spyod//yang dag mtha' ni rtag tu mtha' med shes//de yi byams dang snying rje shin tu dag/gang gi byams dang snyi N+DI rnam dag pa//sdug bsngal dang ni
412a4(mdo sde): bde ba mtshungs mnyam sbyor//rgod dang khengs pa ma yin brtan pa yi//skyes bu mchog de don gyi cho ga shes//chos kyi tshul 'di zhi zhing dben pa ste//'chad pa na ni
412a5(mdo sde): dga' ba thob par 'gyur//nam yang 'phel ba med cing 'bri ba med//chos nyid 'di ni ngar 'dzin med cing zhi//bar snang lam gyi sgra ni gzungs med de//gang gi sgyu
412a6(mdo sde): bshad pa med kyang grags par gyur//gang gis bshad dang gang la bshad pa rnams//de dag thams cad dbang can brdzun pa yin//tshigs su bcad pa mngon par
412a7(mdo sde): sgrub pa 'di bshad pa na/byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob par gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' lha'i
412b1(mdo sde): cod pan gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das tshigs su bcad pa 'di lta bu 'di dag ga las byung /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu
412b2(mdo sde): khyod kyis mi 'am ci'i rgyal po la dris shig dang /des de'i lan glon par 'gyur ro//de nas byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan gyis mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po la
412b3(mdo sde): 'di skad ces smras so//mi 'am ci'i bdag po tshigs su bcad pa mngon par bsgrub pa 'di dag go las byung /smras pa/sems can thams cad kyi sgra ga las byung ngo //
412b4(mdo sde): smras pa/mi 'am ci'i bdag po sems can thams cad kyi sgra ga las byung /smras pa/rigs kyi bu sems can thams cad kyi sgra ni nam mkha' las 'byung ngo //smras pa/
412b5(mdo sde): mi 'am ci'i bdag po sems can thams cad kyi sgra khong pa'i nang nas mi 'byung ngam/smras pa/rigs kyi bu de la ji snyam du sems/sems can thams cad kyi sgra lus
412b6(mdo sde): kyi nang gi khong nas byung ngam/'on te sems las byung /smras pa/mi 'am ci'i bdag po lus las kyang ma yin/sems las kyang ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/
412b7(mdo sde): lus ni blun pa g.yo ba med pa/byed pa med pa rtswa dang bong ba dang /rtsig pa dang shing dang /mig yor lta bu'o//sems ni gzugs med pa bstan du med pa/thogs pa
413a1(mdo sde): rnyed pa/rnam par rig pa nadu pam+b+ha/sgyu mas b+hU smras pa/sa kyi tha lus dang soms ma gtogs par gzhan sbyang nas sku 'byung bar 'argyud/
413a2(mdo sde): smras pa mi'am ci'i bdag po sems can rnams kyi sgra ni yid la byed pa las 'byung bar btags so//skyes pa gas te na ma mtha' med na smrig lusuM 'byu/
413a3(mdo sde): ma'am ci'i bdag po nam mkha' ma gtogs par gzhan gang nos sgra 'byung bar 'gyur/smras pa rigs kyi bu de phyir rnam grangs 'dis sgra ji snyed byed dag thams
413a4(mdo sde): cad ni nam mkha' las 'byung bar rig par bya'o//nam mkha'i nga bo nyid ni sgyu ste/rnam par rig ma thag tu 'gog go/'gags nas nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid du yang nga/
413a5(mdo sde): par gnas so//de'i phyir chos thams cad ni nam mkha' dang mnyam zhes bya ste rnam par rig pa med pa rnam par shes par bya ba ma yin mod kyi sgra dang sgra'i brjes brjod
413a6(mdo sde): do//brjod pa de'ang tho snyad do//gang sgras brjod pa 'di 'dra bar rab tu shes pa dri ni chos gang la'ang mngon par mi chags so//glang mngon par ma tshigs bya de ni rnam
413a7(mdo sde): par mi 'phro'o//gang rnam par mi 'phro bad me 'khor ro//gang mi 'khor ba de mi byed pa'o//gang mi phyed pa de mi smra'o//gang mi skye 'di mi 'jig par 'dod de//gang
413b1(mdo sde): mi 'jig pa de dang pa'o//gang dang ba de dag pa'o//gang dag pa de dri ma med pa'o//gad du ma med pa de 'od gsal ba'o//gang 'od gsal ba de sems kyi rang bzhin no//sam
413b2(mdo sde): rang bzhin gang yin pa de 'jug pa'o//glang 'jug pa de mtshan ma thams cad gnon pa'o//gang mtshan ma thams cad gnon pa de skyon med pa la 'jug pa zhes bya'o//byang chub
413b3(mdo sde): sems dpa'i kon med pa la 'jug pa gang yin pa de ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob pa ste/des na skyon med pa la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' mi skye bo'i chos la bzod
413b4(mdo sde): pa rab tu thob pa zhes bya'o//gang bzod pa rab tu thob pa des thams cad bzod de/de stong par yang bzod de gang zag tu'ang bzod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/grong zag las stong pa
413b5(mdo sde): gzhan ma yin te/gang zag nyid stong pa gzhan ma yin te/gang zag nyid stong bya'o//de mtshan mur yang bzod de mtshan ma med par bzod pa'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/mtshan ma'i
413b6(mdo sde): ngo bo nyid mtshan ma med pa'o//de smin par yang bzod/de smon pa med pa'ang bzod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/smon lam gyi ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid smon pa med pa'o//de sems can
413b7(mdo sde): za po cid rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par yang bzod de sems can rnams 'chi 'pho ba dang skye bar yang bzod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'chi 'pho dang smra ba ni sgyu ma'o
414a1(mdo sde): ngo bo nyid do//rigs kyi bu de ltar mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni 'gag pa med pa ste/chos thams cad dang 'gal ba
414a2(mdo sde): med pa yin no//bdag bzod pa'i rjes su 'gro'ang sems can thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro bas kyang 'gro/bdag bzod pa rjes su 'gro'ang chos thams cad kyi rjes su
414a3(mdo sde): 'gro bas kyang 'gro ste/'ong ba'ang med/'gro ba'ang med do//chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings la gnas par yang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//ji
414a4(mdo sde): lhar chos kyi dbyings la gnas pa de ltar sems can thams cad gnas te/gang gi gnas de thob pa'i gnas med pa'i tshul gyis rjes su thob pa de sgra'i brda'i tha snyad
414a5(mdo sde): kyi sgra nye bar bzung nas/mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya'o//mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa ni gang gis kyang brjod pa 'am/bsnyad pa 'am/bstan par
414a6(mdo sde): mi nus so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/don de ni brjod du med pa/smre med pa/bshad du med pa yin yang brjod du med pa'i don brjod pas bstan pa 'di rigs kyi bu de bzhin
414a7(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i che bo nyid do//de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das kye ma mo'am
414b1(mdo sde): ci'i rgyal po sdong po 'di ji tsam du chos zab mo la bzod pa ston par spobs pa dang /'di lta bur rgya che ba'i yul la nye bar spyod cing longs spyod pas 'byor pa dang /chos ston
414b2(mdo sde): pas zab mo'i bzod pa 'di lta bu dang ldan pa ni ngo mtshar to//bcom ldan 'das mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
414b3(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun na/des 'di spobs pa 'di lta bu grub par gyur bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu gang+gA'i klung gi bye
414b4(mdo sde): ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi skar ma'i gzugs ji snyed pa bgrang ba'i tshul gyis tshad gzung bar nus sam/de bzhin du mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po 'dis yang dag par
414b5(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa dang /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub btsal ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi gan
414b6(mdo sde): na tshangs par spyod pa spyod pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag kyang tshad gzung bla ro mi nus te/des na 'di'i spobs pa 'di
414b7(mdo sde): 'dra'o//de nas byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pani gyis mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po la 'di skad ces smras so//mi 'am ci'i bdag po khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dag
415a1(mdo sde): macom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mang po dadr-ik+ka las dge ba'i rtsu ba bskyon pa'o dge ba'i rtsa ba mang po dr-i l+lA buM bsdoms pas ci bla na men pa
415a2(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshong rgya 'am/mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos smras bya/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams dge ba'i
415a3(mdo sde): rtsu ba yang dag par sgrub pa ni/gang dag gis na bdu'ang ngoms por mi 'gyur ba byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mi ngoms pa bcu gnyis 'di dag ste/bcu gnyis gan
415a4(mdo sde): zhe na/'di lta ste/de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang /rim gro bya bas mi ngoms pa dang /chos mnyan pas mi ngoms pa dang /dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung
415a5(mdo sde): bas mi ngoms pa dang /chos rgya cher rab tu bstan pas mi ngoms pa dang /sems can yongs su smin par bya bas mi ngoms pa dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par/
415a6(mdo sde): bsgrub pas myi ngoms pa dang /dgon pa la gnas pas mi ngoms pa dang /pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su bsrung bar mi ngoms pa dang /ye shes mngon par rab
415a7(mdo sde): tu dong zhing yongs su smin par bya bas mi ngoms pa dang /chos nges par sems shing tshul bzhin la rab tu sbyor bas mi ngoms pa dang /bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs
415b1(mdo sde): rnams dge ba'i tshogs bsngags pa la mi ngoms pa zhes bya'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das la mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das byad
415b2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin dkon mchog 'byung gnas zhes bgyi ba mchis te/byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin de la brten na yo m+b+ha tan+ti rin po che'i khyad par rgya
415b3(mdo sde): chos thams cad thob par 'gyur ro zhes bgyi ba zhig bdag gis thos na/bcom ldan 'das gang thos pas/byang chub sems dpa' rnams yon tan rin po che'i khyad par gyi chos thams
415b4(mdo sde): tad thob par 'gyur bar bgyi ba'i slad du/byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin dkon mchog 'byung gnas de bonan gshegs dris legs par ba shed du gsoso/bcom ldan
415b5(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/mi 'am ci'i bdag pa de'i phyir shin tu de leg par nyon la yid la gzung zhig dang /byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dkon mchog 'byung gnas
416a1(mdo sde): dus khyod la bshad do//mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes gsol nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang /
416a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//mi'i ma ci'i bdag po 'dri la byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas dkon mchog rgyun mi chad pa dang /chos
416a3(mdo sde): dkon mchog rgyun mi chad pa dang /dge 'dun dkon mchog rgyun mi chad par bya ba'i phyir snyoms bskyed pa rin po che brgyad cu po 'di dag la 'jug go/brgyad cu gang zhe
416a4(mdo sde): na/'di lta ste/de thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems rin po che mi mjed pa dang /lhog pa'i bsam pa'i sems rin po che mi gtong ba dang /dge ba rin po che thams
416a5(mdo sde): cad kyi sems mi 'dor ba dang /dge ba rin po che thams cad la rab tu sbyor ba'i sems mi 'dor ba dang /yi dam la brtan pa'i sems rin po che yongs su mi 'dor
416a6(mdo sde): ba dang /bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba'i sems rin po che byang chub tu yongs su sngo bas rnam par smin pa la mi re ba'i sems rin po che la 'jug pa dang /mi dge
416a7(mdo sde): ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa gsum rnam par spangs pas lus kyi rgyan gyi sems rin po che dang /ngag gi skyon rnam pa bzhi rnam par spangs pas ngag gi rgyan gyi sems rin po
416b1(mdo sde): drang /brnab sems dang gnod sems dang log par lta ba dang bral bas sems kyi rgyan gyi sems rin po che dang /tshul khrims ma nyams shring skyon med de 'dren ma ma yin
416b2(mdo sde): zhing thun tshags ma yin pas tshul khrims kyi rgyan gyi sems rin po che dang /sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pas khong khro ba med pa'i snyoms rin po che dang /sems
416b3(mdo sde): can thams cad kyis nyes par byas pa la ji mi snyom pas bzod pa dang nges pa'i sems rin po che dang /byang chub kyi yan lag la lta bas lus dang srog la mi lta ba'i sems ran
416b4(mdo sde): po che dang /mtho dman med pas rjes su chags pa dang khong khro ba dang bral ba'i sems rin po che dang /zhum pa med pas brtson 'grus brtan pa'i go cha'i sems rin po che
416b5(mdo sde): dang /lhod pa med pa'i brtson pa thams cad nyams 'og tu chud par byed pa'i sems rin po che dang /byang chub kyi lam gyi tshogs bsags pas dran pa dang /blo gros dang
416b6(mdo sde): rtogs pa dang /ngo tsha shes pa dang mos pa brjod pa med pa'i sems rin po che dang /sems la dbang byed pas bsam gtan dang /rnam par thar pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang /
416b7(mdo sde): snyoms par 'jug pa dang bskyed pa'i sems rin po che dang /dam pa'i chos bsags pas chos yongs su tshol ba'i sems rin po che dang /'jigs pa med cing spobs
417a1(mdo sde): pas thos pa 'dzin pa'i sems rin po che dang /sdig pa 'dod pa med pas zang zing med par chos ston pa'i sems rin po che dang /chags pa'i sems/
417a2(mdo sde): med pas slob dpon chos mi 'chab pa'i sems rin po che dang /nan tan snying por byed pas tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i sems rin po che dang /de ltar byed pas ji
417a3(mdo sde): ltar thos pa'i chos rnams la nan tan byed pa'i sems rin po chu dang /gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pas shes rab kyis so sor rtog pa'i sems rin po che drong /sems
417a4(mdo sde): tsan thams cad la byams pas khyab pos byams pa chen po'i sems rin po che dang /sems can thams cad la lta bas snying rje chen po'i sems rin po che dang /chos
417a5(mdo sde): la dga' mos dang pos dga' ba chen po'i sems rin po che dang /chos thams cad nges par sems pas btang snyoms chen po'i sems rin po che dang /dge ba'i rtsa
417a6(mdo sde): bla bstsags pas 'khor ba na yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems rin po che dang /bdag gi bde ba la mi chags pas sems can thams cad yongs su smin par byed pa'i sems
417a7(mdo sde): rin po che dang /chos 'dzin pas bsdu ba'i dngos po'i sems rin po che dang /thams cad du rnam par 'phrul pas mngon par shes pa chen po'i sems rin po che dang /
417b1(mdo sde): ma thos pa'i chos mnyan pa'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten pa'i sems rin po che dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad sogs pas sdig pa'i grogs po spong ba'i sems
417b2(mdo sde): rin po che dang /tha dad pa med pos sems can thams cad la sbyor ba mnyam pa'i sems rin po che dang /sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa la 'jug pas sems can
417b3(mdo sde): thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i nad yongs su shes pa'i sems rin po che dang /sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i nad rab tu zhi bar byed pas chos kyi sman thams
417b4(mdo sde): cad yongs su tshol ba'i sems rin po che dang /chos kyi bdag nyid pas ma bslabs pa rnams la mi brnyas pa'i sems rin po che dang /sems can thams cad la 'dud pas
417b5(mdo sde): nga rgyal med pa'i sems rin po che dang /'chos pa med pa'i g.yo dang sgyu med pa'i sems rin po che dang /dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par byed pas chos la dag 'a ba'i
417b6(mdo sde): sems rin po che dang /sangs rgyas thams cad la byas pa gzo bas dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'i sems rin po che dang /brtan pa'i grogs po'i phyir byas pa shes shing
417b7(mdo sde): byas pa gzo ba'i sems rin po che dang /ltos pa med pas lan du phan 'dogs pa la mi re ba'i sems rin po che dang /dkar po'i phyogs srung bas dgon pa la dga' ba'i
418a1(mdo sde): sems rin po hUM dang /lus byas pa chud mi gson pas rtag tu rab tu 'thung ba'i sems rin po che dang /sdom pa'i spyod pa sogs pasdu 'phyas pa'i
418a2(mdo sde): rig pa lnga dga' ba'i sems rin po che dang /sems can thams cad mgu bar byed pas sbyangs pa'i yon tan thams cad dang yi byad bstangs pa'i sems ni don dang /shes
418a3(mdo sde): rab kyis mi ngoms pas 'dod pa chung zhing chog shes pa'i sems rin po che dang /lus dang sems dben pas dga' ba la dben pa'i sems rin po che dang /mtshan dang dpe
418a4(mdo sde): byad bzang po yongs su rdzogs par byed pas bsod nams kyi tshogs kyis mi ngoms pa'i sems rin po che dang /sems can thams cad kyi po che ma bcad pa'i
418a5(mdo sde): phyir ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su tshol ba'i sems rin po che dang /sangs rgyas mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba'i phyir sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sems rin po che dang /chos
418a6(mdo sde): mnyan pa dang mi 'bral ba'i phyir chos rjes su dran pa'i sems rin po che dang /phyir mi ldog pa'i dge 'dun la gzhol ba'i phyir dge 'dun rjes su dran pa'i sems rin po
418a7(mdo sde): dang /byang chub kyi sems los mi g.yo ba'i phyir tshul khrims rjes su dran pa'i sems rin po che dang /nyon mongs pa thams cad yongs su bor bas gtong ba rjes su dran
418b1(mdo sde): ba'i sems rin po che dang /skye ba gcig gis phrogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rjes su dran pa'i phyir lha rjes su dran pa'i sems rin po che dang /mtshungs par byed pa'i phyir
418b2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rjes su dran pa'i sems rin po che dang /don thams cad rtogs pas don so so yang dag par rig pa'i sems rin po che dang /chos kyi dbyingasde 'dres pa
418b3(mdo sde): med pas chos so so yang dag par rig pa'i sems rin po che dang /sems can gyi tshig thams cad rtogs pas nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa'i sems rin po che
418b4(mdo sde): dang /tshig 'bru'i rang bzhin rjes su rtogs pas spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa'i sems rin po che dang /rnam par shes pa sgyu ma lta bur yongs su shes pa'i tshul gyis
418b5(mdo sde): ye shes la ston pa'i sems rin po che dang /bkri ba'i don gyi mdo sde las dang bya ba dang 'gal bas nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde la rton pa'i sems rin po che dang /gang zag gi rang
418b6(mdo sde): bzhin rjes su rtog pas chos nyid la rton pa'i sems rin po che dang /khams gsum thams cad la mngon par zhen pas 'jigs pa'i phyir 'du byed thams cad la mi rtag pa dang
418b7(mdo sde): sdug bsngal bar so sor rtog pa'i sems rin po che dang /sems can thams cad la bdag med pas chos thams cad la bdag med par so sor rtog pa'i sems rin po che dang /'dod
419a1(mdo sde): pa'i khams lngas shin tu 'da' bas mi gtsang bar so sor rtog pa'i sems rin po che dang /shin tu zhi zhing nye bar zhi bas mya ngan las 'das pa la
419a2(mdo sde): zhi bar so sor rtog pa'i sems rin po che dang /bdud rtsi'i sgo la yang dag par gzhol bas rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa
419a3(mdo sde): la mos pa'i sems rin po che dang /mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob pas chos thams cad la mA skyes pa dang ma byung bar mos pa'i sems rin po che dang /
419a4(mdo sde): lte ba thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med pas chos thams cad la sgyu ma dang /smig rgyu dang chu zla dang /mig yod dang /rmi lam lta bur yang dag par gzhol
419a5(mdo sde): bas sems rin po che dang /rtag pa dang chad pa dang bral bas rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang mthun pa'i sems rin po che dang /gnyis dang bral bas mthar lta ba
419a6(mdo sde): thams cad sel ba'i sems rin po che dang /theg pa gcig tu khong du chud pas gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'i sems rin po che dang /skyon med pa la
419a7(mdo sde): 'jug pas spyod pa thams cad las ldog pa'i sems rin po che dang /chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir yang dag por skyon med pa la so sor rtog pa'i sems rin po
419b1(mdo sde): che dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad skye ba med pa'i phyir byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad yang dgra par sgrub pa'i sems rin po che ste/'di dag ni chos rin po che brgyad//
419b2(mdo sde): cu'o//mi 'am co'i bdag po de ltar gang chos brgyad cu po 'di la 'jog pa dang thob pa dang /nan tan byed pa de ni dkon mchog 'byung gnas ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o//
419b3(mdo sde): chos 'di dag ni ting nge 'dzin sgrub pa'o//byang chub sems dpas gang gi tshe dkon mchog 'byung gnas ting nge 'dzin 'di rab tu thob par gyur pa de'i tshe/des gang la dbang
419b4(mdo sde): thob par ma gyur pa'i rin po che'i 'jig rten gyi 'am/'jig rten las 'das pa de grang yang med do//mi 'am ci'i bdag po de la 'jig rten gyi rin po che ni gang /'jig rten
419b5(mdo sde): las 'das pa'i rin po che ni gang zhe na/mi 'am ci'i bdag po de la 'jig rten gyi rin po che ni 'di lta ste/lha dang mi rnams kyi che ba nyid dang /brgya byin dang /tshangs pa'i
419b6(mdo sde): che ba nyid dang /'jig rten skyong ba'i che ba nyid dang 'khor los bsgyur ba'i che ba nyid dang /tshong dpon dang /khyim bdag dang bram ze dang /rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po/
419b7(mdo sde): bu'i che ba nyid do//de de ltar lha dang mi rnams kyi che ba nyid rab tu thob kyang rgyags pa mi skyed/bag med pa mi skyed do//de bag yod par gyur pas/byang chub sgrub par byed
420a1(mdo sde): pa'i chos rnams yang dag par bsgrub pa ste/'di ni 'jig rten gyi rin po che zhes bya'o//de la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rin po che grang zhe na/'di
420a2(mdo sde): ste/'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rin po che'o//'jig rten las 'das pa'i rin po che gang zhe na/chos gang 'jig rten las sgrol ba'o//'jig rten las sgrol ba'i
420a3(mdo sde): chos gang zhe na/'di lta ste/'phags pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab ste/shes rab kyi 'jig rten las sgrol lo//shes rab rin po ches ni 'jig rten las
420a4(mdo sde): 'das pa'i chos thams cad bsdus te/shes rab ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos thams cad kyi gtso bo yin no//mi 'am ci'i bdag po 'di lta ste dper na klu mas
420a5(mdo sde): cad kyi gtso bo ni rgya mtsho chen po'o//ri thams cad kyi gtso bo ni ri'i rgyal po ri rab bo//skar ma thams cad kyi gtso bo ni zla ba'o//snang ba thams cad kyi gtso bo ni nyi ma'o//
420a6(mdo sde): ri dgas thams cad kyi gtso bo ni seng ge'o//skye dgu thams cad kyi gtso bo ni rgyal po'o//sum cu rtsa gsum pa thams cad kyi gtso bo ni brgya byin no//tshangs pa la dbang du
420a7(mdo sde): bya ba rnams kyi gtso bo ni tshangs pa chen po'o//mi ma ci'i bdag po de bzhin du 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos thams cad kyi gtso bo ni shes rab ste/de'i phyir shes
420b1(mdo sde): rabA na chos thams cad kyi rgyal po zhes bya'o//mu la gnas pa bsgral ba'i phyir bdo bar 'gro bas lam mo//nyon mongs pa'i mun pa sel ba'i phyir sgron ma'o//g.yul las rgya
420b2(mdo sde): phyir dpa' bo'o//sman rab tu sbyor ba'i phyir sman pa'o//gtsug lag thams cad shes pa'i phyir slob dpon no//chos thams cad phigs pa'i phyir mda'o//nyon mongs pa
420b3(mdo sde): gcod pa'i phyir ral gri'o//nyon mongs pa'i tshang tshing dral ba'i phyir thong gshol lo//mnyam pa'i phyir mi 'gal lo//'thab pa med pa'i phyir rtsod pa med pa'o//'byung ba
420b4(mdo sde): med pa'i phyir mi 'gag pa'o//bden pa'i don rnams yongs su shes pa'i mthar thug pa'i phyir mi 'khrugs pa'o//dran pa nye bar gzhog pa'i phyir dran pa'o//yang dag par
420b5(mdo sde): spong ba rnams la mnyam pa nyid do//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bskyed pa'o//dbang po rnams sbed pa'o//stobs rnams kyis mi rdzi ba'o//byang chub kyi yan lag rnams rjes
420b6(mdo sde): su rtog pa'o//lam ston pa'o//zhi gnas zhi bar byed pa'o//lhag mthong rig par byed pa'o//rab rib med pa'i phyir snang bar byed pa'o//chos kyi snang bas man pa sel
420b7(mdo sde): ba'o//rdul dang bral ba'i phyir rdul med pa'o//brnyes thabs dang bral ba'i phyir mtho bar sems pa med pa'o//yong ba'i lam las rab tu 'das pa'i phyir kun tu mthong bar
421a1(mdo sde): byed pa'o//phyi nang dang bral ba'i phyir yul med pa'o//lta bas byas pa med pa'i phyir stong pa sgrol ba'o//rnam par rtog pa nye bar zhi ba'i phyir/mtshan ma
421a2(mdo sde): med pas rab tu phye ba'o//khams gsum pa las rnam par 'das pa'i phyir smon po med pa'i mtshan nyid do//mtshan nyid med pa'i phyir mtshan nyid gcig pa'o//mtshungs
421a3(mdo sde): pa med pa'i phyir nam mkha'i mtshan nyid do//bdud kyi las dang bral ba'i phyir g.yo ba dang rlom sems 'joms pa'o//mi rtog pa'i sbyin bya'o//mi gnas pa'i chu bi mas
421a4(mdo sde): so//rab tu mi gnas pa'i bzod pa'o//blang ba med pa dang dor ba med pa'i brtson 'grus so//sgro btags pa med pa'i bsam gton no//rnam par rig byed ma yin
421a5(mdo sde): pa'i sgo'o//thams cad la mngon du phyogs pa'o//thabs dang 'dres pa'o//sems can la bdag med par yang dag par gzhol ba'o//dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags
421a6(mdo sde): pa'o//bya ba med pa'o//bya ba dang bral ba ste/mi 'am ci'i bdag po 'di ni shes rab rin po che'o//shes rab rin po che 'di ni dkon mchog 'byung gnas ting
421a7(mdo sde): 'dzin thob pa'i byang chub sems dang sa thob bo//'di thob pa na rin po che thams cad yang dag par 'du ba yin no//mi 'am ci'i bdag po 'di lta ste dper na tshub thams
421b1(mdo sde): cad kyi sgo ni rgya mtsho chen po ste/rin po che thams cad sogs pa rin po che thams cad yang dag par 'du ba ste/de las rin po che thams cad 'byung ngo //mi 'am ci'i bdag po
421b2(mdo sde): de bzhin du dkon mchog 'byung gnas ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang rin po che thams cad kyi sgo yin te/chos dkon mchog thams cad sogs pa
421b3(mdo sde): rin po che thams cad yang dag par 'du ba'o//dkon mchog 'byung gnas ting nge 'dzin las dkon mchog gsum 'byung ste/sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang /chos dkon
421b4(mdo sde): mchog dang /dge 'dun dkon mchog go/des na dkon mchog 'byung gnas ting nge 'dzin ni rin po che thams cad sogs pa zhes bya'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang
421b5(mdo sde): chab sems dpa' lha'i cod pan gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po 'di dkon mchog 'byung gnas ting nge 'dzin 'di thob pa
421b6(mdo sde): logs sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu khyod kyi de mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po la dris shog dang de khyed la ston par 'gyur ro//de nas byung
421b7(mdo sde): zhub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan gyis mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po la 'di skad ces smras so//mo 'am ci'i bdag po khyod kyis dkon mchog 'byung gnas ting nge 'dzin 'di thob
422a1(mdo sde): bam+ba/smras pa rigs kyi bu ting nge 'dzin 'di ni thob pa 'am/dmigs par so sor nye bar gnas pa ma yin no//ting nge 'dzin 'di na sus kyang mi thob
422a2(mdo sde): bo//ting nge 'dzin 'di ni gzugs su bgrang ba 'am/tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang /rnam par shes par bgrang ba ma yin no//ting nge 'dzin 'di ni
422a3(mdo sde): gzugs su snang ba mu yin ni//ting nge 'dzin 'di ni mig dang /rna ba drang sna dang /lci dang lus dang /yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i gzung ba ma yin/skye ba'i mtshan
422a4(mdo sde): nyid ma yin/'jig pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin/gnas pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin/rgyun chad pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin/mtshan nyid gcig pa ma yin/mtshan
422a5(mdo sde): nyid tha dad pa ma yin/mtshan nyid ma yin/mtshan nyid dang bral ba ma yin/mtshon nyid med pa'ang ma yin te/brjod par bya ba ma yin no//ting nge 'dzin 'di
422a6(mdo sde): ni yongs su rtog par mi nus te/kun tu rtogs par ma yin/rnam par rtogs par ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/gal te ting nge 'dzin 'di yongs su rtogs pa
422a7(mdo sde): 'am/kun tu rtogs pa'am/rnam par rtogs par gyur na ni brtag pa'i gzhi nyid du 'gyur gyi ting nge 'dzin ma yin no//rigs kyi bu ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba ni chos
422b1(mdo sde): thams ca mnyam pa nyid do//chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de dang nga mnyam mo//de dang sems can thams cad kyang mnyam mo//rigs kyis de'i phyir ting nga
422b2(mdo sde): 'dzin 'di dang sems can thams cad mnyam mo//de ci'i phyir zhe na/sems can thams cad ni stong pa ste/stong pa'i mtshan nyid ni ting nge 'dzin 'di'o//sems ca
422b3(mdo sde): thams cad ni mtshan nyid med pa ste/mtshan nyid med pa'i mtshan nyid ni ting nge 'dzin 'di'o//sems can thams cad ni smon pa me pa ste/smon pa med pa'i mtshan nyid ni ting
422b4(mdo sde): 'dzin 'di'o//sems can thams cad ni dben pa ste/dben pa'i mtshan nyid ni ting nge 'dzin 'di'o//sems can thams cad ni bdag med pa ste/bdag med pa mtshan
422b5(mdo sde): nyid ni ting nge 'dzin 'di'o//de ni lus dang ngag dang sems kyis reg par mi nus so//gang la la dag chos la reg par byed pa dang /mnyam par byed pa dang /mngon par
422b6(mdo sde): mnyam par byed pa de dag thams cad ni legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la nga rgyal can du bstan to//de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa'o lha'i cod pan
422b7(mdo sde): gyi 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po'i spyod pa bag mchis pa 'di lta bu dang /chos la spobs pa 'di lta bu ni ngo mtshar to//bcom
423a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu bya ba thams cad kyang kun tu ston la bya ba thams cad kyis kyang /mi gosla pa 'di ni thabs dang shes//
423a2(mdo sde): rab las byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa'o//rigs kyi bu mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po 'dis rgyud kyi sgra dang /glu'i sgra dang sil snyan dang /pheg rdob
423a3(mdo sde): pa byas pa'i tshul 'ad mi 'am ci bye ba phrag bdun bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas so//dri za bye ba phrag sum cu bla na myed pa yang
423a4(mdo sde): dgo par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas so//lto 'phye chen po bye ba phrog bzhi bcu'ang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin/
423a5(mdo sde): par byas so//rang gi 'khor gyi srog chags brgyad do khri bzhi stong yang byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas so//shes rab dang thabs kyi ye shes 'di dang ldan pa'i byed
423a6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' ni gang dang gang gi tshe 'khor gyi che ba nyid thob pa de dang de'i tshe/sems can grangs mod dpag tu med pa yongs su smin par byed do//rigs kyi bu
423a7(mdo sde): 'di lta ste dper na/rgyu med par ma mi 'bar ro//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dben pa na gnas pa'ang sems can yongs su smin
423b1(mdo sde): par bya ba mi 'bar ro//rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na rgyu yod na me 'bar ro//rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skye bo phal po che'i
423b2(mdo sde): nang ni 'dug na/sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'abar ro//rigs kyi bu de'i phyir rnam grangs 'dris 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' ji lta ji lta bur yul dang
423b3(mdo sde): 'khor chen po 'byor par gyur pa/de lta de lta bur sems can dpag tu med pa yongs su smin par byed par rig par bya'o//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan
423b4(mdo sde): 'das la byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos rgyud kyi sgra dang /glu'i sgra dang /sil snyan
423b5(mdo sde): dang /pheg rdobo pa bgyis pas sems can yongs su smin par bgyid/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu mi 'am ci dang /dri za dang /lto 'phye chen po glu
423b6(mdo sde): dang /rol mo'i dbyangs sgra la mos pa rnams la mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos gang gi tshe pi wang gi sgra thos par byed cing sil snyan dang /glu dbyangs sbyor ba de ni mi 'am ci
423b7(mdo sde): dang /dri za dang /lto 'phye chen po de dag dga' ba dang /rab tu mgu bo chen po thob bo//de dag dga' ba dang /mos pa dang rab tu mgu ba thob nas rgyud kyi sgra dang /sil
424a1(mdo sde): nyan gyi sgra dang /glu dbyangs kyi sgra de dag las spangs rgyas kyi sgra 'byung ngo //chos kyi sgra drung dge 'dun nimi sgyu 'byung ngo //byang chub kyi sems la
424a2(mdo sde): dga' ba dang /thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed par sbyor ba'i sgra 'byung ngo //sbyin pa dang /tshul khrims dang /bzod pa dang /brtson 'grus dang /bsam
424a3(mdo sde): gtan dang /shes rab kyi sgra 'byung ngo //byams po dang snying rje dang /dga' ba dang btong snyoms kyi sgra dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang /yang dag par spong ba
424a4(mdo sde): dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /dbang po dang stobs dang /byang chub kyi yan lag dang /lam dang zhi gnas dang /lhag mthong dang /bsam gtan dang /rnam par
424a5(mdo sde): thar pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /snyoms par 'jug pa'i sgra 'byung ngo //mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang /bdag med pa'i sgra 'byung ngo //stong pa nyid dang mtshan/
424a6(mdo sde): ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dang /skye ba med pa dang /'byung ba med pa dang dngos po med pa'i sku 'byung ngo //byang chub sems
424a7(mdo sde): dpa' sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs dang /gzungs dang rdo rje'i tshig dang /'khor gsum yongs su sbyong ba'i sgra 'byung ngo //phyir mi ldog pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab
424b1(mdo sde): chu bsor ba'i sgra dang /chos thams cad la rnam par gdon mi za ba'i rgyal ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgyu dang /rgya mtsho'i phyag d+hA'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang /chos thams cad la
424b2(mdo sde): snong dag par glenal ba'i da de 'dzin gyi sgra dang /chos thams cad la bang byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi ste du/rnam por bkang pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi dang /rin chen na
424b3(mdo sde): tid 'dzin m+b+him+b+ha dang /rin chen 'byung /nas ting de 'dzin gyi sgra dang /rin nA rje gus du'i 'dzin gyi dang /na mongs pa stong gA ting nge 'dzin gyi dang /dga'
424b4(mdo sde): byed k+Shi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang /pad+ma bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang /pad+ma bla ma'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang /nem ma kha'i mdzad kyi ting nge dzin gyi sku dang /thams dkyi
424b5(mdo sde): gro 'i tid de 'dzin TI/nga/dam pa tshab ba /de dzin hU~M nga/ ba nr-id+h+r-i 'dzin m+b+ha dang /ma par lji ba nga byed dun
424b6(mdo sde): dang /cher bsgyings ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang /rnam pa la sems dbang byed pa'i t-i de 'dzin gyi sgra dang /seng gi bsgyings pa'i ting nge 'dzin d+him+b+ha dang /nyi ma sgron mo'i ting nge 'dzin gyi
424b7(mdo sde): dang /mtha' yis 'khyel pa'id kyi sgra dang / rjes su thong ba'i ting 'dzin gyiskye dang / dkyil 'khor ting dzin gyi sgra dang /rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan
425a1(mdo sde): 'dzin gyi sgra dang /rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang /rdo rje lto ba'i ting de 'dzinam+b+hasgra dang /sa 'dzin ting nge 'dzin gyisgra dang /rnyir ban na/
425a2(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang /ri rab rgyal mtshan ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang /rin chen mdzod kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang /sems la dbang byed ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang /sems
425a3(mdo sde): can thams cad kyi sems la rnam par lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang /spyod pa thams cad kyi yul las nges par 'byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang /zab mo sbed
425a4(mdo sde): par sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang /spobs pa sna tshogs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang /bltar mi mthong ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang /chos thams cad la rnam
425a5(mdo sde): par lto ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang /rnam par rol pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang /mngon par shes pa thams cad las nges par 'byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang /
425a6(mdo sde): bdud kyi dkyil 'khor 'jig pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang /gzugs thams cad kun tu ston pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang /sgra thams cad la 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin
425a7(mdo sde): byisgra dang /lus thams cad rnam par gzhig pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang /spyod pa thams cad la dbang ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang /shes rab sgron ma'i ting
425b1(mdo sde): 'dzin gyi sgra dang /byang chub mngon sum snang byed ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang /so so yang dag par rig pa la 'jug pa ston pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang /yon tan gyi rnam pa thams
425b2(mdo sde): cad lA 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra lurti ngo //rigs kyi bu de ltar rgyud kyi sgra dang /sil snyan gyi sgra dang /glu dbyangs kyi sgra de dag las chos kyi sgra 'di lta bu 'di dang ting nge
425b3(mdo sde): 'dzin gyi sgra 'byung ngo //sgra de dag gis sems can de dag yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur te/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni ngo
425b4(mdo sde): mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos 'di lta bu dang ldan pa yin no//mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po'i yon tan bsngags pa bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/sangs rgyas kyi mthus thams
425b5(mdo sde): cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi lag par lha'i me tog man+da ra ba'i phur ma grub nas/de dag gis me tog gi phur ma de dag mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po la gtor to//de nas/
425b6(mdo sde): mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos byin gyi brlabs ji lta bus/me tog de dag lag pa g.yas par blangs te/me tog gcig kyang sa la ma ltung bar de lta bu'i byin gyi brlabs
425b7(mdo sde): byin gyis brlabs nas me tog blangs pa de dag bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor to//de nas me tog de dag gtor ma thag tu sangs rgyas kyi mthus skad cig de la stong
426a1(mdo sde): gi 'jig rten gyi khams me tog rin po che'i gdugs gcig gis khebs par gyur to//me tog rin po che'i gdugs de las mu tig gi do
426a2(mdo sde): shal bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag rab tu 'phyang ngo //me tog gi do shal 'phyang ba re re las kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma byung ngo //'od zer thams
426a3(mdo sde): cad kyi rtse mo las kyang pad+mo sna tshogs blta na sdig pa/kha dog dag dang ldan pa dri dang ldan pa/yid du 'ong po dag byung bar gyur to//pad+ma thams cad la lang bcom
426a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i sku ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku/skyil mo krung bcas shing bzhugs par kun tu snang ngo //sangs rgyas bcom ldan
426a5(mdo sde): 'das de dag thams cad kyis kyang mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste/skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis sems can mang po yongs su smin par byas
426a6(mdo sde): so//sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir gang yul las rnam par grol yang yul thams cod kyang ston/'khor ba las grol yang bsams bzhin du srid
426a7(mdo sde): par skye ba kun tu ston/mya ngan las 'das pa'i skyon med pa thob kyang /khams gsum na nye bar spyod pa 'di lta bu ni byang chub sems dpa'i bya ba yin te/legs so/
426b1(mdo sde): legs so//de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po 'di snyam du sems te/bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi dbu la rin po che'i gdugs gzhan dag
426b2(mdo sde): byin gyis brlabs so snyam mo//dri nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po de'i tshe rin po che'i gdugs bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so//mi
426b3(mdo sde): 'om ci'i rgyal po sdong po rin po che'i gdugs bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbu'i thad drang gi
426b4(mdo sde): steng na rin po che'i gdugs rnams gnas par kun tu snang ngo //'khor der thams cad kyi lag pa g.yas pa nas kyang rin po che'i gdugs rnams byung bar gyur te/de/
426b5(mdo sde): dag gis rin po che'i gdugs de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la mngon par bkab po////bam po gsum pa//ma 'am ci'i rgyal
426b6(mdo sde): po sdong po 'di snyam du sems te/'di ltar bdag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dge par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa nyon
426b7(mdo sde): thos dang /byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun bcas par bshos la spyan drangs te/'di ltar bdag gis bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas par ri'i rgyal po spos kyi
427a1(mdo sde): ngad ljang du bdag gi gnas su gshegs par gsol to//de ltar na bdug gi gnas yongs su spyad par 'gyur ro//lha dang klu dang /gnod sbyin
427a2(mdo sde): dang /dri za dang /lha me yin dang nam mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po'i tshigasu chud med pa la phan btags par yang 'gyur ro//de dag
427a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /yongs su spyad par bya bar spro bar 'gyur te/de'i phyir de dag gi yun ring po'i don dang phan pa dang /grub pa dang /bde
427a4(mdo sde): pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i bsgrub pa thob par 'gyur ro ro snyam mo//de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal
427a5(mdo sde): te/thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag le thugs brtse ba dang /sems can tshad ma mchis pa'i
427a6(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa ba spel ba'i slad du/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang /nyan thos
427a7(mdo sde): kyi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu re spos kyi ngad ldang gi ngos la bdag gi gnas su dgung bdun zhig bzhugs par bdog la gnang bar mdzad du gsol/bcom ldan
427b1(mdo sde): 'das bdag cag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa la bsnyen bkur dang yongs su spyad par bgyi bar spro'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis mi 'am ci'i rgyal
427b2(mdo sde): po sdong po la thugs brtse ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dang /nyan thos kyi tshogs dang bcas po la zhag bdun ri spos kyi ngad ldang gi ngos la bzhugs par gnang ngo //
427b3(mdo sde): de nas mi'am tso'i rgyal po sdong pos bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang bar rig nas/tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs shing rab tu dga' ste dga' ba dang /yid bde ba skyes
427b4(mdo sde): nas dpung dang bcas g.yog 'khor dang bcas te/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag bcol nas lan gsum bskor ba byas te/sil snyan+da dang rol ma'i dbyings
427b5(mdo sde): sgra byas nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas te/'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de nas song nas ri'i rgyal po spos kyi ngad ldang ba la gnas so//de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po
427b6(mdo sde): sdong pos bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i los kyi phyir rang gi khyim rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan te/'khor gyi khyams rgyar kun nas dpag tshad lnga brgya pa/bai DUr+ya sngon
427b7(mdo sde): po dang /dza mra'i klung gi gser gyi pad+mas legs par brgyan pa/rin po che du mas rnam par spros pa byas so//'khor mi khyams der gdan khri rtsa ba rin po che las byis pa/
428a1(mdo sde): lha'i ras brgya stong bting ba brgya stong phyag mang po bshams so//bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan seng ge'i khri 'phang du dpag tshad bcu gnyis pa rin
428a2(mdo sde): po che thams cad kyi sbas pa/rin po che'i kha khyer gyi bskor ba gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang ba dran bsgreng bya/snying po mchog gi bdug pas bdugs pa/bla re bres
428a3(mdo sde): pa dar gyi lnga ldi mang po bres pa lha'i me tog gtor ba bshams so//seng gro'o khri de'i phyogs bzhi ri rin po che'i shing sna tshogs lta na sdug pa bzhi sprul te/skye bo
428a4(mdo sde): thams cad bsdus nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so//u dum+ba ra'i me tog ji bzhin du//sangs rgyas 'byung ba brgya la ma rnyed 'gyur ba//mi mchog de
428a5(mdo sde): ni da ltar byung gyur gyis//skyob la gus dang bcas pas mchod pa gyis//nga rgyal dag dang rgyags dang g.yo spongs la//phrag drog ser sna de bzhin sgyu rnams dang //
428a6(mdo sde): rgod pa thams cad yongs su spong byos la//ston la gus dang bcas pas mchod pa gyis//spos ngad ldang ba 'di na lha yul ba'i//me tog khyad par 'phags pa
428a7(mdo sde): ji snyed pa//de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus nas su//skyes bu khyu mchog la ni mchod pa gyis//sems can mchog la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir//dri zhim
428b1(mdo sde): yid 'ong khyad par 'phags pa'i dri//dus kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i tsAn+dan gyis//spos kyi ngad ldang 'di la bdug pa gyis//glu dbyangs sil snyan rnam mang yod 'ong ba//mi 'am
428b2(mdo sde): ci dag rtag rtse gar byed pa//ldan par byas la dga' zhing dang ba yis//rkang gnyis mchog la mchod pa rab tu gyis//mtshungs pa med pa mthong ba rnyed dka' ba//de bzhin
428b3(mdo sde): gshegs la lha yI gdugs rnams dong //ba dan dag dang rgyal mtshan chos gos dang //bla re mang po yid 'ong gzung bar byos//sangs rgyas mchod pas bde 'gror 'gro
428b4(mdo sde): bar 'gyur//brgya byin dang ni 'jig rten skyong bar 'gyur//rmongs pa dag dang dbang byed dbang phyug dang //lha dang mi yi bdag po chen por 'gyur//mi mchog mchod pas
428b5(mdo sde): gzugs dang kha dog dang //grags dang brjod dang 'khor dang longs spyod dang //de bzhin dbang phyug dang ni snyan tshig dang //de bzhin gzung bar 'os pa'i tshig tu 'gyur//gang
428b6(mdo sde): dag 'dir ni lha dang de bzhin du//mi rnams kyi ni 'dus byas bde ba dang //bde ba bde bas tshim par 'dod pa rnams//'jig rten mgon po de la mchod pa gyis//rang rgyal
428b7(mdo sde): byang chub de bzhin nyan thos dang //de ltar dam pa mchog gi theg pa dang //bdud kyi dpung rnams rab 'joms gang 'dod pas//sems can mchog de la ni mchod pa gyis//
429a1(mdo sde): de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos rang gi g.yog 'khor thams cad la go bar byas te/me tog dang dri dang phreng ba dang /byug pa bsdogs nas ro brgya pa'i
429a2(mdo sde): zhal zas bshams te/ri'i rgyal po spos kyi ngad ldang gi lho phyogs kyi ngos la 'dug nas sil snyan dang glu dbyangs blangs te/rgyud kyi sgra dang glu'i sgra dang ldan pa'i tshigs
429a3(mdo sde): su bcad pa 'di dag gis dbyangs las tshigs su bcad te/bcom ldan 'das la dus bskul ba//phan pa mdzad cing bde mdzad dga' mdzad bcom ldan 'das//zhal
429a4(mdo sde): yang rab 'dzum zla ba'i ngos ltar dri mi mnga'//skyes mchog dge sbyong dam pa lha dang mis mchod pa//bde bar gshegs khyod 'dir gshegs pa yi dus 'di lags//
429a5(mdo sde): stobs bcu rnams kyi stobs mnga' pha rol dpung 'joms pa//gzhan gyi tshogs rnams 'joms shing 'gro la phan pa mdzad//'jo dang rnyog pa rnams dang dri ma 'thab
429a6(mdo sde): spangs pa//phan pa mdzad pa khyod 'dir gshegs pa'i dus 'di lags//sbyangs pa'i yon tan rdul sbyangs the tshom rnam par gtor//dran dang blo gros blo yangs mos
429a7(mdo sde): rtogs blo gros ldan//'gro rgyal rtag tu 'gro ba 'gro med 'gro ba spangs//phan po mdzad cing dga' mdzad rab tu dgyes pa'i thugs//nyi ma zla ba nor bu glog rnams mdzes
429b1(mdo sde): pa'i 'od//brgya byin tshangs pa srid gsum lha tshogs 'od 'phrog cing //'od mdzad dpal sdug thub khyod 'od ni phan bgyid pas//'od 'di bsal nas rgyal ba'i 'od ni lhag ge
429b2(mdo sde): yi//khyod kyi lto skod klu skad mi tsa'i klu sgra yis//yang dang yang du 'bar ba'i nyon mongs zhi bar bgyid//skad mchog yangs pa tshangs pa rnams kyi sgra skad kyis//nyon mongs
429b3(mdo sde): thams cad zhi bar bgyid pas 'bar ma legs//sman pa gang dag phyogs bcur rgyu yang de dag gis//gang du'ang 'gro ba'i nyon mongs zhi bar bgyir mi nus//sman pa'i rgyal
429b4(mdo sde): po bla med gang tshe gzung brjod pa//de tshe nyon mongs kun zhi bde ba thams cad sbyin//shin tu ngo mtshar 'od dang stobs mchog mtshungs med stobs//gsung ni skyon bral 'khrul
429b5(mdo sde): pa mi mnga' dgra 'dul ba//rdul med rab rib bdag gi mun pa shin tu bcom//dgra bral phan mdzad khyed kyi dus lags 'dir gshegs gsol//sbyin dang dul dang legs
429b6(mdo sde): spyod mi mnyam mtshungs dang mnyam//tshul khrims brtul zhugs mi 'khrugs brtul zhugs dka' thub dgyes//bzod dang dul dang shin tu dge la nges pa'i thugs//dga'
429b7(mdo sde): gsung dgra rnams kyi ni dga' spong gshegs su gsol//dbang po stobs dang lam dgyes bsam gtan mngon mkhyen rol//dran dang blo gros rtogs dang mos la gnas
430a1(mdo sde): thugs//'od ni rab tu lhug go shin tu dgyes pa'i thugs//yon tan mnga' ba khyod 'dir glashegs pa'i dus 'di lags//byams dang snying rje dga'
430a2(mdo sde): dang btang snyoms bsgom pa'i thugs//skyon gyi mun pa bcom zhing bag la nyal dang bral//tshangs pa'i lam ni rab bslabs rgyal ba'i lum la gnas//dga' mdzad
430a3(mdo sde): bde bar gshegs pa dus lags gshogs su gsol//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos dus bskul ba'i tshigs su bcad pa gsan nas
430a4(mdo sde): dge slong gi dge 'dun la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos dus bskul gyis lhung bzed dang /chos gos thogs la zhag bdun gnas pa'i
430a5(mdo sde): gtsug lag khang skyong yang bskos shig/de nas byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan 'di snyam du sems te/'di ltar bdag gis khang pa brtsegs pa bkod pa 'di lta
430a6(mdo sde): bu sprul la khang pa brtsegs pa der/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' dang nyan thos kyi tshogs dang bcas pa bzhugs te/rin po che bkod pa'i seng ge'i khril bzhugs
430a7(mdo sde): pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa bdag gis lag pa g.yas par blangs d+d+hi/nam mkha'i ngos las ri'i rgyal po spos kyi ngad ldang du bkur bar byin gyis brlab bo//de nas byang chub
430b1(mdo sde): sems dpa' lha'i cod pan de'i tshe 'di lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga bzang pa b+hU rtsegs pa
430b2(mdo sde): tshad dpag tshad bcu pa bkra ba blta na sdug pa gru bzhi pa/kA baM bzhi zug pa che mnyam pa/shin tu rnam par phye ba byung ngo //khang pa brtsegs pa der stobs dad ldan pa'i pad+ma nadon
430b3(mdo sde): pa'i khri rnams kyang byung ngo //khang pa brtsegs pa der bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan rin po che'i pad+ma bkod pa'i seng ge'i blo 'phang du mi bdun yod pa byung ngo //de nas byang chub sems
430b4(mdo sde): dpa' lha'i cod pan gyis khang pa brtsegs pa bkod pa dang /seng ge'i khri bkod pa 'di lta bu 'di byas nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bdag la thugs brtse
430b5(mdo sde): bi'i slad du bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' dang nyan thos chen po 'di dgra dang thabs tsaM ka tI khang pa brtsegs pa seng ge'i khri bshams pa 'dir bzhugs su gsol//btsar
430b6(mdo sde): ldan 'das bdag gis khang po brtsegs pa 'di sdug pa g.yas pas blangs te/ri'i rgyal po spos kyi ngad ldang du 'tshal nas bzhag par bgyi'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub
430b7(mdo sde): sems dpa' lha'i cod pan la thugs brtse ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' dang nyan thos chen po de dag dang thabs cig tu khang pa brtsegs pa der ji ltar khri bshams pa de dko la bzhunas
431a1(mdo sde): so//de nas byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan gyis khung pa rtsegs pa de lag mthil g.yas par thA s+ya te/sgreng gi nam mtha' las rdzu 'phrul
431a2(mdo sde): slong ngo //de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu dang /gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' lta cod pan gyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul 'di mthong na
431a3(mdo sde): tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs shong rab tu dga' ste dga' ba dang /yod bde ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i cod pan po
431a4(mdo sde): mchod pa'i las kyi phyir me tog dang /'dug pa dang /spos dang phreng ba dang /byug pa thams cad thogs te/sil snyan dang pheg rdob pa byas nas bcom ldan 'das khang pa
431a5(mdo sde): gas pa na bzhugs shing /nam mapa'i ngos las gshegs pa la mchod pa byas te/ri'i rgyal po spos kyi ngang ljang du phyin to//mI 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos bcom
431a6(mdo sde): ldan 'das khang pa brtsegs pa na bzhugs shing nam mkha'i ngos las gshegs pa mthong ngo //mthong nas mi 'am ci dang /dri zo brgyad khri bzhi stong gis bsgyur te/me tog
431a7(mdo sde): dpe/bdug pa dang /spos dang phreng ba dang /byug pa thams cad thogs nas sil snyan dang /pheg rdob pa dang glu dbyangs len pa'i bkod pa byas te/bcom ldan 'das
431b1(mdo sde): bskya ba'i phyir byung ngo //de nas mi 'am ci'i tshul ba sdong po dpung dang bcas 'khor dang bcas s+ho//bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs lo mag bos phyag btso lda nas rdo zla thogs
431b2(mdo sde): pa'i me tog dang /bdug pa dang spos dang /phreng ba dang byug pa de dag dang /sil snyan dang /pheg rdob pa dang /glu dbyangs len pas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas so//
431b3(mdo sde): denas bcom ldan 'das kyis dus la bab par mkhyen nas/byang chub sems dpa' dang nyin thos chen po dang /bid+ma byin dang tshangs pa dang /'jig rten spyong ba dang /dem
431b4(mdo sde): yin pa gzhan lce'i bu rnams dang /thabs cig tu ma 'am ci'i rmel po sdong pos 'khor gyi khyams bkod pa gal ba dor gshegs te rang gi seng ge'i khri jo ltar bshams
431b5(mdo sde): pab la bzhugs so//byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang nyan thos kyi tshogs thams cad so so ci rigs par 'khod do//mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos brgya byin dang tshangs pa
431b6(mdo sde): dang /'jig rten skyong po dang 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag la smras pa/grogs po dag de bzhin gshegs pa dang thabs cig tu gdugs chod
431b7(mdo sde): gsol gyis/khyod thams cad 'dus la tshur spyon//de nas mi'o ma ci'i rgyal po sdong po smras dang bcas/bu dang bcas/rang gi skye bo dang bcas 'khor dang bcas/
432a1(mdo sde): g.yog dang bcas te rang rang gi lag gis baDU bA dang /bca' ba gya nos pa mang po ro dang ldan pa/ro brgya 'i na lnga zlas sna tshogs bcoMm+b+ha n+dan//

432a3(mdo sde): byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lhung bzed bzhag ste/phyag bcabs par rig nas/dpung dang bcas g.yog dang bcas te/chos nyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan
432a4(mdo sde): 'das kyi spyan sngar ji ltar bdag le 'os pa'i stan la 'dug go//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po dang skye bo'i tshogs phal po che de dag la
432a5(mdo sde): chos kyi gtam yid dag par ston to//yang dag par 'dzin du bcug go/bzed bstod do//rab tu dga' bar mdzad do//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi
432a6(mdo sde): gtam ni 'di yin te/mi ma ci'i bdag po rnam pa sum cu rtswa gnyis kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag
432a7(mdo sde): pa yin no//rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na 'di lta ste/mi 'am ci'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa byin pa na byang chub kyi sems sngon du 'gro ba'i sbyin pa dag
432b1(mdo sde): sbyin pa dang /theg pa chung ngu spangs pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa de byin pa dang /slong pa la zhe sdang ba med pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa de byin pa dang /len pa rnams la sbyin gnas su
432b2(mdo sde): 'du shes bskyed de srin pa de byin pa dang /ldan pa rnams la dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 'du shes bskyed de smin pa de byin pa dang /nang gi kun nas nyon mongs pa'i dri mo spangs te/
432b3(mdo sde): sbyin pa de byin po dang /kun tu 'dzin pa med pa'i sems kyi dga' ba dang /dang ba dang mchog tu dga' bo thob nas sbyin pa de byin pa dang /lag pa brkyang ste grol bas gtong ba
432b4(mdo sde): rnam par gtong ba la dga' bas sbyin pa de byin pa dang /rgya chen po la mos te zhum pa med pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa de byin pa dang /snod thams cad la mi gnas par sbyin pa de
432b5(mdo sde): byin pa dang /rnam par smin pa la ra ba med par sbyin pa de byin pa dang /lan la re ba med pa'i sbyin pa de byin po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos tshol ba'i blos sbyin pa de byin pa dang /
432b6(mdo sde): thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes su bsngos te sbyin pa de byin pa dang /gdung ba med pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa de byin pa dang /bsdu ba'i dngos po sngon du 'gro bas sbyin pa de byin
432b7(mdo sde): pa dang /sems can yongs su smin par bya ba 'i phyir sbyin pa de byin pa dang /chos 'dzin par gyur cig snyam s+t+wa~M sbyin pa de byin pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'o gsung dong
433a1(mdo sde): mthun par gyur cig snyam ste sbyin pa de byin pa dang /bdag bdud kyi phyogs char gcod par gyur cig ces te sbyin pa de byin pa dang /bdag byang chub
433a2(mdo sde): kyi lam rnam par spyod par gyur cig ces sbyin pa de byin pa dang /bdag skyes bu rna ma pa'i las byed par gyur cig ces sbyin pa de byon pa dang /bdag yi dgas kyi lam rnam
433a3(mdo sde): par spyod par gyur cig ces te sbyin pa de byon pa dang /bdag gi bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba'i rgyur phyur cig ces sbyin pa de byin pa dang /bdag gis longs spyod

433a5(mdo sde): la dge ba'i bshes gnyen dkon par ma gyur cig ces te sbyin pa de byin pa dang /bdag la sems can thams cad dga' ba'i mig dang ldan par gyur cig ces te sbyin pa byin

433a7(mdo sde): tshogs pa gzhan rnams kyi rjes su slob par gyur cig ces te sbyin pa byin pa dang /bdag mtshan dang dpe byed bzang po bsags pa yongs su 'dzin par gyur cig ces te
433b1(mdo sde): sbyin pa byin pa dang /bdag sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong ba dang bdag spangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon sum du gyur cig ces te sbyin pa byin pa ste/mi 'am ci'i
433b2(mdo sde): bodag po rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag gis/byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no//mi 'om tsi'i bdag po rnam pa sum cu//

433b4(mdo sde): chags dang /zhe sdang dang /gti mug dang bral bas lus yongs su dag pa'i tshul khrims dang /bdag gi lha sangs rgyas la mi slu ba'i mtshan nyid kyis drag yongs

433b6(mdo sde): tshogs pa myong bas dge ba bcu'i las kyi las yongs su dag pa'i tshul khrims dang /nyi tshe ba'i sa thams cad mi ston pas byang chub kyi sems dang /bsam pa mi brjed

434a2(mdo sde): dang /sems can thams cad yongs su skyob pas snying rje chen po la rab tu sbyor ba'i tshul khrims dang dam bcas pas stobs kyis bslab pa rdzogs pa med pa

434b1(mdo sde): bdag la mi bstod gzhan la mi smod pa'i tshul khrims dang /nyon mongs pa med pas nges par sems pa'i snying rje'i tshul khrims dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams

438a1(mdo sde): dag pa dang /sems can la lta ba'i snying rje chen po yongs su dag pa dang /shes rab la 'jug pas rab rib med cing snang ba yongs su dag pa dang /rgyu
438a2(mdo sde): dang 'bras bu dang rnam par smin pa dang mi 'gal ba yongs su dag pa dang /chos la sems pa'i bzod pa yongs su dag pa dang /tshu la bzhin gyi rnam pa'i chos la
438a3(mdo sde): so sor rtog pa yongs su dag pa dang /thabs la mkhas pa bsdu ba yongs su dge pa dang /byang chub kyi snying po bsgrub pa yongs su dag pa dang /nyan thos dang rang sangs
438a4(mdo sde): rgyas dang mi 'dre ba yongs su dag pa dang /mi g.yo ba'i bas mi gtan bsgrub pa yongs su dag pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin thob pa la mi g.yeng ba yongs
438a5(mdo sde): su dag pa dang /sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa lta ba yongs su dag pa dang /sems can thams cad kyi dbang po'i mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes
438a6(mdo sde): nas so sor ci rigs par chos ston pa yongs su dag pa ste/mi 'am ci'i bdag po rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag gis/byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan
438a7(mdo sde): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no//mi 'am ci'i bdag po rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su
438b1(mdo sde): dag pa yin no//sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/di lta ste thos pa tshol bas mi ngoms pas mang du thos pa dang /tshul bzhin yid la byed pas chos rnams la dpyod pa'i shesapa
438b2(mdo sde): lA mkhas pa dang /byang chub mngon sum du byed pa'i bdag nyid chos bsgrub pa shes pa dang /phung po la mkhas pA la 'jug pas rlom par grol ba shes pa dang /chos rgya
438b3(mdo sde): dbyings la mkhas pa'o shes pa dang /skye mchod la mkhas pa'i shes pa dang /rgyu dang bya ba khong du chud pas stong pa'i rnam par rten cing 'brel par 'thung ba la mkhas pa dang /
438b4(mdo sde): badron pa la mkhas pa'i shes pa dang /dror mi ltung bar skyon med pa la 'jug pa shes pa dang /bsems bzhin du skye bas skye ba la sa mar mi rtog pa'i shes pa dang /bzod ma
438b5(mdo sde): nas rnam par dag pas chos thams cad mi skye bar shes po dang /phyin ci log tu gyur pa yongs su smin par byed pas soms can thams cad bdag med par shes pa dang /'dod
438b6(mdo sde): chags dang bral ba'i mdza'i phyir chos thams cad chos gcig tu shes pa dang /nam mkha' dang mtshungs po'i phyir zhing thams cad zhing gcig tu shes pa dang /chos kyi dbyings
438b7(mdo sde): bsam gyis mi khyab pa la zhugs pas sangs rgyas thams cad sangs rgyas gcig tu shes pa dang /yi ge shes pa la mkhas pas chos kyi tshig rab tu dbye ba bstan pa shes pa dang /
439a1(mdo sde): legs par bshadadu pas sems can thams cad tshim par byed pa'i phyir chags pa med pa'i spobs pas chos rgya cher shes pa dang /thos pa thams cad
439a2(mdo sde): 'dzin pas gzungs brjed pa med pa'i shes pa dang /bdud de dag byang chub tu yongs su smin par byed pas/bdud kyi las thams cad khong du chud pa'i shes pa dang /rnam
439a3(mdo sde): par bsgrubs te so sor nye bar gnas par shes pas chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur rtog pa'i shos pa dang /shin tu yongs su grub pa med pa'i tshul gyis chos thams
439a4(mdo sde): cad rmi lam dang /smig rgyu dang chu zla dang /mig yor dang brag ca lta bu'i tshul du ston pa shes pa dang /shes pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir sems can gyi sems kyi spyod
439a5(mdo sde): pa thams cad khong du chud pa'i shes pa dang /shin tu bslabs pa'i phyir 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa brtags par shes pa'i thabs la mkhas pa dang /rnam par thar pa'i
439a6(mdo sde): sgo'i phyir stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med po'i rnam pa'i chos shes pa dang /gzod ma nas bral ba med pa'i phyir chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis zhi ba
439a7(mdo sde): dang /rab tu zhi ba dang /nye bar zhi bar shes pa dang /ma rig pa dang /gti mug gi mun pa kun tu bcom pa'i phyir chos thams cad la rab rib med cing snang ba thob pa
439b1(mdo sde): dang /chos thams cad gar yang mI'i gdunas kyang ma 'ong bar shes pas shes rab kyi 'od dang ldan zhing sems can thams cad la rnam par thar pa'i chos ston pa dang /lus da
439b2(mdo sde): khong chud pas sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang 'gro bar skye ba ston pa dang /don dang chos dang nges pa'i tshig dang spobs pa'i tshul la mkhas te khyad par de kho na'i lung ston paso//
439b3(mdo sde): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi thob pa dang /bdag dul ba dang zhi ba dang /grol ba dang sbas pa dang /byang bas yongs su mya ngan las zlo ba'i phyir don yod pa'i chos ston pa dang /
439b4(mdo sde): dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis de shes rab las nges par byung bar rig nas chos kyi grong khyer thams cad yongs su skyong bar byin
439b5(mdo sde): gyis rlob pa dang /phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpe'i sa la yang dag par gzhol te/mtha' la gnas pa'i tshul nges par byas pas lung bstan pa'i sa rab tu thob pa
439b6(mdo sde): yin te/mi 'am tsi'i bdag po rnam po sum cu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no//mi 'am ci'i
439b7(mdo sde): bdag po byang chub sems dpa' rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan na thabs la mkhas par rig par bya'o//sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na 'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpa'
440a1(mdo sde): bdag zad par mi byed pas sems can la lta ba dang /sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir bsod nams chen po la gnas pa
440a2(mdo sde): dang /sems can thams cad kyi skyon gnas kyi phyir sbyin gnas mi tshol ba dang /sems can dbul po yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir rgya chen po don du mi
440a3(mdo sde): gnyer ba dang /sems can thams cad ngag bsdom po la sbyar ba'i phyir/lkug pa dang /dag pa lta bur ston pa dang /bud med dang bu mo yongs su smin
440a4(mdo sde): par bya ba'i phyir/bud med yongs su 'dzin pa dang /khye'u yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/khye'u'i gzugs su ston pa dang /sems can yongs su smin
440a5(mdo sde): par bya ba dang mthun par bya ba'i phyir/gzugs thams cad ston pa dang /sems can myos pa yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/myos pa ma yin yang myos pa'i
440a6(mdo sde): lus su ston pa dang /de la mim pa'i sems can rnams la chos ston pa'i phyir/smyon pa dang sems g.yongs po'i gzhogs su ston pa dang /sems can yongs
440a7(mdo sde): su smin par bya ba'i phyir/lo brgyar bsags pa'i tshul khrims kyi phung po 'dor ba dang /chos 'dzin du gzhug pa'i phyir/sems can rnams la dga' ba
440b1(mdo sde): thams cad la rtse ba dang /longs spyod ston pa dang /de la mos pa'i sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/g.yon can ma rungs pas 'tsho ba'o lus su ston pa dang /
440b2(mdo sde): bud med gang tshong dpon dang /phyi ma bdag dang /rgyalnga po'i chung mar gyur pa bu med pa bu'i tshe 'dod pa'i mya ngan gyi zug rngu dang ldan zhing sdug bsngal gyi tsher ba myong ba la de na
440b3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpas de dag dge ba la dad cing /yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir de'i bur khas len pa dang /'brog dgon par song ba'i sems can dbul po la bza'
440b4(mdo sde): ba dang /btung ba dang nor sbyin zhing bgo ba shA bya ba'i phyir 'gron po mang po'i nang du dang dben du 'gyur ba dang /gter chen po'i mdun du bzhag ste nor gyi phung po chen po 'byin
440b5(mdo sde): nas chos ston pa dang /mya ngan gyi zug rngu dang ldan pa'o sems can rnams kyi mya ngan gyi zug rngu bsal nas/rdzu 'phrul gyis chos ston pa dang /gter ston pa'i sems can
440b6(mdo sde): rnams kyi mdun du gter tshon po nye bar bstan nas 'tsho ba yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir chos ston pa dang /de dag sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la dgug pa'i phyir gzhan mu stegs
440b7(mdo sde): can spyod pa can dang /kun tu rgyu ba rnams kyi nang du rab tu 'byung ba dang /sems can 'dod chags kyi lcags kyus zin po rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir smad 'tshong
441a1(mdo sde): /ma'i khyim dang /sgras kyi nang du bu mo'i gzugs mdzes pa blta na sdug par ston pa dang /sems can rnams mos pA dz+rI lta ba bzhin du chos kyis yangs/
441a2(mdo sde): su smin par bya ba'i phyir 'dus pa chen po dang /tshogs pa ming po'i nang du rnga dang /dzi m+b+hi dang gi dang rngu pa nA ba dang dung gi sgras sa chen po mdzes par byas nas/bdag
441a3(mdo sde): bar ston cing sems can 'dus pa de dag la rol mo'i dbyangs sgra de dag las chos ston pa'i sgra 'byin cing bzo'i gnas thams cad nye bar ston pa dang /mya ngan du sod pa
441a4(mdo sde): 'dron pa bza' ba dang /btung bzed pa la mngon paro shes pa chen pos rnam par rtse zhing de'i stobs kyis bza' ba dang /btung ba byin nas bkres pa dang bral zhing
441a5(mdo sde): sgom pa dang bral ba'i sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang /sems can gang dag dmus long du gyur pa de dag gi nang du dmus long lta bur gyur nas/dbul po
441a6(mdo sde): mig med pa de dag la rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis bza' ba dang /btung ba 'byor par byas nas/mgo byin te nang gi gzugs bstan nas/ji ltar de dag bla ni med pa
441a7(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar chos ston pa dang /rgyal po'i khri srin du bcug pa'i srog chags brgya phyag dum g.yon can sna
441b1(mdo sde): tshogs dang ldan pa de dag yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/bsam bzhin du bdag rkun por ston cing de g.yon can no zhes shes par byas nas/khri mun du bcug pa dang de
441b2(mdo sde): der zhugs nas rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis btsongs po/de dag gi lus bkrus shing bskus te/gos bzang po bskon nas bza' bo dang /btung bas lus tshim par byas
441b3(mdo sde): te/bcings pa dam pa de dag las dkrol nas ji ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ba de lta bur chos ston pa dang /sems can gang dog
441b4(mdo sde): rgyal pos bsad par dkri ba srog 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa thob pa sdug bsngal gyis nyams zag pa de dge yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
441b5(mdo sde): chen pos rdzu 'phrul gyis gzhan dag cig sprul te/rdzu 'phrul gyis gshed ma la dkris nas gasred par 'os pa'i mi de dag bcings pa de los bkrol te/'jigs pa dang
441b6(mdo sde): brad+ya ba drog rnyed pa dang /dbugs byin pa de dge ba ji ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ba de lta de lta bur chos ston pa dang /phyogs gang
441b7(mdo sde): do dang /nor dang /zhing deng/bye po dang /bran po dang bran mo dang /mi las byed po dang dmag mi'i phyir 'azab po dang /rtsod pa dang 'ged pa dang /'chang
442a1(mdo sde): 'dru bar gyur pa der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs kyis dbus su 'dug nas rdzu 'phrul gyis don dang /nor dang rin po che yongs su
442a2(mdo sde): btang ste/de dag 'dum par sbyor ro//de dag 'dum par rig nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang /byang chub sems
442a3(mdo sde): dpa' thabs la mkhas pas yon lag dang /nying lag thams cad kyis dbang po nyams pa med kyang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir dbang po nyams par
442a4(mdo sde): yang ston pa dang /spyod lam phun sum tshogs kyang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir spyod lam thams cad 'khrugs par yang byed pa dang /byang chub sems
442a5(mdo sde): dpa' thabs la mkhaso pas gzhan mu stegs can ston pa dang /ring du gnas pa bdud kyi spyod yul la spyod pa/bdud kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i mu stegs can de dag
442a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la dgug pa'i phyir de dag gi mdun du dkon mchog gsum gyi bsngags pa brjod pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pas sems
442a7(mdo sde): can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las log nas bsam bzhin du 'dod
442b1(mdo sde): pa'i khams su skye ste/mya ngan las 'das pa 'dod pa rnams la skye ba'i sdug bsngal bstan nas dben pa thob pa rnams bla ma'i lam bsgom du gzud pa'i phyir/mya ngan las
442b2(mdo sde): 'das pa ston po dang /skyon med pa la ma zhugs pa la mya ngan las 'das par 'gro bar 'dun pa rnams kyi mdun du/byang chub sems dpa' thobs la mkhas pa
442b3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi sku ston pa dang /sangs rgyas la dad pa thob cing /sems mnyam par bzhug po rnams byang chub kyi sems len du gzung ba'i phyir/rkyen 'di shes pa la
442b4(mdo sde): 'jug pa nye bar ston pa ste/mi 'am ci'i bdag po rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas par rig par
442b5(mdo sde): bya'o//pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs la mkhas pa la 'jug pa yongs su dag pa'i le'u 'di bstan pa na/mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po'i 'khor dang /de ma yin pa
442b6(mdo sde): go zhan lha dang /klu dang gnod sbyin dang /dri zla'i srog chags dgu khri brgyad sto/ni bla na med pa yi dag par rdzogs pa'i byed chub tu sems skyes so//bcom ldan 'das
442b7(mdo sde): kyi 'khor byang chub sems dpa' las byang chub sems dpa' khri brgyad stong ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa ra tu thob par gyur te//mi 'am mo'i rgyal po sdong po ni shes
443a1(mdo sde): rab sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin myur tu//de rnam mnya ma d+hi'i rgyurma sdong mo bcom ldan 'das kyis/chos kyi gtam gyis ra tu/
443a2(mdo sde): dga' bar byas yang dag par 'dzin du btsud/gzengs du spyod/yang dag pa bstan pas tshim zhing mgre la m+b+hi rlangs shing rab tu dga' ste/dga' ba dang /sring
443a3(mdo sde): bde ba skyes nos/chen 'ad med pa'i rus bac+doM sa m+b+ha lkugs gcig nacom ldan 'das la mngon par bka/ba gro// ba~M seMn+das dpa'i dge 'dun dang /nyan thos
443a4(mdo sde): dge 'dun thams cad la'ang rin thang med pa'i gos kyis so sor bkab bo//gnas thams cad ni yongs su longs spyod pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das la phul lo//de nas
443a5(mdo sde): me ma tsa'i rgyal po sdong bro'i bu brgyad stong pos rin po che'i pad+ma bkod pa dang /rin po che'i gdugs brgyud stong du tshing bso bcom ldan 'das la man mar bkab ste/
443a6(mdo sde): gtor ma tha gro tu sang me rgyas kyi mthus de dag thams cad 'khor gyi khyams der bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i blong tha~Md kyi steng gi bar snang la dpag tshad sbyong ba ma na rin po che
443a7(mdo sde): dugs gcig tu ga bar gyur to//de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po'i bu brgyad stong mi bcom ldan 'das kyi cho 'phrul chen po 'di mthong da tshim zhing mthu
443b1(mdo sde): lho yi rings shing rab ci pur ste/dpa' ba dang yid bde zo skyes na lkug pa'i ba sgom byas blan med pa yin dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do//dengan
443b2(mdo sde): gis byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'ad skad cesmra gsol to//bsgom ldan 'das gang thos pas bdeg drug byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos yang dag
443b3(mdo sde): sgrub par 'gyur ba byang chub tu yongs su smin par bgyid pa'i chos de bzhin ga shogs pa dar+m+ma bsgrim po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bdag cag la bshad nu
443b4(mdo sde): ga sol/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mi 'am ci'i rgyal blo sdong po'i bu de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nas ta le bdun srid kyi steng gi bar snang la skyil mo krung bcas
443b5(mdo sde): te bzhugs nas sku las 'di lta bu'i 'od phyung ste/'odra des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khamos 'di snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to//gong mi 'am ci dang /
443b6(mdo sde): dri za dad lto 'phye de dag dang /'dod pa ni spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gi rol mo si laM snyan rnam pa sna tshogs de dag thams cid ma brdungs ma dkrol bar mdzes pa dang ldan par 'a
443b7(mdo sde): lo//ze'i rgyal po spos kyi 'angad ljang ne dri'i shing dang me tog ge shing dang 'bras bu'i shing ji snyed pa de dag las kyang rol mo sil snyan gyi sgra byung ngo //bcom ldan 'das
444a1(mdo sde): spu'i khung bu thams cad nas kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgyad stong byung ngo //'od zer thams cad kyi rtse mo las kyang pad+ma chad shing rta'i 'khor lo tsam dag
444a2(mdo sde): byung ngo //pad+ma'i snying po thams cad la'ang byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun tu rgyan po'i lus dag gnas par kun tu
444a3(mdo sde): snang ngo //sangs rgyas kyi mthus rol mo sil snyan de dag las ni yongs su 'dri ba'i tshigs su bcad pa byung /byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad ni sgra dbyangs
444a4(mdo sde): dang skad cig gi tshigs su bcad nas nges par len 'dri bas so//de la sil snyan las tshigs su bcad pa/blo na med pa'i byang chub sems//ji lta bur ni skyed pa
444a5(mdo sde): dang //byang chub snying por 'dug par du//sems ni rjed pa med par 'gyur//byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/sems can kun gyi tshad kyi
444a6(mdo sde): phyir//lhog pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs//snying rje che dang ldan pa ni//byang chub sems brjed mi 'gyur ro//sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/de dag bsam
444a7(mdo sde): pa ji lta bu//rab tu 'byor pa tsa 'dra zhig/de dag snying rje chen po la//nges par sems pa ji ltar skye//byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/g.yo
444b1(mdo sde): me lhag pa'i blasam pa ste//de dag sbyor ba bcos ma smin//mya dran 'da' sgor 'jog pa ni//de dag snying rje de 'dra'o//sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/de dgag
444b2(mdo sde): ba ji lta bu//ji ltar byin nas 'gyod mod cing //rnam smin don du mi gnyer bar//byang chub tu ni sngo bar byed//byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa//
444b3(mdo sde): dngos po kun la mi lta ba//des ni byin nas 'gyod pa med//byang chub lam du 'jog byed pa//de phyir rnam smin ro ba med//sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ji ltar tshul
444b4(mdo sde): khrims ldan gyur kyang //tshul khrims kyis ni rlom sems med//theg chen bla na med pa la//ngang tshul ngan can smin par byin//byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams
444b5(mdo sde): kyis smras pa/byang chub sems kyi tshul khrims ldan//stong pa nyid kyi rlom sems med//byams pa chen po skyed pa ni//ngang tshul ngon can yod smin byed//sil snyen
444b6(mdo sde): rnams kyis smras pa/ji ltar na ni sems can gyi//spyos shing sdigs pa bzod byed cing //sems kyi gnod pa mi byed la//mchog tu dga' ba skye bar 'gyur//byeng
444b7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/bdag ni sems can thams cad kyi//nyon mongs gso ba'i sman po snyam//de dag ngan par smras po yi//tshig thos ni
445a1(mdo sde): sdang mi 'gyur ro//sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/de dag brtson 'grus ji lta bu//pha rol gnon pa'ang ci 'dra zhig/ji ltar zhum pa med sems kyi//
445a2(mdo sde): byang chub spyad pa spyod par 'gyur//byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/chos dang sems can bsrung ba ni//phyi rol gnon dang brtson 'grus so//dge
445a3(mdo sde): bo'i rtsa bso brtan pa ni//des na se mos ni zhum mi 'gyur//sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/de dag ji ltar dran dang ldan//blo gros rtog par khong du chud//ji ltar
445a4(mdo sde): bsam gtan bsam gtan byed//de la chags pa med par 'gyur//byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/g.yeng ba med pa dran dang ldan//tshul 'chos med/
445a5(mdo sde): pa blo gros ldan//thabs kyis bsam gtan bsam gtan byed//des na de la chags mi 'gyur//sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ji ltar shes rab ldan pa dang //yang dag
445a6(mdo sde): lta ba drang po dang //chos rnams rnam par dbye ba la//mkhas shing 'jigs pa med par 'gyur//byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/thos pas shes
445a7(mdo sde): rab kun tu 'phel//rten pas lte ba drang por 'gyur//chos kyis sbyin pas nges 'gyur te//tshul bzhin gyis ni don rtogs 'gyur//sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/rdzi
445b1(mdo sde): lhultar zos pa btsal bas na//de dag thos pa mang du 'gyur//gang gis che ba'i bdag 'gyur bar//thos pa'i chos rnams ston par 'gyur//byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams/
445b2(mdo sde): kyis smras pa//gus par byas te thos tshul zhing //sgrub pa'i thos pa mang du 'gyur//zang zing med par chos sbyin pa//des ni che ba'i bdag nyid 'gyur//sil snyan rnams kyis smras
445b3(mdo sde): pa/de dag byams pa ji lta bu//de dag snying rje ci 'dra zhig/de dag dga' bo ji lta bu//btang snyoms kyang ni ci 'dra zhig/byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/
445b4(mdo sde): sems dang bsam snyoms byams pa zhig/sems can 'grol ba snying rje'o//sangs rgyas chos dga' dga' ba ste//gnyis sbyongs pa ni btang snyoms so//sil snyan rnams kyis
445b5(mdo sde): smras pa/ji ltar sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur//sems kyang ji ltar mthong bar 'gyur//chos thos nas ni ji lta bur//de dag the tshom skye mi 'gyur//byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs
445b6(mdo sde): rnams kyis smras pa/sangs rgyas rjes su dran bsgoms pa//des ni 'dren pa mthong bar 'gyur//the tshom med cing bsam dag pas//chos thos nas no som nyi med//sil sbyin
445b7(mdo sde): rnams kyis smras pa/bsod nams tshogs ni ji lta bu//ye shes tshogs kyang ci 'dra zhig/de dag zhe gnas lhag mthong la//brtson pa yang ni ji lta bu//byang chub sems
446a1(mdo sde): dpa' gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/dmas mi shes pa bsod nams tshogs//'dri ba rnams ni ye shes tshogs//zhi ba'i sems ni zhi gnas te/
446a2(mdo sde): chos shes pa ni lhag mthong ngo //sil snyun rnams kyis smras pa/de dag gi ni spyod yul gang //de dag gnas kyang ji lta bu//de dag gnas pa ci 'dra zhig/de dag sbyor//
446a3(mdo sde): ba'ang ji lta bu//byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/de dge spyod yul stong pa nyid//gnas ni pha rol phyin pa'i lam//gnas pa bsam gtan
446a4(mdo sde): bzhi rnams te//sems can rab grol sbyor ba'o//sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/de dag bdud kyi las gang yin//sangs rgyas 'phrin las ji lta bu//ci 'dra ba yi las
446a5(mdo sde): byas na//byang chub la ni gzhol bar 'gyur//byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/theg pa chung ngu bdud kyi las//sangs rgyas phrin las theg pa che//
446a6(mdo sde): sdig pa thams cad spong ba ni//byang chub gzhol bar 'gyur ba'o//sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/de dag grogs bstan ji lta bu//sdig pa'i grogs po ci 'dra/
446a7(mdo sde): zhig/log par lta ba mi gnas shing //de ltar yang dag song bar 'gyur//byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/gang zhig byang chub lam ston
446b1(mdo sde): pa//rtag tu bde sbyin grogs po'o//byang chub sems las gang zlog pa//de dgra sdig pa'i grogs po shes//sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/lam du 'jug par 'gyur ba/
446b2(mdo sde): yi//lta ba drang po ji lta bu//sbyor ba rnam par shes nas su//ji ltar lta de 'jig mi byed//byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/las dang bya bar
446b3(mdo sde): 'jug pa ni//de dag drang por lto ba yin//log par sbyor ba rnam shes nas//lta po de dag 'jig mi byed//sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ji ltar dam po'i chos
446b4(mdo sde): bsrung zhing //sems can yongs su smin par byed//ji lta bu yi thangs kyis ni//de dag byang chub bsgrub par 'gyur//byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams
446b5(mdo sde): kyis smras pa/brtson 'grus kyi ni chos bsrung ste//bsdu bas yongs su smin par byed//mtho' gnyis rnam par spangs pas ni//byang chub sgrub par byed pa yin//sil
