446b6(mdo sde): snyun rnams kyis smras pa/de dag shes pa'i las ci 'dra//nga rgyal las ni ji lta bu//ji ltar bka' blo bde pa dang //thams cad dus su mthun par 'gyur//byang chub
446b7(mdo sde): sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/rtsod pa med pa'i shos pa'i las//nga rgyal las ni rtsod pa 'byung //nges par bka' blo bde ba ste//gus pa yis ni mthun
447a1(mdo sde): par 'gyur//sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/de dag lam ni ji lta bu//log pa'i lam yang ci 'dra zhig/bla med byang chub lam du ni//ji ltar sems
447a2(mdo sde): can rab tu 'god//byang chub sems dpa' gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/lam ni pha rol phyin pa drug/theg pa chung ngu log pa'i lom//shes rab thabs la
447a3(mdo sde): bslabs pa ni//se mos tsan lam la 'jud pa'o//sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ji lta bur na nor chen 'gyur//de dag rnyed pa'ang ci 'dra zhig/gter rnams
447a4(mdo sde): kyang ni ji lta bu//gang gis de dag 'gro tshim byed//byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/nor bdun dang ni rtag tu sngun//chos rnyed pa ni rnyed pa'o//
447a5(mdo sde): de dag gteru ni gzungs yin te//rab tu rnye do nas che mo par byed//sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/de dag gi ni pa ma gang //nye du'i tshogs ni ji lta bu//g.yog
447a6(mdo sde): rnams kyang ni ci 'dra zhig/gang gis mkhas pa de dag mdzes//byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ma ni shes rab pa ni thabs//nye du byang chub
447a7(mdo sde): phyogs rnams yin//dge ba rnams ni g.yog yin te//des ni mkhas pa de dag mdzes//sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ji ltar bdag med rtogs nas no//byams
447b1(mdo sde): papas 'gro ba khyab pur byed//bdag med pa dang /skams pad//de lta ltar mtshungs par 'gyur//byang chub sems pa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/gang dag stong nyid
447b2(mdo sde): rab shes po//de ni bdag med khong du chud//gang gis 'gro ba stong shes pa//de ni de yi byams po mchog/sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/'du byed rnams ni rang
447b3(mdo sde): bzhin gyis//'ong ba med cing 'gro med na//las dang las kyi rnam par smin//ji lta bur na 'thad par 'gyur//byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/dam
447b4(mdo sde): pa'i don du 'ong med de//gang du'ang 'gro ba yod ma yin//kun rdzob tu na lam 'jug cing //rnam par smin po nye bar ston//sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/stong nyid
447b5(mdo sde): mtshan ma med pa dang //smon lam rnam par spangs par ni//mtshan nyid gcig tu rab rtogs nas//de khri na ni ji ltar shes//byang chub sems dpa' gzugs rnams
447b6(mdo sde): kyis smras pa/stong nyid gang yin de mtshan med//mtshan ma ngon du gnyer med pa//mtshan nyid gcig cing don gcig ste//rnamo par thar pa'i sgo bstan to//sil snyan
447b7(mdo sde): rnams kyis smras pa/gang gis mya ngan 'das 'gro ba'i//stong par rtog pa ji lta bu//sems can lta ba ji lta bu//yongs su smin byed ji lta bu//byang chub sems dpa'//
448a1(mdo sde): gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/shes rab kyis ni stong par rtogs//thabs kyis sems can rnams la lta//snying rjes yongs su smin par byed//des
448a2(mdo sde): ni mya ngan 'das par 'gro/sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/chos 'di dag ni chos nyid kyis//skye ba med cing 'byung med par//tshul mchog 'di 'dra shis nas ni//gang
448a3(mdo sde): gis 'khor bar skye bar 'gyur//byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/mi skye bo dang mi 'gyur ba//de ni shes rab spyod yul lo//bsams bzhin du
448a4(mdo sde): ni gang skye ba//de ni thebs kyi tshul yin no//sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/gtong la dga' bar ji ltar 'gyur//ji lta bu ri no phyir mi ldog/ji ltar bzod pa
448a5(mdo sde): phuran sum tshogs//ji ltar rnam par nges par 'gyur//byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/mnyam par gnas par gtong la dga'//chos kyi
448a6(mdo sde): dbyings las phyir mi ldog/mi skye ba la bzod pa ste//chos shes nas ni rnam par nges//sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/byang chub snying po snying po gang //rdzogs pa'i
448a7(mdo sde): byang chub mtshan nyid gang //ci phyir rdzogs sangs rgyas shes bya//de bzhin gshegs pa ji ltar grol//byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/byang chub
448b1(mdo sde): snying po nam mkha' ste//byang chub nam mkha'i mtshan nyid do//gang yang kun nas gti mug med//de bzhin nyid phyir de bzhin gshegs//de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po'i
448b2(mdo sde): bu de dag gis tshigs su bcod pa 'di dag thos nas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob bo//de dag gis bzod pa rab tu thob nas rang rang gi gos dang rgyan bcom ldan 'das
448b3(mdo sde): la mngon par bkab ste/'di skad ces kyang gsol to//bcom ldan 'das gang gi slad du bdag cag gis nyan pa'i rna ba 'di lta bu thob pas sangs rgyas ni badrag cag gi ched
448b4(mdo sde): du byung ngo //bcom ldan 'das sil snyan dang glu dbyangs 'di dag las the tshom 'dri ba'i 'di lta bu byung ba dang /byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs 'di drug gis dris pa de
448b5(mdo sde): dag thams cad kyi lan btab pas 'khor 'di'i dogs pa thams cad spangs pa dang /bdagacig kyi chos snang ba dpag tu ma mchis pa skyes pa ngo mtshar to//bcom ldan
448b6(mdo sde): 'das sil snyan de dag las sgra 'di lta bu byung ba'i rgyu ni lags/su'i byin gyi brlabs kyis na byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs 'di dag gis lan 'debs par gyur/bcom
448b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/bzhin bzangs dag de dag thams cad ni sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi brlabs su blta'o//bzhin bzangs dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin//
449a1(mdo sde): brlabs kyis/nam mkha' las kyang chos kyi sgra 'di lta bu byung na sil snyan las chos kyi sgra ci phyir mi 'byung ste/banin bzangs dag de ltar de bzhin
449a2(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i byin gyi brlabs ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo//mi 'am ci'i rgyal po'i bu de dag gis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi
449a3(mdo sde): byin gyi brlabs bsam gyis mi khyab pa thob par gyur cig//bam po bzhi pa//de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po'i slas mi 'am ci mo brgyad khri
449a4(mdo sde): bzhi stong mu tig kha dog sna tshogs kyi do shal thogs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal nas ji
449a5(mdo sde): ltar thogs pa'i mu tig gi dro shal de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bkab bo//mu tig gi do shwal de dag phul ma thag tu sangs rgyas kyi mthus de dag bcom
449a6(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi drang thad kyi steng gi bar snang la mu tig gi do shal gyi khang pa brtsegs pa brgyad khri bzhi stong du gyur te/khang pa brtsegs pa de dag thams cad
449a7(mdo sde): kyang gru bzhi lham pa/ka ba bzhi zug pa tshe mnyam pa/ngos shin tu rnam par phye ba sha stug go/khang po brtsegs pa de dag na rin po ches spras pa'i khri rtsa ba'ang rin po
449b1(mdo sde): / nas bac+doMs mya rlung du ma 'aHsa pa dag byung byu gyu tu// de dag thams ca la 'dra btsun ga shegs pa'o/ rgyun pa man+dan ma
449b2(mdo sde): rtsaganyis kyis legs par brgyan pa dge bzhugs par kun tu snang ngo //de nas mi 'am ci mo brgyad khri bzhi stong gis bcom ldan 'das kyi cho 'phrul 'di lta bu 'di mthong
449b3(mdo sde): dus/tshim zhing mgu ste yid rab tu dga' nas dga' ba dang /yid bde ba skyes te bsam pa thag pa nas blu na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed
449b4(mdo sde): ngo//de dag byang chub tu sems bskyed nas dga' zhing mchog tu dga' ste drod pa thob nas/thams cad kyis sgra skad dang dbyangs gcig tu tshul dong mthun pa'i tshigs su
449b5(mdo sde): bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod de//bla na med pa'i dgra bcom mchog gsung ba//don dgongs mtshungs pa ma mchis bsam mi khyag
449b6(mdo sde): don dang chos dang 'dul ba rab bslebs pa//sems can mchog la mgo bos phyag 'tshal lo//'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug ze ba 'jig/dgon par bzhugs
449b7(mdo sde): da me bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba//rin chen mdzad dang rin chen ston pa po//bcom ldan rgyal po'i rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo//spyan sngar dri bral nyon mongs mi meng rag
450a1(mdo sde): sa'i dbang po pha rol dag /'joms pa//pad+mo lta bur skyid gsum myi gas pa//bde gshegs mchog sa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//
450a2(mdo sde): nang na mig dang 'drir spyod cing //nyin 'di'i 'od nis bkong ga/'khor los sbyar ba'i rigs su rgyal bar skyes//'khor lo mtshon mdo khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//
450a3(mdo sde): ming dang gzugs la nim yang mi chags shing //mgon dang dpung dang skyabs dang dpung gnyen byer//khyod dang mtshungs med lhag pag 'a zhog/mtha' ya swA
450a4(mdo sde): lce mgo ngas phyag 'tshal lo//brnyes dang ma brnyes nam yang tshigs mi mnga'//'jig rten chos rnams zil gyis mnan te bzhugs//chags srid 'khri shing dri
450a5(mdo sde): grol mdzad po//bcom ldan 'jig rten mgon la phyag 'tshal lo//dul bathugs ni rtag tu mnyam par bzhag/nyon mongs bsregs te stobs bcus rab bzhugs
450a6(mdo sde): 'phrul zang zing mi mnga' skyon tshul pa//sbyin+d+ra pa'i gnas la mig dumi phyug 'tshal lo//sgra mchog dam pa chen gyi nyid 'dris pa//len log kyi
450a7(mdo sde): min ni dam par sdungs//'jam nong sum la snyan pa'i gsung gsung ba//sring po gsum las 'phags la phyag 'tshal lo//mi mchog gdu ngas gdungs so
450b1(mdo sde): mnga' ga//rdzu 'phrul gyis ni bye ba'i zhing du gshegs//'gro ba rab tu sgrol ba'og mdzad pa//bcom ldan bran 'dra khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//bcom ldan brtson 'grus
450b2(mdo sde): dag la skyon mdzad pa//chags shing zhen pa'i 'gro dang mngon shes bya//ldan zhing mkhas pa'i nyan thos rnams kyang 'gre'o//'bru drugan+d+he gshegs khyed la phyag
450b3(mdo sde): gser gyi ba dag 'dral b+hag 'tshal lo//zhig nas dbang po rdu la la phyage 'tshal lo//dz+nyAn mi \u0f88\u0f90 lA'i tshul la phyag 'tshal lo//mi mchog yon tan mongasal
450b4(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal lo//nyon mongs po sregs shing bsnyengs pa mi mnga' gi/skye dgu 'di dag bsgral dka' chu bo ni sgrol//bsgoms shing dbang po thul pa'i bcom ldan 'das/
450b5(mdo sde): khyod la stabs su mchi bar mchid kyis 'tshal//thub pas sbyin pa bsam gyis mo khye stsa 'o//bsrungs na dbang ba dkris par rab 'gyur ba//pha rol dag la sbyin pa mchog sna
450b6(mdo sde): /gtod dpa'i bcom ldan khyod la phyag 'tsha la lo//sems can nga rgyal rgyags khongs gti mug pa//rgyu dang rkyen dang bya ba 'gal dgyid rnams//'phags dri blan mad
450b7(mdo sde): lam mchog le//rnam par 'dron pa chen po khyed kyis bkod//phung po rang bzhin gyis ni stong mkhyen nas//las dang nyon mongs zil gyis mnan te bzhugs//'dren pa 'gro ba
451a1(mdo sde): rnams kyi somanyu gcod//bcom ldan dus gsung khyod la phyag 'tshal la//bden pa'i chos la dgyes shing mnyam par bzhag/chos rnams kun
451a2(mdo sde): mnga' dang pha rol phyin//bla na med pa kha lo sgyur ba mchog/bcom ldan ded dpon khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//'chos pa mi mang 'gayo sgyu rnams dang bral//bdud kyi sde rnams
451a3(mdo sde): 'joms pa'i stobs po che//mi mchog lam dang lam ma lags la mkhas//rlung ma lta bu ro ci la'ang chags mi mnga'//gzing bar gyur gas le pha rol shin tu ge nas/
451a4(mdo sde): thub pa bas ma 'tshal ba'i bang mdzad mnga'//spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe na gang+gA yi//bye mi snyed kyi mi mchog rnams la mchod//mthu brnyes mi g.yo bsam gyis mi khyab pa//chags
451a5(mdo sde): pa'i skyon mi mnga' zhing thang la bzhugs//gnaso ni bzhugs pa'i rgyal po rnams kyis brten//de skad mi rnams mchog le phyag 'tshal lo//skye dang na dang rga shi rnam par spangs//
451a6(mdo sde): tshe rabs bye ba bsam mi khyab pa dgongs//bcom ldan 'das kyi mkhyen pa'i gdugs 'od kyis//'jigs pa chen po'i dra ba rab tu 'dra'o//'dren pa rmi 'drar chos rnams
451a7(mdo sde): thugs su chud//phyag dang zhabs la bkra shis mtshan menga' zhing //bgro shis bgyid las 'jam pa'i ngan slong ba//bcom ldan bkra shis mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo//gzungs rnams
451b1(mdo sde): la ni dbang gi pha rol phyin//zang zing mi mnga' chos kyi sbyin pa stsol//thub pa chos kyi rnga ni rab brdungs pa//chos rje bcom ldan khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//shAkya'i rigs
451b2(mdo sde): rus rgyal po'i las byung ba//dbang po zhi zhing thugs kyu rab tu ni//sbyin pa srid gsum 'jig rten rnam gzigs pa//bdi ga sheg so zhi thugs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//
451b3(mdo sde): bdud rnams dpung dang bcus pas rno ba yi//rol gri thogs nas byang chub drung lcags kyang //khyod kyi baspu tsam yang ma g.yos te//bcom ldan ri rab me tungos la phyag 'tsha
451b4(mdo sde): lo//mi yi dam pa bzod pa'i pha rol phyin//sku rnams kun la nongs pa'igyis kyang bzod//yang 'byung ba dang skye dang 'chi bas dpa'//bzed gsung bcom ldan khyod la
451b5(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal lo//mthu brnyes bde bar gshegs pa mi g.yo ba//gnas dang gnas min mkhas pa ba snyings ma mnga'//khyod kyis sems can mang po byang chub bkod//chos
451b6(mdo sde): gnas rgyal ba khyod la phyag 'argyal lo//'dus bgyis nyams chung snying po med par mkhyen//skye ba'i tshogs ni nyung ba ma lags sel//khyod kyi mkhyen pa srid gsum khyad
451b7(mdo sde): par 'bogs//ye shes pha rol phyin la phyag 'tshal lo//sems can long ba sdug bsngal mgon med pa//de dag khyod kyis dkon mchog gsum tshim bgyis//khyod
452a1(mdo sde): ni bdud dpung bcas pa skrag mdzad pa//bcom ldan mgon gyur khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//stobs dang bsam gtan dang ni dbang po bsgoms//khyod
452a2(mdo sde): kyis bdud ni dpung dang bcas pa bcom//sred pa rnams kyi nang na mchog gyur pa//thub pa dbang po bsgoms la phyag 'tshal lo//dad pa'i rtsa ba rgya chen chos bstan
452a3(mdo sde): bya//mtshungs med byang chub la ni chags mi mnga'//grib ma lta bur mkhyen nas bde gsungs pa//bcom ldan gdugs 'dra khyod la phyag 'tshol lo//'dren pa
452a4(mdo sde): mi 'drar chos rnams thugs su chud//'phags pa'i 'khor lo rmi 'dra rab tu bskor//'dus bgyis yang dag tu ni rmi lam 'drar//mkhyen nas sems can mang po
452a5(mdo sde): dran par mdzad//khyod kyi ljags mchog dag pa dri mi mnga'//ljags kyis rang gi zhal gyi dkyil 'khor khebs//ljags ni pad+ma 'dab ma brgya lta bu//ljags
452a6(mdo sde): skyon mi mnga' khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//srid gsum kun la chags pa mi mnga' ba//'gro ba rnams la 'dod pa'i skyon mi gsung //'dod pa'i chags bral smad pa ma
452a7(mdo sde): logs pa//byang chub mchog la srog chagase mas par mdzad//nyon mongs dgra dang sdig pa'i dgra spangs pa//sor sna'i 'dod chags bral zhing chags mi mnga'//
452b1(mdo sde): mo yi dam pa gsor ltar dpal sdug+sa pa//khyod kyi mtshan dang grags pa chub par grags//gnas dang dbang po rnam par 'byed la mkhas//'dedin bzhugs shing 'gro ba'i mi
452b2(mdo sde): rgyu gyur//gnas dang yig 'bru tshig gi don bslebs pas//khyod kyis chu bo bzhi la zam pa btags//snying po rin thang ma mchis sbyin pa mdzad//'dren pa mi dang lha rnams
452b3(mdo sde): ma Ta zla//khyed kyi yon tan mtha' ma mi rnyed de//mgon po khyod la bdag ni thal mo sbyor//me yi mchog la rdul ni sbyin byin pa'o//myi mdzad dzam+bu'i rgyal por gyur lags
452b4(mdo sde): ni//'dir ni dbang po dad pas thal sbyar nas//skyabs su nye bor mchi ba smos ci 'tshal//phung po gsog ste nyam chung snying po med//stong pa sgyu ma chu blo 'dra bar ni//go
452b5(mdo sde): tA ma khyod kyis de dag yang dag mkhyen//phung po khams mkhas khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//srid pa'i srad bus dam du mdud bor te//srid pa'i 'gro bar dra bar rab grags pa//
452b6(mdo sde): srid par 'gro ba rnams kyi dra ba de//'di gshegs khyod kyis mkhyen pa'i 'od kyis dral//tshangs pa'i sgra skud lta bu'i gsung brjod pa//sho be ma lags mi 'gyur 'drid ma
452b7(mdo sde): legs//phun tshogs gsung de de dag thos nas ni//thal mo sbyar te skyabs su nye bar mchi//phyag gi mthil gyis sa 'dir rig pa na//nags tshal bcas par rnam pa
453a1(mdo sde): drug ga yos kyang //'di na gzhan la gnod pa m+bu ma m+b+has//bdud phyogs dgra ban ma spyod la phyag 'tshal lo//m+b+ha ya ts+tsha ma dang
453a2(mdo sde): mkhas pa gang //khyod kyi chos don gnyer zhing mchis pa rnams//de dges sor chos bstan thoso nas su//zhabaso gnyis la ni rab tu gtugs par bgyid//de
453a3(mdo sde): nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po'i sgras rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
453a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das bdag cag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs nas bud mod kyi dngos pos bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
453a5(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus na/ji ltar bdage cag bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te/skyes pa'i dngos po thob pa dang /bla na med pa yang
453a6(mdo sde): dag por rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos te/bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la legs par bshad du
453a7(mdo sde): gsol/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po'i sgras de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//sring mo dag de'i
453b1(mdo sde): shin tu legs par nyon la yid la gzung zhig dang /ji ltar bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te skyes pa'i dngos po thob cing myur du bla na med pa yang dag par
453b2(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o//mi 'am ci'i rgyal po'i slas rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la
453b3(mdo sde): legs so zhes gsol te/bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//sring mo dag chos gcig dang
453b4(mdo sde): ldan na bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te skyes pa'i dngos po thob par 'gyur ro//chos gcig po de gang zhe na/'di lta ste/thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems
453b5(mdo sde): skyed pa dang mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems spyod pa dang /'jig rten gsum las khyad par du 'phags pa'i sems skyed pa dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la brjed
453b6(mdo sde): po med pa'i sems skyed pa ste/sring mo dag chos gcig po 'di dang ldan na bud+ma med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te/smyos pa'i lus thob par 'gyur ro//sring mo dag
453b7(mdo sde): gzhan yang chos ginyos dang ldan ni bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te skyes pa'i lus thob par 'gyur ro//gnyis gang zhe na/'di lta ste/phrag dog med pa
454a1(mdo sde): sred ma drug rten yang sa ni mang chu ngas de sa / de'i ni 'byung gyur//gsu da nam
454a2(mdo sde): la mi snye ma pa gsum yongs su dag de de/drug gi ngom pa ba ni yongs su dag po dang /yid kyi sgom pa gsum yongs su dag pa ste/sring mongs
454a3(mdo sde): dasum pa di dgung de stan na bung mi dbung me kyi saSh+Ta /skyes pa'i rjes rjig par 'gyur ro//srid sgo dgag nan ma pani dang
454a4(mdo sde): na bud me bud med dngas pa las rkyen te skyes phyi'i dngos po thob par 'gyur ro//bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste/g.yo med par smin pa byin pa dang /pa
454a5(mdo sde): 'i 'i sred pa'i gnas 'dzin pa /g.yo me pya tshul khrims bsnyen pa dang /ma meng par chos nyin paste/sri mngon ldan 'i 'di
454a6(mdo sde): du rkyen na chu med dung kyi dngos po la sem skyes pa'i ngos po thob par 'gyur ro//srung mo dang gzhanas na dudu meng chung me kya
454b1(mdo sde): las gyur te/skyes pa'i dngos po thob par 'gyur ro//lnga gang zhe na/'di lta ste/chos don du gnyer ba dang /chos thos nas tshul bzhin du so sor rtog pa dang /bsam pa
454b2(mdo sde): thag pa nas bud mod kyi dngos po la smod pa dang /rtag par rgyun du skyes pa'i lus thob par sems skyed pa dang /ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byed pa ste/sring mo dag chos
454b3(mdo sde): lnga po 'di dag dang ldan na bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te smyos pa'i dngos po thob par 'gyuraro ro//sring mo dag gzhan yang chos drugo dang ldan ni bud med bud
454b4(mdo sde): kyi dngos po las gyur te/skyes pa'i dngos po thob par 'gyur ro//drug gang zhe na/'di lta ste/drang pa dang /mnyen pa dang rgyu med pa dang /ga yo med pa dang
454b5(mdo sde): bstsol ba med pa dang /bcos pa med pa ste/sring mo dag tshes drug po 'di dag dang ldan na bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te/skyes pa'i dngos po thob par 'gyur ro///
454b6(mdo sde): sring mo dag gzhan yang chos bdun dang ldan na bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te/skyes pa'i dngos po thob par 'gyur ro//bdun gong zhe na/'di lta ste/sangs rgyas
454b7(mdo sde): kyi sku thob par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos thob par bya ba'i phyir chos rjes su dran pa dang /rang gis phyir mi ldog pa'i dge 'dun bsdu
455a1(mdo sde): ba'i phyir dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang /smon lam yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang /nyon mongs pa thams cad
455a2(mdo sde): yongs su dor ba'i phyir gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang /byang chub kyi sems rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir lha rjes su dran pa dang /de dag dgrol ba'i phyir sems can thams
455a3(mdo sde): cad la sems pa ste/sring mo dge chos bdun po 'di dag dang ldan na bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te/skyes pa'i dngos po thob par 'gyur ro//sring mo dag
455a4(mdo sde): gzhan yang chos brgyad dang ldan na bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te skyes pa'i dngos po thob par 'gyur ro//brgyad gang zhe na/'di lta ste/zas la sred pa ma
455a5(mdo sde): yin pa dang /skom pa la sred pa ma yin pa dang /me tog dang spos dang phreng ba dang /byug pa dang /phye ma la sred pa ma yin pa dang /skyed mos tshal du 'gro bar
455a6(mdo sde): sred pa ma yin pa dang /rgod pa dang 'jo bra la sred pa ma yin pa dang /glu dang gar dang rol mo'i dbyangs sgro la sred pa ma yin pa dang /dgo' ba dang rtse ba la sred pa ma
455a7(mdo sde): yin pa dang /rna ba dang sgra dang /sna dang dri dang /lce dang ro dang /lus dang reg la dga' ba la sred pa ma yin pa ste/sring mo dag chos brgyad po 'di dag dang
455b1(mdo sde): ldan na bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te skyes pa'i dngos po thob par 'gyur ro//sring mo dag gzhan yang chos dgu dang ldan na bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur
455b2(mdo sde): te skyes pa'i dngos po thob par 'gyur ro//dgu gong zhe na/'di lta ste/chad par lta ba ma yin pa dang /rtag par lci ba ma yin pa dang /bodag tu sme ba ma yin pa
455b3(mdo sde): dang //sems can du smra ba ma yin pa dang /srog tu smra ba ma yin pa dang /gang zag tu smra ba ma yin pa dang /'byung bar lta ba ma yin pa dang /'jig par
455b4(mdo sde): lta ba ma yin pa dang /rgyu dang rkyen la 'jug pa la mkhas pa yin te/sring mo dag chos dgu po 'di dag dang ldan na bude med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te skyes
455b5(mdo sde): pa'i dngos po thob lngar 'gyur ro//sring mo dag gzhan yang chos bcu dang ldan na bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te skyes pa'i dngos po thob par 'gyur ro//
455b6(mdo sde): bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/sems can thams cad la byams par gnas pa dang /gzhan gyi longs spyod la brnab sems mi skyed pa dang /skyes pa'i sems su
455b7(mdo sde): yid la byed pa skyed pa dang /srog gi phyir yang rdzun gyi tshig mi smra ba dang /phra ma'i tshig mi smra ba dang /zhe gcod pa'i tshig mi spro ba dang /tshi go kyal pa mi smra ba
456a1(mdo sde): dang /pha rol po dga' zhing rtse ba la phrag dog myed pa dang /gnon sems kyi bag la nyal mngon par mi sgrub pa dang /yang dag par lta ba dang
456a2(mdo sde): ldan par 'gyur ba dang rnam par smin pa la re ba med pa ste/sring mo dag chos bcu po 'di dag dang ldan na bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te skyes pa'i dngos
456a3(mdo sde): po thob par 'gyur ro//sring mo dag gzhan yang bud med zab mo la mos pa yin te/de gzugs la dbru ba brdos pa lta bur so sor rtog kyang gzugs kyis rgyags
456a4(mdo sde): shing myos par mi 'gyur ba dang /tshor ba la chu'i chu bur lta bur so sor rtog kyang bde ba'i tshor ba la rjes su chags pa med pa dang /sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba la
456a5(mdo sde): khong khro bar mi 'gyur ba dang /bde ba'ang ma yin sdug bsngal ba'ang ma yin pa'i tshor ba'i kun tu gti mug par mi 'gyur ba dang /'du shes la smig rgyu lta bur so
456a6(mdo sde): sngor rtog cing bud med kyi 'du shes mi skyed/skyes pa'i 'du shes mi skyed pa dang 'du byed rnams la chu shing gi phung po lta bur so sor rtog ste/'du byed thams cad la
456a7(mdo sde): snying po med par rtogs nas 'du byed thams cad la mi gnas shing de la gnas pa mi skyod pa dang /rnam par shes pa la sgyu ma lta bur so sor rtog ste/sems dang yid
456b1(mdo sde): dang rnam par rig pa de sgyu ma byas pa bzhin du rtog sa nas chos thams cad la chags pa med zhe sdang med/gti mug med pa dang /lus la 'byung ba chen po bzhi dang ldan par
456b2(mdo sde): so sor rtog ste/'di lta ste/sa'i kham pa dang ldan pa dang /chu khams dang ldan pa dang /me'i khams dang ldan pa dang /rlung gi khams dang ldan par lus la so sor rtog
456b3(mdo sde): go/lus 'dri ni bsdus paM rU dang /shing dang /bong ba dang /rtsig pa dang /mig yor lta bu ste 'di bdag mi yin/sems can ma yin/srog ma yin/skye dbu ma yin/
456b4(mdo sde): gang zag ma yin gyi phyini ci log sngon du song bas rgyu dang bya ba dang /las kyi byung ba'o//gzhan yang bud med mig lA kha zas las skyes pa sha'i gang bu ngo bo nyid kyis skying pa rang
456b5(mdo sde): bzhin gyis dben par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du so sor rtog pa dang /de bzhin du rna ba dang sna dang lho dang lus dang yid la ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa dang /rang bzhin gyis dben
456b6(mdo sde): par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du so sor rtog pa'i//gzhan yang bud med lus la gzugs birnyan lta bur 'jug pa dang /ngag la blag ci lta bur 'jug pa dang /sems
456b7(mdo sde): la sgyu ma lta bur 'jug pa'o//sring mo dag chos 'di dag dang ldan na bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te skyes pa'i dngos po thob cing myur du bla na med pa yang dag par
457a1(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'chung rgya bar 'gyur ro//de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po'i sras de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan
457a2(mdo sde): 'das las bud med kyi dngos po las skur ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas tshi ma zhing mgu ste/yi rangs shing rab tu dga' nas dge' dang yid bde ba skyes te/
457a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag bcol nas tshul dang mthun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do//dri med dri bral drom
457a4(mdo sde): gcod mdzad pa//rdul med rdul bral lhag pa'i gzi brjod mnga'//pad+ma'i 'dab 'dra'i spyan dang mdzes pa'i thugs//dri med zla zhal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//dga'i mdzad
457a5(mdo sde): zhi mdzad nyon mongs gcod mdzad pa//dga' bo ston pa rtag tu dgon pa dgyes//rin chen 'byung gnas rin chen mdzad mnga' ga/yon tan mchog mang khyod la phyag
457a6(mdo sde): 'tshal lo//pha rol gshegs pa gzhan gyi tshogs rnams 'joms//pad+ma lta bur stong mchog bka' mchid gsung //lam mchog stsol zhing dam pa'i don ston po//
457a7(mdo sde): mchog tu dga' mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//chu bo bzhi brgal bden bzhi'i bka' mchid gsung //sa la rgyu ba 'di la mig stsol ba//'khor lo mchog gi mtshan ni/
457b1(mdo sde): mnga' ba//rdul med phan mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//nyon mongs rdul bas la drum pa mthu bo na//mgon po 'gro la mchog gi don mdzad pa//bdud kyi dung rnams
457b2(mdo sde): stobs med 'jig midzad pa//bcom ldan skyabs bcu khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//skud pa'i 'khyi shing gcod mdzad mnyam la med//brnyes pa dag dang ma ban+tis mtshungs mnyam
457b3(mdo sde): rdzogs//'jig rten mthar 'byin snang bri'i sprin mdzad pa//rgya mtsho lta bu khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//dul zhing stobs bcu chen po dam pa mnga'//sbyin pa stsol zhing rtag
457b4(mdo sde): gteng la dgyes//dul bzhi gnas yon tan pha rol phyin//nyon mongs rdul bsal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//mtshan mchog 'gro bya kun la dam pa stsol//skye bo'i 'dren
457b5(mdo sde): palha yi mchog pas mchog/byams dang stobs dang bzod la nges par dgyes//mchod 'oso byed gshegs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//mar mi lta bu dri med zlo ba 'a/
457b6(mdo sde): nyon mongs dri ma gcod mdzad pa//nyon mongs spangs pa yon tan bsod nams gter//zhi ba thugs zhi khyod la phyog 'tshal lo//dad pa stsol ba dge sbyong zhi mdzad
457b7(mdo sde): po//ston pa skye mched drug las thar mdzad pa//rjes su dran drug shin tu yongs dag dran//rgyal ba dge sbyong rgyal lo phyag 'tshal lo//'dom gang 'od ni gser gyi
458a1(mdo sde): dogs//bad+mang spyan dam pa rnam par dag pa'i dang+yas//bcom ldan gang naklu sa pa skyes tham chog/snod gsum na mdzad khyod la phyuga'atshal to//
458a2(mdo sde): rab mun pa ma mchis pha rol gshegs//rtag tu dka' thub brtulo zhugs rab tu spyod//de bzhin kho na gzhan min de bzhin gsung //mun par sgron mo 'dzin la phyag 'a
458a3(mdo sde): lo//bde gshegs grags ldan yon tan bas ma 'tshal//de bzhin nyid kyi chos kyi gnas ston pa//yon tan brjod pa mthang zhing grags bsgrags pas//mchog tu dga'
458a4(mdo sde): mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//bsngags la gnas shing brtul zhugs dka' thub 'phags//khengs dang nga rgyal rgyags pa gcod mdzad pa//ye shes 'thung gnas rdul
458a5(mdo sde): bral blo gros mchog/skye bo mthar phyin khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//kaM la bing ka tshangs dbyangs thugs rje can//'dod pa rtsod bgyid dri ma sel mdzad pa//phung po yongs mkhyen/
458a6(mdo sde): mkhas pa bde bar gshegs//yon tan chogs mchog mnga' la phyag 'tshal lo//yon tan ston pa yon tan bstod mchod pa//zab mo blta dka' shin tu rtogs par
458a7(mdo sde): dka'//'dzum zhal zla 'dra gsong por gsung mdzad pa//bdud stobs 'joms mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//mnyam thugs kha lo bsgyur ba rab du la thugs//kun gyis
458b1(mdo sde): mngon bstod mnyam pa'i lam la gnas//thub pa mchog gsung bden pa'i bka' mchid can//bde gshegs mnyam thugs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//lam stsol snyan pa
458b2(mdo sde): shin tu 'jam pa'i dbyangs//bdud kyi sde mang 'joms mdzad nga rgyal dang //lhag pa'i nga rgyal mi mnga' tshul mi 'chos//thub po dge sbyong rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo//stobs dang
458b3(mdo sde): mthu dang brtson 'grus bsam gtan dgyes//rtag tu 'dod chags skyon dang rab rib bral//bde bar gshegs pa mi g.yo gnas la zhugs//stobs bcu mchog mnga'i khyod
458b4(mdo sde): la phyag 'tshal lo//phyag dang zhabs ni dri med dra bas 'brel//skyo dang rga dang 'chi ba mi mnga' ba//rgyal bar 'os pa 'gro ba kun las rgyal//nam mkha' mnyam thugs khyod la
458b5(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal lo//de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po'i slas mi 'amo ci mo brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs pa dang /bcom ldan 'das
458b6(mdo sde): kyis de dag gi lhug pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nas dri'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad do//'dri ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid de gang gi tshe 'dzum
458b7(mdo sde): pa mdzad pa de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer du ma kha dog sna tshogs byung ste/'di lta ste/sngon po dang /ser po dang /dmar po dang /dkar po dang /
459a1(mdo sde): lo brgan dang /shel dang dngul gyi 'dog lta bu'o//de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med par 'od kyis khyab par byas te//tshangs pa'o//
459a2(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par 'phags nus nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od mag mog por byas te/sgyur log nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/bcom ldan
459a3(mdo sde): 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo//de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las mongs te thA gas phrag pa gcig la gzar nas/pus ma g.yas pa'i lhang sa la btsugs
459a4(mdo sde): te zhe sa dang bcas shing gus pa dang bcas par bcom ldan 'das gadra na pa de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud te tshigs su bcad pa mngon par bsgrub pa 'dis bcom ldan
459a5(mdo sde): 'das la 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i don zhus pa/bde bar gshegs pa ci slad 'jam ston pa//zla bo dri ma med zhal khyod la zhu//dri med gzi brjid mnga' ba khyod la 3/
459a6(mdo sde): gser gyi kha dog lta bu khyod la zhu//bde bar gshegs pa ni slad 'dzum ston pa//dam pa'i gzugs rnams maunga' ba khyod la zhu//'gro ba rnams kyi don mdzad khyed la
459a7(mdo sde): zhu//lha dang mi rnams kyis mchod khyod la zhu//bde bar gshegs paci smad 'dzum ston pa//sbyin dang dul la dgyes pa khyod la zhu//tshul khrims yongs dag gyur
459b1(mdo sde): pa khyod la zhu//bzod pa'i stobs dang stobs stsol khyod la zhu//bde bar gshegs pa ci smad 'dzum ston pa//brtson 'grus stobs dang mthu mnga' khyod la zhu//bsam
459b2(mdo sde): gtan mngon shes dgyes pa khyod la zhu//shes rab nam mkha' mnyam pa khyod la zhu//bde bar gshegs pa ci skadadu 'jim ston pa//rtag tu byams pa'i thugs can khyod
459b3(mdo sde): la zhu//rtag tu thugs rje ldan pa khyod la zhu//dga' dang btang snyoms dgyes pa khyod la zhu//bde bar gshegs pa ci slod 'dzum ston pa//srid pa gsum po mthar 'byin
459b4(mdo sde): khyod la zhu//spyan gsum dri ma mi mnga' khyod la zhu//bdud rtsi chos rnams gsung ba khyod la zhu//bde bar gshegs pa ci slad 'dzum ston pa//bya dang rnams tha mar 'byin
459b5(mdo sde): pa khyod la zhu//ngan pa'i tshogs rnams 'joms pa khyod la zhu//bden pa dam pa gzigs pa khyed la zhu//bde bar gshegs pa ci slad 'dzum ston pa//stabs bcu ngom
459b6(mdo sde): pa mnga' be khyed la zhu//the tshom dog ni gcod mdzad khyod la zhu//yon tan stong gros brgyan pa khyod la zhu//de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldam 'das kyis tshe dang ldan
459b7(mdo sde): pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//kuno dga' bo khyod kyis mi 'am ci'i rgyal po'i slas rnams nga las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed do//bsam pa thag pa nas bla na med
460a1(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/bud med kyi dngos po las bsgyur zhing skyes pa'i dngos po slob par bya ba'i phyir nga'i rlung pa gnyis
460a2(mdo sde): la gtugs pa mthong ngam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo mi 'am ci'i slas brgyad khri bzhi stong po
460a3(mdo sde): de dag gis bsam pa thag pa nas dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa 'dis 'di ni shi 'phos nas bud med kyi dngos pA las gyur te skyes pa'i lus thob nas dga' ldan gyi lha rnams dang
460a4(mdo sde): skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyur ro//der skyes nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang lhan cig tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi
460a5(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'od kun 'gro ba byed par 'gyur ro//byams pa de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub thob pa na mnyes par byed cing dam pa'i chos kyang kun 'gro bar byed par
460a6(mdo sde): 'gyur ro//bskal pa bzang po'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la'ang rim gyis mnyes par byed par 'gyur/de dag gis dam pa'i chos kyang kun 'gro ba byed par 'gyur/
460a7(mdo sde): 'dzin par 'gyur ro//de dag rim gyis byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos yang dag par bsgrub par bya ba thams cad kun tu rdzogs par byas nas gang gi tshe mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po
460b1(mdo sde): bla na med pa yang dag pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar 'gyur te/des de dag bla na med pa yang dag par
460b2(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par yang 'gyur ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das la mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos 'di skad ce ste gsol to//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
460b3(mdo sde): gshegs pos bdag cag la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad do//ngan song ngan 'gro thams cad kyi lam bkram mo//bde 'gro thams cad kyi lam rnam par sbyangs so//bdag
460b4(mdo sde): cag byang chub kyi lam la rab tu bkod do//bdag cag la chos kyi gter bstan to//bdag cag ye shes kyis la bkod do//dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad 'bar bar bgyis so//
460b5(mdo sde): pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyogs bstan to//thabs la mkhas pa bstan to//bdag cag byang chub kyi sems yang dag par 'dzin du stsal to//chos bsgrags pas rab tu dga' bar
460b6(mdo sde): mdzad do//dga' bo dang dang ba dang /mchog tu dga' ba thob pas gzeng bstod do//chos zab mo'i bzod pa la rab tu dga' bar mdzad do//bdag cag phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la
460b7(mdo sde): rab tu bkod do//bdag cag ni bcom ldan 'das la byas pa gzo ba lags kyi byas pa mi gzo ba ma lags kyang bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis sho dang khrag gis kyang
461a1(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa la ldan mi ljon+da na gzhan gyis lan+da lon+da par mi 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ni 'tshal/de nas 'khor de'i nang nas byang chub sems
461a2(mdo sde): dpa' kha cig 'di snyam du sems te/ma la mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po 'di ji srid cig na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
461a3(mdo sde): bar 'gyur/'di'i ming ni ji skad ces bya bar 'gyur/byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun ni ji snyed cig tu 'gyur/longs spyod dang yongs su spyod pa ni ji 'dra zhig tu 'gyur//
461a4(mdo sde): de'i sems can bkod pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ni ji 'dra ba zhig tu 'gyur snyam mo//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag
461a5(mdo sde): gi sems kyi rnam par rtog pa thugs kyis yongs su mkhyen nas 'dzum pa mdzad pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer du mau khe dog tha dad pa kha dag brgya
461a6(mdo sde): stong phrag du ma byung ste/phyogs bcu kun gyi phyogs ro ror yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing grang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bar byas te/sems can rnams kyi ngan song gi sdug
461a7(mdo sde): bsngal thams cad zhi bar byas nas lha dang /me dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rteni dun par byas te slar log nas bcom ldan 'das la lan stong du bskor
461b1(mdo sde): byas te/bcom ldan 'das kyi dngu'i gtsug tu nu ga/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyis somaH ma mdzad pa'i 'jam pa mthong nas stan las long/
461b2(mdo sde): to thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs le phyag btsal te/len gsum bskor ba byas nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste pus mo g.yas dri'i stangs
461b3(mdo sde): btsugs nas/bcom ldan 'das gro la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pas gsol pa/bde bar gshegs kyi 'dzum pa
461b4(mdo sde): 'dra ba/de ring phyung ste zug med bye bri'i zhing //rgya chen phyogs bcu'i gang+gA'i rdul mtha' yas//khyab pa de 'dra sngon chad yod ma mthong //tshangs pa de bzhin 'jig rten skyong ba dang /
461b5(mdo sde): nor bu me dang nyi ma zla ba'i 'od//mi dbang gzi brjid kyis ni mog mog gyur//dzum mdzad 'di yi rgyu ni lung bsnyen gsol//su yi ched du dpa' bo khyod kyis 'od byung bas/
461b6(mdo sde): 'dir ning ngan sang gsum ni byang chub yan lag rdzogs//chos kyi rtswa yis bdag cig rnams kyi dgas pa sol//mi rnams kyi ni yid gnyis ma lus legs par bum//'khor kun
461b7(mdo sde): dge bas rtog bgyid ni// de 'dzum pa bstan//de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod nas bskor rje
462a1(mdo sde): byos te rang gi stan la 'dug go/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe glang po che'i blta sbyangs kyis phyogs bcuru gzigs nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'//
462a2(mdo sde): bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//kun dga' bo khyod kyis mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po 'dis tshul 'di lta bu dang /rgya che ba 'di lta bu dang /rnam pa 'di lta bu 'dis
462a3(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byas pa mthong ngam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so//bde bar gshegs pa mthong lags so//bcom ldan
462a4(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po 'di bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
462a5(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/dkon mchog 'byung zhes bya ba'i bskal pa la 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba dri sa med ces bya bar yon tan gyi rgyal por
462a6(mdo sde): snang ba zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyen pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa/'jig rten mkhyen
462a7(mdo sde): pi/skyes bu 'dul ba khe lo sgyur ba bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su 'jig rten du 'byung ngo //kun dga' bo 'jig rten rgya
462b1(mdo sde): khams zla ba dri ma med pa de ni lag mthil ltar mnyam par 'gyur te/bai DUr+ya dkar po las grub pa//zlo ba lta bur snang ba/shin tu dri ba med pa/shin tu rnam par dag pa/
462b2(mdo sde): mching bu med pa'o//de bzhin gshegs pa de'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun yang tshad med par gyur te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de thams cad kyang
462b3(mdo sde): phyir mi ldog pa/rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa thob pa sha stag go/byang chub sems dpa'adi dag nin mo mkha' la kha la brtsegs pa na longs spyod de/de dag
462b4(mdo sde): nom mkha' la khang pa brtsegs pa na gnas pa ni bai DUr+ya dkar po las grub pa'i sa chen po dar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gyi rgyal por ro snang ba de'i
462b5(mdo sde): gzugs brnyan mthong bar 'gyur ro//de dag gis mthong ma thag tu chos 'di dag thams cad ni gzugs brnyan lta bu'i zhes dran pa skye bar 'gyur ro//byang chub sems
462b6(mdo sde): dpa' gang chos gang la the tshom za ba na de de bzhin gshegs pas de la snang bar gyur pa de la zhu bar 'gyur ro//de bzhin gshegs pa des kyang byang chub sems dpa' de
462b7(mdo sde): dag la zhus pa'i lung bstan pas sems rangs par mdzad par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis chos de 'os nas mi skye ba'i chos lo bzod pa rab tu thob
463a1(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro//kun dga' bo 'jig rten gyi khams de na grong dang /grong khyer dang /grong rdal dang /ljongs dang /yul 'khor dang /rgyal dro
463a2(mdo sde): pho brang 'khor yod par mi 'gyur ro//sems can de dag thams cad kyang nam mkha' la khyod pa brtsegs pa na 'khod par 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas kyi zhing dor bud
463a3(mdo sde): med du gdags pa'ang med par 'gyur ro//sems can de dag thams cad kyang pad+ma'i snying po las brdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro//'jig rten gyi khams de na kha zas su
463a4(mdo sde): gdags pa med de//sems can de dag thams cad ni bsam gtan la dga' ba dang /chos la dga' bri'o zas can du 'gyur ro//'jig rten gyi khams de na gzhan/
463a5(mdo sde): rnam par bzhag pa med de/sems can de dag thams cad ni theg pa chen po la nges par 'gyur ba dag go//'jig rten gyi khams de na tshul khrims log par zhugs
463a6(mdo sde): pa'am/lta ba log par zhugs pa 'am/cho ga log par zhugs pa 'am/'tsho ba log par zhugs pa'i sems can 'ga' yang med par 'gyur ro//sems
463a7(mdo sde): can de dag thams cad ni nan tan dang ldan pa ste/sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la brtson 'grus brtsams par 'gyur ba sha stag go/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na bdud dam/
463b1(mdo sde): bdud kyi ris kyi lha 'am/gzhan mu stegs can+da spyod pa can dang /kun tu rgyu dang dmigs pa'i lta ba la mngon par zhon pa dang /pha rol rgol ba med par 'gyur ro//sems//
463b2(mdo sde): can de drug thams cad ni zab mo'i spyod yul stong pa nyid kyi phyag rgyas btab par 'gyur ro//'jig rten gyi khams de ni ming du btags pa tsam dang /'du shes tsamu ma gtogs par
463b3(mdo sde): lha dang mi zhes pa drung du bya ba med par 'gyur ro//sems can de dag thams cad ni yongs su spyad pa mtshungs par 'gyur ro//kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das yon tan gyi rgyal
463b4(mdo sde): por snang ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra btsam pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de'ang lho dang /mi rnams kyi skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /skye bo mang po la bde ba'i phyir
463b5(mdo sde): bibar gyi bskul pa bcu tham par bzhugs par 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das yon tron gyi rgyal por snang ba de bzhin gshegs pa de glang gi tshe yongs su mya ngan las 'das par
463b6(mdo sde): bzhed pa de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus 'bar ba 'di nga'i 'og tu bla ni med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya
463b7(mdo sde): bar 'gyur te/bkod pa chen po zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyen pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa/
464a1(mdo sde): 'jig rten mkhyen pa/skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su 'gyur ro zhes
464a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus 'bar ba zhes bya ba lung bstan nos mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro//kun dga' bo bar gyi bskal pa de'ang sangs rgyas dkon mchogs
464a3(mdo sde): dong tshes dkon mchog dang dge 'dun dkon mchog dang mi 'brel bar 'gyur te/bar gyi bskol pa de ni dkon mchog 'byung ba zhes brjod do//de nas mi 'am ni'i
464a4(mdo sde): rgyal po sdong pos bcom ldan 'das las lung bstan pa thos nas dga' zhing mgu ste yi rangs shing rab tu dga' nas/dga' ba dang /yid bde ba skyes te/byang chub sems
464a5(mdo sde): dpa'i dga' ba dang /mchog tu dga' ba'i shugs kyis sa las steng gi bar snang las shing ta la bdun tsam du 'phags te/thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor dad pa
464a6(mdo sde): bya cher spel ba dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bskyed pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /rang gi shes rab kyi spobs pas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras
464a7(mdo sde): so//chos 'di thams cad rab tu dben pa dang //dri mo med de nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid//rgyud kyi dam pa 'di ni rnam shes na//de phyir de dag thub sras thu bor 'gyur//
464b1(mdo sde): lam bzhin du mthong ba cung zad med//thams cad med de gzung med gsog dang gsob//chos rnams thams cad rmi lam 'drar shes nas//'dus byas drag la skyo ba
464b2(mdo sde): 'gyur ba med//la las sgyu ma'i rta dang glang chen dang //shing rta dpung bu chung dang bzhon mthong ba//dam pa'i don du snying po med pa ltar//phung po 'di dag skyo 'dra snying
464b3(mdo sde): po med//gzugs kyi rang bzhin da bu ba brdos pa bzhin//tshor ba 'di ni tsu'i chu bur 'dra//'du shes dag ni smig rgyu 'dra bar gzungs//'dus byas thams cad tshu
464b4(mdo sde): shing snying po med//srid gsum 'di ni sems yid rnam par shes//rgyal bas de bzhin skye 'dra gsog tu gsungs//gzugs kyi rang bzhin stong par rig nas ni/
464b5(mdo sde): 'dus byas dag la nam yang skyo ba med//khams bzhi po ni chos kyi dbyings 'dra dang //skye mched rnams ni grong stong lta bu dang //chos 'di gsog dang gso ba ltar rnam
464b6(mdo sde): shes pa//de dge rgyal ba'i'o chos mdzod 'dzin pa yin//rab tu dul-i phyir sbyin dang dul ba dang //de bzhin tshul khrims rnam dag tshul khrims dang //rtag tu 'phags
464b7(mdo sde): pa'i tshul gyis bzod mi zad//stong pa nyid phyir brtson 'grus rnam par dag/bsam gtan rang bzhin 'gyur ba med pa dang //de ltar shes rab chags med ma spangs
465a1(mdo sde): par//glang gi 'jug pa de 'drar gyur pa de//pha rol phyin pa'i pha rol rab tu phyin//bdag med kho na nyid phyir byams pa mnyam//num mkha' lta bur
465a2(mdo sde): gong du snying rje dag/zhi phyir dga' dang btang snyoms bcas pa yi//lo ma 'di tshangs pa'i la mo ste rtag tu zhi//bsdu ba bzhi po khyod par 'phags pa 'di//rnam par 'dran
465a3(mdo sde): pas rjes su gzung phyir gsungs//'dzin pa med cing rnam rtog gang med pa//de ni bsdu ba'i dngos po'i pha rol phyin//sems can 'di dag bdag med sems can med//
465a4(mdo sde): srog dang gso ba gang zag mi rnyed do//dbang po drug 'di stong ste rab zhi bar//gang shes de ni byang chub sems dpa' yin//sems can med cing byang chub sems dpa' med///
465a5(mdo sde): de ni gang du'ang bdag med rlom sems med//gnyis dang bral zhing ma chags spros med pa//sems can byang chub sems dpa' de dpal ldan//chos 'di snying po med de sgyu
465a6(mdo sde): ma 'dra//gang du'ang mi 'ong nam yang 'gror mi 'gyur//chos dbyings 'di yi gnas pa rig nas ni//rgyal bas de bzhin nyid ni mnyam sangs rgyas//gang na'ang yod pa'om
465a7(mdo sde): med pa med mod kyi//rgyu la brten nas chos rnams 'byung bas na//mkha' la glog mthong 'jig pa lta bur ni//sems kyi 'khri shing de ltar shes par bya//rlung ni nam
465b1(mdo sde): mkhar mi chags rgyu ba bzhin//gzugs med sems ni 'dus byas dag la rgyu//sems kyi rang bzhin rnam dag de shes nas//nyon mongs gzugs med sogs par mi 'gyur
465b2(mdo sde): ro//lus ni brtsig pa rtswa dang lo ma 'dra//blun pa rje med rdo shing ngan pa ltar//de yis snga ma'i rang bzhin 'drar shes nas//lus kyi chos la gnas par mi byed do//tshig
465b3(mdo sde): ni rtag tu gzung med rlung dang 'dra//ri dang brag gi brag ca lta bu ste//de 'drar sgra ni rab tu dben shes pa//sgra rnams kun la 'dod pa'i chags pa med//bdag ni nam mkha
465b4(mdo sde): ngos gnas mi ltung ste//mkha' las ltung ba'i gnas kyang yod ma yin//chos 'di nam mkha' 'dra bar bsgoms nas ni//de ltar sems can sems can med mtshungs
465b5(mdo sde): gnas//bskal pa brgya phrag mang por bsregs kyang ni//ji ltar nam mkha' nam yang sngon ma tshig/chos rnams thams cad nam mkhar 'drar shes pa//de sreg bskal
465b6(mdo sde): tshe zhing rnams brgyar yang 'gro/ri dang ri bar kho ra khor yug ri//de bzhin ri dang bcas pa'i sa rnams kun//nam mkha'i ngos kyis phye bar rig nas de//rdzu 'phrul stobs
465b7(mdo sde): kyis bye ba'i zhing du 'gro/sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dag dang //khams bzhi 'di dag nam mkha'i ngos mnyam par//dpa' bo tshul 'di khong du chud pa dag/mkha' las bya ba
466a1(mdo sde): mtha' sa dang du rgyu/srid pag su rgod /sa da do zhon ga/ sa ra
466a2(mdo sde): //sngon gyi rang bzhin mi sna rgyu ba med//rang byung ba ni na tshun gyi chog ma yin yang //skyenas kyi chos kyis gzugs kyis rab tu phye//sems dang yid na
466a3(mdo sde): mtshungs pa dben par gyur//rgyal ba thams cad chos mtshungs nyid phyir mnyam//sngon gyi srid par byang chub spyad spyod cing //dge ba ba rgya stong rab tu bsags nas
466a4(mdo sde): ni//byang chub mnyam zhing mnyam par rab shes pa//grags pa chen po rnams ni 'a ba stan 'gyur//chos rnams kun ni rang yul yongaso dag ste//mtha' yas
466a5(mdo sde): phyir ni rgya lta ba'i yul du mnyam//mnyam nyid 'di dag gang gis rab shes pa//yon tan ldan pa de dag lung bstan 'gyur//bdag ni gzugs min tshor min
466a6(mdo sde): 'du shes min//sems dpa' ma yin rnam par shes med kyang //byang chub khong du chud pas bdag lung bstan//phung po khams kyis bdag ni lung mi bstan/
466a7(mdo sde): bzod pa gang zhig gzod ma nus ni yi//skad cig pa ni zad dang 'dri min la//mtshungs med mi skye ba la bzod pa no//mi dbang 'gyur zhes rgyal bas lung bstan to//
466b1(mdo sde): rnams kun dang bdag tu rang bzhin mnyam//bdag ni bdag mod stong pa'i rang bzhin te//stong pA nam mkha' 'dra ba'i ngo bo nyid//byang chub rtag tu mkha' mnyam rang ban
466b2(mdo sde): ni//zad par bya phyir zad pa shes mi nus//mi zad pa ni zad pas zing mi 'gyur//zad pa'i sgo yis chos rnams kun ma skyes//bzod dang ldan la sangs rgyas lung ston
466b3(mdo sde): te//mtshan mod gnas 'jug pa yi gnas med de//yang dag 'dus ma byas pa dus las grol//ma byas byed du ma bcug byung ba min//de bzhin nyid 'drar rgyal byas
466b4(mdo sde): bdag lung bstan//gal te bdag ni lung bstan 'gyur snyam na//tshwas lam tshul la mi mnyam sbyor ba min//sems dang yid kyis sbyor ba sbyor ma yin//tshes sbyor khyad
466b5(mdo sde): par 'phags 'di mtshungs shing mam//khyod cag thams cad swa yi steng na 'khod//bdag ni nam mkha'i dkyil na rnam par gnas//sna dang nam mkha' mnyam par shos
466b6(mdo sde): nas ni//srid pa gsum na chags mod ye shes 'jug/de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po stong pos tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras nas steng gi bar snang las brubs te thal mo sbyar
466b7(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag btsal te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas ni bdag gi tshod du byung ngo //de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom
467a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das bdag sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa don ma mchis par ma bgyis te/sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyis bdag ma bsres pas bcom
467a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bdag gi bsam pa thams cad yongs su bskong ba'i slad du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to//de nas 'khor de'i nang
467a3(mdo sde): na byang chub sems dpa' kha cig 'di lta bu'i sems bskyed de/mi 'ami ci'i rgyal po sdong pos de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
467a4(mdo sde): rgyas gang las dang po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed snyam mo//de nas byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan gyis byang chub sems
467a5(mdo sde): dpa' de dag gi sems kyi rnam par rtog pa sems kyis shes nos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos de
467a6(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa gang las byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan ci lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu sngon
467a7(mdo sde): byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal po grangs med pa'i yang chos grangs med pa/rgyas pa/tshad med pa/bsam gyis mi khyab par gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na rnam par dag pa
467b1(mdo sde): zhes bya ba'i bskal pa la 'jig rten gyi khams dge ba zhes bya bar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyen pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/
467b2(mdo sde): bde bar gshegs pa/'jig rten mkhyen pa/skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba bla na med pa/lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rin chen phung po zhes bya
467b3(mdo sde): ba 'jig rten du byung ngo //rigs kyi bu de'i tshe de'i dus na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen phung po de'i byang chub
467b4(mdo sde): sems dpa'i dge 'dun ni bye ba phrag drug cur gyur te/thams cad kyang brtson 'grus brtsams pa/bzod pa rab tu thob pa/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir
467b5(mdo sde): mi ldog pa sha stag go/de'i tshe'i tshad ni lo bye ba phrag drug cu thub par gyur to//dge ba zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams de'ang bai DUr+ya las grub pa/rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan
467b6(mdo sde): pa/rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris lta bur khang khyim dang /longs spyod dang /nye bar spyod pa dang /bza' ba dang /btung ba bsams pa tsam
467b7(mdo sde): gyis 'byor pa'o//sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na theg pa chen po ma gtogs par theg pa gzhan rnam par bzhag pa med par gyur to//rigs kyi bu de'i tshe de'i dus na gling bzhi la dbang ba'i
468a1(mdo sde): 'khor los sgyur rgyal bas dun sa byung rna pa ma sgra bdun dang ldan du zhig d+hA rmA san stong brag san dz+nyAn mau do//den
468a2(mdo sde): sto rnam pa yod de/dpa' ba brtul pho pa/yan lag mchog gi gzugs can pha rol gyi sde rab tu joms pa shi stag go//rigs kyi bu rgyal po sa 'dzin sa
468a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen phung po dang /chub sems dpa' bye ba breg d+hA tshul mi bya babam par yid du 'a ba'i chos gas dang /
468a4(mdo sde): byas dang /mal cha dang /nu pa'i gsos spyan dang/yi byed rnam sto dang /bde bar skyer bo ba kyi la ri m+bi parA gnos par bya ba thams cid dkyis bsnyen 'gur byas nas
468a5(mdo sde): des byanam ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs bI n+da chen phung po de la mchod pa dpag tu med pa byas te/dge ba'i rtsa bas bor brten nas bud med pa ni snying po de dag dang /
468a6(mdo sde): ni myong ba d+ma dge dang /srog chags pa rje ts+tshang dang ldan drug tu zin med pa yangad dag pa rdzags pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed de//des kyi chub sems
468a7(mdo sde): nas kyang mi bya bar bcom ldan 'das de shegs gro pa skyed bas//rdo rje gzhi nigan du rje matsug pa yongs su dag
468b1(mdo sde): zhes bya ba rgyal por bcug nas rgyal srid thams cad bor te/sgra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgros te bcom ldan 'das de'i bstan pa la dad pas khyim nas khyim med
468b2(mdo sde): par rab tu byung ngo //de nas rgyal po'i bu de dag gis kyang rim gyis bu thu bo ri re rgyal por bcug nas pha'i rjes su rab tu byung bar gyur to//rigs kyi bud ltar na rnam grongs 'dis
468b3(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa de'i tshe'i tshad ring bar gyur to//rgyal po gzhon nu de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa de las rab tu byung nas rgyal bu gzhon nu tha chung snying rje'i blo
468b4(mdo sde): zhes bya ba gcig pu ma gtogs te/de ni chos kyis rgyal srid byed pa chad pa med pa dang /mtshon cha med par chos dang mthun par dbang byed du bcug go/rigs kyi bu de ltar
468b5(mdo sde): rgyal po sa 'dzin de bu dang bcas par bcom ldan 'das de'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas thog ma dang bar ma dang tha mar de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen phung po de'i dam pa'i chos rab
468b6(mdo sde): tu bzung ngo //rigs kyi bu de'i tshe de'i dus na gling bzhi la dbang ba'i 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po sa 'dzin zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod dogs shing the
468b7(mdo sde): tshom za 'am yad gnyis su gyur pa lta na rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po 'di de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal pos 'dzin zhes bya
469a1(mdo sde): bar gyur to//rgyal po de'i bur gyur pa de dag thams cad ni de ltar phyogs bcu na byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod do//rigs kyi bu de ltar na mi'am/
469a2(mdo sde): ci'i rgyal po sdong pos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin tshe ni phung po de las bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do//de bla na
469a3(mdo sde): med pa yang dge par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu dang po sems bskyed tshun chad de'i bar thams cad du sangs rgyas mthong ba dang chos nyan pa dang dge 'dun la rimi gro byed pa dang
469a4(mdo sde): ma bral bar gyur to//'dis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi tshogs kyang myur du yang dag par bsgrubs pas 'di la ngos 'di ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin
469a5(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan gyi rgyal po zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung yang bstan to//de nas bcom ldan 'das la
469a6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i cod pan gyis 'dadi skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
469a7(mdo sde): popar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i mkhyen pa dang ldan pas 'di ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'dus bgyis pa'i rgyu ba nas yun ring du lags pa'ang bcom
469b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis sgrib pa mi mnga' ba'i mkhyen pas gzigs pa ni ngo mtshar to//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu de bzhin no//ji skad smras pa de bzhin to//
469b2(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni thogs pa med pa'i ye shes mthong ba dang ldan no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rigs kyi bu gang sems can
469b3(mdo sde): thams cad kyi 'das pa'i sems kyi rgyu zad pa/'gegs pa/bral ba/rnam par gyur pa/rgyu gang dag las sems kyi rgyud de dag byung ba dang /rgyu gang dag med pas zad pa//dge
469b4(mdo sde): ba 'am/mi dge ba 'am/lung du bstan pa 'am/lung du ma bstan pa de dag thams cad rnam pa dang bcas/gzhi dang bcas/gtan tshigs dang bcas pas de bzhin gshegs
469b5(mdo sde): pas rab tu shes so//da ltar byung ba'i dus kyi sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyud byung ba dge ba'am/mi dge ba'am/lung du bstan pa 'am/lung du ma bstan pa'ang rung
469b6(mdo sde): ste/sems gang gi 'og tu sems gang byung ba de dag thams cad kyang rnam pa dang bcas/gzhi dang bcas/gtan tshigs dang bcas par de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu shes so///
469b7(mdo sde): gang ma 'ongs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyud dang sems las byung ba'i chos dge ba 'am/mi dge ba'am/lung du bstan pa 'am/lung du ma bstan pa'ang rung ste/sems/
470a1(mdo sde): gang gi 'og tu sems gang 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang rnam pa dang bcas//gno dang bcos go gau tan tshigs dang bcas par po zhi
470a2(mdo sde): gshegs pas rab tu shes so//rigs kyi bu de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni thogs pa med pa'i ye shes dang ldan no/
470a3(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i mkhyen pa thogs pa mi mnga' bye bstan pa 'di bshad pa na srog chags sum 'bum gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed
470a4(mdo sde): do//de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' dang nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyi 'khor dang bcas pa la zhig bdun bode bar sbyar ba thams
470a5(mdo sde): cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas nas yongs su longs spyad par bya ba'i phyir rang gi khang khyim dang /'khor gyi khyams de'ang bcom ldan 'das la phul te 'di skad ceso gsol to//
470a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad dri rtag tu 'dir gshegs shing bzhugs par gsol/des na skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /skye bo mang po la bde ba dang
470a7(mdo sde): 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang /skye bo'i tshogs pol po che'i 'don dang /mi 'am ci dang /dri za dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams la phan pa dang bde bor 'gyur ro//de nas mi
470b1(mdo sde): 'am+b+ha ci'i rgyal po sdong po'i bu dri ma med pa'i mig ces bya bas bcom ldan 'das la nor bu rin po che'i smyo ba phul nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan
470b2(mdo sde): 'das mi 'am ci bdag cag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs su legs kyang bdag cag ni sil snyun dang rol mo'i dbyangs sgra dang /hUM/
470b3(mdo sde): drang gar la rab tu chags/me tog dang spos dang bdug pa dang byug pa dang /phye ma la bag ma mchis par dga' zhing rtse ba lags na ji ltar bdag cag bgo mchis par 'gyur
470b4(mdo sde): zhing /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yang dag par bsgrub par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos rin po che'i phyag rgya'i sgo'i gdams ngag bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la stsal
470b5(mdo sde): bar gsol/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis mi 'am ci'i rgyal po'i bu dri ma med pa'i mig la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//bzhin bzangs de'i phyir
470b6(mdo sde): dredeng phyin cad skyil snyan drang glu dbyangs de dag las byang chub yongs su smin par byed pa'i chos drug cu rtswa bzhi byung bar khyed la byin gyis brlab par bya'o//drug cu rtsa bzhi gang zhe na/
470b7(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/mi rtag pa'i sgra'i byung ba dang /sdug bsngal gyi sgra dang /bdag med pa'i sgra dang /zhi ba'i sgra dang /mngon por 'du mi byed pa'i sgro dang /dben pa'i sgra dang /mi skye
471a1(mdo sde): ba'i sgra dang /dngos po med pa'i sgra dang /'byung ba med pa'i sgra dang /gnas med pa'i sgra dang /ji lta ba bzhin gyi sgra dang /yang drug pa'i mtha'i sgra dang /
471a2(mdo sde): chos kyi dbyings kyi sgra dang /sems can med pa'i sgra dang /srog med pa'i sgra dang /gang zag med pa'i sgra dang /sbyin pa'i sgra dang /tshul khrims kyi sgra dang /bzod pa'i
471a3(mdo sde): sgra dang /brtson 'grus kyi sgra dang /bsam gtan gyi sgra dang /shes rab kyi sgra dang /byams pa'i sgra dang /snying rje'i sgra dang /dga' ba'i sgra dang /btang snyoms kyi sgra dang /
471a4(mdo sde): 'ong ba med pa'i sgra dang /'gro ba med pa'i sgra dang /rgyu ba med pa'i sgra dang /gnas med po'i sgra dang /brtan pa med pa'i sgra dang /stong pa nyid kyi sgra dang /mtshan ma med pa'i
471a5(mdo sde): sgra dang /smon pa med pa'i sgra dang /'dod chags dang bral ba'i sgra dang /'byung ba med pa'i sgra dang /rten pa'i sgra dang /rten pa med pa'i sgra dang /sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang /
471a6(mdo sde): chos kyi sgra dang /dge 'dun gyi sgra dang /byang chub tshad med pa'i sgra dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i sgra dang /yang drag par spong ba'i sgra dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i sgra
471a7(mdo sde): dang /dbang po'i sgra dang /stongs kyi sgra dang /byang chub kyi yan lag gi sgra dang /lam gyi sgra dang /zhi gnas kyi sgra dang /lhag mthong gi sgra dang /thangs kyi sgra dang /
471b1(mdo sde): bsdu ba'i dngos po'i sgra dang /sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i sgra dang /bdud tshar bcad pa'i sgra dang /dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i sgra dang /chos thams
471b2(mdo sde): cad sgyu ma dang /rmi lam dang /gzugs brnyan dang /chu'i zla ba dang /brag ca lta bu'i sgra dang /chos kyi dbyings 'dres pa med pa'i sgra dang /'khor bas yongs su mi skyo
471b3(mdo sde): ba'i sgra dang /'byung ba'i sgra dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs thams cad kyi sgra dang /dbu ba dang /chu'i chu bu ro dang /smig rgyu dang /chu shing gi phung po dang /sgyu ma dang /snying
471b4(mdo sde): po med pa'i sgra dang /ji skad smras pa de bzhin du bya zhing chos bsgrub pa'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ro//bzhin bzangs dag de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi mthus sil snyan dang glu dbyangs
471b5(mdo sde): de dag las gang gi khyod bag yod par byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams bsgrub par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sgra 'di dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro////bam po lnga
471b6(mdo sde): pa ste tha ma//de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de ngo mtshar du gyur nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag btsal te 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du
471b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang byang chub 'di byin gyis brlabs kyis shin tu byin gyis brlabs pa dang /chos bstan pa dang /ji tsam du de bzhin gshegs pas
472a1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams shin tu yongs su bzung ba ni ngo mtshar to//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/grogs po dag ji skad smras pa de bzhin
472a2(mdo sde): te/de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams shin tu yongs su bzung ngo //de ci'i phyi zhe na/'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' yongs su bzung bas sems
472a3(mdo sde): tsun+da nyams cad yongs su bzung por 'gyur ro//grogs po dag de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub sems dpa' yongs so bzung ba gang yin pa de sems can thams cad
472a4(mdo sde): kyi don nyid do//de ltar na sems can thams cad kyi ched du de dag go cha gang gis sems can tshad med grangs med pa 'khor ba las mya ngan las 'da' ba'i lam du gzud par
472a5(mdo sde): 'gyur ba'i go cha chen po gyon no//grogs po dag rnam grangs 'dis 'di ltar nga da ltar bzhugs kyang rung yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang rung ste/byang chub sems dpa'
472a6(mdo sde): rnams yongs su bzung ba mdzad pa gang yin pa des sems can thams cad yongs su bzung bya yin par rig par bya'o//grogs po dag byang chub sems dpa' la chos gos dang //
472a7(mdo sde): bsod snyoms dang /mal cha dang /na ba'i gsos sman dang /yo tshad rnamu kyis ri mi kor byas pa ni se mos tshon thams cad la rim kr-i byas par 'gyur ro//grogs po dag
472b1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' la bde bar sbyar ba nye bar bsgrubs pa ni sems can thams cad la bde bar sbyar ba nye bar bsgrubs par 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/grogs po dag tha na
472b2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i dbugs 'byung ba dang /rngub pa gang yin pa de thams cad kyang sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po rab tu thob pa dang ldan pa dang /sems can thams
472b3(mdo sde): cod la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir yongs su 'dzin to//de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /gzugs na spyod pa dang /gnas gcing ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu de dag dang /klu dang gnod
472b4(mdo sde): sbyin dang dri za dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po dang /thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par gsungs pa la rjes su yi rang nas/lha'i me
472b5(mdo sde): tog rnam pa mang po kha dog sna tshogs pas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor to//de nas mi'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos 'di snyam du bsams te/bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi
472b6(mdo sde): rdzu 'phrul gyis sam/gzhan byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis bdag gi gnas nas/bya rgod kyi phung po'i ro la gshegs pa ni bdag gi cha ma yin gyis bdag gis
472b7(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir shing rta gang lo bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang bcas pa dang nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang ban+d+has
473a1(mdo sde): par bzhugs pa de lta bu'i shang rta bkod pa bsgrubs te/shing rta de 'dra bdag 'khor dang bcusA pas drangs nas/de ltar na bdag gis de bzhin
473a2(mdo sde): gshegs pa la mchod pa byas par 'gyur snyam mo//de nas mi 'o ma ci'i rgyal po stong pos yid las byung ba lha'i rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta 'phang du dpagra cheng
473a3(mdo sde): khyon du dpag tshad lnga pa/kha khyer rin po che sna tshogs kyis bskor ba/shing sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan pa/steng du rin po che'i dra ba bres po/rin po che
473a4(mdo sde): skud pa myig mangs ris su bres pa mngon par spel nas shing rta de la bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan seng ge'i khyi bokla ba blta ni sdug pa/'phang du mi bdun yod pa/
473a5(mdo sde): res bcos ma zung brgya stong meng po bkram pa mngon par sprul/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang nyan thos kyi dge 'dun thams cad kyi stan yang so sor mngon
473a6(mdo sde): par sprul/gang dag bcom ldan 'das la chos nyan zhing zhibs 'bring du 'brang ba brgya byin dang /tshangs pa dang /'jig rten skyong ba dang /'dod pa na spyod pa dang /
473a7(mdo sde): gzugs na spyod pa dang /gnas gcing ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu de dag gi stani yang shing rta de'i steng du ci rigs par sprul to//de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos de lta
473b1(mdo sde): bra'i shing rta bkod pa de sprul nas thal mo sbyar te/bcom ldan 'das la phyag btsal nas 'di skad ces gsol te//bcoM mu ldan 'das bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du shing rta
473b2(mdo sde): 'di la ji ltar gang na pa shims pa rnams la 'khor thams cad dang thab sa tsug tu bzhugs su gsol/de nas seng gro'i khri de la bcom ldan 'das kyang bzhugs/byang chub
473b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' dang /dge slong gri dge 'dun dang 'khor thams cad kyang ci rigs par 'khod do//de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis shing rti de log
473b4(mdo sde): pa g.yas pas blangs te/shing rta la bdun srid kyi steng gi bar snang la 'phags nas/de nas mi'am ci mo brgyad khri bzhi stong de dge thams cad dang bu brgyad stong po de dag
473b5(mdo sde): dang gzhan yang mi 'am ci dang dri za dang lto 'phye chen po brgya stong phragi du ma dang mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po nyid kyang rin po che'i theg pa thogs nas shing rta la btogs te nam mkha'
473b6(mdo sde): las drangs so//de nas bcom ldan 'das steng gi bar snang gi shing rta la bzhugs shing /nam mkha'i dkyil nas gshegs pa la mi 'am ci mo brgyad khri bzhi stong po de
473b7(mdo sde): dag gis sil snyan dang /gla dbyangs blangs nas mchod pa byed de/mdun du do zhing bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do//mi 'am
474a1(mdo sde): mo brgyad khri bzhi stong po//gzugs kyi dam pa dang ni ldan pa dag/sil spyan rnams ni rab tu dkrol brjid cing //yang dag bsngags pas 'dren la
474a2(mdo sde): brjod pa bgyid//mtshan mchog bsod nams kyis ni gza brjid gyur//gzugs mchog mthong na dga' bar bgyid pa'i gzugs//bden pa'i yon tan la ni rtag
474a3(mdo sde): gnas pa//yon tan mtsho chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams dang khyod mi 'angadra//g.yas g.yon na yang rnam par mthong ma myong //ji ltar ri rab brtan
474a4(mdo sde): zhing mi g.yo ba//de ltar khyed kyi sku ni dpol gyis mdzes//'dren pa khyod kyis rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni//chags pa ma mchis par yang mkha' las mchi//nam
474a5(mdo sde): mkha' lta bur dag cing dri mo mnga'//bcom ldan nyon mongs bsal la phyag 'tshal lo//lci dbang lha min dbang dang srin po dang //brgya byin tshangs pa dang ni dag pa'i
474a6(mdo sde): lha//nyi ma zla bskur mAr bcas pa'i 'od//khyed kyi mdzod spus 'od ni ma mo chis gyur//shes rab 'byung gnas shes rab rgya mtsho ldan//sems can kun gyi sems
474a7(mdo sde): spyod la mkhas//'jig rten gsum na 'jig rten gsum gyis mchod//'jig rten grags pa'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal lo//bdud dran pa ma skyon rnams bsal badz+ra /
474b1(mdo sde): badren pa sgril brnam da spyod mad pa//rdzu phrul ban stos kyis sa ma //swA sa r+b+ba m+b+ha ga/shegs pas gsheg+sas gshegs pa mdzes//brtul pa d+hA/
474b2(mdo sde): yang skyob mi mnga' zhing //rtog tu rdul la thugs ni mnyam par bzhag/legs par gsungs pas 'gro ba tshim mdzad kyang //khyod ni tshig dang skad la gnas ma lags//khyod kyi
474b3(mdo sde): gsung ni yid 'ong rab tu spyan//zhing brgya dag tu thogs pa med par mchi//sgra ni sems can gang gis thos gyur pa//de dag thams cad bde bas tshim par 'gyur//sems can
474b4(mdo sde): khu lo bsgyur ba sku gcig tu//stong gsum rgya mtsho'i chub rnams zhugs gyur kyang //sems can rags pa rnams la'ang mi gnod la//rdzu 'phrul la yang skyon no yong mi gda'//
474b5(mdo sde): stong gsum gyi nor bo ri rab dag/phyag gcig gi ni mthil du bzhag nas su//zhing mang bye bdag tu gshegs mdzad kyang //khyod kyi sku yi stobs ni zhum mo mchis//khyod ni bskum
474b6(mdo sde): paM brgya phrag bas ma yas nas//brtul zhugs dka' thub tshul khrims yon tan dang //sbyin dang dul dang sdom dang bzod pa dang //basnron 'grus pasam gtan shes rab shin
474b7(mdo sde): bslabs//sangs rgyas bye ba mngal basbyin bkur mdzad//de dag rnams kyis 'i shid pa'i chos kyang brdung //thugs rje ldan zhing 'gro ba'i don gyi phyir//khyod la yongs su
475a1(mdo sde): rtags mi ma //m-im+b+hi ma bzhim zhum par mi k+Sha sh+tsi// ba sa pas mtho bor 'gyur ma lags//dgas du smrams slong //
475a2(mdo sde): myi g.yo ste//'jig rten chos gnas mi gos pad+ma bzhin//chos rnams stong pa mtshan ma ma mchis dang //chu zla 'dridra zhing sgyu ma lta bu dang //dbu 'i rjes 'dra
475a3(mdo sde): glog 'dra dang //smig rgyu'i mtshan nyid lta bur rab tu mkhyen//ngo bo nyid kyis gang zag bdag ma mchis//gdid nas stong zhing mig l+le rjes ma mchis//nam mkha' lta
475a4(mdo sde): bIr dag cing dri ma ma chos//dngos po bas par dngos po ma mchis 'dra//lus dang bya ba rgyu dang rkyen rnams las//byung ba lags kyi rjes ni mA mchis par//rdul
475a5(mdo sde): 'od rnam par sbyang ba mdzad pas na//de phyir khyod ni rdzogs sangs rgyas zhes bgyi//gong dge 'dren pa mthong zhing thos gyur pa//de dag la ni ngan song 'jigapa
475a6(mdo sde): mchis//de dag bde 'gro dag tu mchog gzhol te//srog chags de rnams kyi ni rnyed pa lags//bdag cag rnams kyis gang zag dam pa khyod//kun tu mchod
475a7(mdo sde): pas mchod pa bgyis gnas su//byang chub tu ni sems kyang bskyed pa gyis te//gang zag mchog 'drar thams cad 'gyur bar shog/nam mtha' la ni dpag tu
475b1(mdo sde): nus kyang gda'o//rgya mtsho'i chub ni bas bgyir nus kyang gda'//nyi zla mkha' las sar ni ltung gda' yi//sangs rgyas yon tan pas par 'gyur mi gda'//de nas bcom
475b2(mdo sde): ldan 'das shing rta la bzhugs te nam mkha'i dkyil gyi lam nas gshegs pas gshegs shing /gser gyi kha dog lta bur sku las 'od gang gis stong gsum gyi stong
475b3(mdo sde): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams khyab par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i 'od phyung ba dang /'od des rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po dang /bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri'ang rab tu khyab par
475b4(mdo sde): gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das shing rta ngas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer drang bya rgod kyi phung po'i rig la ba der gshegs so//de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer sde rgyal po

475b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das bsu ba'i phyir rings po rings par rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po nas byung ste/bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ngo //sdong po'i
476a1(mdo sde): smras rnams shing d+hA 'dren du na dus spyan brgyad khri ba ni spyod byed do//mi 'am ci mo'i rim pa si k+sha rmAn g+hIH/des bya da kyi phung po'i rirnams
476a2(mdo sde): cad du grag par gyur to//de ltar mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po dpung dang bcas/'khor dang bcas pas rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i
476a3(mdo sde): dkyil nas khyer te bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la bzhag go/de nas bcom ldan 'das shing rta de las babs nas rang gi gnas su gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so//byang
476a4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' de dag dang nyan thos chen po de dag dang /thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor kyang shing rta de las babs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos
476a5(mdo sde): phyag btsal te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas bcom ldan 'das la kun nas bskor te rang rang gi stan la 'khod do//'dod pa ni spyod pa dang /gzugs na spyod pa
476a6(mdo sde): dang /gan pa gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu de dag kyang shing rta de las babs ti bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal nas phyogs gcig tu mdzod do/

477a1(mdo sde): 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/tshe rlabs thams cad du skye ba dran par 'gyur/lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur/dram

477a3(mdo sde): bdag po sdong po la 'di skad ces smras so//mi 'am ci'i bdag po bcom ldan 'das kyiso khyod kyi yon tan yongs su brjod pa mdzad pas khyod kyis rnyed pa legs
477a4(mdo sde): par rnyed kyis khyod kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba de las shes shig kho bos kyang thob par 'dod do//mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos smras pa/rgyal po chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba

477a7(mdo sde): ba thams cad la ser sna mi bskyed do//dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad sems can thams cad lo gtong yang yid mi bde bar mi 'gyi di/'gyod par mi 'gyur ro//rgyal//
477b1(mdo sde): po chen po byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba glang thams cad mkhyen par yongs su bsngos pa de'ang sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rgyal po chen
477b2(mdo sde): pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub ni sems can thams cad kyi gnas byed pa dang /sems can la sbyor ba dang /sems can gyi phyir 'brang por 'gyur ro//rgyal po
477b3(mdo sde): chen po khyod kyis gang gi phyir dge bo'i ba shes gnyen bcom ldan 'das dang 'dzem dpal gzhon nur gyur pa rnyed de/de gnyis las khyod kyis dam pa'i chos thos nas dus mi

478a1(mdo sde): snyoms sa snod du rgyur gdo//dacos gastsol ba dang 'o sa kyis rmya snyoms lta'i nod pa na la b+h+ri ska /

478a3(mdo sde): na/'di lta ste/ rigs kyi mu byang chub sems dpa'i snod sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis pi rlabs dang /lhag pa'i bsdam pa'i snod bsam pa dang /byang chu la mnye bar ston
478a4(mdo sde): bya'i skyes sbyor ba dang /dge ba'i rtsu ba byed par du 'gro ba'i snyid lhag pa'i bsom pa dang /mang du thos pa'i snod dran pa dang /lamya la 'jug pa'i snod blo gros dang /don

479b1(mdo sde): can gyi khams tshad med pa thos na skrag pa dang /'khor ba chud med pa thos na skrag pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi ye shes tshad med par thos na skrag pa dang /bsod nams tshad med pas//

480a1(mdo sde): la ra ba dang //bsduskabs su dang sangs rgyas thog pa la ro ba dang /dab pa rjes rnam par 'jog pan yal ba 'dor slod yongs su mi 'dzin padang //

481b5(mdo sde): dpa'i spyod pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag byung ngo //phan pa spyod pa dag dang don spyod dang //chos thos nan tan byed pa spyod pa dang //byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa//de dag/
481b6(mdo sde): yongs su skye ba med par spyod//bde ba spyod dang skyid pa spyod pa da //sems can kun lo sems snyoms spyod pa dang //byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa//de dag rgya tshon ma yin
