482b3(mdo sde): chags pa med par spyod//dad pa spyod dang dang ba spyod pa dang //dran dang g.yeng ba med par spyod pa dang //byang chub mchog go spyod pa gang spyod pa//de dag yongs su gcod pa
482b4(mdo sde): med par spyod//bsam gton spyod dang rnam thar spyod pa dang //mngon shes lnga rnams yongs dge spyod pa dang //byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa//de dag chags
482b5(mdo sde): pa med par spyod pa yin//sangs rgyas spyod dang dam chos spyod pa dang //dge 'dun dkon mchog nye bar brtan spyod dang //byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa//de dag dkon
482b6(mdo sde): mchog mchog gi spyod pa yin//chos spyod pa dang shin tu rigs spyod dang //sems can thams cad yongs su smin spyod dang //byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang snyed pa//de
482b7(mdo sde): dag tu na mi 'chad por spyod pa yin//bya ba spyod dang chos rnams spyod pa dang //mtha' kun yongs su gcad pa'i spyod pa dang //byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang sprod pa//de dge
483a1(mdo sde): gang du'ang lta bar spyod pa med//dag par spyod dang rnam par dgra spyod dang //nyon mongs thams cad yongs su gcod spyod dang //byang chub mchog gi spyod pa
483a2(mdo sde): gang spyod pa//de dag yongs su gdung bar spyod pa med//bde ba spyod dang shin tu rnam thar spyod//sems can kun la 'jigs med mchog spyod dang //byang chub mchog gi
483a3(mdo sde): spyod po gang spyod pa//de dag smon lam spyod po med pa yin//nyi mo spyod dang zla ba spyod pa dang //pad+ma lta bur gos pa med spyod dang //byang chubo mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa//
483a4(mdo sde): de dag ltar po ces 'jig rten phyig bya ba//brgya byin spyod dang tshangs pa'i spyod pa dang //dkar po'i chos rnams yongs su rdzogs spyod dang //byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang
483a5(mdo sde): spyod pa//de dag bdud rnams sngar bcas skrag par byed//mchog spyod pa dang khyad par 'phags spod dang //'dod chags nyes pa tho ba ga cad spyod dang //byang chubo mchog
483a6(mdo sde): page spyod pa//de da/gang du'ang gti mug spyod pa // ma spyod pa dang rmugs spyod pa dang //shes rna yong pa smyin de dang //byang chub ma
483a7(mdo sde): gi spyo pa gang spyod pa//de dag yongs su rtog par spyod pa med/dul ba spyod dang rab tu zhe spyod dang //ming dang gzugs la mi chags spyod pa dang //byang chub mchog gi
483b1(mdo sde): bya gang sod pa//ded//lha dang mi ni rang pos brjod//'phags pa'i spyod dang shin tu mnyas bud dang //g.yon phyogs lam na yangs su gcod spyad dang //byang
483b2(mdo sde): gispyod pa gang spyod pa//de dag rtag tu don sa 'babya ma yin//dpa' bo spyod dang shin tu brtan spyod pa//bad kyi sde rnams 'jigs par byed sprid dang //byang chubo mchog mi
483b3(mdo sde): spyod pa gang spyod po//de dag byang chub sring por gzhol ba yin//gzung po spyod dang don yod spyod pa dang //gzungs la g.yengs pa med par spyod pa dang //byeg zhang mchog
483b4(mdo sde): gi spyod pa gang spyod pa/de dag gang du'ang ma rig spyod pa med//dgon po spyod dang rab tu dpon spyod pa//rtag tu rab tu 'byung bar spyod pa dang //byang chub mchog go spyong pa
483b5(mdo sde): gang spod pa de dag nan tan byed par spyod pa yin//gtso bo'i spyod dang khyad par 'phags spyod dang //'jig rten thams cad zil gi non spyod pa dang //byang chub mchog gi
483b6(mdo sde): spyod po kyang rjod pa//de dag chung ngu la ni spyod pa med//rig pa po spyod dang thabs la spyod pa dang //bsam gtan bde las ldog par spyod po dang //bya 'amachog gi sbyor
483b7(mdo sde): gang spyod pa//de dag mi shi sa spyod pa med kyi yin//ltang spyod dang rnam phrer lha spyod do //ming dang gra thugs la mi chags spyod pa dang //byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gong
484a1(mdo sde): //de 'dugs pa ra pa da pa na//ma da spyod du su/spyo /nga sa smo pa smo da/d+hU
484a2(mdo sde): mchog gi spyod pa gang smad pa//de dag yi shes nam mkha'i mthu' dang 'dra//byang chub sems dpa'i snod pa bstan pa'i tshogs su bcud pa mngon par
484a3(mdo sde): 'ad zung gi skye de las nga na/nga chub sems dpa' nga mas pa'i chos lnga ban pa ba ba myur gyur //rgyas pas zhes dga'i la khor dang /
484a4(mdo sde): khab kyi bram ze dang/khyim bdag dang /mo 'am ci dang dri zodang sna'i phye chen po de dag gi 'khar gyi sgrog tshogs brgyad steng bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i drung
484a5(mdo sde): chub tu sems bskyed nas tshig 'dri skad ces bcom ldan 'das bdag cog kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'di la bsleb par bgyi'o//nan tan gyis bsgrul
484a6(mdo sde): bgyi'o//sems can tshad ma mchis pa dag kyang byang chub sems dpe'i spyod pa/ ny-i yang dag par 'dzin du skal bar byegyi'o nas smras so//rdo ram pami ldan
484a7(mdo sde): sa kyis mi'am tsha'i rgyam ba rjong ba rdzo//denas kyi na sa kyis gnang byas maci'i rgyal ba nga po ma/da
484b1(mdo sde): dang byacas/rlung gi skye bo dang bcas 'khor dang bcas te/bcom ldan 'das kyi nabs la mgo thos phyag bcal nas bcom ldan 'das la lhan gsum bskor pa byas te/bzod pa
484b2(mdo sde): gsol nas sil snyan dkrol/me tog gi char phag/'od zer gyi dru ba phyung ste/sa chen po rnam pa drug tu g.yos par byis nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas song ste/de skad
484b3(mdo sde): cig thang cig yud tsam de nyid la ri'i rgyal po spos kyi ngad ldang du rang gi khyim du phyin to//de nas bcom ldan 'das la lho'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol
484b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang chos la mchod pas bdag zil gyis non to//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
484b5(mdo sde): kau shi ka mo ma ci'i rgyal po sdong pos khyod 'ba' zhig zil gyis mnan pa ma yin gyis/kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos thob pa ma gtogs par gang
484b6(mdo sde): dag stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi brgya byin dang /tshangs pa dang 'jig rten skyong ba dang /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas de dag thams cad mi 'am ci'i rgyalang rje
484b7(mdo sde): pos zil gyis non to//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems bskyed ma thag pas/nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang /brgya byin dang chang
485a1(mdo sde): pa dang /'jig rten skyong ba thams cad zil gyis non to//kau shrI ka de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' ni lhar bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis zil gyis mi non
485a2(mdo sde): to//gang byang chub sems dpa' la zil gyis gnon par sems dpa' de ni de bzhin gshegs po la zil gyis gnon par 'dod pa'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/byang chub
485a3(mdo sde): sems dpa'o las ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ngo //de bzhin gshegs pa las ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas 'byung ngo //de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin
485a4(mdo sde): gyis bstan pa 'di thos nas thal mo sbyar te mchi ma blags nas 'di skad ces kye ma'o//bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi mkhyen pa chags pa mi mnga' zhing sgrib pa mi mnga' ba 'di
485a5(mdo sde): lta bu las nyams so zhes smras so//de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi bu lha'i bu 'od zer bsrung zhes bya ba'akhor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des lha rnams
485a6(mdo sde): kyi dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so//yab 'di ltar gang rab tu dben pa rnam par bsgrub par nye ba ro gnas pa'i mtshan nyid ma lags pa'i chos rnams la//
485a7(mdo sde): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems mi bskyed pa de ni sems can thams cad la snying rje rnyed pa/lags/rgya chen po la mos pa'i dge ba'i bshes
485b1(mdo sde): na la stod bu ma lags te/phyis 'gyod par 'gyur ba'o//ub sgron med pa la zhugs te rgyud chag cing sa bon tshig ste/theg pa chen po'i snod du ma gyur pa ltung
485b2(mdo sde): babyor ci mchis/bstan pa 'di bo shwad pa na sum nu rje gsum ris kyi lho'i bu lasna lha'i bu skyong tham pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems bskyed
485b3(mdo sde): do//de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i bu 'ang zer skyong gis 'di skad nas gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dka' ba stod
485b4(mdo sde): phyi bad+ma n+d+har phrag ji snyed pa bcom ldan 'dres sngun byang chub sems dpa' smad pa spyod pa na smyan pa ni bdag la mngon sum du gyur to//bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan
485b5(mdo sde): snor byang chub sems dpar gyur pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bzhim pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar mi mdzad las mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab rje 'phru
485b6(mdo sde): bzod pa thob pa de la 'jug pa'i rnam par dbye ba bstan pa cung zad cig bcom ldan 'das kyis bshud du gsol/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi skye
485b7(mdo sde): ba'i chos la bzod pa rab cu thob pa gang bdog gis thos nas de bzhin nyid du bsgrubs pas chos de 'thob par 'gyur/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das
486a1(mdo sde): lha'i bu 'od zer srung la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//'od zer srung byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskrun pa rnams kyis me skye ba'i chos la bzod
486a2(mdo sde): pa thob par mi 'gyur zlos/byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba brtan pa rnams kyis mo skye ba'i chos la brjod par 'gyur ro//'od byer srung byung chub sems dpa'
486a3(mdo sde): chos bzhi dang ldan na mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob par 'gyur ro//bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/sangs rgyas mnyam pa nyid dang chos mnyam po nyid dang dge 'dun
486a4(mdo sde): mnyam pa nyid dang /zhing mnyam pa nyid de/lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na mi skye ba'i chos lo bzod pa rab tu thob par 'gyur ro//
486a5(mdo sde): lha'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob par 'gyur ro//bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/bsam gtan bzhis
486a6(mdo sde): stong pa nyid la rnam por rtsi ba dang /pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis tha bas mkhas pa la rnam par rtse ba dang /mngon par shes pa lngas ye shes la rnam par rtse ba dang /thogs/
486a7(mdo sde): pa med pa'i ye shes kyis rdzu 'phrul la rnam par rtsi ba ste/'od zer srung byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob par
486b1(mdo sde): gyur //'od par srung gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'achos shidang ldanan ma skye ba'i chos la bzod parab tu thob par 'gyur ro//bzhi gang non 'di lta ste/phung po rnams lnga byung
486b2(mdo sde): chub 'tshol yang phung po rnams la byang chub kyi rang bzhin du mos pa ma yin pa dang /khams rnams la byang chub 'tshol yang khams rnams la byang chub kyi rang bzhin du
486b3(mdo sde): mos pa ma yin pa dang /skye mchod rnams la byang chuba'i tshol yang /skye mched rnams la byang chub kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog pa dang /chos thams cad la byang chub 'tshol yad
486b4(mdo sde): chos thams cad la byang chub kyi rang bzhin du mos pa ma yin pa ste/'od zer srung byong chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po di dag dang ldan na mi skye ba'i chos la bzod rlab tu thob par 'gyur
486b5(mdo sde): /'od zer srung gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan ni mo skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob par 'gyur ro//bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/mi g.yo ba'i
486b6(mdo sde): tshul gyis chos thams cad yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas par shes pa dang /dus gsum mnyam pa nyid pas chos thams cad de bzhin nyid la gnas par 'jug pa dang /chos
486b7(mdo sde): thams cad mtshan nyid 'dres pa med pas chos kyi dbyings su 'du bar shis pa dang /chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su song bas nam mkha'i rang bzhin du sa
487a1(mdo sde): sor rtog pa ste/'od zer srung byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob par 'gyur ro//mi skye ba'i
487a2(mdo sde): chos la bzod pa rab tu thob pa bstan pa 'di bshod pa na byang chub sems dpa' lnga stong /mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob par gyur to//lha'i bu 'od zer srung
487a3(mdo sde): ni rjes su mthun pa'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob par gyur to//chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i tha mar bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal
487a4(mdo sde): pa/kun dga' bo khyod kyis mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos zhus pa pha rol tu phyin pas 'dul ba bstan pa'i sgo'i le'u'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung ngam/kun dga'
487a5(mdo sde): bos gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/sangs rgyas kyi mthu nyid kyis bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung lags so//bcom ldan 'das kye ma'o ji
487a6(mdo sde): ma du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zab mo rnam par nges pa dang don bzang po dang tshig 'bru bzang pos brgyan pa ni mdzes te ngo mtshar to//bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs
487a7(mdo sde): 'di la bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi sgom bsdus pa de gang yang ma mchis so//bcom ldan 'das sngon bdag la chos snang bar gyur pa gang lags pa de'ang chos
487b1(mdo sde): rnam grangs 'di la brten nas 'bum 'gyur du skyes so//bcom ldan 'das bdag ni 'di snyam du bdag lta bu nyi rgyu ba'i 'tshal ba dang ldan pa blo chung nga nyan zas kyi thag pa'i smon
487b2(mdo sde): mya mchis pa/thachang la zhugs par gnas pas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas kyang 'di lta bu'i chos kyi snang ba 'di skyes par gyur na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
487b3(mdo sde): po ye shes tshad ma mchis pa'i snod du gyur pa//blo rgya che zhing rgya mtsho lta bu dang ldan pa chos rin po che thams cad yongs su 'dzin pa/gsol ba ma btab par sems can thams
487b4(mdo sde): cad kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen bgyi ba gang lags pa de dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos na chos kyi snang ba ji snyed cig thob par 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal snyam bgyid do//
487b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo stong gsum gyi skyong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi nyi ma dang zla ba'i snang ba ji snyed pa de thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i
487b6(mdo sde): spu gcig gis 'od kyi mog mog por 'gyur ro//kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa'i spu'i khung bu thams cad nas 'od ji snyed byung ba de dag ni shes rab kyi 'od kyi brgya'i rgyur
487b7(mdo sde): yid nye bar mi 'gro ste/stong gi cha dang stong phrag brgya'i cha dang /bye ba'i cha dang bye ba khrag khrig pargya drag stong gi cha dang grangs dang cha dang bgrang ba dang de'i dang rgyar yang nye bar mi
488a1(mdo sde): 'gro'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/snang ba thams cad ni shes rab kyi snang ba las byung ba'i phyir ro//kun dga' bo de bdan gshegs pa'i shes
488a2(mdo sde): rab kyi snang ba gang yin pa shes rab kyi snang ba de dang ldan na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'das pa dang mdo
488a3(mdo sde): pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa dang /g.yo ba rnams mkhyen pa'i shes rab kyi snang ba de lta bu dang rigs kyi bu dang rigs
488a4(mdo sde): b+hi bu mo dag ldan par 'gyur ro//kun dga' bo gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan pa dang /byos nas kyang mos pa dang mis nas kyang 'dzin pa dang 'chad pa dang /
488a5(mdo sde): klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher rab tu ston pa dang tshul bzhin du so sor rtogs pa dang /de bzhin du bsgrub pa de dag ni byang chub
488a6(mdo sde): kyi sems mi brjid pa dang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba don du gnyer ba dang snying rje chen po'i go cha bgos pa dang byams pa chen po'i go cha bgos pa dang
488a7(mdo sde): bdud dang phyir rgol ba bcom pa dang byang chub kyi snying por gzhol ba'i skyes bu dam par rig par bya'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di
488b1(mdo sde): skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas mos pa dang /'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par bgyid pa dang /
488b2(mdo sde): gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher rab tu ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de bsod nams ji snyed cig snyed par 'gyur/pa com ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
488b3(mdo sde): pa/kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis snga dro'i dus kyi tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po che sna bdun gyis
488b4(mdo sde): rab tu bkang ste/rgyun du zhugs pa dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang phyir mi 'ong ba dang dgra bcom pa dang /rang sangs rgyas dang /de bzhin gshegs pa
488b5(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la sbyin pa byin pa dang /de bzhin du nyi ma'i gung dang phye ma red kyi dus dang srod dang nam gyi gung thun dang /tho
488b6(mdo sde): rengs stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rin po che sna bdun gyis yongs su bkang ste/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag /
488b7(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bar la sbyin pa byin pa dang rnam grangs 'di lta bus lo gcig gam+ba/lo brgya'am/lo stong ngam/lo brgya phrag stong du sbyin pa
489a1(mdo sde): byin na kun dga' bo de la ji snyam du sems/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag nyi de la sa bsod nams mang du spyod dam/kun+d+ha dga' sa
489a2(mdo sde): gsol ba/bcom ldan 'das mang ste tshad mi mchis so//bde bar gshegs pa dpag tu ma mchis so//bcom ldan 'das gdugs gcig bsags
489a3(mdo sde): pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de'ang tshad ma mchis na/dgung lo brgya phrag skyong du bsags pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshul/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
489a4(mdo sde): pa/kun dga' bo khyod mos par bya'o//khyod kyis khong du chud par bya'o//byang chub don du gnyer ba dang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba don du gnyer ba dang /
489a5(mdo sde): sems can rab tu thar bar bya ba don du gnyer ba gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas mos sam/'dzin tam/'chang ngam klog gam/kun chub par byed
489a6(mdo sde): na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa de de las bsod nams kyi phung po mang du skyed na gang de bzhin nyid du bsgrub pa lta smos kyang
489a7(mdo sde): dgos/'i phyir dzi na/kun ga' bo gang dge chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las zin tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad patsam 'dzin tam/'chang ngam
489b1(mdo sde): gam/kun chub par byud dam/gzhan dgu la'ang ston na de ni sbyin pa zhes bya ste/de ni sbyin pa thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'o//'di lta ste chos kyi sbyin du
489b2(mdo sde): 'dir son pa rnams kyi mchog ga/'di lta ste chos kyi rjes su 'dzin pa de ni rjes su bzung ba rnams kyi mchog go/'di lta ste chos kyi gding ba de ni gdong ba rnams
489b3(mdo sde): mchog go/'di lta ste/chos yongs su 'dzin pa de ni yongs su 'dzin pa rnams kyi mchog go//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kun dga' bo chos kyi sbyin pa byin pas ni nyon
489b4(mdo sde): mongs pa 'bri bar 'gyur ro//zang zing gi sbyin pa byin pas ni lus brtan pa byas par 'gyur ro//kun dga' bo de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa'i nyon mongs pa 'bri bar byed
489b5(mdo sde): 'dod pas sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba chos kyi sbyin po de sbyin par bya ste/chos kyi sbyin pa des ni yon tan gyi khyad par thams cad thob par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa'
489b6(mdo sde): chos kyi sbyin pa sbyin pa ni yon tan gyi phan yon yang dag phul sum cu rtsa gnyis rab tu 'dzin par 'gyur ro//sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/'di lta ste dran pa dang ldan par 'gyur
489b7(mdo sde): ba dang blo gros dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang rtogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang 'dod chags chung bar 'gyur ba dang /zhe sdang chung bar 'gyur ba dang /gti mug chung bar 'gyur ba dang
490a1(mdo sde): bdag dang gzhan gyi nyon mongs pa tshar gcod par 'gyur ba dang /skye bo mang po dga' bar 'gyur ba dang de'i bsngags pa lha rnams kyi brjod
490a2(mdo sde): par 'gyur ba dang /lha dang sku dang gnod sbyin dang dri za rnams kyis bsrung bar 'gyur ba dang /las byas nas bsod snyoms za bar 'gyur ba dang /chos gos
490a3(mdo sde): dang bsod snyoms dang mal cha dang nu ba'i gsos smon dang yo byad rnyed par 'gyur ba dang grags pa dang sgra dang tshigs su bcad pa phyogs bcur grags par 'gyur
490a4(mdo sde): ba dang /mi ma yin pa rnams kyis klags rnyed par mi 'gyur ba dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bsngags por 'gyur ba dang /dam pa'i chos
490a5(mdo sde): yongs su bsrung ba dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis dam pa'i chos 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang ngan song thams cad kyis 'jigs par mi 'gyur zhing /
490a6(mdo sde): de la lha dang mir skye ba dka' bar mi 'gyur ba dang /sangs rgyasgra mthong pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ba dang /chos nyan pa dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba dang /dge
490a7(mdo sde): 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba dang /skye ba drin par 'gyur ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par skye bar 'gyur ba dang
490b1(mdo sde): nam du'ang dbang po mi tshang par mi 'gyur ba dang /skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis thob par 'gyur ba dang /gzi brjid can gzungs kyi sa bon bsgrub par
490b2(mdo sde): 'gyur ba dang /spobs pa rgyun mi 'chad pa'i rgyu rab tu 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang /skye bo mkhas pas g.yog byas par 'gyur ba dang shes rab chen po'i rgyu rab tu 'dzin
490b3(mdo sde): par 'gyur ba dang /myur du chos kyi snang ba rab tu thob par 'gyur ba dang /de'i sems la tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i yid la byed pa kun tu mi 'byung ba dang /'jig rten
490b4(mdo sde): gyi zang zing gi sbyin pa thams cad zil gyis mnan nas de chos kyi gter zad mi shes pa yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ba ste/kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi
490b5(mdo sde): sbyin pa sbyin na yon tan gyi khyad par yang dag phul sum cu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag thob par 'gyur ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis
490b6(mdo sde): 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung lags te/bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'o slad na
490b7(mdo sde): sems can snod du gyur pa de dag gi rna lam du bsgrag par bgyi/kun bsrung bar bgyi/mos par bgyi/de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni yon tan
491a1(mdo sde): phun sum tshogs pa 'di dang bsod namas+ya yongs su 'dzin pa don du gnyer ba'i slad du'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha rnams
491a2(mdo sde): kyi dbang po brgya byin la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste/kau shi ka khyod dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir nga'i mdun du seng ge'i sgra bsgrags pa
491a3(mdo sde): legs so legs so//kau shi ka dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di ngu'i dam pa'i chos yun ji srid du gnas pa de srid du lha dang lha ma yin g.yul 'gyed pa na lha ma yin
491a4(mdo sde): rnams ni pham par 'gyur lha rnams ni rgyal bar 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni yang dag phul yin te/kau shi ka 'di
491a5(mdo sde): lte ste/chos thams cad mi dmigs pa de ni 'jigs pa myed pa'i sbyin pa'o//kau shi ka gang cung zad 'jigs pa skye ba de dag thams cad ni 'jig tshogs la
491a6(mdo sde): ltelci ba la dmigs shing rab tu gnas pa las byung ngo //kau shi ka gong mi dmigs pa de dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das la
491a7(mdo sde): mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag bsam gtan gyi bde ba la gnas pa chad ma mchis pa bting ste/grong
491b1(mdo sde): nga grang khyer dang grong rdul dang ljongs dang /yul 'khor dang /rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor gang dang gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rab tu spyod pad+ma dang du dag tu bdag tsho
491b2(mdo sde): pa'i slad du nye bar mchi bar bgyi'o//mchis nas kyang chos smra ba de dag chos dang ldan pas bsrung ba dang /sba ba dang bsgrub par bgyi'o//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom
491b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas dang brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang 'jig rten skyeng ba dang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rnams ni 'di las byung ba'i skyed du'o//de nas
491b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po bzhis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das rgyal po chen po bzhi po bdag cag dang /bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos che
491b5(mdo sde): pa de dag dang bdag cag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du bsrung ba dang sba ba dang bskyab pa la brtson par bgyi'o//bdag cag gi
491b6(mdo sde): 'khor gang dag sangs rgyas dang sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la ma dad pa de dag kyang ji nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa bsrung ba'i slad du rtson par 'gyur bar dad par bgyi'o//
491b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das dge slong dang dge slong ma dang dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma gang dag sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la rtson pa dang /gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa
492a1(mdo sde): mngon par dud pa srung ba ma mchis pa de dag srung ba'i ched du gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag la kha ton du bgyi'o//gsang sngags kyi tshig
492a2(mdo sde): 'di dag gis gnod sbyin dang srin po dang dri za dang me'am ci deng lci 'phye chen po dang /grul bum la sogs pa drud myi dang mi ma lags pa dang /gnan yang
492a3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi bstan po la zhe sdang bar bgyid pa rnams shin tu tshar tshod por 'gyur ro//tAd+ya thA/ta rA be a ro be oM n+do be sa ra be/hu lu mahA hu lu
492a4(mdo sde): hu lu/hu lu/a bdA Te/bi kad Te/pa ri tshad ni/nI gra ni hA te/pra b+hU ta ni/i do Te id tI/bid Ti bid Ti/ad tshe gad tshe/me ra ni gra
492a5(mdo sde): ha na/sarba pa ra pra bA de ni/graha na sarba ma~M bya pra p+ta/ta na na ni g+hA h+Na na/sarba/bud d+ha ba ra nri te d+harma ni ya ta shi ya b+hU tin+ta/b+had d+ha ba ra ni ta na/tsa shwar maH
492a6(mdo sde): rA dza nir de sha na/mun tra ba lan/a ba tA ra/a bya tA ra/prAk+Shi Na ni gra hA ya/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang byang
492a7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan la bka' stsal pa/skyes bu dam pa da /nges bskal pa mtha' yas grangs med par bskyobs pa'i byang chub 'di ji nas yun ring du
492b1(mdo sde): gnas par 'gyur ba dang nub par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir khyed gnyis kyi lhag tu bzhag glo gtad do//de gnyis kyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag rtag
492b2(mdo sde): gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'dres pa'i slad na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung bar bgyi'o//rgyas par bgyi'o//chos kyi rnam grangs 'di chos
492b3(mdo sde): smra ba dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi lag tu mchi bar bgyi'o//de dag mdo sde 'di la mos par bgyi ba dang yongs su 'dzin
492b4(mdo sde): par bgyi ba'i slad du de dag gi yid rab tu gzung bar bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang dag gi rna lam du thos pa dang /
492b5(mdo sde): thos nas 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang /klog pa dang kun chub par bgyid pa dang /'chad pa de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'
492b6(mdo sde): lha'i cod pan gyi byin gyi brlabs lpags par rig par bgyi'o//de nas bdud sdig can 'khor der 'dus par gyur nas 'dug pa de gdong las mchi ma zag cing nga ro phyung
492b7(mdo sde): nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das gang bcom ldan 'das kyis nyan thos kyi theg pa las brtsams te/chos bstan pa de la
493a1(mdo sde): ni bdag tha na spu zing zhes bgyid pa tsam yang ma mchis so//glang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'i phyag rgya de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin
493a2(mdo sde): brlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byang chub kyi lam la 'jug pa/sems can thams cad kyi rton pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gsungs pa de
493a3(mdo sde): bdag mya ngan gyi zug rngu dang ldan zhing bdag nyid rnyis par gyur pa snyam bgyid do//bcom ldan 'das bdag la phyag brkyang ba bstsal du gsol/gang thos pas bdag mya ngan gyi
493a4(mdo sde): zug rngu dang ldan par 'gyur ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu'ang mi gsung bar gsol/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'o stsal pa/sdig can khyod dang mthun pa'i sems can chos
493a5(mdo sde): zab mo 'di lta bu la ma mos pa ni mang /gang bdag mos pa'i sems can de dag ni nyung gis/mya ngan ma byed smre sngags ma 'don cig/sdig can 'di lta ste dper na/sa'i steng
493a6(mdo sde): nas rdul blangs pa snyed kyi sems can ni chos kyi rnam grangs zab mo 'di lta bu la mos so//sa'i rdul ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sems can ni chos kyi rnam grangs zab mo 'di lam mos te/de
493a7(mdo sde): dag thams cad ni khyod dang mthun no//sems can gyi khams tshad med pa khyod dang mthun gyis de bas na sdig can dka' bar gyis zhig/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na sems can
493b1(mdo sde): dpag tu med pa ni byang chub la yang dag par zhugs so//byang chub sems dpa' dgu khri nyis skyong ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob par gyur to//srog chags brgyad khri bani stongan
493b2(mdo sde): chos rnams la chos kyi mge rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/dge slong brgyad stong ni nye b.raro len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo//stong gsum gyi
493b3(mdo sde): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos nas snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur te/lha'i me tog gi char ni rab tu bab/sil snyan brgya stong dag ni ma dkrol bar rang 'khrol lo//
493b4(mdo sde): lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong rnams ni steng gi bar snang la kye ma bdag cag gis dzem+bu'i gling du chos kyi 'khor lo lani gnyis bskor ba 'di mthong ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis gang dag yang
493b5(mdo sde): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan te bshad nas sems can gyi don mdzad pa gang lags pa 'di ni grong khyer 'khor mo 'jig tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te/sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa de
493b6(mdo sde): bas ches mchog go//gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang /'chang ba dang /klog pa dang /kun chub par bgyid pa dang /gzhan dag la rgya cher ston pa dang /tha na glegs bam la bris te/
493b7(mdo sde): 'chang ba'i sems can de dag kyang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur ro zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do//de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang /byang chub
494a1(mdo sde): sems dpa' lha'i cod pan+da dang /tshe dang ldan pa kun dge' ngos 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/'dri ma
494a2(mdo sde): ltar gzung bar bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu dag de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos zhus pa pha rol tu phyin pa
494a3(mdo sde): rnam par nges pa bstan pa dang /dam pa'i chos rin po che'i le'u zhes bya bar yang zung shig/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'
494a4(mdo sde): byams pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la yi rangs te mngon par dga'o//'phags pa
494a5(mdo sde): mi'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so////zhus chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de
494a6(mdo sde): dpal gyi lhun po dang /dpal brtsegs kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//mad+hA laM//zhus dag
